core_function.cn: 展示品牌Logo与名称，建立品牌认知
core_function.en: Display brand logo and name, establish brand recognition

design_highlights.cn: 渐变粉色背景搭配白色Logo，传递女性健康产品的温柔专业感
design_highlights.en: Gradient pink background with white logo conveys gentle professionalism for women's health

design_highlights.cn: 花瓣与羽毛结合的图形Logo设计，象征轻盈、自然与女性特质
design_highlights.en: Petal and feather combined logo symbolizes lightness, nature and femininity

design_highlights.cn: 手写风格品牌字体增添亲和力，降低健康类App的距离感
design_highlights.en: Handwritten brand font adds approachability, reducing the distance of health apps

product_insight.cn: Flo作为女性健康追踪应用，启动页通过柔和配色与有机图形建立情感连接。Logo融合花瓣/羽毛元素暗示经期追踪的核心功能，品牌识别度极高，值得借鉴其视觉符号与功能的隐喻关联。
product_insight.en: Flo establishes emotional connection through soft colors and organic shapes. The petal/feather logo subtly hints at period tracking functionality, creating high brand recognition worth learning from.

core_function.cn: 展示品牌标识，建立第一印象并加载应用
core_function.en: Display brand identity and establish first impression while loading

design_highlights.cn: 采用标志性珊瑚粉色作为品牌主色，视觉冲击力强且辨识度高
design_highlights.en: Signature coral pink brand color creates strong visual impact and high recognition

design_highlights.cn: 温暖友好的欢迎文案配合柔和图标，传递女性关怀氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm welcome copy with soft icon conveys feminine care atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计只保留logo和欢迎语，聚焦品牌认知
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with only logo and welcome text focuses on brand recognition

product_insight.cn: Flo作为女性健康追踪应用，启动页用鲜明的粉色建立品牌调性，简洁的欢迎语降低新用户心理门槛，动态加载指示器暗示即将进入精彩体验，整体设计专业且温暖。
product_insight.en: Flo establishes brand identity with signature pink, welcoming copy reduces barriers for new users, loading indicator hints at upcoming experience - professional yet warm design for women's health app.

core_function.cn: 展示品牌标识，建立品牌认知，加载应用资源
core_function.en: Display brand identity and load app resources

design_highlights.cn: 采用高饱和度品牌蓝作为全屏背景，配合白色logo形成强烈视觉冲击
design_highlights.en: High-saturation brand blue background with white logo creates strong visual impact

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计只保留品牌名，无干扰元素，聚焦品牌记忆点
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with only brand name, no distracting elements

design_highlights.cn: 底部加载指示器给予用户进度反馈，减少等待焦虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom loading indicator provides progress feedback to reduce waiting anxiety

product_insight.cn: MyFitnessPal作为头部健康类App，启动页采用纯净品牌色+居中logo的经典模式，强化品牌辨识度。蓝色传递专业、可信赖的健康形象，值得健康类产品借鉴。
product_insight.en: MyFitnessPal uses classic centered logo on brand color, reinforcing brand recognition. Blue conveys professionalism and trustworthiness in health space.

core_function.cn: 展示品牌Logo，建立品牌认知
core_function.en: Display brand logo and establish brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 纯黑背景搭配白色Logo，极简高对比设计营造高端感
design_highlights.en: Pure black background with white logo creates premium minimalist aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 抽象人形Logo融合字母R设计，传达运动/健身品牌调性
design_highlights.en: Abstract human figure merged with letter R conveys fitness brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 动态奔跑姿态的Logo传递活力与积极向上的品牌精神
design_highlights.en: Running pose logo conveys energy and positive brand spirit

product_insight.cn: 启动页采用极简设计策略，通过高对比度和符号化Logo快速建立品牌记忆点。人形运动图标暗示产品定位为健身/运动类应用，首屏即传递核心价值主张。
product_insight.en: Minimalist splash screen strategy uses high contrast and symbolic logo for instant brand recognition. Athletic figure hints at fitness app positioning, conveying core value proposition from first screen.

core_function.cn: 展示品牌Logo，建立品牌认知
core_function.en: Display brand logo and establish brand recognition

design_highlights.cn: 纯黑背景搭配白色Logo，极简高对比度设计强化运动品牌调性
design_highlights.en: Pure black background with white logo, minimalist high-contrast design reinforces athletic brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 定制化字体Logo设计，几何化字母造型传递力量与速度感
design_highlights.en: Custom typography logo with geometric letterforms conveying power and speed

design_highlights.cn: Logo居中布局营造专注感，暗色调呼应专业运动员氛围
design_highlights.en: Centered logo creates focus, dark tone evokes professional athlete atmosphere

product_insight.cn: Strava采用极简启动页设计，纯黑背景与醒目Logo形成强烈视觉冲击，既保证快速加载又强化品牌记忆，符合运动类App专业、硬核的定位调性。
product_insight.en: Strava uses minimalist launch design with pure black background and bold logo for strong visual impact, ensuring fast loading while reinforcing brand memory, matching the professional athletic app positioning.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化训练计划，引导用户注册
core_function.en: Display personalized training plan to drive user registration

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合霓虹绿色强调，专业运动感十足
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with neon green accents creates professional athletic feel

design_highlights.cn: 先展示完整计划内容再要求注册，降低决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Shows complete plan before requiring signup, reducing decision friction

design_highlights.cn: "just for you"强调个性化，提升用户专属感
design_highlights.en: "Just for you" emphasizes personalization, enhancing exclusivity

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示1/5完成状态，营造已开始的沉浸感
design_highlights.en: Progress bar showing 1/5 completion creates sense of started journey

product_insight.cn: 采用"先体验后注册"策略，通过展示详细的个性化周计划让用户感受产品价值，同时显示部分完成进度制造沉没成本心理，大幅提升注册转化率
product_insight.en: Uses 'try before signup' strategy, showing detailed personalized weekly plan to demonstrate value while partial completion creates sunk cost psychology, significantly improving registration conversion

core_function.cn: 展示OB-GYN医生推荐背书，建立产品可信度
core_function.en: Display OB-GYN recommendation endorsement to build product credibility

design_highlights.cn: 柔和粉色花卉插图营造女性化温馨氛围，与经期追踪主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Soft pink floral illustrations create feminine and warm atmosphere, matching period tracking theme

design_highlights.cn: "#1 female OB-GYN-recommended"大字号突出权威背书，增强用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Large '#1 female OB-GYN-recommended' headline emphasizes authority endorsement, enhancing user trust

design_highlights.cn: 底部标注调研来源（225位美国OB-GYN，DRG 2021），以数据支撑增强说服力
design_highlights.en: Footer cites survey source (225 US OB-GYNs, DRG 2021), enhancing persuasiveness with data

product_insight.cn: 健康类App巧妙运用医学专业人士背书策略，通过第三方权威调研数据建立信任，降低用户对隐私敏感型应用的心理门槛，值得同类产品借鉴
product_insight.en: Health app cleverly uses medical professional endorsement strategy, building trust through third-party authoritative research data, lowering psychological barriers for privacy-sensitive apps

core_function.cn: 展示排卵追踪核心功能，引导用户开始备孕旅程
core_function.en: Showcase ovulation tracking features and guide users to start fertility journey

design_highlights.cn: 圆润卡片搭配实物图片，建立情感共鸣与产品信任感
design_highlights.en: Rounded cards with real photos create emotional connection and product trust

design_highlights.cn: "Let's reach your goal together"文案传递陪伴感，降低备孕焦虑
design_highlights.en: Supportive copy "Let's reach your goal together" reduces fertility anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 粉色醒目CTA按钮"Start my journey"，使用旅程隐喻激发行动
design_highlights.en: Pink prominent CTA with journey metaphor motivates action

design_highlights.cn: 三个功能点用粉色勾选图标，清晰传达核心价值
design_highlights.en: Three checkmark bullet points clearly communicate core value propositions

product_insight.cn: 通过排卵倒计时预览和验孕棒/B超实物图，精准触达备孕用户心理诉求。功能点强调预测准确性和社区支持，构建产品专业度与情感归属双重价值。
product_insight.en: Ovulation countdown preview and pregnancy test imagery precisely target fertility users' needs. Feature highlights emphasize prediction accuracy and community support, building both professional credibility and emotional belonging.

core_function.cn: 展示产品价值主张，引导用户注册使用
core_function.en: Showcase product value and guide users to sign up

design_highlights.cn: 真实人物照片配合数据卡片叠加，传递健康积极的品牌调性
design_highlights.en: Real person photo with data card overlay conveys healthy and positive brand tone

design_highlights.cn: 文案"Ready for some wins"激发用户成就感期待，降低使用门槛
design_highlights.en: Copy 'Ready for some wins' creates achievement anticipation and lowers barrier

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色高对比CTA按钮突出，免费注册降低转化阻力
design_highlights.en: High-contrast blue CTA button stands out, free signup reduces conversion friction

design_highlights.cn: 轮播指示器暗示更多内容，引导用户探索产品功能
design_highlights.en: Carousel indicators hint at more content, encouraging feature exploration

product_insight.cn: 通过蛋白质追踪数据预览展示产品核心功能，配合真实用户形象建立信任感。"Start tracking, it's easy"降低新用户心理门槛，免费注册策略最大化获客漏斗顶部流量。
product_insight.en: Protein tracking preview showcases core feature with real user imagery building trust. 'It's easy' messaging lowers psychological barrier while free signup maximizes top-of-funnel acquisition.

core_function.cn: 展示App核心功能，引导用户注册或登录
core_function.en: Showcase app features and guide users to sign up or log in

design_highlights.cn: 3D卡片轮播展示真实界面，Premium标识增强价值感知
design_highlights.en: 3D card carousel showcases real interface with Premium badge enhancing perceived value

design_highlights.cn: 醒目蓝色CTA按钮"Sign Up For Free"降低注册门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent blue CTA 'Sign Up For Free' reduces signup friction

design_highlights.cn: "Discover the impact"文案激发用户探索欲望和目标感
design_highlights.en: Copy 'Discover the impact' evokes curiosity and goal-oriented motivation

design_highlights.cn: 数据可视化环形图直观展示卡路里追踪核心功能
design_highlights.en: Circular data visualization intuitively displays calorie tracking core feature

product_insight.cn: 通过展示Premium版真实界面作为引导页，既展示核心功能价值又预埋付费升级心智。免费注册CTA配合登录入口的层级设计，优先转化新用户同时照顾老用户回归。
product_insight.en: Showing Premium interface as welcome screen demonstrates core value while planting upgrade intent. Free signup CTA with secondary login balances new user conversion and returning user needs.

core_function.cn: 展示智能手表连接与实时教练功能价值
core_function.en: Showcase smartwatch connectivity and live coaching value

design_highlights.cn: 真实Apple Watch Ultra产品图展示，增强专业感和设备兼容性认知
design_highlights.en: Real Apple Watch Ultra imagery enhances professionalism and device compatibility

design_highlights.cn: 使用真实用户跑步记录卡片（柏林半马），增加真实感和成就激励
design_highlights.en: Real user running record card (Berlin Half Marathon) adds authenticity and achievement motivation

design_highlights.cn: 双CTA设计，青绿色Sign Up按钮突出，Log In采用幽灵按钮降低视觉权重
design_highlights.en: Dual CTA design with prominent cyan Sign Up button, ghost Log In button reduces visual weight

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景搭配高对比度手表屏幕，聚焦核心功能展示
design_highlights.en: Dark background with high-contrast watch screens focuses on core feature display

product_insight.cn: 通过展示高端设备（Apple Watch Ultra）与真实用户成就，同时传递产品的专业性和社区活跃度，降低用户对跑步App的决策门槛，提升注册转化率。
product_insight.en: Displaying premium devices (Apple Watch Ultra) with real user achievements conveys professionalism and community activity, reducing decision barriers and boosting signup conversion.

core_function.cn: 展示应用核心功能，引导用户注册或登录
core_function.en: Showcase core features and guide users to sign up or log in

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合青绿色CTA按钮，视觉层次分明，突出行动按钮
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with teal CTA button creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 多层卡片堆叠展示功能多样性，暗示产品内容丰富度
design_highlights.en: Stacked cards showcase feature diversity, implying rich content

design_highlights.cn: 运动人物插图配合具体训练内容，增强专业可信度
design_highlights.en: Exercise illustrations with specific training details enhance credibility

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条暗示多页面引导流程，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar indicates multi-page flow, reducing cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 通过展示真实功能预览（训练动作、伤病管理）而非抽象描述，让用户直观感受产品价值。堆叠卡片设计巧妙暗示功能深度，同时保持界面简洁，有效平衡信息密度与视觉清晰度。
product_insight.en: Showing real feature previews (exercises, injury management) instead of abstract descriptions helps users directly perceive value. Stacked cards cleverly imply feature depth while maintaining clean interface.

core_function.cn: 展示运动目标追踪功能，引导用户注册体验
core_function.en: Showcase fitness goal tracking features to drive user registration

design_highlights.cn: 手机模型悬浮于运动场景上，真实感与功能展示完美融合
design_highlights.en: Phone mockup floating over cycling scene blends authenticity with feature demonstration

design_highlights.cn: 橙色CTA按钮"Join for free"突出免费价值，降低注册门槛
design_highlights.en: Orange CTA 'Join for free' emphasizes free value, reducing signup friction

design_highlights.cn: "Make progress toward goals"文案激发用户目标达成欲望
design_highlights.en: Copy 'Make progress toward goals' triggers user's achievement motivation

design_highlights.cn: 折线图数据可视化直观展示周运动趋势和目标完成度
design_highlights.en: Line chart visualization intuitively shows weekly activity trends and goal completion

product_insight.cn: 通过真实产品界面预览替代抽象描述，让用户提前感知核心价值。目标进度可视化设计强化了"坚持运动"的用户心智，分页指示器暗示更多功能待探索。
product_insight.en: Real product UI preview replaces abstract descriptions, letting users perceive core value upfront. Goal progress visualization reinforces 'fitness persistence' mindset while pagination hints at more features to explore.

core_function.cn: 展示社区互动氛围，激励用户加入获取支持
core_function.en: Showcase community engagement to motivate user sign-up

design_highlights.cn: 真实运动场景背景与模拟App界面叠加，营造沉浸式体验
design_highlights.en: Real athletic background with app mockup overlay creates immersive experience

design_highlights.cn: "I'm a runner now!"文案传递身份转变的成就感和社区归属感
design_highlights.en: "I'm a runner now!" copy conveys identity transformation and community belonging

design_highlights.cn: 展示kudos点赞、评论互动，强化社交激励机制
design_highlights.en: Displaying kudos, comments reinforces social motivation mechanics

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色CTA按钮"Join for free"降低注册门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA "Join for free" reduces signup friction

product_insight.cn: 通过展示真实用户动态和互动反馈，将产品从"运动记录工具"升级为"运动社交社区"，利用社交归属感驱动转化，文案精准击中新手用户"成为跑者"的心理诉求
product_insight.en: Elevates product from tracking tool to social community by showcasing real interactions, leveraging social belonging to drive conversion with copy targeting new runners' identity aspirations

core_function.cn: 以拟人化方式介绍App品牌，建立情感连接
core_function.en: Introduce app brand with personified greeting to build emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 散落的手绘花卉插图营造温馨女性化氛围，配色柔和治愈
design_highlights.en: Scattered hand-drawn floral illustrations create warm feminine atmosphere with soft healing colors

design_highlights.cn: 拟人化命名"Flo"赋予产品人格，"Hello"问候语建立亲切对话感
design_highlights.en: Personified name 'Flo' gives product personality, 'Hello' greeting creates intimate dialogue

design_highlights.cn: 极简居中排版，大量留白聚焦品牌信息，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist centered layout with ample whitespace focuses on brand message

product_insight.cn: Flo作为女性健康App，通过花朵意象（Flo-flower谐音）和拟人化设计传递温暖陪伴感，降低用户对健康追踪的心理门槛，建立信任基础。
product_insight.en: Flo uses flower imagery (Flo-flower wordplay) and personification to convey warm companionship, reducing psychological barriers to health tracking and building trust foundation.

core_function.cn: 展示路线发现功能，吸引用户注册体验
core_function.en: Showcase route discovery feature to attract user registration

design_highlights.cn: 真实运动场景与界面截图融合，营造沉浸式体验感
design_highlights.en: Blending real sports scenes with UI screenshots creates immersive experience

design_highlights.cn: "Route options that never run out"文案传递无限可能性
design_highlights.en: Copywriting conveys unlimited possibilities for exploration

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色CTA按钮配合免费注册降低转化门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA with free signup lowers conversion barrier

design_highlights.cn: 地图路线可视化展示活跃时段数据增强功能可信度
design_highlights.en: Map visualization with active times data enhances feature credibility

product_insight.cn: 通过展示真实路线详情（距离、时长、海拔、热门时段）让用户预见使用价值，人物背景图传递社区归属感，分页指示器暗示更多功能等待发现，有效提升注册意愿。
product_insight.en: Displaying real route details lets users preview value. Background athletes convey community belonging. Pagination hints at more features, effectively boosting signup intent.

core_function.cn: 展示营养追踪功能，引导用户注册体验
core_function.en: Showcase nutrition tracking features and guide user registration

design_highlights.cn: 真实美食图片搭配营养数据悬浮卡片，直观展示核心功能价值
design_highlights.en: Real food imagery with floating nutrition cards showcasing core feature value

design_highlights.cn: "mindful eating a habit for life"文案传递长期健康理念，建立情感连接
design_highlights.en: Mindful eating messaging conveys long-term wellness philosophy and emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 免费注册按钮采用高对比蓝色，降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: High-contrast blue CTA for free signup reduces user decision barrier

design_highlights.cn: 三环进度条设计直观呈现蛋白质、脂肪、碳水三大营养素占比
design_highlights.en: Three circular progress rings intuitively display protein, fat, and carbs breakdown

product_insight.cn: 通过美食实拍+数据可视化的组合，既展示产品专业性又保持生活化气息。免费注册策略配合轮播引导，有效降低新用户进入门槛，符合健康类App的信任建立路径。
product_insight.en: Combines real food photography with data visualization to show professionalism while maintaining lifestyle appeal. Free signup strategy with carousel guidance effectively lowers new user barriers.

core_function.cn: 传递产品核心价值：提升预测准确性
core_function.en: Communicate core value: improving prediction accuracy

design_highlights.cn: 极简纯白背景搭配粗体黑字，营造专业可信的视觉氛围
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background with bold black text creates professional and trustworthy atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 使用"Let's"营造协作感，拉近与用户心理距离
design_highlights.en: Using 'Let's' creates collaborative tone and builds psychological connection with users

design_highlights.cn: 动态文字逐步展示，引导用户专注阅读核心信息
design_highlights.en: Animated text display guides users to focus on core message

product_insight.cn: 采用渐进式价值传递策略，通过极简设计让用户专注于单一承诺。"预测更准确"暗示产品具备数据分析能力，为后续功能介绍埋下伏笔，提升用户期待值。
product_insight.en: Progressive value delivery strategy with minimalist design focuses users on single promise. 'More accurate predictions' implies data analytics capability, setting expectations for upcoming features.

core_function.cn: 展示付费版数据分析功能，引导用户升级
core_function.en: Showcase premium analytics features to drive upgrades

design_highlights.cn: 柔和渐变粉紫背景配合卡片式布局，营造温暖女性化氛围
design_highlights.en: Soft pink-purple gradient with card layout creates warm feminine atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 情感预测用表情符号直观展示，降低健康数据的冷冰感
design_highlights.en: Emoji-based mood predictions make health data feel approachable and friendly

design_highlights.cn: 粉色徽章标注Exclusive to Premium，强调稀缺性和价值感
design_highlights.en: Pink badge highlighting exclusivity creates perceived value and scarcity

design_highlights.cn: 周期趋势折线图数据可视化清晰，增强功能说服力
design_highlights.en: Clear cycle trends line chart visualization enhances feature credibility

product_insight.cn: 通过可视化展示高级分析能力，让用户在付费前感知价值。情感预测和症状模式识别切中女性健康管理痛点，数据图表增强专业可信度，有效提升付费转化意愿。
product_insight.en: Visualizing premium analytics capabilities lets users perceive value before paying. Mood predictions and symptom patterns address key pain points, while data charts enhance credibility to drive conversions.

core_function.cn: 展示运动追踪功能，引导用户注册体验
core_function.en: Showcase activity tracking features to drive user registration

design_highlights.cn: 真实地图界面叠加在生活场景背景上，营造沉浸式产品体验预览
design_highlights.en: Real map interface overlaid on lifestyle background creates immersive product preview

design_highlights.cn: 运动类型图标采用横向滚动选择，支持快速切换多种运动模式
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrollable sport icons enable quick switching between activity types

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色CTA按钮配合"Join for free"文案，降低注册心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA with 'Join for free' copy reduces registration friction

design_highlights.cn: 背景展示真实用户运动场景，传递社区活力和运动愉悦感
design_highlights.en: Background showing real athletes conveys community energy and exercise joy

product_insight.cn: 通过展示真实产品界面而非抽象插图，让用户提前体验核心功能，配合免费注册引导，有效降低转化漏斗流失。多运动类型展示强调产品全能性，吸引不同运动爱好者。
product_insight.en: Showing actual product interface instead of abstract illustrations lets users preview core features, combined with free signup CTA effectively reduces funnel drop-off. Multi-sport display emphasizes versatility to attract diverse athletes.

core_function.cn: 介绍Apple Health连接功能，整合健康数据追踪
core_function.en: Introduce Apple Health integration for unified health data tracking

design_highlights.cn: 中心辐射式图标布局，直观展示多源数据整合概念
design_highlights.en: Radial icon layout visually demonstrates multi-source data integration

design_highlights.cn: 柔和的粉色主色调配合健康图标，传递女性健康关怀感
design_highlights.en: Soft pink palette with health icons conveys feminine wellness care

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调经期对能量的影响，精准击中用户痛点
design_highlights.en: Copy highlights cycle-energy connection, addressing key user pain point

product_insight.cn: 通过可视化整合场景降低用户对数据授权的心理门槛，将技术功能转化为健康洞察价值，步进式引导设计有效提升授权转化率
product_insight.en: Visualizing integration scenario reduces permission anxiety, transforms technical feature into health insight value, stepper design improves authorization conversion

core_function.cn: 欢迎新用户加入跑步社区，引导邮件订阅
core_function.en: Welcome new users to running community and encourage email subscription

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼"Welcome to the club, Julia"营造专属归属感
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting 'Welcome to the club, Julia' creates sense of belonging

design_highlights.cn: 真实跑者群体照片传递社区活力与多元包容氛围
design_highlights.en: Authentic group photo of diverse runners conveys vibrant community atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 邮件订阅预勾选设计提升转化，明确价值说明降低抵触
design_highlights.en: Pre-checked email subscription with clear value proposition boosts opt-in rate

design_highlights.cn: 双CTA设计区分主次路径，支持邀请码入口促进裂变
design_highlights.en: Dual CTAs with clear hierarchy, referral code entry supports viral growth

product_insight.cn: 通过社区归属感强化用户留存动机，将邮件订阅融入欢迎流程而非单独请求，降低用户决策负担。真实人物照片比插图更能建立信任感，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Reinforces retention through community belonging, embeds email opt-in naturally in welcome flow. Real photos build more trust than illustrations, worth learning from.

core_function.cn: 介绍心情记录功能，引导用户建立情绪反思习惯
core_function.en: Introduce mood tracking feature to build mindful reflection habits

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景搭配浮动emoji营造轻松愉悦氛围，中心emoji突出核心功能
design_highlights.en: Gradient background with floating emojis creates joyful atmosphere, centered emoji highlights core feature

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调'mindful reflection'传递正念理念，降低用户心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'mindful reflection' conveying mindfulness concept, lowering psychological barriers

design_highlights.cn: 提供Skip选项尊重用户选择，分页指示器暗示流程可控
design_highlights.en: Skip option respects user choice, pagination indicator suggests controllable flow

product_insight.cn: 通过emoji可视化降低情绪表达门槛，用'每天一分钟'的轻量化承诺消除用户顾虑。渐变色彩营造积极情绪基调，为后续功能使用建立正向预期。
product_insight.en: Emoji visualization lowers emotional expression barriers. 'One minute' lightweight commitment removes user concerns. Gradient colors set positive emotional tone for feature engagement.

core_function.cn: 介绍心情追踪功能，引导用户开始每日心情记录
core_function.en: Introduce mood tracking feature and guide users to start daily check-ins

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景从青色过渡到粉紫色，营造温暖治愈的情绪氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient background from cyan to pink-purple creates warm healing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: Emoji表情直观展示心情状态，降低用户表达情绪的门槛
design_highlights.en: Emoji icons intuitively display moods, lowering barrier for emotional expression

design_highlights.cn: 周视图卡片设计预览功能效果，建立用户对连续记录的期待
design_highlights.en: Weekly view card previews feature effect, building expectation for continuous tracking

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮"Start Check-In"明确引导，减少决策负担
design_highlights.en: Single CTA 'Start Check-In' provides clear guidance, reducing decision burden

product_insight.cn: 通过功能预览页降低用户对新功能的认知成本，周视图设计暗示需要持续使用才能获得价值，巧妙培养用户日记录习惯，提升长期留存。
product_insight.en: Feature preview reduces cognitive cost for new functionality. Weekly view implies continuous use for value, cleverly cultivating daily habit to improve long-term retention.

core_function.cn: 介绍快速日记功能，引导用户开始记录心情
core_function.en: Introduce Quick Journal feature and guide users to start journaling

design_highlights.cn: 渐变天空背景从蓝到暖橙，营造日出/日落的温馨氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient sky background from blue to warm orange creates sunrise/sunset atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 文案亲切自然，强调'memories, feelings, dreams'触动用户情感
design_highlights.en: Warm copy emphasizing memories, feelings, dreams to connect emotionally with users

design_highlights.cn: 极简线条插画（铅笔+曲线）传达轻松书写的概念
design_highlights.en: Minimalist line illustration with pencil conveys easy writing concept

design_highlights.cn: 单一箭头CTA按钮降低操作门槛，引导用户无压力进入
design_highlights.en: Single arrow CTA button reduces friction and guides users to proceed effortlessly

product_insight.cn: 通过'New'标签制造新鲜感，结合每日提示词(daily prompt)的设计降低用户写作压力，支持文字/照片/表情多形式输入满足不同偏好，有效提升日记功能的使用率和留存。
product_insight.en: The 'New' badge creates freshness, daily prompts reduce writing pressure, and multi-format input (text/photo/emoji) accommodates different preferences, effectively boosting journaling engagement and retention.

core_function.cn: 介绍每日冥想反思功能，引导用户开始使用
core_function.en: Introduce daily calm reflection feature and guide users to get started

design_highlights.cn: 散落的反思卡片营造沉浸式视觉氛围，深色渐变背景传递宁静感
design_highlights.en: Scattered reflection cards create immersive visual atmosphere with calming dark gradient background

design_highlights.cn: 日出图标与'Daily Calm'文案呼应，强化每日仪式感和正念主题
design_highlights.en: Sunrise icon echoes 'Daily Calm' copy, reinforcing daily ritual and mindfulness theme

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮'Get Started'降低决策成本，快速引导用户进入功能
design_highlights.en: Single CTA 'Get Started' reduces decision friction and quickly guides users into feature

product_insight.cn: 通过展示真实反思卡片样例预览功能价值，结合情感化设计和简洁引导，有效降低新功能的认知门槛，提升用户探索意愿。中央留白卡片暗示个性化内容等待用户创建。
product_insight.en: Showcasing real reflection card examples previews feature value. Combined with emotional design and simple guidance, effectively lowers cognitive barrier for new features and increases user exploration intent.

core_function.cn: 向用户介绍新的记录进度庆祝功能
core_function.en: Introduce new logging progress celebration feature to users

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色渐变背景搭配白色卡片，层次分明，视觉聚焦明确
design_highlights.en: Blue gradient background with white cards creates clear visual hierarchy and focus

design_highlights.cn: "Crushing it!"激励文案配合动态插画，增强用户成就感
design_highlights.en: "Crushing it!" motivational copy with dynamic illustration enhances achievement feeling

design_highlights.cn: 模拟真实界面展示功能效果，降低用户认知成本
design_highlights.en: Simulated real interface preview reduces cognitive load for feature understanding

design_highlights.cn: Next/Skip双选项设计，尊重用户选择权
design_highlights.en: Next/Skip dual options respect user's choice and control

product_insight.cn: 采用"功能预览+情感激励"组合拳，通过展示真实界面mockup让用户提前感受功能价值，同时"Celebrate your healthy choices"强化健康正反馈机制，提升用户对新功能的期待和留存动机。
product_insight.en: Combines feature preview with emotional motivation. Real interface mockup lets users preview value while "Celebrate healthy choices" reinforces positive feedback loop, boosting anticipation and retention.

core_function.cn: 介绍AI扫描识别餐食功能，引导用户使用相机记录饮食
core_function.en: Introduce AI meal scanning feature to capture and identify food items

design_highlights.cn: 设备框架展示真实使用场景，精美食物图片激发食欲与期待感
design_highlights.en: Device mockup showcases real usage scenario with appetizing food imagery

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器清晰展示引导进度，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Pagination dots clearly indicate onboarding progress, reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 简洁文案传达核心价值，突出'扫描整餐'的便捷性
design_highlights.en: Concise copy communicates core value, emphasizing convenience of scanning entire meals

design_highlights.cn: 黄色CTA按钮醒目突出，引导用户进入下一步
design_highlights.en: Yellow CTA button stands out, guiding users to proceed

product_insight.cn: 通过'手机套娃'设计让用户预览真实使用体验，降低新功能的学习成本。强调'整餐扫描'差异化卖点，暗示AI能力的先进性，有效降低饮食追踪的门槛。
product_insight.en: Phone-within-phone design previews real usage experience, reducing learning curve. Emphasizes 'entire meal' scanning as differentiator, implying advanced AI capabilities and lowering barriers to food tracking.

core_function.cn: 介绍即时训练功能，展示多种跑步训练类型选择
core_function.en: Introduce instant workouts feature with various running workout options

design_highlights.cn: 彩色渐变背景配合彩带装饰，营造庆祝氛围；训练类型采用彩虹色卡片区分
design_highlights.en: Gradient background with confetti creates celebratory mood; rainbow-colored cards differentiate workout types

design_highlights.cn: 手机屏幕内嵌展示实际界面，让用户预知使用体验
design_highlights.en: Phone mockup shows actual interface, helping users preview the experience

design_highlights.cn: 欢迎文案亲切友好，强调自由度和个性化训练选择
design_highlights.en: Welcoming copy is friendly, emphasizing flexibility and personalized workout choices

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器显示进度，降低用户心理负担促进完成引导
design_highlights.en: Pagination dots show progress, reducing cognitive load and encouraging completion

product_insight.cn: 通过真实界面预览降低新功能学习成本，彩色分类设计让复杂的训练选项一目了然。庆祝风格的视觉营造积极情绪，提升用户对新功能的接受度和尝试意愿。
product_insight.en: Real interface preview reduces learning curve for new features. Color-coded categories make complex workout options scannable. Celebratory visuals create positive emotions, increasing feature adoption willingness.

core_function.cn: 展示虚拟健康助手价值并显示个性化进度
core_function.en: Showcase virtual health assistant value while displaying personalization progress

design_highlights.cn: 温馨手绘风插图展示聊天场景，配色柔和亲切
design_highlights.en: Warm hand-drawn illustration showing chat scenario with soft, friendly color palette

design_highlights.cn: 环形进度条配合百分比显示，让等待过程可视化
design_highlights.en: Circular progress bar with percentage display makes waiting process visible

design_highlights.cn: "Personalizing your experience"文案传递定制化服务感
design_highlights.en: Personalization copy conveys customized service experience

design_highlights.cn: 在等待期间展示核心功能，强化产品价值认知
design_highlights.en: Showcasing core features during wait time reinforces product value perception

product_insight.cn: 巧妙将等待时间转化为价值传递机会，通过虚拟助手插图预告核心功能，进度条降低用户焦虑感。'个性化'措辞暗示后台正在为用户定制体验，提升期待值。
product_insight.en: Cleverly converts wait time into value delivery opportunity. Virtual assistant illustration previews core feature while progress bar reduces anxiety. 'Personalizing' wording implies customized experience preparation.

core_function.cn: 展示健康教育文章库，引导用户订阅Premium
core_function.en: Showcase health education articles and drive Premium subscription

design_highlights.cn: 柔和粉紫色调配合多样化插图，营造包容、舒适的女性健康氛围
design_highlights.en: Soft pink-purple palette with diverse illustrations creates inclusive, comfortable feminine health atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 通过展示真实内容卡片激发用户兴趣，Premium标签强调独家价值
design_highlights.en: Real content cards spark interest while Premium badge emphasizes exclusive value

design_highlights.cn: 文章主题涵盖敏感话题，以专业且亲和的方式降低用户心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Article topics cover sensitive subjects in professional yet approachable way, reducing psychological barriers

design_highlights.cn: 水平滚动卡片式布局，高效展示丰富内容同时保持界面整洁
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling card layout efficiently showcases rich content while maintaining clean interface

product_insight.cn: 通过展示实际内容而非抽象功能介绍来推动转化，让用户直观感受产品价值。1000+文章的数量强调内容深度，分类展示降低敏感话题的心理压力，是健康类App常见的信任建立策略。
product_insight.en: Drives conversion by showcasing actual content rather than abstract features. 1000+ articles emphasize depth, categorized display reduces stigma around sensitive topics - a common trust-building strategy in health apps.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权跨应用追踪以实现个性化推荐
core_function.en: Request user authorization for cross-app tracking to enable personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造平静氛围，与Calm品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient background creates calm atmosphere, consistent with brand identity

design_highlights.cn: Welcome欢迎语减轻权限请求的侵入感，建立友好第一印象
design_highlights.en: Welcome greeting softens permission request intrusion, establishes friendly first impression

design_highlights.cn: iOS标准弹窗清晰说明追踪用途，强调个性化价值
design_highlights.en: Standard iOS dialog clearly explains tracking purpose, emphasizes personalization value

product_insight.cn: 在欢迎页触发ATT弹窗是常见策略，通过友好的Welcome文案铺垫，降低用户对追踪请求的抵触心理，但转化率通常较低，建议考虑延迟到用户体验产品价值后再请求
product_insight.en: Triggering ATT prompt on welcome screen is common but typically has low opt-in rates. Consider delaying until users experience product value first.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权跨应用活动追踪权限
core_function.en: Request user permission for cross-app activity tracking

design_highlights.cn: 背景模糊处理突出弹窗焦点，粉色按钮元素隐约可见保持品牌一致性
design_highlights.en: Blurred background highlights dialog focus while pink buttons maintain brand consistency

design_highlights.cn: 详细说明数据用途和共享范围，增强用户信任降低拒绝率
design_highlights.en: Detailed data usage explanation builds trust and reduces rejection rate

design_highlights.cn: 透明披露共享数据类型（技术标识符、年龄组等），体现隐私尊重
design_highlights.en: Transparent disclosure of shared data types shows privacy respect

product_insight.cn: 在iOS ATT框架下，Flo通过详细说明数据用途和限制范围来争取用户授权，将法规合规转化为建立信任的机会，同时在敏感问题（怀孕）场景下请求权限需更谨慎处理隐私顾虑
product_insight.en: Under iOS ATT framework, Flo leverages detailed data usage disclosure to gain consent, turning compliance into trust-building opportunity while handling privacy concerns in sensitive contexts like pregnancy

core_function.cn: 请求相机权限以扫描食品条形码
core_function.en: Request camera access to scan food barcodes

design_highlights.cn: 扫描框视觉引导清晰，蓝色角标突出扫描区域
design_highlights.en: Clear scan frame visual guide with blue corner markers highlighting scan area

design_highlights.cn: 提供手动输入备选方案，降低权限拒绝的流失
design_highlights.en: Manual barcode entry fallback reduces drop-off when permission denied

design_highlights.cn: 权限说明文案具体化，阐明三个使用场景增强信任
design_highlights.en: Specific permission copy explains three use cases to build trust

product_insight.cn: 权限请求时机恰当，在用户主动触发扫描功能时弹出，结合场景化文案说明用途，底部保留手动输入选项确保功能可用性，有效平衡转化与用户体验。
product_insight.en: Well-timed permission request triggered by user action, contextual copy explains benefits, manual entry fallback ensures feature accessibility regardless of permission choice.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权应用发送推送通知
core_function.en: Request user permission to send push notifications

design_highlights.cn: 渐变蓝紫色背景营造平静氛围，与品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Blue-purple gradient background creates calm atmosphere aligned with brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 系统原生弹窗设计，用户熟悉度高，降低决策压力
design_highlights.en: Native iOS system dialog increases familiarity and reduces decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计提供明确选择，Allow按钮蓝色突出显示
design_highlights.en: Dual button design with blue highlighted Allow button guides user choice

product_insight.cn: Calm在首次启动时即请求通知权限，利用用户初始兴趣最高的时机获取授权。背景保持品牌视觉一致性，减少用户在权限请求时的跳出感，提升授权率。
product_insight.en: Calm requests notification permission at first launch to capitalize on peak user interest. Consistent brand background reduces friction and improves opt-in rates.

core_function.cn: 引导用户开启通知以接收受孕最佳时机提醒
core_function.en: Guide users to enable notifications for fertility reminders

design_highlights.cn: 模拟真实通知样式预览，让用户直观感受通知价值
design_highlights.en: Simulated notification preview shows real value of alerts

design_highlights.cn: 倒计时式文案"11天后"制造紧迫感和期待感
design_highlights.en: Countdown copy '11 days' creates urgency and anticipation

design_highlights.cn: 先展示通知价值再请求权限，提升授权率
design_highlights.en: Value demonstration before permission request increases opt-in rate

product_insight.cn: 采用"价值前置"策略，通过具体化的受孕日期预测和真实通知预览，将抽象的权限请求转化为用户可感知的切实利益，大幅提升通知授权率
product_insight.en: Value-first strategy transforms abstract permission request into tangible benefit through specific fertility date prediction and realistic notification preview, significantly boosting opt-in rates

core_function.cn: 引导用户开启推送通知以提高训练计划完成率
core_function.en: Guide users to enable push notifications to improve workout plan completion

design_highlights.cn: 真实手机模型展示通知效果，直观呈现开启后的体验
design_highlights.en: Real phone mockup showing notification preview, visually demonstrates the enabled experience

design_highlights.cn: 数据驱动说服：用"2x more likely"量化开启通知的价值
design_highlights.en: Data-driven persuasion: quantifying notification value with '2x more likely' statistic

design_highlights.cn: 强调用户获益而非功能本身，聚焦"完成计划"的个人目标
design_highlights.en: Emphasizes user benefit over feature itself, focusing on personal goal of 'finishing your plan'

product_insight.cn: 采用预权限页面策略，在系统弹窗前先展示价值，通过数据背书和视觉预览双重说服，有效提升通知权限授予率。绿色高亮关键词引导用户视线至核心价值点。
product_insight.en: Pre-permission screen strategy shows value before system prompt, using data endorsement and visual preview for dual persuasion to boost notification opt-in rates. Green highlights guide attention to key value points.

core_function.cn: 引导用户授权同步Apple Health睡眠数据
core_function.en: Guide users to authorize Apple Health sleep data sync

design_highlights.cn: 渐变蓝紫色背景搭配白色卡片，营造睡眠主题的宁静氛围
design_highlights.en: Blue-purple gradient background with white cards creates calm sleep-themed atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 通过疑问句式"食物如何影响睡眠"激发用户好奇心和探索欲
design_highlights.en: Question format 'How does food affect your sleep' sparks curiosity and exploration desire

design_highlights.cn: 可视化预览卡片展示授权后的数据洞察价值，降低授权心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Visual preview cards show post-authorization data insights, reducing permission friction

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器暗示多步引导流程，让用户了解当前进度
design_highlights.en: Pagination dots indicate multi-step flow, showing users current progress

product_insight.cn: 通过价值前置策略，先展示食物与睡眠的关联洞察预览，再请求数据授权。将抽象的权限请求转化为具象的健康收益，有效提升用户授权意愿和转化率。
product_insight.en: Value-first strategy shows food-sleep correlation insights preview before requesting permission. Transforms abstract permission into tangible health benefits, effectively improving authorization willingness and conversion.

core_function.cn: 引导用户授权同步Apple Health睡眠数据
core_function.en: Guide users to authorize Apple Health sleep data sync

design_highlights.cn: 蓝紫色渐变背景营造夜间睡眠氛围，星星元素增强主题感
design_highlights.en: Blue-purple gradient background creates night sleep atmosphere with star elements

design_highlights.cn: 通过展示睡眠因素分析卡片预览功能价值，激发用户授权动机
design_highlights.en: Sleep factors analysis card previews feature value to motivate authorization

design_highlights.cn: 文案直击痛点'什么让你睡不着'，建立情感共鸣
design_highlights.en: Copy addresses pain point 'what keeps you awake' to build emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 白色卡片与渐变背景形成层次对比，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: White card contrasts with gradient background for clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 授权前先展示功能价值预览，通过可视化睡眠因素分析降低用户顾虑。皇冠图标暗示高级功能，为后续付费转化埋点。分页指示器表明多步引导，减少用户压力。
product_insight.en: Shows feature value preview before authorization through visualized sleep factors analysis. Crown icon hints premium features for future conversion. Pagination indicator reduces user pressure in multi-step flow.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权保存成就徽章到相册并分享
core_function.en: Request permission to save achievement badges to camera roll

design_highlights.cn: 成就徽章设计精美，渐变棕色背景营造温暖冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Beautiful achievement badge with warm gradient brown background creates meditation atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 权限请求与分享场景绑定，用户在成就感高涨时更易授权
design_highlights.en: Permission request tied to sharing moment when user achievement feeling is high

design_highlights.cn: 底部提供多种分享渠道（Instagram Stories、消息），降低分享门槛
design_highlights.en: Multiple sharing options at bottom (Instagram Stories, Message) lower sharing barriers

design_highlights.cn: 权限弹窗采用系统原生样式，与品牌卡片形成层次对比
design_highlights.en: Native system permission dialog creates visual hierarchy with branded card

product_insight.cn: 将权限请求嵌入成就分享流程是巧妙策略，用户在获得"1 Mindful Day"成就时情绪正向，更愿意授权。同时社交分享能带来自然增长，一举两得。
product_insight.en: Embedding permission request in achievement sharing flow is clever. Users are emotionally positive when earning badges, more willing to grant access. Social sharing also drives organic growth.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权应用发送通知提醒
core_function.en: Request user authorization for push notifications

design_highlights.cn: 使用原生iOS系统弹窗，保持平台一致性体验
design_highlights.en: Native iOS system dialog maintains platform consistency

design_highlights.cn: 底部箭头和"Choose it!"文案引导用户关注弹窗选择
design_highlights.en: Bottom arrow and 'Choose it!' text guides user attention to dialog

design_highlights.cn: "Allow"按钮使用蓝色高亮，视觉引导用户点击允许
design_highlights.en: Blue highlighted 'Allow' button visually guides users to permit

design_highlights.cn: 简洁友好的引导文案降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Simple friendly guidance reduces user decision pressure

product_insight.cn: Flo在权限请求时采用轻量化引导策略，通过箭头和简短文案提示用户操作，既不过度打扰又有效提升授权率。经期追踪类应用通知权限对用户留存至关重要，此设计平衡了转化与体验。
product_insight.en: Flo uses lightweight guidance with arrow and brief text for permission requests, balancing conversion and experience. Notification permission is crucial for retention in period tracking apps.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权推送通知权限
core_function.en: Request user authorization for push notifications

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的青色箭头和"PICK ME"按钮引导用户注意力至Allow选项
design_highlights.en: Eye-catching cyan arrow and 'PICK ME' button directing attention to Allow option

design_highlights.cn: 在系统弹窗下方添加自定义引导元素，强化用户点击Allow的意愿
design_highlights.en: Custom guidance element below system dialog reinforces user intent to tap Allow

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示当前位于引导流程中，降低用户中途放弃率
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows current step in onboarding flow, reducing abandonment

product_insight.cn: 通过在系统原生弹窗外叠加趣味化的引导元素，巧妙地将枯燥的权限请求转化为互动体验，显著提升通知权限授予率，值得借鉴的转化优化技巧
product_insight.en: Overlaying playful guidance on native system dialog transforms boring permission request into engaging experience, significantly boosting notification opt-in rates

core_function.cn: 请求用户允许跨应用追踪以优化广告投放
core_function.en: Request user permission for cross-app tracking to optimize ads

design_highlights.cn: 徽章成就系统视觉设计，展示10K/13.1/26.2/5MI等跑步里程碑，激发用户向往
design_highlights.en: Badge achievement system showcasing running milestones like 10K/13.1/26.2/5MI to inspire users

design_highlights.cn: 透明诚实的追踪说明文案，直接说明是为了广告效果追踪，建立信任
design_highlights.en: Transparent tracking explanation stating it's for ad effectiveness, building user trust

design_highlights.cn: 背景展示核心价值主张和成就体系，即使弹窗遮挡也传递产品吸引力
design_highlights.en: Background displays core value proposition and achievements even with modal overlay

product_insight.cn: 将ATT权限请求叠加在成就徽章展示页上，用户在决策时能看到产品的游戏化激励体系，降低权限请求的突兀感，同时透明说明追踪目的体现品牌诚信。
product_insight.en: Overlaying ATT prompt on achievement badges lets users see gamification while deciding, reducing friction. Transparent tracking explanation demonstrates brand integrity.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权跨应用活动追踪以提供个性化体验
core_function.en: Request user authorization for cross-app tracking to provide personalized experience

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合iOS原生弹窗样式，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark background with native iOS modal style creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调'个性化体验'正向价值，降低用户抵触心理
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'personalized experience' value to reduce user resistance

design_highlights.cn: 将Allow按钮置于底部蓝色高亮位置，引导用户授权
design_highlights.en: Allow button highlighted in blue at bottom position to guide user authorization

product_insight.cn: 在注册流程中嵌入ATT权限请求，利用用户对新App的好奇心和信任度，配合表单填写的沉没成本，提升授权同意率。时机选择巧妙，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Embedding ATT request during registration leverages user curiosity and sunk cost from form filling to improve authorization rate. Strategic timing placement worth learning.

core_function.cn: 引导用户开启推送通知以保持社交连接
core_function.en: Guide users to enable push notifications for social connection

design_highlights.cn: 模拟真实App界面预览，直观展示通知效果场景
design_highlights.en: Simulated real app interface preview showing notification context

design_highlights.cn: 以'Stay connected to what motivates you'激发用户情感共鸣
design_highlights.en: Emotional headline 'Stay connected to what motivates you' resonates with users

design_highlights.cn: 明确列出三大通知价值点，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Three clear value propositions reduce user decision friction

design_highlights.cn: 提供'Not now'选项尊重用户选择，避免强制感
design_highlights.en: Providing 'Not now' option respects user choice without pressure

product_insight.cn: Strava通过展示真实社交互动场景（好友动态、挑战通知）来说明通知价值，而非抽象描述。将权限请求转化为用户获益的机会，值得借鉴的预请求设计模式。
product_insight.en: Strava demonstrates notification value through real social interaction scenarios rather than abstract descriptions. Converting permission requests into user benefit opportunities is a noteworthy pre-permission design pattern.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权位置权限以追踪运动活动
core_function.en: Request location access to track user activities

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合醒目的橙色导航图标，品牌色突出且视觉聚焦明确
design_highlights.en: Dark background with prominent orange navigation icon creates strong visual focus and brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 友好询问式文案'Is that ok with you?'降低用户心理压力
design_highlights.en: Friendly question 'Is that ok with you?' reduces user psychological pressure

design_highlights.cn: Yes按钮采用橙色填充强调，No按钮仅描边，引导用户授权
design_highlights.en: Yes button uses filled orange while No button is outlined, guiding users to grant permission

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式保留页面上下文，减少跳转打断感
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet pattern preserves context and reduces interruption feeling

product_insight.cn: 在权限请求前预置解释页面，说明位置数据用于活动追踪，提高用户授权率。采用自定义弹窗而非系统弹窗，可控制文案和视觉风格，提升转化效果。
product_insight.en: Pre-permission explanation screen clarifies location use for activity tracking, improving grant rates. Custom sheet instead of system dialog allows branded messaging and better conversion.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权App写入健康数据权限
core_function.en: Request user permission to write health data

design_highlights.cn: 使用iOS原生Health图标，增强用户信任感和熟悉度
design_highlights.en: Native iOS Health icon builds trust and familiarity

design_highlights.cn: 预设开启Mindful Minutes开关，降低用户操作成本
design_highlights.en: Pre-enabled toggle reduces user friction for opt-in

design_highlights.cn: 清晰解释数据用途，透明沟通消除隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Clear explanation of data usage alleviates privacy concerns

design_highlights.cn: 提供Turn Off All选项体现用户控制权，反而提升授权率
design_highlights.en: Turn Off All option gives control, paradoxically improving consent rate

product_insight.cn: 通过与Apple Health生态整合，将冥想数据沉淀为用户健康资产，既提升产品粘性又增加用户切换成本。预开启开关的默认设计巧妙提高授权转化率。
product_insight.en: Integration with Apple Health ecosystem turns meditation data into user health assets, increasing stickiness and switching costs. Pre-enabled toggle cleverly improves authorization conversion.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权读写Apple Health健康数据
core_function.en: Request user authorization to read and write Apple Health data

design_highlights.cn: 采用系统原生Health授权界面，红色心形图标增强健康主题识别度
design_highlights.en: Native Health authorization UI with red heart icon enhancing health theme recognition

design_highlights.cn: 分组展示读写权限，开关控件让用户精细控制每项数据授权
design_highlights.en: Grouped read/write permissions with toggle controls for granular data authorization

design_highlights.cn: 默认开启所有权限开关，降低用户决策成本提升授权率
design_highlights.en: All permission toggles enabled by default, reducing decision cost and improving authorization rate

design_highlights.cn: 底部说明文案解释数据用途，建立信任感消除隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom explanation text clarifies data usage, building trust and addressing privacy concerns

product_insight.cn: Flo通过深度集成Apple Health实现数据互通，请求的权限涵盖基础体温、睡眠、体重等女性健康关键指标，体现专业的周期追踪产品定位，同时透明的权限说明有助于建立用户信任。
product_insight.en: Flo deeply integrates with Apple Health, requesting permissions for key female health metrics like basal temperature, sleep, and weight, reflecting professional cycle tracking positioning while transparent explanations build user trust.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权读取Apple健康应用中的睡眠数据
core_function.en: Request user permission to read sleep data from Apple Health

design_highlights.cn: 采用iOS原生系统弹窗风格，红色心形图标增强健康品类识别度
design_highlights.en: Native iOS system sheet style with red heart icon enhancing health category recognition

design_highlights.cn: Toggle开关设计让用户精细控制每项数据权限，降低隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches allow granular control over each data permission, reducing privacy concerns

design_highlights.cn: 默认开启睡眠数据读取权限，降低用户操作成本提升授权率
design_highlights.en: Sleep data toggle pre-enabled by default to reduce friction and increase authorization rate

design_highlights.cn: 底部App说明文案解释数据用途，建立信任感消除用户疑虑
design_highlights.en: App explanation text at bottom builds trust by clarifying data usage purpose

product_insight.cn: 健康数据授权采用系统原生样式增强可信度，默认开启策略配合清晰的权限说明，在保护用户隐私感知的同时最大化数据获取率，是健康类App的标准权限请求范式。
product_insight.en: Native system style enhances credibility. Default-on strategy with clear explanations maximizes data collection while maintaining privacy perception - a standard pattern for health apps.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权读写Apple Health健康数据
core_function.en: Request user authorization to read/write Apple Health data

design_highlights.cn: 采用Apple原生Health图标和系统UI风格，增强用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Uses native Apple Health icon and system UI style to build user trust

design_highlights.cn: 读写权限分组展示，每项开关独立控制，用户可精细化管理
design_highlights.en: Read/write permissions grouped separately with individual toggles for granular control

design_highlights.cn: 默认开启所有权限开关，降低用户操作成本，提高授权通过率
design_highlights.en: All toggles pre-enabled by default to reduce friction and increase authorization rate

design_highlights.cn: 提供App说明解释数据用途，消除用户隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: App explanation provided to address privacy concerns and justify data usage

product_insight.cn: 遵循iOS系统规范的健康权限请求设计，通过分类展示读写权限让用户感知透明度。预设开启策略平衡了数据完整性与用户体验，App说明文案增强信任，是健康类App标准最佳实践。
product_insight.en: Follows iOS Health permission guidelines with categorized read/write permissions for transparency. Pre-enabled toggles balance data completeness with UX, while app explanation builds trust—a best practice for health apps.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权读写健康数据权限
core_function.en: Request user authorization for health data read/write access

design_highlights.cn: 采用iOS原生健康权限弹窗设计，红色心形图标强化健康属性认知
design_highlights.en: Native iOS health permission sheet design with red heart icon reinforcing health identity

design_highlights.cn: 所有开关默认开启状态，降低用户操作成本，提升授权转化
design_highlights.en: All toggles default to ON state, reducing friction and improving authorization conversion

design_highlights.cn: 分类展示读写权限，透明化数据用途说明增强用户信任
design_highlights.en: Categorized read/write permissions with transparent data usage explanation builds trust

design_highlights.cn: 底部说明文案解释数据共享目的，消除用户隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom explanation text clarifies data sharing purpose, alleviating privacy concerns

product_insight.cn: 运动类App获取健康数据是核心功能前提，采用系统原生授权界面提升可信度，默认全开策略配合清晰的权限分类，平衡了数据获取需求与用户隐私感知，值得借鉴
product_insight.en: Health data access is essential for fitness apps. Native system UI builds trust, default-on toggles with clear categorization balance data needs with privacy perception effectively

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权访问运动与健身数据以追踪活动
core_function.en: Request user permission to access motion and fitness data for activity tracking

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图背景配合GPS信号提示条，强化运动追踪场景感
design_highlights.en: Dark map background with GPS signal bar reinforces activity tracking context

design_highlights.cn: 权限弹窗叠加在功能页面上，让用户理解权限用途的实际场景
design_highlights.en: Permission dialog overlaid on functional page helps users understand real usage context

design_highlights.cn: 绿色GPS状态条暗示功能就绪，增强用户授权意愿
design_highlights.en: Green GPS status bar implies feature readiness, encouraging permission grant

design_highlights.cn: 文案清晰说明权限用途，降低用户隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Clear copy explaining permission purpose reduces privacy concerns

product_insight.cn: Strava在请求敏感权限时展示实际功能界面和GPS就绪状态，让用户在理解价值的情境下做决策，有效提升权限授予率，这种时机选择和场景化设计值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Strava shows the actual feature interface and GPS ready state when requesting sensitive permissions, enabling contextual decision-making that effectively improves grant rates. This timing and contextual approach is worth learning.

core_function.cn: 请求用户同意分享运动数据以获取AI分析洞察
core_function.en: Request user consent to share workout data for AI-powered insights

design_highlights.cn: 透明化隐私说明，明确告知数据匿名化处理且不用于AI训练
design_highlights.en: Transparent privacy disclosure, clearly stating data anonymization and no AI training usage

design_highlights.cn: Accept按钮采用黑色实心设计突出主操作，Decline使用文字链接降低拒绝倾向
design_highlights.en: Black solid Accept button highlights primary action, text-style Decline reduces rejection tendency

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计保持页面上下文，减少用户跳出感
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design maintains page context, reducing user disorientation

product_insight.cn: 通过详细的隐私说明建立用户信任，强调数据最小化原则和匿名处理，同时用第三方AI品牌（OpenAI）增加可信度，有效降低用户对数据分享的顾虑。
product_insight.en: Builds user trust through detailed privacy disclosure, emphasizes data minimization and anonymization, leverages trusted third-party AI brand (OpenAI) to reduce data sharing concerns.

core_function.cn: 请求蓝牙权限以连接和控制跑步机设备
core_function.en: Request Bluetooth permission to connect and control treadmill devices

design_highlights.cn: 动态蓝牙扫描动画配合雷达式视觉效果，直观展示设备搜索状态
design_highlights.en: Dynamic Bluetooth scanning animation with radar-style visual showing device search status

design_highlights.cn: 清晰说明权限用途（连接跑步机），降低用户授权顾虑
design_highlights.en: Clear explanation of permission purpose (treadmill control) reduces user hesitation

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示已发现设备数量，增强用户授权信心和动力
design_highlights.en: Real-time display of found devices count boosts user confidence to grant permission

product_insight.cn: 将系统权限请求与实际设备发现结合展示，用户能即时看到50+设备已被发现，形成强烈的功能价值感知，大幅提升授权转化率。隐私说明透明化也符合合规要求。
product_insight.en: Combining permission request with real-time device discovery creates immediate value perception. Showing 50+ devices found significantly boosts authorization rate while transparent privacy notice ensures compliance.

core_function.cn: 请求蓝牙权限以连接心率传感器等第三方设备
core_function.en: Request Bluetooth access to connect heart rate sensors and third-party devices

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合蓝色雷达动效，营造科技感的设备扫描氛围
design_highlights.en: Dark background with blue radar animation creates tech-savvy device scanning atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示已发现50+设备，增强用户对蓝牙功能的信任感
design_highlights.en: Real-time display of 50+ devices found builds user trust in Bluetooth functionality

design_highlights.cn: 透明的隐私提示说明数据用途，降低用户授权顾虑
design_highlights.en: Transparent privacy notice explains data usage to reduce authorization concerns

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计给予用户明确选择权，符合iOS权限设计规范
design_highlights.en: Dual-button design gives users clear choice, following iOS permission guidelines

product_insight.cn: Strava通过可视化的设备扫描动效展示蓝牙功能价值，同时坦诚告知位置追踪风险，平衡了功能展示与隐私透明，这种诚实设计更易获得用户信任和授权。
product_insight.en: Strava balances functionality showcase with privacy transparency through visual scanning animation while honestly disclosing location tracking risks, building user trust for permission granting.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权位置权限以提供精准天气预报
core_function.en: Request location permission for precise weather forecasts

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗设计简洁，背景虚化突出权限请求的重要性
design_highlights.en: Clean modal dialog with blurred background emphasizes permission importance

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调"精准"和"实时"价值，降低用户授权心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'precise' and 'up-to-date' value to reduce authorization hesitation

design_highlights.cn: 主按钮黑色高对比设计，次选项文字链降低拒绝感
design_highlights.en: High-contrast black CTA with text link secondary option reduces rejection friction

product_insight.cn: 采用应用内自定义弹窗预请求策略，先说明价值再触发系统权限，可有效提升授权率。"Maybe Later"措辞比"拒绝"更友好，保留后续转化机会。
product_insight.en: Pre-permission dialog strategy explains value before system prompt, improving grant rates. 'Maybe Later' wording preserves future conversion opportunities compared to hard rejection.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权实时位置分享给安全联系人
core_function.en: Request user permission to share real-time location with safety contacts

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色强调色，突出安全功能的紧急感与信任感
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange accent creates urgency and trust for safety feature

design_highlights.cn: 详细说明使用场景和限制条件，透明沟通建立用户信任
design_highlights.en: Detailed explanation of use cases and limitations builds user trust through transparency

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计提供明确选择，Allow按钮使用品牌色引导操作
design_highlights.en: Dual-button design with brand-colored Allow button guides user action

product_insight.cn: Strava将位置权限请求与安全场景绑定，通过Beacon功能赋予权限请求合理性。透明披露数据使用方式和限制，降低用户隐私顾虑，提升授权率。
product_insight.en: Strava ties location permission to safety Beacon feature, making the request contextually meaningful. Transparent disclosure of data usage and limitations reduces privacy concerns and improves authorization rates.

core_function.cn: 用户从相册选择要授权给应用的照片
core_function.en: Select specific photos to grant app access from library

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配网格布局，照片展示清晰有序，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with grid layout provides clear visual hierarchy for photo display

design_highlights.cn: 私密访问提示明确告知用户仅选中照片会被应用访问，增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Private access notice clearly informs users only selected photos will be accessible

design_highlights.cn: 「Learn More」链接降低用户隐私顾虑，体现对用户数据的尊重
design_highlights.en: Learn More link reduces privacy concerns, showing respect for user data

design_highlights.cn: 位置信息提示在底部明确展示，帮助用户了解分享内容范围
design_highlights.en: Location included notice at bottom helps users understand sharing scope

product_insight.cn: iOS限制性照片选择器设计体现了隐私优先理念，用户仅授权需要的照片而非整个相册，这种最小权限原则既保护用户隐私又降低授权阻力，值得所有需要媒体访问的应用借鉴。
product_insight.en: iOS limited photo picker embodies privacy-first design. Users grant access only to needed photos, not entire library. This minimal permission principle protects privacy while reducing authorization friction.

core_function.cn: 请求相册写入权限以分享运动活动
core_function.en: Request photo library access to share activity highlights

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景与运动主题图片营造沉浸式氛围
design_highlights.en: Dark background with athletic imagery creates immersive atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 分享流程中适时触发权限请求，场景化获取授权
design_highlights.en: Permission triggered contextually within sharing flow for better conversion

design_highlights.cn: 底部多平台分享选项预先展示，激发用户授权动机
design_highlights.en: Multiple sharing options displayed below motivate users to grant permission

design_highlights.cn: 清晰说明权限用途，降低用户心理顾虑
design_highlights.en: Clear explanation of permission purpose reduces user hesitation

product_insight.cn: 在用户主动触发分享功能时请求权限，而非启动时索取，符合JIT原则。背景展示活动卡片预览，让用户直观理解授权价值，显著提升权限通过率。
product_insight.en: Just-in-time permission request during active sharing intent, not at launch. Activity card preview in background shows value proposition, significantly improving permission grant rate.

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权访问本地网络以发现投屏设备
core_function.en: Request user permission to access local network for Cast device discovery

design_highlights.cn: 系统弹窗叠加应用底层UI，清晰展示已发现的网络设备信息
design_highlights.en: System dialog overlays app UI, clearly displaying discovered network devices

design_highlights.cn: 详细说明权限用途并提示隐私风险，建立用户信任
design_highlights.en: Detailed permission explanation with privacy warning builds user trust

design_highlights.cn: 双选项设计（允许/不允许）给予用户完整控制权
design_highlights.en: Dual-option design (Allow/Don't Allow) gives users full control

product_insight.cn: 权限请求时机选择在用户主动触发投屏功能时弹出，结合场景说明用途，提升授权率。底部隐私提示体现iOS平台对用户数据的透明化要求，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Permission request triggered when user initiates casting, contextual explanation improves authorization rate. Privacy disclaimer reflects iOS transparency requirements, worth learning from.

core_function.cn: 引导用户连接日历以便安排训练计划
core_function.en: Guide users to connect calendar for workout scheduling

design_highlights.cn: 手机模拟器展示日历整合效果，直观呈现功能价值
design_highlights.en: Phone mockup showing calendar integration provides visual value demonstration

design_highlights.cn: 300%数据强调转化效果，使用绿色高亮关键信息
design_highlights.en: 300% statistic emphasizes conversion benefit with green highlight on key info

design_highlights.cn: 文案聚焦用户利益（完成计划），降低连接心理阻力
design_highlights.en: Copy focuses on user benefit (finishing plans), reducing friction

design_highlights.cn: 提供'稍后再说'选项，尊重用户选择降低强迫感
design_highlights.en: Maybe later option respects user choice and reduces pressure

product_insight.cn: 通过具体数据（300%）量化连接日历的价值，配合真实界面预览，有效降低用户对权限请求的抵触心理，是权限引导的优秀范例
product_insight.en: Quantifying value with specific data (300%) combined with real interface preview effectively reduces user resistance to permission requests, exemplary permission guidance

core_function.cn: 提供多种账号注册登录方式，保存用户进度
core_function.en: Provide multiple sign-up options to save user progress

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造冥想氛围，品牌logo居中强化认知
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient creates meditation atmosphere, centered logo reinforces brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 三种主流登录方式并列，降低注册门槛
design_highlights.en: Three mainstream login options in parallel, reducing registration barriers

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调保存进度的价值，激励用户完成注册
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes value of saving progress, motivating users to complete registration

design_highlights.cn: 左上角关闭按钮给予用户控制感，减少强迫感
design_highlights.en: Close button in top-left gives users control, reducing feeling of being forced

product_insight.cn: 注册页采用非强制设计，允许跳过，降低流失率。将注册价值外化为'保存进度'，让用户感知具体利益而非抽象账号概念，提升转化意愿。
product_insight.en: Non-mandatory registration design allows skipping, reducing churn. Externalizing value as 'save progress' helps users perceive concrete benefits rather than abstract account concept, improving conversion.

core_function.cn: 通过社交账号或邮箱快速注册登录
core_function.en: Quick registration via social accounts or email

design_highlights.cn: 粉色#1徽章设计突出行业领先地位，花朵装饰增添女性化气息
design_highlights.en: Pink #1 badge highlights industry leadership with feminine floral decorations

design_highlights.cn: 98%用户好评数据+2.5k用户调研背书，强化信任感
design_highlights.en: 98% user satisfaction stats with 2.5k survey backing builds trust

design_highlights.cn: "Take control of your health"赋权式文案激发用户掌控感
design_highlights.en: Empowering copy 'Take control of your health' motivates user agency

design_highlights.cn: 三种登录方式层级分明，Apple优先符合iOS用户习惯
design_highlights.en: Three login options with clear hierarchy, Apple-first suits iOS users

product_insight.cn: 登录页巧妙融入价值主张和社交证明，用行业排名和用户数据消除新用户疑虑，同时多登录选项降低注册摩擦，值得健康类App借鉴
product_insight.en: Cleverly integrates value proposition and social proof into login page, using rankings and user data to reduce signup friction for health apps

core_function.cn: 提供多种注册方式，引导用户开始个性化设置
core_function.en: Provide multiple sign-up options and guide users to personalization

design_highlights.cn: 极简白底设计，蓝色CTA按钮形成强视觉焦点
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background with blue CTA as strong visual focus

design_highlights.cn: 主CTA与社交登录分层展示，降低注册门槛
design_highlights.en: Layered primary CTA and social login options reduce registration friction

design_highlights.cn: Welcome欢迎语+个性化承诺，建立用户期待感
design_highlights.en: Welcome message with personalization promise builds user anticipation

design_highlights.cn: 三种登录方式并列，用户可自由选择偏好入口
design_highlights.en: Three login methods side by side for flexible user choice

product_insight.cn: 通过「定制目标」的价值承诺前置，将注册转化为获得个性化服务的起点而非障碍。隐私声明底部展示，平衡合规与转化体验。
product_insight.en: By positioning 'customize for your goals' upfront, registration becomes a gateway to personalization rather than a barrier. Privacy notice at bottom balances compliance with conversion.

core_function.cn: 收集用户基本信息完成账户创建以保存进度
core_function.en: Collect user information to create account and save progress

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造冥想App的宁静氛围，表单字段简洁优雅
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient creates calm meditation atmosphere with elegant form fields

design_highlights.cn: 实时验证反馈，输入完成后即显示绿色勾选图标确认状态
design_highlights.en: Real-time validation with green checkmarks confirming input completion

design_highlights.cn: 以'保存进度'为注册价值主张，降低用户注册心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Using 'save progress' as value proposition reduces registration friction

design_highlights.cn: 密码字段隐藏显示保护隐私，白色高亮Continue按钮引导完成
design_highlights.en: Password field hidden for privacy, white CTA button guides completion

product_insight.cn: 将注册定位为'保存进度'而非'创建账户'，巧妙转换用户心理预期，让注册成为用户主动诉求而非被迫行为，有效提升转化率。精简三字段设计降低填写负担。
product_insight.en: Framing registration as 'save progress' transforms user psychology, making signup feel like a benefit rather than obligation. Minimal three-field design reduces completion friction.

core_function.cn: 通过邮箱和密码完成最终账户注册
core_function.en: Complete final account registration with email and password

design_highlights.cn: 多色进度条清晰展示注册流程进度，增强用户完成动力
design_highlights.en: Multi-color progress bar clearly shows registration progress, boosting completion motivation

design_highlights.cn: "Almost done!"正向鼓励文案降低用户流失焦虑
design_highlights.en: "Almost done!" positive copy reduces user dropout anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 条款同意默认预选，减少注册摩擦提升转化
design_highlights.en: Terms agreement pre-checked to reduce friction and improve conversion

design_highlights.cn: 密码最少字符数实时提示，降低输入错误率
design_highlights.en: Real-time minimum character hint reduces password input errors

product_insight.cn: 将注册放在onboarding末尾是经典的承诺升级策略，用户已投入时间填写偏好信息，沉没成本促使完成注册。进度条即将满格的视觉暗示进一步强化完成动机。
product_insight.en: Placing signup at onboarding end is classic commitment escalation. Users already invested time in preferences, sunk cost drives completion. Near-full progress bar visually reinforces finish motivation.

core_function.cn: 提示用户验证邮箱地址以保护隐私和数据安全
core_function.en: Prompt users to verify email address for privacy and data security

design_highlights.cn: 简洁线性图标配合警示三角，清晰传达待验证状态
design_highlights.en: Clean line icon with warning triangle clearly conveys pending verification status

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调隐私保护，建立用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes privacy protection, building user trust

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计支持重发邮件和确认已验证两种操作路径
design_highlights.en: Dual button design supports resend email and confirm verified actions

product_insight.cn: 将邮箱验证与数据导出功能关联，通过隐私保护诉求提升验证完成率。界面极简设计降低用户焦虑，双CTA设计覆盖不同用户状态，减少流程断点。
product_insight.en: Links email verification to data export via privacy appeal to boost completion rate. Minimal design reduces anxiety, dual CTAs cover different user states and minimize drop-off.

core_function.cn: 通过邮箱或第三方账号快速创建用户账户
core_function.en: Create user account via email or third-party authentication

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色CTA按钮，视觉层级清晰，引导用户聚焦注册操作
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange CTA button creates clear visual hierarchy focusing on signup action

design_highlights.cn: 提供邮箱和社交登录双通道，降低注册门槛，提升转化率
design_highlights.en: Dual registration channels via email and social login reduce friction and boost conversion

design_highlights.cn: 单一输入框极简设计，减少用户认知负担，邮箱已预填提示输入状态
design_highlights.en: Minimalist single input field reduces cognitive load with pre-filled email indicating input state

product_insight.cn: 注册流程极度精简，仅需邮箱一步即可完成，配合Google/Apple第三方登录覆盖主流用户群体。法律条款前置展示体现合规意识，X关闭按钮保留用户退出自由度。
product_insight.en: Ultra-simplified registration requiring only email, with Google/Apple options covering mainstream users. Legal terms upfront show compliance awareness while X button preserves user exit freedom.

core_function.cn: 通过邮箱和密码创建新用户账户
core_function.en: Create new user account with email and password

design_highlights.cn: 极简白色背景配合青色品牌色，界面干净清爽无干扰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background with teal brand color, clean and distraction-free

design_highlights.cn: 密码输入框配备可见性切换图标，提升用户输入体验
design_highlights.en: Password field with visibility toggle icon enhances input experience

design_highlights.cn: 注册/登录Tab切换设计，降低用户选择成本，提高转化
design_highlights.en: Sign up/Log in tab switching reduces user decision cost and improves conversion

product_insight.cn: 采用模态弹窗形式呈现注册流程，左上角X按钮让用户可随时退出，降低心理压力。Tab切换设计让新老用户都能快速找到入口，减少流失。表单字段精简至最少，降低注册门槛。
product_insight.en: Modal presentation with X button reduces user pressure. Tab switching serves both new and returning users efficiently. Minimal form fields lower registration barrier.

core_function.cn: 通过邮箱或第三方账号创建Runna账户
core_function.en: Create Runna account via email or third-party login

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合高对比度输入框，视觉层次分明，降低视觉疲劳
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high-contrast input fields creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 密码字段提供可见性切换，增强输入体验和安全感
design_highlights.en: Password visibility toggle enhances input experience and security

design_highlights.cn: 提供三种社交登录选项降低注册门槛，主CTA按钮采用品牌蓝色突出
design_highlights.en: Three social login options reduce friction, primary CTA uses brand blue for emphasis

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条暗示流程简短，减轻用户心理负担
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar implies short process, reducing user anxiety

product_insight.cn: 注册页采用渐进式表单设计，通过进度条可视化流程进度。多种登录方式覆盖不同用户偏好，法律条款采用内联链接而非弹窗，最大化减少注册摩擦。
product_insight.en: Progressive form design with progress visualization. Multiple login options cater to user preferences. Inline legal links minimize friction compared to popups.

core_function.cn: 收集用户基本信息完成账号注册
core_function.en: Collect user info to complete account registration

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合高对比度输入框，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high-contrast input fields creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 密码框提供可见性切换按钮，提升输入体验
design_highlights.en: Password visibility toggle enhances input experience

design_highlights.cn: 提供三种社交登录选项，降低注册门槛
design_highlights.en: Three social login options reduce registration friction

design_highlights.cn: 简洁表单仅需3项信息，减少用户心理负担
design_highlights.en: Minimal 3-field form reduces user cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 注册流程极简化设计，仅收集必要信息（姓名、邮箱、密码），结合多元社交登录降低流失率。进度条暗示流程可控，法律条款前置展示建立信任感。
product_insight.en: Minimalist registration collects only essential info. Multiple social logins reduce drop-off. Progress bar implies controllable flow while upfront legal terms build trust.

core_function.cn: 输入6位邮箱验证码完成身份验证
core_function.en: Enter 6-digit email verification code for identity confirmation

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合独立数字方块，输入状态清晰可辨，当前位置高亮显示
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with separate digit boxes, clear input state with highlighted current position

design_highlights.cn: 自定义数字键盘取代系统键盘，专注于数字输入，减少误操作
design_highlights.en: Custom numeric keypad replaces system keyboard, focused on digit input to reduce errors

design_highlights.cn: 提供'打开邮箱'快捷入口，降低用户切换App的操作成本
design_highlights.en: Quick 'Open email app' link reduces friction of switching between apps

design_highlights.cn: 文案简洁直接，明确告知验证码发送目标邮箱，建立信任感
design_highlights.en: Clear copy directly shows target email address, building user trust

product_insight.cn: 验证码页面采用分离式输入框设计，视觉反馈清晰；提供重新获取验证码和直接打开邮箱两个辅助入口，有效降低验证流程中的用户流失率，值得借鉴的闭环设计思维。
product_insight.en: Separated input boxes with clear visual feedback; dual auxiliary entries (resend code & open email) effectively reduce drop-off during verification, demonstrating thoughtful closed-loop design.

core_function.cn: 通过对比展示使用Flo前后的差异，强调产品价值
core_function.en: Compare user experience with and without the app to highlight product value

design_highlights.cn: 左灰右粉的对比卡片设计，视觉上强化正向选择
design_highlights.en: Gray vs pink comparison cards visually reinforce the positive choice

design_highlights.cn: 33%更高怀孕几率的数据背书，附带研究来源增强可信度
design_highlights.en: 33% higher pregnancy rate claim with research citation builds credibility

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼Julia并配合温馨插图，建立情感连接
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with warm illustrations creates emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 勾选与减号图标对比，直观传达优劣势
design_highlights.en: Checkmarks vs minus icons intuitively convey advantages and disadvantages

product_insight.cn: 采用经典的Before/After对比框架，将用户痛点与产品优势并置，配合权威数据和个性化称呼，有效降低决策阻力。粉色突出区域引导视觉焦点，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Classic before/after comparison framework juxtaposes pain points with benefits. Personalization, authoritative data, and color-coded visual hierarchy effectively reduce decision friction.

core_function.cn: 科普备孕知识，消除用户认知误区
core_function.en: Educate users on conception facts and debunk myths

design_highlights.cn: 淡紫色卡片配合趣味插图，降低敏感话题的尴尬感
design_highlights.en: Soft purple card with playful illustration reduces awkwardness of sensitive topic

design_highlights.cn: "Did you know?"开场引发好奇心，轻松幽默的文案风格建立信任
design_highlights.en: "Did you know?" hook sparks curiosity, casual humorous tone builds trust

design_highlights.cn: 上滑手势引导用户探索更多内容，降低操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Swipe up gesture guides users to explore more content with low friction

design_highlights.cn: 底部CTA按钮"Check it out"引导用户进入内容中心
design_highlights.en: Bottom CTA "Check it out" drives users to content hub

product_insight.cn: 通过科学知识卡片降低用户焦虑，以轻松幽默方式处理敏感话题，建立产品专业且友善的品牌形象，同时引导用户深入探索内容生态。
product_insight.en: Science-backed tips reduce user anxiety, handling sensitive topics with humor builds a professional yet friendly brand image while driving content engagement.

core_function.cn: 展示社区热门话题，引导新用户加入备孕讨论
core_function.en: Showcase community discussions and invite users to join fertility conversations

design_highlights.cn: 聊天气泡布局模拟真实社区对话氛围，粉色渐变背景营造温馨女性化感受
design_highlights.en: Chat bubble layout simulates real community conversations with warm pink gradient background

design_highlights.cn: 展示真实话题与高互动数据（43K回复），消除用户孤独感并建立归属感
design_highlights.en: Real topics with high engagement metrics (43K replies) reduce isolation and build belonging

design_highlights.cn: 精选高热度备孕话题激发用户好奇心，降低加入社区的心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Curated high-engagement fertility topics spark curiosity and lower barriers to join

product_insight.cn: 通过展示真实社区内容而非空洞介绍，用具体数据（5K-19K点赞）证明社区活跃度，让首次尝试备孕的用户感受到同伴支持，有效提升社区功能的使用率和留存
product_insight.en: Showing real community content with concrete engagement metrics proves community value, helping first-time users feel peer support and boosting feature adoption and retention

core_function.cn: 让用户选择训练目标距离，支持预设和自定义
core_function.en: Let users select training distance goal with preset and custom options

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合清晰的选项卡片，层次分明易于扫视
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with clear option cards, well-layered for easy scanning

design_highlights.cn: 单选配合自定义输入，满足标准化和个性化双重需求
design_highlights.en: Radio selection with custom input meets both standard and personalized needs

design_highlights.cn: 从5k到Ultra渐进式难度排列，降低新手选择焦虑
design_highlights.en: Progressive difficulty from 5k to Ultra reduces beginner's choice anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 包含Ultra马拉松选项传递专业感，吸引进阶用户
design_highlights.en: Ultra marathon option conveys professionalism, attracting advanced users

product_insight.cn: 通过覆盖从5k新手到Ultra高阶的全距离选项，配合自定义功能，既能快速完成目标设定又能满足专业跑者需求，体现产品对不同用户群体的包容性设计思维
product_insight.en: Covering full distance range from 5k to Ultra with custom option enables quick goal setting while meeting pro runners' needs, showing inclusive design for diverse user segments

core_function.cn: 收集用户力量训练经验水平以个性化训练方案
core_function.en: Collect user strength training experience for personalized workout plans

design_highlights.cn: 圆环图标直观表达等级递进关系，填充程度暗示能力水平
design_highlights.en: Ring icons visually represent level progression, fill degree implies ability level

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，选中态边框高亮，交互反馈清晰
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design with highlighted border for clear selection feedback

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配详细描述和具体动作示例，降低用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Detailed descriptions with specific movement examples reduce decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 提示可后续修改，降低用户选择压力促进流程完成
design_highlights.en: Hint about changing later reduces pressure and promotes flow completion

product_insight.cn: 通过具体动作举例（如前蹲、过顶深蹲）帮助用户准确自评，避免模糊选项导致的错误匹配。问号图标提供额外帮助入口，平衡简洁与完整信息需求。
product_insight.en: Specific movement examples (front squats, overhead squats) help accurate self-assessment. Question mark icon provides help access, balancing simplicity with complete information needs.

core_function.cn: 收集用户昵称以实现个性化称呼体验
core_function.en: Collect user nickname for personalized addressing

design_highlights.cn: 亲切友好的开场语"Let's get to know each other"拉近与用户距离
design_highlights.en: Warm opening phrase creates friendly connection with users

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计，大面积留白聚焦单一输入任务，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with ample whitespace focuses on single input task

design_highlights.cn: 提供Skip选项尊重用户选择权，降低流失风险
design_highlights.en: Skip option respects user choice and reduces abandonment risk

design_highlights.cn: 粉色圆角CTA按钮醒目突出，引导用户继续流程
design_highlights.en: Pink rounded CTA button stands out to guide user progression

product_insight.cn: 通过询问称呼建立个性化关系是女性健康App的经典策略，既收集数据又营造一对一陪伴感。Skip按钮平衡了转化率与用户体验，避免强制输入造成的流失。
product_insight.en: Asking for name establishes personalized relationship - classic strategy for women's health apps. Skip button balances conversion with UX, avoiding forced input abandonment.

core_function.cn: 收集用户首选称呼，建立个性化体验基础
core_function.en: Collect user's preferred name to establish personalized experience

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计风格，大量留白聚焦单一输入任务
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with ample whitespace focusing on single input task

design_highlights.cn: 友好亲切的问候语气，降低用户心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Friendly greeting tone reduces user psychological barriers

design_highlights.cn: 分段式进度条清晰展示引导流程阶段
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar clearly shows onboarding stages

design_highlights.cn: 醒目蓝色CTA按钮引导用户继续操作
design_highlights.en: Prominent blue CTA button guides users to proceed

product_insight.cn: 通过询问"称呼"而非正式姓名，营造轻松氛围并暗示后续个性化体验。单一输入字段降低认知负担，分段进度条让用户对流程长度有明确预期，减少中途放弃率。
product_insight.en: Asking for 'what to call you' instead of formal name creates casual atmosphere and implies personalization. Single input field reduces cognitive load while segmented progress sets clear expectations.

core_function.cn: 选择训练和比赛的地形坡度偏好
core_function.en: Select terrain elevation profile for training and race

design_highlights.cn: 四个选项配以直观图标，从平坦到山丘渐进式视觉呈现
design_highlights.en: Four options with intuitive icons showing progressive elevation from flat to hilly

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式交互，选中状态青色边框高亮清晰
design_highlights.en: Single-select card interaction with clear cyan border highlight for selected state

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项提供具体数值范围建议，降低用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Each option provides specific elevation range recommendations reducing decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 预选默认值Flat降低决策成本，加速完成流程
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected default value reduces decision cost and accelerates onboarding

product_insight.cn: 通过量化的海拔爬升数据（m/km）帮助用户科学匹配训练计划与实际赛道，体现专业运动App的差异化定位，避免用户因选择不当导致训练效果不佳。
product_insight.en: Quantified elevation gain data (m/km) helps users scientifically match training plans with actual race courses, demonstrating professional sports app positioning and preventing suboptimal training outcomes.

core_function.cn: 注册完成后的个性化欢迎，确认用户身份
core_function.en: Personalized welcome after signup, confirming user identity

design_highlights.cn: 使用用户名个性化问候，营造亲切感和专属体验
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with username creates intimacy and exclusive experience

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计，大量留白聚焦核心信息，粉色羽毛图标轻盈优雅
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with whitespace focusing on core message, elegant pink feather icon

design_highlights.cn: 过渡页设计减少认知负担，为后续流程做好情感铺垫
design_highlights.en: Transition page reduces cognitive load, emotionally prepares users for next steps

product_insight.cn: 在注册流程中插入个性化欢迎页是情感化设计的经典手法，通过称呼用户姓名建立情感连接，羽毛图标暗示产品轻盈、舒适的调性，为后续引导问卷降低用户抗拒心理
product_insight.en: Inserting personalized welcome in signup flow is classic emotional design, building connection through user's name. Feather icon suggests lightness, reducing resistance for subsequent onboarding

core_function.cn: 通过数据可视化展示减重过程，激励用户坚持目标
core_function.en: Motivate users with weight loss journey visualization

design_highlights.cn: 渐变蓝色背景配合曲线图，视觉清新且专业
design_highlights.en: Gradient blue background with curve chart, fresh and professional

design_highlights.cn: "OK, real talk"口语化文案拉近距离，承认困难但给予鼓励
design_highlights.en: Conversational tone acknowledges challenges while providing encouragement

design_highlights.cn: 底部P.S.文案强化用户已迈出第一步，降低放弃率
design_highlights.en: P.S. copy reinforces first step taken, reducing dropout rate

design_highlights.cn: 曲线图展示非线性减重过程，设定合理预期
design_highlights.en: Curve chart shows non-linear weight loss, setting realistic expectations

product_insight.cn: 巧妙运用期望管理策略，通过展示真实的减重曲线（有起伏）而非理想直线，降低用户因短期反弹而流失的风险，同时用情感化文案建立信任感。
product_insight.en: Smart expectation management showing realistic weight fluctuations instead of ideal linear progress, reducing churn from short-term setbacks while building trust through emotional copy.

core_function.cn: 让用户自评跑步能力等级以匹配训练计划
core_function.en: Self-assess running ability to match personalized training plans

design_highlights.cn: 圆环选择器设计直观展示等级层次，深色主题配合霓虹绿强调选中态
design_highlights.en: Circular selector visually represents levels, dark theme with neon green highlights selection state

design_highlights.cn: 选中项展开显示详细说明和引导提示，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Selected option expands to show detailed description and guidance, reducing decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 贴心提示'可稍后修改'消除用户选择焦虑，初级选项提供进阶路径建议
