design_highlights.en: Reassuring note about changing later reduces anxiety, beginner option provides progression guidance

design_highlights.cn: 四级分层覆盖全用户群体，每级配具体可量化指标便于自我定位
design_highlights.en: Four-tier structure covers all users, each with quantifiable metrics for easy self-assessment

product_insight.cn: 通过可量化的距离和时间指标帮助用户准确定位能力等级，展开式说明设计既保持界面简洁又提供足够信息，降低选择门槛的同时为个性化推荐奠定基础
product_insight.en: Quantifiable distance and time metrics help accurate self-assessment. Expandable descriptions maintain clean UI while providing sufficient info, lowering barriers while enabling personalized recommendations

core_function.cn: 收集用户感兴趣的运动类型，实现个性化推荐
core_function.en: Collect user's sports interests for personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色选中态，视觉层次分明，运动图标风格统一
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange selection state, clear visual hierarchy with consistent sport icons

design_highlights.cn: 多选列表支持自由选择，选中状态即时反馈，操作流畅无阻碍
design_highlights.en: Multi-select list with instant feedback, smooth and frictionless interaction

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调'30+运动类型'展示平台丰富度，激发用户探索欲望
design_highlights.en: Copy highlights '30+ sport types' showcasing platform richness, inspiring exploration

design_highlights.cn: 预设热门选项降低决策成本，底部固定CTA按钮引导继续
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected popular options reduce decision cost, fixed CTA button guides continuation

product_insight.cn: 通过运动偏好收集实现冷启动个性化，预选Run/Walk/Hike降低用户操作负担。30+类型的数据展示建立专业形象，为后续内容推荐和社区匹配奠定基础。
product_insight.en: Cold-start personalization through interest collection. Pre-selecting Run/Walk/Hike reduces user effort. '30+ types' establishes professional image for content and community matching.

core_function.cn: 通过情绪选择为用户个性化推荐冥想内容
core_function.en: Personalize meditation recommendations based on user's current mood

design_highlights.cn: 使用emoji表情图标直观表达情绪状态，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Emoji icons intuitively represent emotional states, reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式保持上下文，选中状态有明确边框反馈
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet maintains context with clear selection border feedback

design_highlights.cn: 包含正负情绪选项（平静到恐慌），展现对用户情绪的全面关怀
design_highlights.en: Covers positive to negative emotions (calm to panicked), showing comprehensive emotional care

design_highlights.cn: 背景展示推荐内容预览，暗示选择后的价值
design_highlights.en: Background shows recommended content preview, implying value after selection

product_insight.cn: 情绪作为个性化推荐的入口，既能收集用户即时状态数据，又能建立产品与用户情感连接。六种情绪覆盖主流场景，选项设计避免用户选择困难，提升转化效率。
product_insight.en: Mood as personalization entry collects real-time user data while building emotional connection. Six emotion options cover main scenarios without overwhelming users, improving conversion efficiency.

core_function.cn: 区分自用用户与伴侣模式用户，实现差异化体验
core_function.en: Distinguish self-users from partner mode users for differentiated experience

design_highlights.cn: 极简黑白设计，大量留白突出选项焦点
design_highlights.en: Minimalist black-white design with ample whitespace focusing on options

design_highlights.cn: 二选一简洁决策，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Binary choice reduces cognitive load for quick decision making

design_highlights.cn: 伴侣码选项暗示社交裂变增长策略
design_highlights.en: Partner code option implies social viral growth strategy

design_highlights.cn: 友好的问句式标题拉近与用户距离
design_highlights.en: Friendly question-style headline creates approachable tone

product_insight.cn: Flo通过早期用户身份区分，实现产品的多场景覆盖。伴侣码机制既是增长策略，也满足了伴侣间共享经期数据的真实需求，体现了女性健康产品的社交属性延伸。
product_insight.en: Flo's early user type distinction enables multi-scenario coverage. Partner code mechanism serves both as growth strategy and meets real couples' needs for shared cycle data, extending social attributes of women's health products.

core_function.cn: 展示与Whole Foods和Amazon Fresh的集成功能
core_function.en: Showcase integration with Whole Foods and Amazon Fresh

design_highlights.cn: 双品牌Logo并列展示，强化合作伙伴背书和信任感
design_highlights.en: Dual brand logos displayed side by side, reinforcing partner endorsement and trust

design_highlights.cn: 突出时间节省价值主张，直击用户痛点
design_highlights.en: Highlighting time-saving value proposition, addressing user pain points directly

design_highlights.cn: 简洁清晰的文案说明具体使用场景，降低理解成本
design_highlights.en: Clean copy explaining specific use cases, reducing cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 通过展示与知名零售品牌的深度集成，提升产品可信度和实用价值。将膳食计划与购物环节打通，形成完整的用户体验闭环，增强用户粘性和转化动力。
product_insight.en: Showcasing deep integration with well-known retail brands enhances product credibility. Connecting meal planning with shopping creates a complete user experience loop, boosting retention and conversion.

core_function.cn: 收集用户过往减重失败原因，优化个性化方案
core_function.en: Collect past weight loss barriers to optimize personalized plans

design_highlights.cn: 选中项蓝色边框+勾选标识，视觉反馈清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Blue border with checkmark for selected items provides clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 多选模式配合'Select all that apply'提示，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Multi-select mode with hint reduces user decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 问题聚焦过往障碍而非失败，措辞正向减少负罪感
design_highlights.en: Focus on barriers rather than failures, positive wording reduces guilt

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条展示流程进度，提升用户完成意愿
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows completion status, increases user motivation

product_insight.cn: 通过障碍因素调研实现精准用户画像，预判流失风险点并针对性设计干预策略。选项覆盖时间、执行难度、社交场景等多维度，为后续方案推荐提供数据支撑。
product_insight.en: Barrier assessment enables precise user profiling and predicts churn risks. Options cover time, difficulty, social scenarios for personalized plan recommendations.

core_function.cn: 收集用户生日信息以个性化训练强度
core_function.en: Collect birthday to personalize training intensity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合高对比度日期显示，滚轮选择器直观易用
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high-contrast date display, intuitive scroll picker

design_highlights.cn: 三列滚轮联动选择，符合用户心理模型，操作自然流畅
design_highlights.en: Three-column scroll wheel with natural interaction pattern

design_highlights.cn: 说明数据用途并强调隐私保护，降低用户顾虑
design_highlights.en: Explains data purpose and privacy to reduce user concerns

design_highlights.cn: 底部年龄限制提示建立合规信任，明确产品定位
design_highlights.en: Age restriction notice builds compliance trust

product_insight.cn: 通过说明数据用途（个性化训练、降低受伤风险）和隐私保护承诺，将敏感信息收集转化为用户价值感知，有效降低填写阻力。18岁限制既满足合规要求，也传递专业运动训练定位。
product_insight.en: Transforms sensitive data collection into perceived user value by explaining purpose (personalized training, injury prevention) and privacy assurance. Age restriction signals compliance and professional athletic positioning.

core_function.cn: 收集用户每周可用于跑步的时间偏好
core_function.en: Collect user's weekly availability for running sessions

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合青绿色强调色，打造专业运动App视觉氛围
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with teal accent color creates professional sports app aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的复选框交互，支持多选且状态反馈即时明确
design_highlights.en: Clear checkbox interaction with instant multi-select feedback

design_highlights.cn: 设置最低选择门槛（至少4天），确保收集有效数据用于个性化推荐
design_highlights.en: Minimum selection threshold (4 days) ensures quality data for personalization

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调「最优日程」，让用户感受到个性化关怀
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'optimal days' making users feel personalized attention

product_insight.cn: 通过设置最低选择数量，既保证算法有足够数据生成有效训练计划，又给用户灵活性。这种约束式选择设计平衡了数据质量与用户体验，是个性化产品的核心策略。
product_insight.en: Minimum selection requirement balances algorithm data needs with user flexibility. This constrained choice design ensures quality personalization while maintaining user agency - a core strategy for customization products.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择每周长跑训练的固定日期
core_function.en: Let users choose their preferred day for weekly long runs

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合高对比度选中状态，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high-contrast selection state creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 单选按钮设计简洁，选中状态反馈明确即时
design_highlights.en: Clean radio button design with immediate and clear selection feedback

design_highlights.cn: 精选4个常见训练日而非全部7天，降低决策负担
design_highlights.en: Curated 4 common training days instead of all 7, reducing decision fatigue

design_highlights.cn: 问题式标题营造对话感，让用户感受个性化关怀
design_highlights.en: Conversational question format creates personalized and caring experience

product_insight.cn: 将7天简化为4个跑步常用日，体现对跑者习惯的深度洞察。进度条设计让用户清晰感知流程位置，帮助信息图标提供即时解惑入口，整体设计平衡了数据收集效率与用户体验。
product_insight.en: Simplifying 7 days to 4 common running days shows deep understanding of runner habits. Progress bar and help icon balance data collection efficiency with user experience.

core_function.cn: 设置每日就寝时间和提醒日期，建立规律作息习惯
core_function.en: Set daily bedtime and reminder days to build consistent sleep routine

design_highlights.cn: 深棕渐变背景营造夜间氛围，与睡眠主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Dark brown gradient creates nighttime atmosphere, perfectly matching sleep theme

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮时间选择器，底部弹窗形式操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker in bottom sheet provides intuitive time selection

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调"更好睡眠"的益处，用科学理由激励用户设置
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'better sleep' benefits, motivating users with scientific reasoning

design_highlights.cn: 工作日默认选中周末取消，符合用户实际作息预期
design_highlights.en: Weekdays pre-selected while weekends unchecked matches user expectations

product_insight.cn: 通过就寝提醒功能增强用户粘性和日常打开率，预设合理默认值降低设置门槛，底部弹窗保持上下文连贯性，是睡眠类App提升留存的核心功能设计。
product_insight.en: Bedtime reminders boost daily engagement and retention. Smart defaults reduce friction while bottom sheet maintains context. A core feature design for sleep app retention strategy.

core_function.cn: 收集用户出生年份以优化个性化预测
core_function.en: Collect birth year to improve personalized predictions

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮选择器采用渐变透明效果，突出当前选中项
design_highlights.en: Wheel picker with gradient transparency highlighting current selection

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮式交互符合iOS原生习惯，操作流畅自然
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel interaction provides smooth and intuitive experience

design_highlights.cn: 说明数据用途（改善预测），降低隐私顾虑提升填写率
design_highlights.en: Explaining data purpose (better predictions) reduces privacy concerns

design_highlights.cn: 粉色CTA按钮温和友好，与品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Soft pink CTA button creates friendly tone consistent with brand

product_insight.cn: 通过解释数据收集目的（优化预测）建立信任，滚轮选择器比输入框更高效且减少错误，粉色按钮暗示这可能是健康/女性向产品，整体设计简洁聚焦单一任务。
product_insight.en: Building trust by explaining data purpose. Wheel picker is more efficient than text input with fewer errors. Pink button suggests health/female-oriented product. Minimal design focuses on single task.

core_function.cn: 展示对用户挑战的理解，建立情感连接与信任
core_function.en: Show understanding of user challenges and build emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼"Julia"配合共情文案，让用户感到被理解和支持
design_highlights.en: Personalized name 'Julia' with empathetic copy makes users feel understood

design_highlights.cn: 纯净蓝色渐变背景传递专业信任感，大面积留白聚焦核心信息
design_highlights.en: Clean blue gradient background conveys trust, whitespace focuses on key message

design_highlights.cn: 引用"帮助数百万人"的成功案例作为社交证明增强说服力
design_highlights.en: Social proof citing 'millions of people' enhances persuasion

product_insight.cn: 在onboarding中插入共情页是高明的转化策略，先承认用户的痛点和挑战，再展示产品能力，降低用户心理防线。个性化称呼强化一对一服务感知，提升用户承诺度。
product_insight.en: Inserting empathy page in onboarding is smart conversion strategy. Acknowledging user pain points before showing product capability lowers psychological barriers. Personalized greeting enhances one-on-one service perception.

core_function.cn: 确认用户是否可以在计划开始日进行首次跑步
core_function.en: Confirm if user can run on planned start date

design_highlights.cn: 二元选择设计简化决策，单选按钮配合清晰的副标题说明
design_highlights.en: Binary choice with radio buttons and clear subtitle explanations

design_highlights.cn: 友好的询问语气，给予用户灵活调整的选择权
design_highlights.en: Friendly questioning tone gives users flexibility to adjust schedule

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合高对比度文字，选中状态清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high contrast text, clear selected state indication

design_highlights.cn: 预选'No'选项降低用户承诺压力，提高完成率
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected 'No' reduces commitment pressure, improves completion rate

product_insight.cn: 通过智能检测日程冲突并主动询问，体现产品对用户实际情况的关注。预选'不可用'选项降低心理门槛，避免用户因承诺压力而放弃，提升留存。
product_insight.en: Smart schedule conflict detection shows user-centric design. Pre-selecting 'No' reduces psychological pressure, preventing dropout from commitment anxiety and improving retention.

core_function.cn: 收集用户可用训练日以制定最优计划
core_function.en: Collect available training days to create optimal schedule

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的列表布局，每天独立卡片设计便于点击
design_highlights.en: Clean list layout with independent card design for easy tapping

design_highlights.cn: 复选框即时反馈，选中状态深色填充明确
design_highlights.en: Checkbox with instant feedback, dark fill for clear selected state

design_highlights.cn: 设置最少3天门槛，确保用户承诺度和计划有效性
design_highlights.en: Minimum 3-day threshold ensures user commitment and plan effectiveness

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调'最优训练日'，传递专业个性化服务感
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'optimal days' conveying professional personalization

product_insight.cn: 通过最低选择门槛设计，既保证训练计划的科学性（需要足够恢复间隔），又筛选出有意愿坚持的用户，提升后续留存率。多日分散选择的引导也符合运动科学原则。
product_insight.en: Minimum selection threshold ensures scientific training plans with recovery intervals while filtering committed users for better retention. Guidance for spaced days aligns with exercise science principles.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择想要参与的运动挑战类型
core_function.en: Let users select the type of fitness challenge they want to join

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合卡片式布局，视觉层次清晰，每个选项配有图标增强识别性
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with card layout, clear visual hierarchy, icons enhance recognition

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片设计简化决策，每个选项附带详细说明降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Single-select cards simplify decision, detailed descriptions reduce cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 友好的引导语'Let's get started'营造轻松开始的氛围
design_highlights.en: Friendly prompt 'Let's get started' creates a relaxed atmosphere to begin

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示流程位置，减少用户中途放弃率
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows flow position, reduces user drop-off rate

product_insight.cn: 通过四种差异化挑战类型满足不同用户需求：团队协作、个人累积、速度竞赛、单次突破，既支持社交属性也满足个人成就感，是运动App增强用户粘性的有效策略。
product_insight.en: Four differentiated challenge types meet diverse needs: team collaboration, personal accumulation, speed competition, and single breakthrough. Supports both social engagement and personal achievement, effective for fitness app retention.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择每周期望的跑步天数
core_function.en: Let users select their desired running days per week

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合简洁单选按钮，视觉层次分明易于聚焦
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with clean radio buttons, clear visual hierarchy for focus

design_highlights.cn: 贴心提示不要超过当前频率太多以避免受伤，体现专业关怀
design_highlights.en: Caring tip about injury prevention shows professional consideration

design_highlights.cn: 仅提供3个选项降低决策负担，帮助信息按钮方便用户了解更多
design_highlights.en: Only 3 options reduce decision fatigue, help icon for more info

product_insight.cn: 通过限制选项数量和添加安全提示，既简化了用户决策流程，又展现了产品的专业性和对用户健康的关注，有效建立信任感。进度条设计让用户清楚了解引导流程位置。
product_insight.en: Limited options and safety tips simplify decisions while demonstrating professionalism and health concern, effectively building trust. Progress bar shows clear onboarding position.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择每周力量训练的次数，定制个性化计划
core_function.en: Let users choose weekly strength training frequency for personalized plans

design_highlights.cn: 友好的引导文案「More isn't always best」减轻用户选择压力，降低心理负担
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy 'More isn't always best' reduces user pressure and psychological burden

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的单选列表设计，选项间距适中，视觉层级分明
design_highlights.en: Clear radio button list design with proper spacing and visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 安全提示「至多比当前多一次」降低用户受伤风险顾虑，提升转化
design_highlights.en: Safety tip about injury prevention addresses user concerns and improves conversion

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示当前步骤位置，给用户明确的进度感知
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows current step position, giving users clear progress awareness

product_insight.cn: 通过专业健身建议（循序渐进原则）建立信任感，同时「可以稍后添加」的说明降低决策门槛，体现了以用户安全为中心的产品理念，值得健身类App借鉴
product_insight.en: Builds trust through professional fitness advice while 'add more sessions later' reduces decision burden, reflecting user-safety-centered design worth adopting in fitness apps

core_function.cn: 展示个性化营养建议功能，引导用户开始使用
core_function.en: Preview personalized nutrition recommendations and guide users to start

design_highlights.cn: 模糊化卡片设计营造神秘感，突出蛋白质核心指标
design_highlights.en: Blurred card design creates mystery while highlighting protein as key metric

design_highlights.cn: 对话式文案'You'll feel fuller'传递个人化关怀与健康承诺
design_highlights.en: Conversational copy 'You'll feel fuller' conveys personal care and health promise

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色CTA按钮配合Skip选项，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Blue CTA with Skip option reduces user decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 底部透明度说明链接增强信任感和产品透明度
design_highlights.en: Transparency link at bottom builds trust and product credibility

product_insight.cn: 通过模糊化展示未解锁功能制造期待感，对话气泡式设计让营养建议更具亲和力，同时'How we make recommendations'链接有效缓解用户对AI建议的信任顾虑
product_insight.en: Blurred preview creates anticipation for locked features. Chat bubble design makes nutrition advice approachable. Transparency link effectively addresses user trust concerns about AI recommendations

core_function.cn: 收集用户当前跑步能力数据以个性化训练计划
core_function.en: Collect current running ability to personalize training plans

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮式时间选择器，支持小时/分钟/秒精确调节，操作自然流畅
design_highlights.en: Drum picker for time selection with hour/minute/second precision, intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 距离选项采用胶囊标签设计，5km高亮为青绿色强调当前选择
design_highlights.en: Distance options use pill-shaped tags with teal highlight for current selection

design_highlights.cn: 明确提示用户使用当前水平而非PB，降低输入压力减少虚荣心干扰
design_highlights.en: Clear guidance to use current fitness level, not outdated PB, reducing ego-driven input

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示流程位置，帮助用户预期完成时间
design_highlights.en: Progress bar at top shows flow position, helping users anticipate completion

product_insight.cn: 通过多距离选项适配不同跑者经验，滚轮选择器降低输入门槛，实时句子预览确认用户意图。强调"当前"而非目标时间，确保训练计划基于真实能力而非愿望，提升后续留存。
product_insight.en: Multi-distance options accommodate various runner experiences. Wheel picker reduces input friction while live sentence preview confirms intent. Emphasizing 'current' over 'goal' ensures training plans are realistic, improving retention.

core_function.cn: 收集用户可用健身器材，个性化定制训练计划
core_function.en: Collect available equipment to personalize workout plans

design_highlights.cn: 简洁列表设计配合圆角复选框，选中态使用深色填充对比明显
design_highlights.en: Clean list design with rounded checkboxes, dark fill for selected state provides clear contrast

design_highlights.cn: 副标题减压设计：告知用户无器材也能使用自重训练，降低选择焦虑
design_highlights.en: Reassuring subtitle tells users bodyweight exercises work too, reducing selection anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 多选交互简单直观，无需复杂操作即可完成器材配置
design_highlights.en: Simple multi-select interaction allows quick equipment configuration without complexity

product_insight.cn: 通过器材收集实现训练个性化，同时友好提示无器材方案降低用户流失。列表覆盖主流器材类型，平衡专业性与易用性，为后续推荐算法提供关键输入。
product_insight.en: Equipment collection enables workout personalization while friendly no-equipment messaging reduces churn. List covers mainstream equipment types, balancing professionalism with usability for recommendation algorithms.

core_function.cn: 通过开放式问题引导用户深度表达悲伤情绪
core_function.en: Guide users to express grief through open-ended reflection prompts

design_highlights.cn: 填空式句子引导降低表达门槛，帮助用户直面内心真实感受
design_highlights.en: Fill-in-the-blank format lowers expression barriers and helps users confront true feelings

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色渐变背景营造平静疗愈氛围，减轻沉重话题的压迫感
design_highlights.en: Blue gradient background creates calming healing atmosphere for heavy emotional topics

design_highlights.cn: 字符计数器提供输入边界感，292字符限制鼓励简洁有力的表达
design_highlights.en: Character counter provides input boundaries, 292-char limit encourages concise expression

product_insight.cn: 悲伤疗愈类App通过结构化提问降低情绪表达难度，填空式设计比开放问题更易回答。用户输入"my life"暗示深度需求，产品需做好危机干预准备。
product_insight.en: Grief healing apps use structured prompts to ease emotional expression. Fill-in-blank design is easier than open questions. User input 'my life' signals deep needs requiring crisis intervention readiness.

core_function.cn: 确认用户选择并传达小习惯带来大改变的理念
core_function.en: Confirm user choices and convey the philosophy of small habits leading to big changes

design_highlights.cn: 生动插图隐喻：人物推动巨大果实上山，象征积小成大的努力过程
design_highlights.en: Vivid illustration metaphor: person pushing giant fruit uphill symbolizes incremental progress

design_highlights.cn: 积极肯定文案'Excellent choices!'配合激励性标题增强用户信心
design_highlights.en: Positive affirmation 'Excellent choices!' with motivational headline boosts user confidence

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示已完成大部分步骤，降低用户放弃意愿
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows most steps completed, reducing user abandonment intent

design_highlights.cn: 纯蓝色背景搭配橙绿色插图形成鲜明对比，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Pure blue background with orange-green illustration creates clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 在用户完成选择后及时给予正向反馈，通过隐喻性插图传达产品核心理念'小习惯大改变'，既强化用户决策信心，又为后续功能使用奠定心理预期，是优秀的过渡衔接设计。
product_insight.en: Timely positive feedback after user selections, metaphorical illustration conveys core concept 'small habits = mighty change', reinforcing decision confidence while setting expectations for upcoming features.

core_function.cn: 收集用户跑步训练目标，提供个性化计划
core_function.en: Collect user running goals to provide personalized training plans

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合emoji图标，视觉层次清晰且富有活力
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with emoji icons creates clear hierarchy and vibrant feel

design_highlights.cn: 单列卡片式列表布局，选项清晰可点击区域大
design_highlights.en: Single-column card list with clear options and large tap targets

design_highlights.cn: 目标覆盖从新手5K到伤后恢复，体现对用户全生命周期的关怀
design_highlights.en: Goals span from beginner 5K to post-injury recovery, showing full lifecycle care

design_highlights.cn: 丰富的目标选项降低决策门槛，每个用户都能找到匹配项
design_highlights.en: Rich goal options reduce decision friction, ensuring every user finds a match

product_insight.cn: 通过10种细分目标覆盖跑者全场景需求，从比赛备战到产后恢复均有涵盖，既体现产品专业度也最大化用户群体覆盖，每个选项带简短说明降低认知成本
product_insight.en: 10 segmented goals cover all runner scenarios from race prep to postnatal recovery, demonstrating expertise while maximizing user coverage. Brief descriptions reduce cognitive load

core_function.cn: 选择5K比赛目标日期以定制训练计划
core_function.en: Select target 5K race date to customize training plan

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合清晰的日期列表，单选圆形指示器视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with clear date list, radio button indicators with distinct visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 完整周视图展示所有可选日期，减少用户决策负担
design_highlights.en: Full week view displays all selectable dates, reducing user decision burden

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调"personal best"激励目标，增强用户完成训练的动力
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'personal best' to motivate users toward training completion

design_highlights.cn: 预选周日作为默认值，符合大多数跑者周末比赛习惯
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected Sunday as default, matching most runners' weekend race preference

product_insight.cn: 通过让用户选择具体比赛日期而非模糊时间范围，建立明确的目标承诺感。倒推式训练计划设计体现专业性，同时deadline驱动能有效提升用户留存和训练完成率。
product_insight.en: Letting users select specific race date instead of vague timeframe creates commitment. Reverse-engineering training plan shows professionalism while deadline-driven approach improves retention and completion rates.

core_function.cn: 选择挑战中计入的运动类型
core_function.en: Select sports to count toward fitness challenge

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色勾选框，视觉层次清晰，已选项一目了然
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange checkboxes creates clear visual hierarchy for selected items

design_highlights.cn: 提供Select All快捷操作，减少用户点击成本
design_highlights.en: Select All option reduces user effort for bulk selection

design_highlights.cn: 每个运动配有专属图标，增强识别性和视觉趣味性
design_highlights.en: Unique icons for each sport enhance recognition and visual interest

design_highlights.cn: 预选常见运动（骑行、跑步、游泳等），降低用户决策负担
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected common sports reduce decision fatigue for users

product_insight.cn: 通过智能预选核心运动类型（骑行/跑步/游泳/徒步/步行），既展示产品丰富性，又为用户提供合理默认值。多选机制支持跨运动挑战，提升用户参与度和留存。
product_insight.en: Smart pre-selection of core activities shows product versatility while providing sensible defaults. Multi-select enables cross-sport challenges, boosting engagement and retention.

core_function.cn: 收集用户了解产品的渠道来源信息
core_function.en: Collect user acquisition channel data for attribution analysis

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造沉静氛围，与Calm品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient background creates calming atmosphere aligned with brand

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计简洁，圆形选择器提供清晰的交互反馈
design_highlights.en: Clean radio button list with circular selectors provides clear interaction feedback

design_highlights.cn: 选项覆盖全渠道且包含Other兜底，确保数据完整性
design_highlights.en: Comprehensive channel options with Other fallback ensures complete data collection

design_highlights.cn: 问题措辞友好自然，降低用户填写心理负担
design_highlights.en: Friendly question wording reduces user cognitive load and friction

product_insight.cn: 归因调研置于onboarding流程中是获取真实渠道数据的最佳时机。选项设计精细区分了付费渠道(Podcast/TV Ad)、自然渠道(App Store)和推荐渠道(Friend/Therapist)，为营销ROI分析提供精准数据支撑。
product_insight.en: Placing attribution survey in onboarding captures authentic channel data. Options strategically distinguish paid, organic, and referral channels, providing precise data for marketing ROI analysis.

core_function.cn: 收集用户获客渠道来源数据
core_function.en: Collect user acquisition channel data

design_highlights.cn: 极简列表设计，黑白配色降低视觉干扰，选项清晰易读
design_highlights.en: Minimalist list design with black-white scheme for reduced visual noise

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表交互简单，支持Skip跳过降低用户压力
design_highlights.en: Simple single-select list with Skip option reduces user pressure

design_highlights.cn: 包含医疗专业人士选项，暗示产品专业可信度
design_highlights.en: Medical professional option implies product credibility and trustworthiness

design_highlights.cn: 提供'不想回答'选项尊重用户隐私，建立信任感
design_highlights.en: Prefer not to answer option respects privacy and builds trust

product_insight.cn: 归因调研置于引导流程中收集真实渠道数据，覆盖主流获客渠道并细分社交平台，帮助优化营销投放。提供跳过选项平衡数据采集与用户体验，是成熟增长团队的标准做法。
product_insight.en: Attribution survey embedded in onboarding captures authentic channel data. Covers major acquisition channels with social platform segmentation for marketing optimization. Skip option balances data collection with UX.

core_function.cn: 收集用户获取渠道数据，优化营销投放策略
core_function.en: Collect user acquisition channel data to optimize marketing strategy

design_highlights.cn: 选中态采用蓝色边框+填充勾选，视觉反馈清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Selected state uses blue border with filled checkbox for clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 多选机制允许用户选择多个渠道，降低填写门槛
design_highlights.en: Multi-select mechanism allows multiple channels, reducing friction

design_highlights.cn: 标注Optional降低用户压力，减少因强制调研导致的流失
design_highlights.en: Optional label reduces pressure and prevents drop-off from mandatory surveys

design_highlights.cn: 渠道选项覆盖全面，包含社交媒体、电视广告、口碑推荐等
design_highlights.en: Comprehensive channel options including social media, TV ads, and word-of-mouth

product_insight.cn: 将归因调研置于注册流程中而非事后问卷，能获得更高响应率和准确数据。选项设计涵盖付费与自然渠道，便于计算各渠道CAC和ROI，是数据驱动增长的基础设施。
product_insight.en: Embedding attribution survey in signup flow yields higher response rates than post-hoc surveys. Options cover paid and organic channels, enabling CAC and ROI calculation for data-driven growth.

core_function.cn: 收集用户餐食计划习惯以个性化推荐
core_function.en: Collect user meal planning habits for personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的单选列表设计，选中态以蓝色边框和勾选图标强调
design_highlights.en: Clear radio list design with blue border and checkmark for selected state

design_highlights.cn: 五级频率选项从Never到Always，覆盖完整行为频谱
design_highlights.en: Five-level frequency options from Never to Always covering full behavior spectrum

design_highlights.cn: 渐进式问卷降低用户心理负担，顶部进度条提供完成预期
design_highlights.en: Progressive questionnaire reduces cognitive load with progress bar showing completion

product_insight.cn: 通过询问用餐规划频率，产品可精准识别用户习惯成熟度，为后续推荐激进或温和的改善方案提供依据。五级选项设计既科学又友好，避免二元化判断带来的用户抵触。
product_insight.en: By asking meal planning frequency, the product identifies user habit maturity to tailor aggressive or gentle improvement plans. Five-level options are scientific yet friendly, avoiding binary judgments that may cause user resistance.

core_function.cn: 提供多种早餐选项供用户替换不喜欢的餐品
core_function.en: Offer multiple breakfast options for users to swap unwanted meals

design_highlights.cn: 高质量美食图片采用2x2网格布局，清晰展示热量信息
design_highlights.en: High-quality food images in 2x2 grid layout with clear calorie display

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，轻扫即可关闭
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables one-handed operation with swipe to dismiss

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配置独立替换按钮，降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Individual swap buttons on each option reduce decision friction

design_highlights.cn: 丰富多样的健康餐品选择增强用户掌控感
design_highlights.en: Diverse healthy meal choices enhance user sense of control

product_insight.cn: 通过给予用户餐品替换权限，既尊重个人口味偏好又保持营养计划框架，这种「有限自由」的设计平衡了个性化需求与产品引导，有效降低用户放弃率
product_insight.en: Offering meal swap options respects personal taste while maintaining nutritional plan structure. This 'bounded freedom' approach balances personalization with product guidance, effectively reducing abandonment rates

core_function.cn: 收集用户腰围数据用于个性化健身方案
core_function.en: Collect waist measurement for personalized fitness plan

design_highlights.cn: 极简单字段设计，聚焦用户注意力于唯一输入项
design_highlights.en: Minimalist single-field design focuses attention on one input

design_highlights.cn: 数字键盘自动弹出，减少用户操作步骤
design_highlights.en: Numeric keypad auto-appears, reducing user interaction steps

design_highlights.cn: 干净无压力的界面设计降低用户输入敏感数据时的心理负担
design_highlights.en: Clean pressure-free interface reduces anxiety when entering sensitive data

product_insight.cn: 将身体数据拆分为独立页面逐一收集，降低用户面对多项敏感信息时的心理压力，同时通过单一焦点设计提升输入准确性和完成率。
product_insight.en: Splitting body measurements into separate screens reduces psychological pressure when sharing sensitive data, while single-focus design improves input accuracy and completion rate.

core_function.cn: 选择训练计划使用的距离单位（英里/公里）
core_function.en: Select distance units for training plan generation

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合青色高亮边框，选中状态清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Dark background with cyan highlight border for clear selection state

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式单选设计，点击区域大，操作友好
design_highlights.en: Card-based single select with large tap targets for easy interaction

design_highlights.cn: 提供具体示例（Tempo 2mi/3km）帮助用户理解选择影响
design_highlights.en: Concrete examples help users understand the impact of their choice

product_insight.cn: 将单位选择前置于计划生成流程，避免后续数据展示混乱。通过实际示例降低认知负担，体现了对跑步用户习惯差异的尊重，增强产品国际化适配能力。
product_insight.en: Placing unit selection early prevents display confusion. Real examples reduce cognitive load, showing respect for regional running habits and enhancing internationalization.

core_function.cn: 收集用户备孕时长信息以提供个性化支持
core_function.en: Collect trying-to-conceive duration for personalized support

design_highlights.cn: 选中选项即时展示温暖鼓励文案，营造贴心陪伴感
design_highlights.en: Instant warm encouragement copy upon selection creates caring atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 粉色高亮选中态与白色未选态形成清晰视觉对比
design_highlights.en: Pink highlight for selected state contrasts clearly with white options

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，点击即选中，操作简洁直观
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design with tap-to-select for intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示流程位置，降低用户放弃率
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows flow position to reduce abandonment

product_insight.cn: 通过备孕时长分层用户，不同阶段用户焦虑程度和需求差异大。首选项的即时情感反馈设计，让新用户感受到被理解和支持，有效提升完成率和品牌好感度。
product_insight.en: Segments users by TTC duration as anxiety levels vary greatly. Instant emotional feedback on first option makes new users feel understood, boosting completion rate and brand affinity.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择训练计划的时长周期
core_function.en: Allow users to select their training plan duration

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合蓝色选中态，视觉层次清晰，选项卡片间距舒适
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with blue selection state, clear visual hierarchy and comfortable card spacing

design_highlights.cn: 单选交互配合即时日期计算，用户可直观看到计划结束时间
design_highlights.en: Radio selection with real-time date calculation showing plan end dates

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项附带推荐说明降低决策成本，自定义选项满足个性化需求
design_highlights.en: Recommendation labels reduce decision burden, custom options meet personalized needs

design_highlights.cn: 「可稍后更改」的提示降低用户选择焦虑，增强决策信心
design_highlights.en: Change later hint reduces selection anxiety and boosts decision confidence

product_insight.cn: 通过预设推荐选项+自定义组合，平衡标准化与个性化需求。动态显示结束日期让抽象周期具象化，帮助用户建立明确的时间预期，提升计划完成率。
product_insight.en: Balances standardization and personalization through preset recommendations plus custom options. Dynamic end dates make abstract durations concrete, helping users set clear time expectations.

core_function.cn: 收集用户性别、年龄、地区信息用于卡路里计算
core_function.en: Collect user demographics for calorie calculation

design_highlights.cn: 性别选择采用简洁的二选一卡片设计，选中状态用蓝色勾选明确反馈
design_highlights.en: Clean binary card design for sex selection with blue checkmark for clear feedback

design_highlights.cn: 国家选择使用底部弹窗列表，支持滚动浏览，交互自然流畅
design_highlights.en: Country picker uses bottom sheet with scrollable list for natural interaction

design_highlights.cn: 提供"Which one should I choose?"帮助链接，减轻用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Help link 'Which one should I choose?' reduces user decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 顶部绿色进度条展示完成进度，激励用户继续填写
design_highlights.en: Green progress bar at top motivates users to continue form completion

product_insight.cn: 表单设计注重透明度，明确解释数据用途（计算卡路里需求），降低隐私顾虑。帮助链接的设置体现了对非二元性别用户的包容性考虑，值得健康类App借鉴。
product_insight.en: Form emphasizes transparency by explaining data usage for calorie calculation. Help link shows inclusive consideration for non-binary users, a valuable practice for health apps.

core_function.cn: 收集用户性别、年龄、地区等基础信息用于卡路里计算
core_function.en: Collect user demographics for personalized calorie calculation

design_highlights.cn: 性别选择采用卡片式单选设计，选中状态以蓝色勾选清晰标识
design_highlights.en: Card-style radio buttons for sex selection with clear blue checkmark indicator

design_highlights.cn: 提供"Which one should I choose"帮助链接，降低用户决策困惑
design_highlights.en: Helper link reduces user confusion about sex selection for calculations

design_highlights.cn: 说明文案强调"sex at birth"用于精准计算，消除敏感性顾虑
design_highlights.en: Explanatory text about 'sex at birth' addresses sensitivity while justifying data need

design_highlights.cn: 顶部分段进度条展示完成度，激励用户完成后续步骤
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar at top motivates users to complete onboarding

product_insight.cn: 通过详细解释数据用途（卡路里计算）和提供帮助入口，有效降低用户对敏感信息的填写顾虑，分步表单设计配合进度条减少心理负担，提升完成率
product_insight.en: Transparent data usage explanation and helper links reduce friction for sensitive info collection. Stepped form with progress bar minimizes cognitive load and improves completion rates

core_function.cn: 收集用户姓名和出生日期完成账户设置
core_function.en: Collect user name and birthdate to complete account setup

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配高对比度选中态，滚轮选择器橙色高亮清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high-contrast selection, orange highlight on picker for clear visibility

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器设计，三列联动选择月/日/年，操作直觉自然
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker with three columns for month/day/year, intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 友好的标题文案"Tell us who you are"降低表单填写的心理负担
design_highlights.en: Friendly title 'Tell us who you are' reduces psychological burden of form filling

design_highlights.cn: 底部提示资料默认公开并可修改，透明化隐私设置增强信任
design_highlights.en: Privacy notice about public profile with control option builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 表单设计采用渐进式披露，点击生日字段才弹出选择器，减少页面复杂度。底部隐私提示前置告知用户数据可见性，符合GDPR合规要求，同时Continue按钮置灰引导完成必填项。
product_insight.en: Progressive disclosure with date picker appearing on tap reduces complexity. Upfront privacy notice about profile visibility ensures GDPR compliance while grayed Continue button guides completion of required fields.

core_function.cn: 通过开放式问题引导用户反思情绪与呼吸的关联
core_function.en: Guide users to reflect on the connection between emotions and breathing

design_highlights.cn: 柔和渐变背景营造冥想氛围，降低用户输入压力
design_highlights.en: Soft gradient background creates meditative atmosphere, reducing input pressure

design_highlights.cn: 开放式提问设计鼓励深度自我觉察，建立情感连接
design_highlights.en: Open-ended question encourages deep self-awareness and emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 全屏自由文本输入区域，给予用户充分表达空间
design_highlights.en: Full-screen free text input area gives users ample space for expression

product_insight.cn: 采用开放式问题而非选择题，体现产品对用户个体差异的尊重，同时收集高质量定性数据用于个性化推荐。这种设计增强用户参与感和产品认同。
product_insight.en: Using open-ended questions instead of multiple choice shows respect for individual differences while collecting quality qualitative data for personalization, enhancing user engagement and product connection.

core_function.cn: 收集用户当前备孕/怀孕状态以个性化服务
core_function.en: Collect user's pregnancy status for personalized experience

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变按钮配合纯白背景，传递女性健康App的温柔专业感
design_highlights.en: Pink gradient buttons on white background convey gentle and professional feminine health vibe

design_highlights.cn: 三个选项覆盖所有用户场景，单选设计降低决策负担
design_highlights.en: Three options cover all user scenarios, single-select reduces decision burden

design_highlights.cn: 文案温和且包容，'better understand my body'表达关怀而非压力
design_highlights.en: Warm and inclusive copy, 'better understand my body' expresses care without pressure

product_insight.cn: 首屏即通过核心问题精准分流用户，为后续推送差异化内容（备孕指导/经期追踪/孕期管理）奠定基础。选项设计兼顾商业价值与用户体验，避免流失非备孕用户群体。
product_insight.en: First screen precisely segments users via core question, enabling differentiated content delivery. Option design balances business value with UX, retaining non-pregnant user segments.

core_function.cn: 收集用户健康习惯偏好，实现个性化推荐
core_function.en: Collect user health habit preferences for personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 标签式多选设计，蓝色选中态清晰醒目，视觉层级分明
design_highlights.en: Tag-based multi-select with clear blue selected state and distinct visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 智能推荐分区设计，「Recommended for you」提升用户信任和选择效率
design_highlights.en: Smart recommendation section with 'Recommended for you' builds trust and speeds selection

design_highlights.cn: 提供「Something else」和「I'm not sure」选项，覆盖边缘用户需求
design_highlights.en: Offers 'Something else' and 'I'm not sure' options to cover edge cases

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示引导进程，降低用户焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows onboarding progress, reducing user anxiety

product_insight.cn: 通过推荐区与更多选项的分层设计，既降低用户决策成本，又提供充分选择空间。标签化多选便于后续算法建模，是健康类App获取用户画像的经典范式。
product_insight.en: Layered design with recommendations and more options reduces decision fatigue while offering flexibility. Tag-based multi-select enables algorithm modeling, a classic pattern for health apps to build user profiles.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择每周减重目标以制定个性化计划
core_function.en: Let users select weekly weight loss goal for personalized plan

design_highlights.cn: 选中项蓝色边框+勾选图标双重反馈，状态清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Selected item with blue border and checkmark provides clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 标注Recommended推荐选项，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Recommended label reduces decision friction and guides user choice

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计简洁，操作路径清晰只需点选即可
design_highlights.en: Simple radio button list with clear tap-to-select interaction

design_highlights.cn: 提供渐进式目标选项(0.2-1kg)，让用户感到目标可控可达成
design_highlights.en: Progressive goal options (0.2-1kg) make targets feel achievable and controllable

product_insight.cn: 通过预设推荐选项引导用户选择科学合理的减重速度，既避免激进目标导致的挫败感，又确保效果可见，提升长期留存。渐进式选项设计体现了对用户心理的精准把握。
product_insight.en: Pre-selected recommended option guides users to a scientifically reasonable pace, avoiding frustration from aggressive goals while ensuring visible results. Progressive options demonstrate deep understanding of user psychology.

core_function.cn: 自定义每日卡路里和宏量营养素配比目标
core_function.en: Customize daily calorie and macronutrient ratio goals

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮选择器设计直观，百分比与克数双视图切换便于精确调整
design_highlights.en: Scroll picker with percentage/grams toggle enables precise macro adjustment

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗展示三列并排选择器，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with three-column parallel pickers shows clear information hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 皇冠图标标注Premium功能，暗示付费解锁高级定制
design_highlights.en: Crown icon marks premium feature, hints at paid customization unlock

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示100%总计验证，给用户即时正确反馈
design_highlights.en: Real-time 100% total validation provides instant correctness feedback

product_insight.cn: 通过周几选择器支持不同日期设置不同目标，满足用户差异化饮食计划需求。将高级定制作为Premium功能，既展示产品深度又创造付费转化点。
product_insight.en: Day-specific goal setting accommodates varied diet plans. Premium gating for advanced customization showcases product depth while creating conversion opportunities.

core_function.cn: 设置跑步距离目标并输入当前配速水平
core_function.en: Set running distance goal and input current pace level

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景配合彩色纸屑营造庆祝氛围，强化运动成就感
design_highlights.en: Gradient background with confetti creates celebratory atmosphere, reinforcing achievement feeling

design_highlights.cn: 距离/时间双维度切换设计，配合滑动选择器降低输入门槛
design_highlights.en: Distance/Time toggle with slider selector reduces input friction

design_highlights.cn: 提示语强调'current fitness level'避免用户设定不切实际目标
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes 'current fitness level' to prevent unrealistic goal setting

design_highlights.cn: 预设常见距离选项（5km/10km/半马）加速决策流程
design_highlights.en: Preset distance options (5km/10km/Half Marathon) accelerate decision making

product_insight.cn: 通过收集用户当前能力数据实现个性化配速建议，既降低了目标设定门槛，又为后续智能教练功能奠定数据基础，有效平衡用户体验与数据采集
product_insight.en: Collecting current ability data enables personalized pace recommendations, balancing user experience with data collection while laying foundation for smart coaching features

core_function.cn: 设置跑步目标距离，基于预估配速制定训练计划
core_function.en: Set running target distance and build workout based on estimated pace

design_highlights.cn: 渐变绿色背景营造运动活力氛围，与白色内容区形成清晰层次
design_highlights.en: Green gradient background creates energetic sports atmosphere with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: Distance/Duration双Tab切换配合快捷预设按钮(5k/10k/15k)，降低输入成本
design_highlights.en: Dual tab switcher with preset buttons (5k/10k/15k) reduces input friction

design_highlights.cn: "we'll motivate you to the finish line"文案传递陪伴感和激励情绪
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy conveys companionship and encouragement to users

design_highlights.cn: 显示当前5KM预估时间42:00，增强用户对个性化方案的信任
design_highlights.en: Showing estimated 5KM time builds trust in personalized training plans

product_insight.cn: 通过展示用户已有的5KM预估成绩，建立数据关联性，让用户相信后续训练计划是基于个人能力定制的。快捷预设按钮覆盖主流跑步距离，兼顾效率与灵活性。
product_insight.en: Displaying existing 5KM estimate creates data relevance, making users trust the personalized plan. Preset buttons cover popular distances, balancing efficiency with flexibility.

core_function.cn: 选择挑战追踪维度并设定目标值
core_function.en: Select tracking metric and set optional goal target

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色高亮，视觉层次分明，选中态清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates clear visual hierarchy and selection state

design_highlights.cn: 目标设置标记为可选，降低用户决策压力，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Optional goal setting reduces decision pressure and improves completion rate

design_highlights.cn: 预设100公里默认值，锚定效应引导用户接受挑战性目标
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled 100km default uses anchoring effect to encourage ambitious goals

design_highlights.cn: 文案'see where the challenge takes you'营造探索冒险氛围
design_highlights.en: Copy 'see where the challenge takes you' creates adventurous atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 将必选项与可选项分离设计，既保证核心数据收集又尊重用户自主权。四种追踪维度覆盖不同运动偏好，单位下拉框照顾国际用户习惯，体现产品的专业性和包容性。
product_insight.en: Separating required and optional inputs ensures core data collection while respecting user autonomy. Four tracking metrics cover diverse fitness preferences, unit dropdown accommodates international users.

core_function.cn: 了解用户备孕期的情绪状态以提供个性化支持
core_function.en: Understand user's emotional state during conception journey for personalized support

design_highlights.cn: 使用emoji和温暖文案营造关怀氛围，降低用户心理防线
design_highlights.en: Emojis and warm copy create caring atmosphere, reducing user's emotional barriers

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态即时展开详细说明，提供积极反馈和预期价值
design_highlights.en: Selected state expands with detailed explanation, providing positive feedback and value preview

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变高亮选中项，与品牌调性一致且视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Pink gradient highlights selection, consistent with brand tone and clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼Julia增强用户归属感和产品亲密度
design_highlights.en: Personalized name 'Julia' enhances user belonging and product intimacy

product_insight.cn: 通过情绪check-in建立情感连接，同时收集用户心理状态数据用于后续个性化内容推荐。选中展开的设计既确认用户选择，又预告产品价值，降低流失率。
product_insight.en: Emotional check-in builds connection while collecting psychological data for personalization. Expandable selection confirms choice and previews product value, reducing drop-off rate.

core_function.cn: 展示系统为用户定制的训练量和难度设置
core_function.en: Display customized training volume and difficulty settings

design_highlights.cn: 四色运动图标矩阵设计，视觉活力强且符合健身主题
design_highlights.en: Four-color athletic icon matrix with vibrant fitness-themed visuals

design_highlights.cn: 预设个性化结果降低用户决策负担，传递智能定制感
design_highlights.en: Pre-set personalized results reduce decision burden and convey smart customization

design_highlights.cn: 提供编辑入口保留用户控制权，平衡自动化与自主性
design_highlights.en: Edit preferences option balances automation with user autonomy

design_highlights.cn: 简洁双指标卡片快速传达价值，加速用户完成引导流程
design_highlights.en: Clean dual-metric cards quickly convey value and accelerate onboarding

product_insight.cn: 采用'先替你选好，再让你调整'策略，既展示产品智能个性化能力，又通过可编辑设计消除用户被动感，有效提升引导完成率和用户信任度。
product_insight.en: Uses 'pre-select then allow adjustment' strategy, showcasing smart personalization while eliminating user passivity through editable options, boosting onboarding completion and trust.

core_function.cn: 通过填空式提示引导用户探索和表达悲伤情绪
core_function.en: Guide users to explore and express grief through fill-in-the-blank prompts

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景从深蓝过渡到暖橙色，营造平静疗愈的氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient background transitioning from deep blue to warm orange creates calming, healing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 填空式提问降低表达门槛，让用户更容易开启内心对话
design_highlights.en: Fill-in-the-blank format lowers expression barrier, making it easier to start inner dialogue

design_highlights.cn: 刷新提示按钮提供选择权，用户可跳过不适合的问题
design_highlights.en: Refresh prompt button provides choice, allowing users to skip uncomfortable questions

product_insight.cn: 心理健康类应用采用开放式提问而非封闭选项，尊重用户个体差异。渐变色彩从冷到暖暗示从悲伤到希望的情绪转变，设计本身即是疗愈过程的一部分。
product_insight.en: Mental health apps use open-ended prompts respecting individual differences. Cool-to-warm gradient suggests emotional transition from grief to hope, making design itself part of the healing process.

core_function.cn: 展示真实用户好评，建立产品信任度
core_function.en: Display real user reviews to build product trust and credibility

design_highlights.cn: 气泡式对话卡片设计，模拟社交聊天界面，亲切自然
design_highlights.en: Chat bubble card design mimics social messaging, feels friendly and natural

design_highlights.cn: 真实用户名+具体成功故事，强调"3周怀孕"等具体成果增强可信度
design_highlights.en: Real usernames with specific success stories like 'pregnant in 3 weeks' boost credibility

design_highlights.cn: "600万+五星评价"数据背书配合桂冠图标，形成强大社交证明
design_highlights.en: 6 million 5-star ratings with laurel icons create powerful social proof

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变CTA按钮与整体柔和配色协调，符合女性健康App调性
design_highlights.en: Pink gradient CTA button harmonizes with soft color scheme, fits women's health app tone

product_insight.cn: 通过多个不同场景的成功案例（备孕1个月/3周/6个月）覆盖不同用户心理预期，结合权威数据背书，有效降低用户决策焦虑，提升转化率。评价内容聚焦核心诉求"成功怀孕"，精准打击目标用户痛点。
product_insight.en: Multiple success stories covering different timeframes address varied user expectations. Combined with authoritative ratings data, this effectively reduces decision anxiety and boosts conversion by targeting the core desire of successful pregnancy.

core_function.cn: 展示身体信号帮助用户了解最佳受孕时机
core_function.en: Educate users on body signals to identify optimal conception timing

design_highlights.cn: 三张卡片采用柔和配色和具象插画，直观展示抽象的生理信号
design_highlights.en: Three cards with soft colors and concrete illustrations visualize abstract body signals

design_highlights.cn: 使用亲和力强的图标和粉色调，降低敏感话题的尴尬感
design_highlights.en: Friendly icons and pink tones reduce awkwardness of sensitive topics

design_highlights.cn: 社交证明数据「74%用户成功受孕」增强产品可信度和转化动力
design_highlights.en: Social proof stat '74% users conceived' boosts credibility and conversion

product_insight.cn: 通过可视化身体信号教育用户，配合统计数据建立信任，将专业医学知识转化为易理解的视觉语言，降低用户学习成本的同时强化产品价值感知
product_insight.en: Visualizes body signals with educational content, combines statistics for trust-building, transforms medical knowledge into accessible visuals while reinforcing product value

core_function.cn: 展示最佳受孕时机预测功能，说服用户使用产品
core_function.en: Display fertility prediction feature to convince users of product value

design_highlights.cn: 绿色圆形卡片突出"Today"关键信息，视觉焦点清晰
design_highlights.en: Teal circular card highlights 'Today' as key info with clear visual focus

design_highlights.cn: 引用波士顿大学研究数据"33%更高受孕率"增强可信度
design_highlights.en: Boston University research citation '33% more likely' boosts credibility

design_highlights.cn: 使用样本数据预览功能，降低用户认知门槛激发期待
design_highlights.en: Sample data preview reduces cognitive load and builds anticipation

design_highlights.cn: 双重价值点列表配合勾选图标，强化产品核心优势
design_highlights.en: Dual value propositions with checkmarks reinforce core product benefits

product_insight.cn: 通过模拟真实使用场景展示核心功能价值，结合权威研究数据作为社交证明，有效降低用户对隐私敏感类App的心理门槛，提升转化率
product_insight.en: Simulates real usage scenario with core feature preview, combines authoritative research as social proof, effectively reduces user hesitation for privacy-sensitive apps

core_function.cn: 展示排卵期计算过程，同时强化产品价值
core_function.en: Display fertility calculation progress while reinforcing product value

design_highlights.cn: 日历+放大镜插图直观传达'精准分析'概念，手绘风格亲和温暖
design_highlights.en: Calendar with magnifier illustration conveys 'precise analysis', hand-drawn style feels warm and approachable

design_highlights.cn: 使用省略号暗示正在处理中，营造系统认真计算的感知
design_highlights.en: Ellipsis suggests ongoing processing, creating perception of serious calculation

design_highlights.cn: 利用等待时间展示社交证明(89%用户认可)，提升信任感
design_highlights.en: Utilizes waiting time to display social proof (89% user approval), building trust

product_insight.cn: 巧妙将加载等待转化为营销时机，用数据统计强化产品价值。'计算最佳受孕日'的表述让用户感知个性化服务，提升对结果的期待值和信任度。
product_insight.en: Cleverly transforms loading wait into marketing opportunity with statistics reinforcing product value. 'Calculating best days' phrasing creates personalized service perception, enhancing anticipation and trust.

core_function.cn: 通过研究数据展示产品对受孕率的提升效果
core_function.en: Display research data showing product's impact on conception rates

design_highlights.cn: 简洁柱状图对比，粉色渐变突出产品优势，视觉冲击力强
design_highlights.en: Clean bar chart comparison with pink gradient highlighting product advantage

design_highlights.cn: 引用权威机构研究数据，波士顿大学背书增强可信度
design_highlights.en: Citing authoritative research from Boston University to build credibility

design_highlights.cn: +33%数字标注直观醒目，给用户带来希望和信心
design_highlights.en: +33% annotation is visually striking, giving users hope and confidence

product_insight.cn: 在用户决策关键节点展示第三方研究数据，用具体数字量化产品价值，波士顿大学背书消除用户疑虑，是健康类App建立信任的经典策略。
product_insight.en: Displaying third-party research at decision points with quantified value and university endorsement is a classic trust-building strategy for health apps.

core_function.cn: 展示用户信息保存进度，提供视觉等待反馈
core_function.en: Display saving progress with visual feedback during data processing

design_highlights.cn: 极简纯白背景配合柔和渐变色块，营造轻盈现代感
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background with soft gradient blobs creates light, modern aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 圆形进度指示器搭配状态文案，清晰传达处理状态
design_highlights.en: Circular progress indicator with status text clearly communicates processing state

design_highlights.cn: 淡粉和淡蓝渐变营造柔和氛围，降低等待焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Soft pink and blue gradients create calming atmosphere, reducing wait anxiety

product_insight.cn: 加载页采用极简设计语言和轻柔配色，将等待时刻转化为品牌体验的一部分。圆形进度指示器给用户明确预期，避免用户因不确定而中断流程，值得借鉴其将过渡页作为品牌触点的思路。
product_insight.en: Loading screen transforms waiting into brand experience with minimalist design and soft colors. Circular indicator sets clear expectations, preventing abandonment. Worth noting how transition screens become brand touchpoints.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化膳食计划的核心价值主张
core_function.en: Present core value proposition of personalized meal planning

design_highlights.cn: 纯净蓝色渐变背景配合简约线条插图，传递科技与信任感
design_highlights.en: Pure blue gradient with minimalist line illustration conveys tech and trust

design_highlights.cn: 文案"少量规划，精彩生活"直击用户痛点，降低心理负担
design_highlights.en: Copy 'A little planning, a lot of living' addresses pain points and reduces anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 分段式进度条清晰展示引导流程位置，减少用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar clearly shows onboarding position, reducing user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 醒目白色CTA按钮与蓝色背景形成强对比，引导点击
design_highlights.en: Prominent white CTA button contrasts strongly with blue background

product_insight.cn: 通过简化价值传递缓解用户对"规划"的抵触心理，抽象图表暗示数据驱动的个性化能力，为后续信息收集建立信任基础，降低流失率
product_insight.en: Simplifies value delivery to ease resistance to 'planning', abstract chart implies data-driven personalization, building trust foundation for subsequent data collection

core_function.cn: 展示系统正在处理用户数据并计算个性化特征
core_function.en: Display system processing user data and calculating personalized traits

design_highlights.cn: 生动的购物篮插图包含多种食材，直观传达食品/杂货主题
design_highlights.en: Vivid shopping basket illustration with diverse groceries conveys food/grocery theme

design_highlights.cn: 友好的加载文案"Calculating traits..."暗示个性化服务即将到来
design_highlights.en: Friendly loading copy 'Calculating traits...' implies personalized service coming

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的灰白色背景突出中心插图，视觉聚焦明确
design_highlights.en: Clean gray-white background highlights central illustration with clear visual focus

product_insight.cn: 将等待时间转化为价值感知时刻，通过"计算特征"的文案让用户感受到系统正在为其定制个性化体验，减少等待焦虑并提升期待感。插图选择强化产品定位。
product_insight.en: Transforms waiting time into value perception moment. 'Calculating traits' copy makes users feel system is customizing experience, reducing anxiety while building anticipation. Illustration reinforces product positioning.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化运动计划正在生成的加载状态
core_function.en: Display loading state while generating personalized workout plan

design_highlights.cn: 动感火焰跑鞋插图传递运动能量和速度感，强化品牌调性
design_highlights.en: Dynamic flaming sneaker illustration conveys energy and speed, reinforcing brand identity

design_highlights.cn: "Building your plan"文案暗示个性化定制，提升用户期待感
design_highlights.en: "Building your plan" copy implies personalization, building user anticipation

design_highlights.cn: 简洁进度条提供明确加载反馈，减少等待焦虑
design_highlights.en: Clean progress bar provides clear loading feedback, reducing wait anxiety

product_insight.cn: 将后台数据处理时间转化为品牌展示机会，用运动主题插图强化产品定位，同时"your plan"的个性化表述让用户感受到专属服务价值，提升后续付费转化预期
product_insight.en: Transforms backend processing time into brand exposure opportunity. Sport-themed illustration reinforces positioning while "your plan" personalization creates perceived value for conversion

core_function.cn: 收集用户基本个人信息以完成账户设置
core_function.en: Collect basic personal information to complete account setup

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色强调色，表单字段清晰分隔，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange accent, clear field separation with distinct visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 单选按钮组设计清晰，已选项状态明确，操作反馈即时
design_highlights.en: Clear radio button group design with obvious selected state and immediate feedback

design_highlights.cn: 提供'Prefer not to say'选项体现对用户隐私的尊重，降低填写压力
design_highlights.en: Offering 'Prefer not to say' option shows respect for user privacy and reduces friction

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定醒目CTA按钮，引导用户顺畅完成流程
design_highlights.en: Fixed prominent CTA button at bottom guides users to complete the flow smoothly

product_insight.cn: 表单设计遵循渐进式信息收集原则，问号图标提供字段解释降低疑虑，隐私提示前置建立信任。性别选项包容性设计符合现代产品趋势，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Form follows progressive disclosure principle. Question mark icons reduce uncertainty, upfront privacy notice builds trust. Inclusive gender options align with modern product trends, worth adopting.

core_function.cn: 收集用户日常活动水平以定制个性化方案
core_function.en: Collect user's daily activity level for personalized plan customization

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的单选卡片设计，选中态蓝色边框+勾选标识层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clear radio card design with blue border and checkmark for selected state

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配有具体职业示例，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Each option includes job examples to reduce cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 副标题说明'不包含锻炼'消除用户疑虑，减少选择焦虑
design_highlights.en: Subtitle clarifies 'not including workouts' to eliminate user concerns

design_highlights.cn: 进度条可视化当前步骤，激励用户完成流程
design_highlights.en: Progress bar visualizes current step to motivate completion

product_insight.cn: 通过4级活动量分类精准覆盖不同用户群体，每个选项用具体职业举例而非抽象描述，大幅降低理解成本。明确排除运动量说明体现产品数据收集的严谨性，有助于后续提供更准确的热量计算。
product_insight.en: Four activity levels precisely cover different user groups. Concrete job examples instead of abstract descriptions significantly reduce understanding barriers. Explicitly excluding workouts shows data collection rigor for accurate calorie calculations.

core_function.cn: 了解用户是否掌握最佳受孕时机，提供教育引导
core_function.en: Assess user's fertility timing awareness and provide educational guidance

design_highlights.cn: 选中"否"后即时展示教育性文案，消除用户焦虑同时传递产品价值
design_highlights.en: Educational copy appears instantly when selecting 'No', reducing anxiety while conveying product value

design_highlights.cn: 粉色高亮选中状态与展开式信息卡片设计，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Pink highlighted selection with expandable info card creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 三个选项覆盖所有用户认知状态，"不知道"选项降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Three options cover all awareness levels, 'I don't know' option reduces decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 通过选项文案暗示产品核心功能，提前建立用户期待
design_highlights.en: Option copy subtly introduces core features, building user expectations in advance

product_insight.cn: 通过询问受孕时机认知来分层用户，同时借选项展开教育内容，实现用户筛选与价值传递双重目标，让新手用户感受到产品的专业与贴心。
product_insight.en: Segments users by fertility awareness while delivering education through expanded options, achieving both user qualification and value communication goals.

core_function.cn: 收集用户身高、体重及目标体重信息
core_function.en: Collect user height, weight and goal weight data

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的表单布局，输入框与单位切换按钮清晰分离
design_highlights.en: Clean form layout with clear separation between input fields and unit toggles

design_highlights.cn: 支持英制/公制单位快捷切换，降低用户输入门槛
design_highlights.en: Quick toggle between imperial and metric units reduces input friction

design_highlights.cn: 贴心提示语降低用户心理压力，强调数据可随时修改
design_highlights.en: Reassuring microcopy reduces anxiety by emphasizing data can be updated later

design_highlights.cn: 目标体重不影响卡路里目标的说明消除用户顾虑
design_highlights.en: Clarifying goal weight doesn't affect calorie goal removes user hesitation

product_insight.cn: 通过分步收集身体数据并配合安抚性文案，有效降低用户对敏感信息的抵触心理。单位切换设计体现国际化考量，目标体重独立说明避免用户因担心系统设置过激目标而放弃填写。
product_insight.en: Step-by-step body data collection with reassuring microcopy reduces resistance to sharing sensitive info. Unit toggle shows internationalization consideration, and goal weight clarification prevents abandonment due to fear of aggressive targets.

core_function.cn: 引导用户扫描添加parkrun条码以便随时使用
core_function.en: Guide users to scan and add parkrun barcode for easy access

design_highlights.cn: 渐变色顶部背景过渡到纯白，营造清新自然氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient header transitioning to white creates fresh natural atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 友好文案'Let's get started!'降低用户操作心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy 'Let's get started!' reduces psychological barriers

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮设计，聚焦用户注意力降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button focuses attention and reduces decision cost

design_highlights.cn: 品牌树形图标居中展示，强化品牌识别与运动主题
design_highlights.en: Centered tree logo reinforces brand identity and sports theme

product_insight.cn: 通过简化的单步操作设计降低用户流失，条码绑定功能解决跑步者携带实体条码的痛点，提升用户对App的依赖性和使用频率
product_insight.en: Simplified single-step design reduces drop-off. Barcode binding solves runners' pain point of carrying physical barcodes, increasing app dependency and usage

core_function.cn: 在敏感问题前提供情感缓冲，让用户自主选择是否继续
core_function.en: Provides emotional buffer before sensitive questions with user choice

design_highlights.cn: 温和的感叹号图标配合柔和薄荷色，传递关怀而非警告
design_highlights.en: Gentle exclamation icon with soft mint color conveys care not alarm

design_highlights.cn: 提供Continue和Skip双选项，尊重用户情感边界和自主权
design_highlights.en: Dual Continue/Skip options respect user emotional boundaries and autonomy

design_highlights.cn: 极简纯白背景突出核心信息，降低视觉压力
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background highlights core message, reduces visual stress

design_highlights.cn: 粉色主按钮与灰色Skip形成层次，引导但不强迫
design_highlights.en: Pink primary button vs gray Skip creates hierarchy, guides without forcing

product_insight.cn: 针对孕期/女性健康类App中的敏感话题（流产、终止妊娠），通过预警机制展现产品同理心。这种设计既收集必要健康数据，又避免触发用户创伤，是情感化设计的优秀范例。
product_insight.en: For sensitive topics in pregnancy/women's health apps, this warning mechanism demonstrates product empathy. It collects necessary health data while avoiding trauma triggers—an excellent emotional design example.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化热量目标和预期减重效果
core_function.en: Display personalized calorie goal and expected weight loss results

design_highlights.cn: 祝贺语开头营造成就感，强化用户完成注册的正向反馈
design_highlights.en: Congratulatory message creates achievement feeling and positive feedback

design_highlights.cn: 具体日期和数字目标（2.5kg by June 16）增强计划可信度和紧迫感
design_highlights.en: Specific date and number goal enhances plan credibility and urgency

design_highlights.cn: 三个预勾选选项降低决策成本，默认开启关键功能提升留存
design_highlights.en: Pre-checked options reduce decision cost, default enabling key features for retention

design_highlights.cn: 大字号热量数字突出核心指标，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Large calorie number highlights core metric with clear information hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 通过量化目标和明确截止日期创造承诺感，预勾选权限巧妙提升通知开启率和数据追踪覆盖，同时"How we make recommendations"链接增加算法透明度建立信任
product_insight.en: Quantified goals with deadlines create commitment. Pre-checked permissions cleverly boost notification opt-in and tracking coverage. Algorithm transparency link builds trust.

core_function.cn: 汇总用户选择的训练参数并生成个性化跑步计划
core_function.en: Summarize user preferences and generate personalized running plan

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合真实跑步场景图，营造运动氛围，蓝色徽章强化目标感
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with real running scene photo creates athletic vibe, blue badge reinforces goal

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼"Julia"配合"nearly ready"文案，制造期待感与专属感
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with 'nearly ready' copy creates anticipation and exclusivity

design_highlights.cn: 清晰列出所有用户选择，增强透明度和信任感，降低决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Clear list of all user choices increases transparency and reduces decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮"Generate my plan"聚焦用户注意力，推动最终转化
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button focuses attention and drives final conversion

product_insight.cn: 在用户完成多步骤问卷后展示汇总页是最佳实践，既让用户确认选择无误，又通过"专属定制"感知提升付费意愿。徽章化的目标展示增强承诺效应。
product_insight.en: Summary page after multi-step onboarding is best practice—lets users verify choices while 'custom-made' perception boosts conversion. Badge-style goal display enhances commitment effect.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化训练计划摘要，确认用户选择的参数
core_function.en: Display personalized training plan summary and confirm user preferences

design_highlights.cn: 动态跑步背景图配合蓝色徽章设计，营造专业运动氛围
design_highlights.en: Dynamic running background with blue badge design creates professional sports atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼"Julia"增强用户归属感，"nearly ready"制造期待感
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting 'Julia' enhances belonging, 'nearly ready' creates anticipation

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的参数列表让用户确认选择，降低后续退订率
design_highlights.en: Clear parameter list confirms choices, reducing future cancellation rates

design_highlights.cn: 底部分页指示器暗示后续步骤，引导用户继续完成流程
design_highlights.en: Bottom pagination indicator hints at next steps, guiding users to complete flow

product_insight.cn: 通过汇总展示所有用户输入的个性化参数，既增强用户对计划的信任感，也为后续可能的参数调整埋下入口。徽章设计强化目标感，是健身类App的经典转化技巧。
product_insight.en: Summarizing all personalized parameters builds trust in the plan while providing entry points for adjustments. Badge design reinforces goal-focus, a classic fitness app conversion technique.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化跑步训练计划详情与预估成绩
core_function.en: Display personalized running plan details and estimated performance

design_highlights.cn: 顶部沉浸式跑步场景图配合徽章成就元素，激发运动热情
design_highlights.en: Immersive hero image with achievement badge creates athletic motivation

design_highlights.cn: 个性化问候语"Welcome Julia!"搭配清晰计划参数，建立亲切感与信任
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with clear plan parameters builds rapport and trust

design_highlights.cn: 嵌入YouTube教学视频降低学习门槛，珊瑚色预估成绩卡片强化价值感知
design_highlights.en: Embedded tutorial video reduces friction, coral time estimate card reinforces value

design_highlights.cn: 图标化信息展示（距离、日期、周期、地形）实现快速信息扫描
design_highlights.en: Icon-based info display enables quick scanning of distance, date, duration, terrain

product_insight.cn: 将onboarding收集的数据即时转化为可视化计划，配合成绩预估增强用户期待感。视频引导降低使用门槛，提升完成率和后续留存。
product_insight.en: Instantly transforms onboarding data into visible plan with performance prediction, building anticipation. Video guidance reduces learning curve, improving completion and retention.

core_function.cn: 收集用户使用目标以提供个性化推荐
core_function.en: Collect user goals to provide personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造冥想放松氛围，与品牌调性高度一致
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient creates calming meditation atmosphere aligned with brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 选项采用列表式单选设计，选中状态清晰醒目便于操作
design_highlights.en: List-style single selection with clear highlighted state for easy interaction

design_highlights.cn: 品牌名Calm使用手写体强化品牌个性，问句式文案拉近用户距离
design_highlights.en: Handwritten Calm logo reinforces brand personality, question format creates connection

design_highlights.cn: 7个目标选项覆盖主要用户需求，降低用户思考成本
design_highlights.en: 7 goal options cover main user needs, reducing cognitive load for decision

product_insight.cn: 通过目标选择实现用户分层，既收集数据优化推荐算法，又让用户感受到产品的个性化关怀。选项设计覆盖压力、睡眠、情绪等核心场景，精准定位目标用户群体。
product_insight.en: Goal selection enables user segmentation, collecting data for recommendations while creating personalized experience. Options cover core scenarios like stress, sleep, and emotions, precisely targeting user segments.

core_function.cn: 收集用户备孕紧迫度以提供个性化服务
core_function.en: Collect user's conception urgency for personalized service

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变高亮选中状态，与女性健康主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Pink gradient highlight for selected state, matching feminine health theme

design_highlights.cn: 「Let's make it happen!」积极鼓励式文案降低用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Encouraging copy 'Let's make it happen!' reduces user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 两个选项形成清晰二分法，降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Binary choice design minimizes decision fatigue

design_highlights.cn: 选中即展开详细说明，预告产品价值提升转化
design_highlights.en: Expanded description on selection previews product value

product_insight.cn: 通过意向分层实现用户分群，紧迫型用户可推送付费功能，学习型用户则侧重教育内容培养，提升LTV同时降低流失率
product_insight.en: User segmentation by urgency enables targeted monetization for eager users while nurturing learners with educational content, optimizing LTV and retention

core_function.cn: 让用户选择最多三个健康目标以个性化体验
core_function.en: Let users select up to three health goals for personalized experience

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态采用蓝色边框+勾选图标，视觉层次分明易识别
design_highlights.en: Selected state uses blue border with checkmark, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 多选限制三项，降低决策负担同时收集关键偏好
design_highlights.en: Multi-select limited to three reduces decision burden while gathering key preferences

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼"Hey, Julia"配合挥手emoji，营造亲切友好氛围
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting 'Hey, Julia' with wave emoji creates friendly atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示流程位置，减少用户放弃率
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows flow position, reducing user drop-off rate

product_insight.cn: 通过限制选择数量（最多3项）平衡了数据收集深度与用户体验，目标覆盖减重、饮食、运动等维度，为后续个性化推荐奠定基础。列表式设计便于扩展目标选项。
product_insight.en: Limiting selections to 3 balances data depth with UX. Goals cover weight, diet, and activity dimensions, enabling personalized recommendations. List design allows easy option expansion.

core_function.cn: 收集用户健康饮食目标以提供个性化服务
core_function.en: Collect user health and dietary goals for personalized service

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态采用蓝色边框+填充勾选框，视觉反馈清晰明确
design_highlights.en: Selected state uses blue border with filled checkbox for clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 支持多选模式，用户可自由组合多个目标，降低决策压力
design_highlights.en: Multi-select mode allows flexible goal combinations, reducing decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 目标选项覆盖全面，从减重到省钱，精准捕获不同用户动机
design_highlights.en: Comprehensive goal options from weight loss to saving money capture diverse user motivations

design_highlights.cn: 文案直接使用用户语言如'Hit my macros'，建立专业认同感
design_highlights.en: Copy uses user language like 'Hit my macros' to build professional rapport

product_insight.cn: 通过目标多选设计深度理解用户需求，既包含功能性目标（减重/增重）也涵盖行为习惯（省时/省钱），为后续个性化推荐和留存策略提供精准数据支撑
product_insight.en: Multi-goal selection captures both functional goals (weight management) and behavioral habits (save time/money), providing precise data for personalized recommendations and retention strategies

core_function.cn: 让用户选择适合自己的断食时间方案
core_function.en: Let users choose their preferred fasting schedule

design_highlights.cn: 渐变色条直观区分难度等级，绿色代表简单、橙色代表挑战
design_highlights.en: Gradient color bars visually distinguish difficulty levels with intuitive color coding

design_highlights.cn: 难度标签降低用户心理门槛，Easiest标签鼓励新手开始
design_highlights.en: Difficulty labels reduce psychological barriers, Easiest tag encourages beginners

design_highlights.cn: 默认选中最简单选项，降低决策成本促进转化
design_highlights.en: Default selection on easiest option reduces decision cost and improves conversion

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度指示器清晰展示流程步骤，增强用户掌控感
design_highlights.en: Top progress indicator clearly shows setup steps, enhancing user control

product_insight.cn: 通过难度分级和默认推荐降低新用户决策焦虑，同时保留进阶选项满足不同需求。文案强调可随时切换，减轻选择压力，是健康类App常见的渐进式引导策略。
product_insight.en: Difficulty tiers and default recommendations reduce decision anxiety for new users while preserving advanced options. Emphasis on flexibility reduces commitment pressure—a common progressive onboarding strategy in health apps.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择力量训练目标以个性化训练计划
core_function.en: Let users choose strength training goals to personalize workout plans

design_highlights.cn: 极简卡片设计配合清晰的单选交互，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Minimalist card design with clear radio selection and distinct visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 单选按钮配合详细描述，帮助用户理解每个选项的含义
design_highlights.en: Radio buttons with detailed descriptions help users understand each option

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调可随时更改，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes changeable settings, reducing user decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 问号帮助图标提供额外信息入口，减少用户困惑
design_highlights.en: Help icon provides additional info entry point, reducing user confusion

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的训练目标简化为两个清晰选项，通过详细描述帮助用户自我归类。跑步专项+综合力量的分类方式精准切分用户群体，体现对目标用户的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex training goals into two clear options with detailed descriptions for self-categorization. Running focus vs all-round split precisely segments user groups, showing deep user understanding.

core_function.cn: 收集用户备孕经历信息以提供个性化支持
core_function.en: Collect user fertility history to provide personalized support

design_highlights.cn: 敏感话题处理得当，包含妊娠损失选项并提供数据安全承诺
design_highlights.en: Sensitive topic handled well with pregnancy loss option and data safety assurance

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表清晰简洁，选项互斥易于点击
design_highlights.en: Clean single-select list with mutually exclusive, easy-to-tap options

design_highlights.cn: 提供'不愿回答'选项降低流失率，尊重用户隐私
design_highlights.en: Prefer not to answer option reduces drop-off and respects privacy

design_highlights.cn: 极简黑白设计，视觉焦点集中在问题和选项上
design_highlights.en: Minimalist black-white design focuses attention on question and options

product_insight.cn: 备孕类App在收集敏感信息时，通过数据安全声明和'不愿回答'选项建立信任。选项设计覆盖多种用户场景，为后续个性化内容推荐奠定基础，体现对用户情感的深度关怀。
product_insight.en: Fertility apps build trust when collecting sensitive data through safety assurance and skip options. Options cover diverse user scenarios for personalized recommendations, showing deep emotional care.

core_function.cn: 确认用户设定的周习惯并指导使用方法
core_function.en: Confirm weekly habit setup and guide usage instructions

design_highlights.cn: "Boom! Congrats!"庆祝文案配合蓝色渐变背景，营造成就感
design_highlights.en: Celebratory 'Boom! Congrats!' copy with blue gradient creates achievement feeling

design_highlights.cn: 白色卡片内嵌周视图，绿色勾选清晰展示已完成状态
design_highlights.en: White card with embedded week view, green checkmarks show completed status

design_highlights.cn: 分步引导说明（打卡+反思），降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Step-by-step guidance (check-off + reflection) reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: BETA标签暗示新功能，激发用户尝鲜心理
design_highlights.en: BETA tag implies new feature, triggers user curiosity to try

product_insight.cn: 通过即时正向反馈强化用户行为承诺，同时在确认页植入使用教程，降低后续功能学习成本，提升首周留存概率
product_insight.en: Reinforces user commitment through instant positive feedback while embedding usage tutorial on confirmation page, reducing learning curve and improving first-week retention

core_function.cn: 完成反思后给予用户温暖的情感支持和鼓励
core_function.en: Provide emotional support and encouragement after reflection completion

design_highlights.cn: 蓝橙渐变背景营造日出/日落般的治愈氛围，色彩过渡柔和自然
design_highlights.en: Blue-orange gradient creates healing sunrise/sunset atmosphere with smooth color transition

design_highlights.cn: 文案温柔体贴，承认反思可能带来的情绪波动，给予用户被理解的感受
design_highlights.en: Tender copy acknowledges emotional impact of reflection, making users feel understood

design_highlights.cn: 极简交互设计，单一Done按钮降低认知负担，让用户专注于当下感受
design_highlights.en: Minimalist interaction with single Done button reduces cognitive load, focusing on present feelings

product_insight.cn: 这是心理健康类App的典范设计——在用户完成可能触发情绪的自我反思后，不急于推销功能或引导下一步，而是给予无条件的关怀和安全空间，建立深层情感连接。
product_insight.en: Exemplary mental health app design - instead of pushing features after emotionally triggering self-reflection, it offers unconditional care and safe space, building deep emotional connection.

core_function.cn: 通过滚轮选择器收集用户身高数据
core_function.en: Collect user height data via scroll picker

design_highlights.cn: 双滚轮联动选择器，支持英制/公制切换，操作直观高效
design_highlights.en: Dual scroll picker with imperial/metric toggle, intuitive and efficient

design_highlights.cn: 选中值放大加粗显示，视觉层级分明，聚焦当前选择
design_highlights.en: Selected value enlarged and bold, clear visual hierarchy focusing on current selection

design_highlights.cn: Skip选项降低流失，同时粉色CTA按钮引导完成输入
design_highlights.en: Skip option reduces drop-off while pink CTA guides completion

design_highlights.cn: 简洁友好的提问方式，减少用户输入压力
design_highlights.en: Simple friendly question reduces user input pressure

product_insight.cn: 身高输入采用滚轮而非键盘输入，大幅降低输入成本；同时提供公制/英制切换满足全球用户需求，体现了健康类App对个性化数据收集的精细化设计思路。
product_insight.en: Scroll picker instead of keyboard input significantly reduces friction; imperial/metric toggle serves global users, reflecting refined personalization in health app data collection.

core_function.cn: 通过滚轮选择器收集用户精确体重数据
core_function.en: Collect precise user weight data via scroll picker

design_highlights.cn: 双列滚轮选择器支持整数和小数精确输入，操作直观高效
design_highlights.en: Dual-column scroll picker enables precise integer and decimal input intuitively

design_highlights.cn: 选中行高亮突出显示，灰色渐变淡化非选中项形成视觉焦点
design_highlights.en: Selected row highlighted with gray gradient fading non-selected items

design_highlights.cn: 支持kg/lb单位切换，适应全球用户习惯
design_highlights.en: Unit toggle between kg/lb accommodates global user preferences

design_highlights.cn: Skip跳过选项降低输入压力，减少流程放弃率
design_highlights.en: Skip option reduces input pressure and lowers abandonment rate

product_insight.cn: 体重输入采用原生滚轮而非键盘输入，降低认知负担且避免输入错误；实时数据同步显示在上方增强反馈感，单位切换设计体现国际化产品思维。
product_insight.en: Native scroll picker reduces cognitive load and input errors compared to keyboard. Real-time display above enhances feedback. Unit toggle reflects internationalization product thinking.

core_function.cn: 收集用户性别信息以提供个性化体验
core_function.en: Collect gender info for personalized experience

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合蓝色选中态，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with blue selection state creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 单选Radio Button设计，操作直观，支持跳过选项
design_highlights.en: Radio button design with intuitive interaction and skip option

design_highlights.cn: 包含Non-Binary和隐私选项，体现包容性设计理念
design_highlights.en: Inclusive design with Non-Binary and privacy options shows respect

design_highlights.cn: Maybe later选项降低用户流失，减少强制感
design_highlights.en: Maybe later option reduces friction and drop-off rate

product_insight.cn: 性别选择页面采用包容性设计，提供4种性别选项和延迟填写机制，既满足个性化数据需求又尊重用户隐私，顶部进度条明确告知流程位置，有效降低放弃率。
product_insight.en: Inclusive gender options with defer mechanism balances personalization needs and user privacy. Progress bar indicates flow position, effectively reducing abandonment rate.

core_function.cn: 引导用户进入周期和生育力信息采集环节
core_function.en: Guide users to cycle and fertility data collection section

design_highlights.cn: 环形图标结合验孕棒元素，直观传达周期追踪主题
design_highlights.en: Circular icon with pregnancy test element visually conveys cycle tracking theme

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼Julia增强亲切感和专属体验
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with user name enhances intimacy and exclusive experience

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮降低决策成本，流畅推进流程
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button reduces decision cost and smoothly advances the flow

product_insight.cn: 在长问卷流程中设置模块过渡页，既能让用户心理准备下一主题，又能缓解问卷疲劳感，分段式设计提升完成率。粉色渐变按钮与女性健康主题呼应。
product_insight.en: Section transition pages in long questionnaires prepare users mentally for new topics and reduce survey fatigue. Segmented design improves completion rates. Pink gradient button aligns with women's health theme.

core_function.cn: 评估用户改变意愿程度，制定个性化计划
core_function.en: Assess user's readiness for change to create personalized plan

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色选中状态对比清晰，单选项目层级分明带副标题说明
design_highlights.en: Clear blue selection state with hierarchical options featuring subtitles

design_highlights.cn: 单选即时反馈，进度条顶部可视化引导流程感知
design_highlights.en: Instant radio button feedback with top progress bar for flow awareness

design_highlights.cn: 提供'暂未准备好'选项尊重用户节奏，降低决策压力
design_highlights.en: Offering 'Not ready yet' option respects user pace and reduces pressure

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配备解释文案，帮助用户准确自我定位
design_highlights.en: Each option has explanatory text helping users accurately self-identify

product_insight.cn: 通过动力水平分层设计（从高到低四档），既收集关键行为改变数据，又让用户感受到被理解和尊重。'小步渐进'的默认选择降低心理门槛，提升后续留存可能。
product_insight.en: Tiered motivation levels collect behavioral data while making users feel understood. The 'small changes' option lowers psychological barriers and improves retention potential.

core_function.cn: 展示用户专属训练计划并欢迎开始训练旅程
core_function.en: Display personalized training plan and welcome user to start journey

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色徽章图标配合运动场景背景，建立专业训练氛围
design_highlights.en: Blue badge icon with sports background creates professional training atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 个性化欢迎语使用用户名称，增强归属感和专属体验
design_highlights.en: Personalized welcome message with user name enhances belonging and exclusive experience

design_highlights.cn: 简洁明了的计划信息展示（6周·5km），降低用户决策负担
design_highlights.en: Clear plan info display (6 weeks·5km) reduces user decision burden

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式设计配合暗色调背景图，聚焦核心内容
design_highlights.en: Card design with dark background image focuses on core content

product_insight.cn: 在引导流程结束时通过个性化确认页强化用户承诺感，明确计划周期和目标，配合励志文案激发用户开始训练的动力，有效提升后续留存率
