product_insight.en: Personalized confirmation page at onboarding end reinforces user commitment, clarifies plan duration and goals with motivational copy to boost training motivation and retention

core_function.cn: 让用户选择最多3个标签描述其俱乐部性质
core_function.en: Allow users to select up to 3 tags describing their club type

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，复选框选中状态对比鲜明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color, high contrast checkbox states

design_highlights.cn: 列表式多选设计，选项带清晰复选框，操作直观无误
design_highlights.en: List-based multi-select with clear checkboxes for intuitive operation

design_highlights.cn: 底部提示可随时更改，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Bottom hint about changing later reduces user decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 限制最多3个选项避免选择过载，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Limiting to 3 tags prevents choice overload and improves completion

product_insight.cn: 通过俱乐部类型标签实现用户分群，便于后续推荐和社区匹配。限制3个选项既保证数据精准度又降低认知负担，'可随时更改'的提示有效减少决策摩擦。
product_insight.en: Club type tags enable user segmentation for recommendations and community matching. The 3-tag limit ensures data accuracy while reducing cognitive load; 'change later' hint effectively reduces decision friction.

core_function.cn: 收集用户健康饮食的最大障碍信息
core_function.en: Collect user's biggest challenge to eating healthy

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态使用蓝色边框+勾选图标，视觉反馈清晰明确
design_highlights.en: Selected state uses blue border with checkmark, clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计简洁，选项间距适中便于点击操作
design_highlights.en: Clean single-select list with adequate spacing for easy tapping

design_highlights.cn: 提供'None of the above'选项，尊重用户多样性避免强制选择
design_highlights.en: Includes 'None of the above' option respecting user diversity

product_insight.cn: 通过识别用户健康饮食障碍（如渴望、压力、时间不足），为后续提供个性化解决方案奠定基础。选项设计覆盖主要痛点场景，有助于精准用户分群和内容推荐。
product_insight.en: Identifying eating challenges (cravings, stress, time) enables personalized solutions. Options cover major pain points for precise user segmentation and content recommendations.

core_function.cn: 用户自定义创建俱乐部名称、头像和描述信息
core_function.en: Customize club name, photo and description for creation

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，视觉层次分明，表单区域清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates clear visual hierarchy and form distinction

design_highlights.cn: 实时字符计数器显示剩余可输入字符，防止用户输入超限
design_highlights.en: Real-time character counter shows remaining characters to prevent overflow

design_highlights.cn: 底部提示"可随时更改"降低用户决策压力，减少放弃率
design_highlights.en: "You can always change this later" reduces decision pressure and abandonment

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条明确显示创建流程位置，增强用户完成动力
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows creation flow position to boost completion motivation

product_insight.cn: 表单设计巧妙平衡了必填与选填项，通过Required标签明确必要信息，同时保持描述可选降低门槛。社区规范提示体现了平台治理意识，为后续内容审核奠定基础。
product_insight.en: Form balances required and optional fields with clear Required labels. Community Standards reminder shows platform governance awareness, laying foundation for content moderation.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择或确认自动填充的日期范围
core_function.en: Allow users to select or confirm auto-filled date ranges

design_highlights.cn: 自动填充日期并允许用户手动调整，降低操作成本同时保持灵活性
design_highlights.en: Auto-fill dates with manual adjustment option, reducing effort while maintaining flexibility

design_highlights.cn: 粉红色圆形勾选标记清晰区分已选日期，TODAY标签突出当前日期定位
design_highlights.en: Pink circular checkmarks clearly distinguish selected dates, TODAY label highlights current date

design_highlights.cn: 顶部渐变提示条温和引导用户，降低信息收集的压迫感
design_highlights.en: Gradient header tip gently guides users, reducing pressure during data collection

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的青绿色Next按钮形成视觉焦点，引导用户完成流程
design_highlights.en: Prominent teal Next button creates visual focus, guiding users to complete the flow

product_insight.cn: 智能预填充+可调整的设计平衡了效率与用户控制感，适用于周期追踪类应用。多日期连续选择的交互模式值得借鉴，既简化操作又保证数据准确性。
product_insight.en: Smart pre-fill with adjustable design balances efficiency and user control, ideal for cycle tracking apps. Multi-date continuous selection pattern simplifies operation while ensuring data accuracy.

core_function.cn: 选择计划或活动的开始与结束日期
core_function.en: Select start and end dates for a plan or activity

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗滚轮选择器，支持滑动浏览日期，操作直观流畅
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with scroll wheel picker, intuitive swipe gesture for date browsing

design_highlights.cn: 选中项高亮背景突出显示，层级清晰，未选中项渐变淡化
design_highlights.en: Highlighted selected item with gradient fade effect on unselected options

design_highlights.cn: 默认显示Today标签，强化当下行动感，降低决策压力
design_highlights.en: Today label as default creates immediacy and reduces decision friction

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生滚轮选择器符合用户心智模型，开始日期默认今天配合7天周期预设，平衡了灵活性与便捷性，有效引导用户快速完成设置进入核心功能。
product_insight.en: Native iOS wheel picker aligns with user mental models. Default 'Today' start with 7-day preset balances flexibility and convenience, guiding users to complete setup quickly.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择计划的开始和结束日期
core_function.en: Allow users to select plan start and end dates

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计风格，大量留白突出核心选择项
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with ample white space highlighting core options

design_highlights.cn: 下拉选择器降低输入成本，预填今日日期减少操作步骤
design_highlights.en: Dropdown selectors reduce input effort, pre-filled today's date minimizes steps

design_highlights.cn: 使用'Today'文案暗示立即行动，营造紧迫感
design_highlights.en: Using 'Today' copy implies immediate action, creating urgency

product_insight.cn: 通过预设合理的日期范围（9天），既给用户自主权又提供默认建议，降低决策负担。简洁的双日期选择器设计清晰表达时间跨度概念，适合健康、习惯养成类应用。
product_insight.en: Pre-setting a reasonable date range (9 days) gives users autonomy while providing defaults, reducing decision burden. Clean dual-date picker clearly conveys time span concept, suitable for health and habit apps.

core_function.cn: 选择开始和结束日期以设定时间范围
core_function.en: Select start and end dates to set a time range

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗滚轮选择器，支持惯性滚动，操作自然流畅
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with scroll wheel picker, supports momentum scrolling for natural interaction

design_highlights.cn: 选中日期高亮突出，渐变淡出效果增强层次感
design_highlights.en: Selected date highlighted with gradient fade effect enhancing visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 下拉框与弹窗联动，点击即展开日历选择器
design_highlights.en: Dropdown synced with bottom sheet, tap to expand calendar picker

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色边框明确指示当前编辑字段，焦点状态清晰
design_highlights.en: Blue border clearly indicates active field with clear focus state

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生滚轮选择器模式降低学习成本，日期选项按周几+日期组合展示增强时间感知，底部弹窗不遮挡上方选项便于用户对比确认所选范围。
product_insight.en: Native iOS wheel picker reduces learning curve. Weekday+date format enhances time perception. Bottom sheet doesn't obscure top fields, allowing users to compare and confirm selected range.

core_function.cn: 选择挑战活动的开始日期和截止日期
core_function.en: Select start and cut-off date for challenge activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，日期选择器对比分明易识别
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent, date picker has clear contrast for easy selection

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器，三列独立滚动实现月/日/年的精确选择
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker with three independent columns for month/day/year selection

design_highlights.cn: "kick your challenge off"活力文案激发用户开启挑战的积极性
design_highlights.en: Energetic copy 'kick your challenge off' motivates users to start their challenge

product_insight.cn: 挑战类产品通过让用户自主设定开始时间，增强承诺感和参与意愿。底部弹窗式日期选择器保持上下文可见，减少用户迷失感，同时Back/Next导航明确引导流程进度。
product_insight.en: Challenge products let users set their own start time to enhance commitment. Bottom sheet date picker maintains context visibility, while Back/Next navigation clearly guides flow progress.

core_function.cn: 设置挑战活动的开始与截止日期
core_function.en: Set start and end dates for challenge activities

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色高亮，突出当前选中项，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange highlight emphasizes selection with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器，三列独立滚动支持精确日期选择
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker with three independent columns for precise date selection

design_highlights.cn: 友好的引导文案'kick your challenge off'营造积极开始的氛围
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy 'kick your challenge off' creates positive starting atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 挑战类产品通过明确时间边界强化用户承诺感，日期选择弹窗与主页面分离减少认知负荷，清晰的开始/结束日期设置帮助用户建立可执行的目标计划。
product_insight.en: Challenge products reinforce user commitment through clear time boundaries. Separated date picker modal reduces cognitive load, helping users establish actionable goal plans.

core_function.cn: 设置挑战活动的开始和结束日期
core_function.en: Set start and end dates for the challenge activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配高对比度下拉选择器，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high-contrast dropdown selectors creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的双下拉选择器设计，减少用户操作复杂度
design_highlights.en: Simple dual dropdown design minimizes user interaction complexity

design_highlights.cn: 友好活泼的文案'kick your challenge off'营造期待感
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy 'kick your challenge off' creates anticipation and excitement

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示流程进度，降低用户放弃率
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows flow progress, reducing user drop-off rate

product_insight.cn: 将日期选择拆分为独立步骤而非复杂表单，降低认知负担。预设合理的默认日期范围（约1个月），帮助用户快速决策，体现了'渐进式承诺'的设计策略。
product_insight.en: Separating date selection into a dedicated step reduces cognitive load. Pre-set reasonable default date range (about 1 month) helps quick decisions, reflecting progressive commitment design strategy.

core_function.cn: 让用户回顾并记录过往经期日期，建立周期数据基础
core_function.en: Allow users to log previous period dates to establish cycle data baseline

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变头部搭配白色内容区，女性化配色温和不突兀
design_highlights.en: Pink gradient header with white content area creates soft feminine aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 日历直接点选交互，已选日期显示粉色勾选标记，状态清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Direct calendar tap interaction with pink checkmarks showing clear selection states

design_highlights.cn: 虚线圆圈表示预测日期，实心勾选表示确认记录，视觉区分明确
design_highlights.en: Dashed circles indicate predicted dates while solid checks show confirmed logs

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定醒目CTA按钮，青色与粉色形成对比，引导用户继续流程
design_highlights.en: Fixed teal CTA button contrasts with pink theme, guiding users to proceed

product_insight.cn: 通过回溯历史经期数据而非仅记录当前周期，能快速建立用户周期模型，提升预测准确性，同时降低新用户等待成本，这是经期追踪类产品冷启动的关键策略。
product_insight.en: Collecting historical period data enables quick cycle model building and improves prediction accuracy, reducing cold-start wait time - a key strategy for period tracking apps.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择减重速度并预览目标达成时间线
core_function.en: Let users choose weight loss pace and preview goal timeline

design_highlights.cn: 曲线图直观展示体重下降趋势，起止点标注清晰
design_highlights.en: Curve chart intuitively shows weight trend with clear start/end markers

design_highlights.cn: 滑块交互让用户掌控减重速度，增强参与感
design_highlights.en: Slider interaction gives users control over pace, enhancing engagement

design_highlights.cn: "Recommended"标签降低决策压力，"sustainable pace"文案传递健康理念
design_highlights.en: Recommended label reduces decision pressure, sustainable pace copy conveys healthy approach

design_highlights.cn: 预览具体日期和目标体重，让抽象目标具象化提升承诺度
design_highlights.en: Previewing specific dates and target weight makes abstract goals tangible

product_insight.cn: 通过可视化时间线和推荐选项平衡用户期望与现实，既满足快速见效的心理又引导健康减重，滑块设计让用户感觉目标由自己掌控而非被动接受，提升后续留存
product_insight.en: Balances user expectations with reality through visual timeline and recommendations. Slider design makes users feel in control rather than passive, improving retention commitment

core_function.cn: 创建俱乐部时选择公开或私密访问权限
core_function.en: Choose public or private access when creating a club

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色强调色，视觉层次分明，选项对比清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange accent creates clear visual hierarchy and option contrast

design_highlights.cn: 单选按钮设计简洁，每个选项附带详细说明降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Clean radio button design with detailed descriptions reduces decision-making friction

design_highlights.cn: 底部提示可随时更改设置，消除用户选择焦虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom hint about changing later eliminates user anxiety about commitment

product_insight.cn: Strava在俱乐部创建流程中将隐私设置独立成页，体现对用户数据控制权的重视。简明的选项说明和可修改提示有效降低用户决策压力，提升完成率。
product_insight.en: Strava dedicates a separate page for privacy settings in club creation, showing respect for user data control. Clear descriptions and changeable hint reduce decision pressure and improve completion rate.

core_function.cn: 告知用户注册/设置流程已完成，引导探索功能
core_function.en: Confirm setup completion and guide users to explore features

design_highlights.cn: 庆祝感插画配合彩色几何元素，营造欢快成就氛围
design_highlights.en: Celebratory illustration with colorful confetti creates joyful achievement atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼用户名Julia，增强专属感和亲切感
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with user name Julia enhances intimacy and exclusivity

design_highlights.cn: 渐变色CTA按钮醒目突出，文案'Show me!'激发好奇心
design_highlights.en: Gradient CTA button stands out, 'Show me!' copy triggers curiosity

design_highlights.cn: 人物举手机自拍动态姿势，传递活力与社交属性
design_highlights.en: Character holding phone in dynamic selfie pose conveys energy and social vibe

product_insight.cn: 完成页采用庆祝仪式感设计，通过个性化称呼+成就感插画降低用户流失，渐变CTA营造期待感，有效承接后续功能探索，是提升激活率的关键节点设计
product_insight.en: Celebration ritual design with personalized greeting and achievement illustration reduces drop-off. Gradient CTA creates anticipation, effectively bridging to feature exploration - a key activation moment

core_function.cn: 欢迎新用户完成注册并引导开始使用
core_function.en: Welcome new users after registration and guide them to start

design_highlights.cn: 真实运动场景照片传递活力与社交氛围，两人欢笑画面极具感染力
design_highlights.en: Authentic fitness photo with laughing friends conveys energy and social vibe

design_highlights.cn: 个性化欢迎语"Welcome, Julia!"创造专属感和亲切感
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting 'Welcome, Julia!' creates sense of belonging

design_highlights.cn: 明确传达产品三大核心价值：上传活动、竞争、社区建设
design_highlights.en: Clearly communicates three core values: upload activities, compete, build community

design_highlights.cn: 以"have fun"结尾强调愉悦体验，降低用户心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Ending with 'have fun' emphasizes enjoyment, lowering psychological barriers

product_insight.cn: 通过真实社交场景+个性化问候+价值主张三重组合，在注册完成关键时刻强化用户期待。照片选择突出社交属性，暗示产品不只是工具而是社区，有效提升首次使用意愿。
product_insight.en: Combines authentic social imagery, personalized greeting, and value proposition at the critical post-registration moment. Photo emphasizes social aspect, positioning product as community not just tool, boosting first-use motivation.

core_function.cn: 收集用户对定制周餐计划功能的意愿程度
core_function.en: Collect user interest level in customized weekly meal planning feature

design_highlights.cn: 三档选项设计清晰，选中态使用蓝色边框和勾选图标形成明确反馈
design_highlights.en: Three-tier options with clear selected state using blue border and checkmark icon

design_highlights.cn: 单选交互简洁直观，降低用户决策负担
design_highlights.en: Simple single-select interaction reduces user decision burden

design_highlights.cn: 提供"Open to trying"中间选项，降低承诺压力，提升转化意愿
design_highlights.en: Middle option 'Open to trying' reduces commitment pressure and improves conversion

design_highlights.cn: 渐进式承诺设计，从"开放尝试"到"确定需要"引导用户逐步接受
design_highlights.en: Progressive commitment design guides users from 'open to trying' to full acceptance

product_insight.cn: 采用三级意愿选项而非二元选择，巧妙捕获"摇摆用户"群体。中间选项降低心理门槛，后续可针对不同意愿程度提供差异化体验，提升功能激活率和留存。
product_insight.en: Three-tier willingness options instead of binary choice cleverly capture 'swing users'. Middle option lowers psychological barrier, enabling differentiated experiences based on commitment level to boost activation and retention.

core_function.cn: 收集用户对宏量营养素的重视程度偏好
core_function.en: Collect user preference for macronutrient priority

design_highlights.cn: 极简卡片式单选设计，选中态用蓝色边框+勾选图标清晰反馈
design_highlights.en: Minimal card-style radio buttons with blue border and checkmark for clear selection feedback

design_highlights.cn: 提供'All equally'兜底选项，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Provides 'All equally' fallback option to reduce user decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 问题表述专业但易懂，建立产品的专业营养指导形象
design_highlights.en: Professional yet accessible wording establishes expert nutrition guidance image

product_insight.cn: 通过宏量营养素偏好收集实现个性化推荐，'All equally'选项既降低流失又能识别无明确偏好用户群，为后续算法推荐提供分层依据
product_insight.en: Macronutrient preference collection enables personalized recommendations. 'All equally' option reduces drop-off while identifying users without clear preferences for algorithm segmentation

core_function.cn: 收集用户常用购物渠道以提供个性化服务
core_function.en: Collect user's preferred grocery stores for personalized service

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态采用蓝色边框+填充复选框，视觉反馈清晰明确
design_highlights.en: Selected state uses blue border with filled checkbox for clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 多选列表设计支持灵活选择，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Multi-select list allows flexible choices, reducing decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 包含主流商超和Other选项，确保覆盖所有用户场景
design_highlights.en: Includes major retailers and Other option to cover all user scenarios

product_insight.cn: 通过收集购物渠道偏好，产品可对接相应平台API实现价格比较或购物清单同步，同时Kroger下方的品牌说明降低用户认知成本，提升选择准确性。
product_insight.en: Collecting store preferences enables API integration for price comparison or shopping list sync. Sub-brand explanation under Kroger reduces cognitive load and improves selection accuracy.

core_function.cn: 用户创建俱乐部时选择运动类型偏好
core_function.en: Select sport type preference when creating a club

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动感十足，各运动类型配有专属图标增强识别度
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates athletic feel, sport-specific icons enhance recognition

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计清晰，选中状态明确，支持滚动浏览更多选项
design_highlights.en: Clear single-select list with distinct selected state, scrollable for more options

design_highlights.cn: '可随时更改'的提示降低决策压力，鼓励用户快速完成选择
design_highlights.en: 'Change later' hint reduces decision pressure, encouraging quick selection

design_highlights.cn: 默认选中'All Sports'降低选择门槛，确保用户能快速进入下一步
design_highlights.en: Default 'All Sports' selection lowers barrier, ensuring quick progression

product_insight.cn: 通过提供宽泛和具体两种选择策略，兼顾不同用户需求。默认'All Sports'的预选设计巧妙降低决策成本，同时详细的子类型说明帮助专业用户精准定位，平衡了易用性与专业性。
product_insight.en: Offers both broad and specific selection strategies. Default 'All Sports' cleverly reduces decision cost, while detailed subtypes help power users. Balances usability with professional needs.

core_function.cn: 收集用户近6个月避孕方式以评估周期影响
core_function.en: Collect recent birth control usage to assess cycle impact

design_highlights.cn: 纯净白底配合浅灰色选项卡片，视觉层次清晰不压迫
design_highlights.en: Clean white background with light gray option cards creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 提供'不愿回答'选项尊重用户隐私边界，降低敏感问题流失
design_highlights.en: Prefer not to answer option respects privacy boundaries, reduces sensitive question dropout

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计简化决策，选项覆盖全面包含当前使用状态
design_highlights.en: Single-select list simplifies decision, options comprehensively cover current usage status

design_highlights.cn: 解释性副标题说明提问原因，建立数据收集的信任感
design_highlights.en: Explanatory subtitle clarifies why asking, builds trust for data collection

product_insight.cn: 通过透明化数据用途（影响周期预测）来提升敏感问题的回答率，同时提供跳过和不回答双重退出机制，平衡数据完整性与用户体验，是健康类App收集隐私数据的最佳实践。
product_insight.en: Transparently explaining data usage improves sensitive question response rates. Dual exit mechanisms (skip and prefer not to answer) balance data completeness with user experience—best practice for health apps collecting private data.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择偏好的饮食计划类型以个性化推荐
core_function.en: Let users choose preferred diet plan for personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 精美食物摄影配图，每种饮食方案用代表性食材直观呈现
design_highlights.en: Beautiful food photography with representative ingredients for each diet type

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式网格布局，支持快速浏览和点击选择
design_highlights.en: Card grid layout enabling quick browsing and tap selection

design_highlights.cn: 简洁副标题解释每种饮食特点，降低用户决策负担
design_highlights.en: Concise subtitles explaining diet characteristics reduce decision burden

product_insight.cn: 通过视觉化饮食选项降低用户认知成本，6种主流饮食方案覆盖大部分用户需求。图文结合的卡片设计既美观又实用，副标题简明扼要突出核心差异，帮助用户快速做出选择。
product_insight.en: Visual diet options reduce cognitive load. Six mainstream diet plans cover most user needs. Image-text card design is aesthetic and practical, with concise subtitles highlighting key differences for quick decisions.

core_function.cn: 向用户介绍跑步计划中的不同训练类型
core_function.en: Introduce different training types in the running plan

design_highlights.cn: 彩色方块图标区分训练类型，建立清晰的视觉编码系统
design_highlights.en: Colored square icons differentiate run types, creating clear visual coding system

design_highlights.cn: 可展开的列表设计，点击箭头可查看详情，保持界面简洁
design_highlights.en: Expandable list design with arrow indicators for details while keeping UI clean

design_highlights.cn: 友好的引导语气，帮助用户理解即将开始的训练内容
design_highlights.en: Friendly guiding tone helps users understand upcoming training content

product_insight.cn: 在用户开始训练前提供类型说明，降低认知门槛，颜色编码系统在后续日历/计划视图中可形成一致的视觉语言，提升产品使用效率
product_insight.en: Providing type explanations before training reduces cognitive load. Color coding creates consistent visual language for calendar/plan views, improving product usability

core_function.cn: 选择俱乐部所在地区或设为全球性质
core_function.en: Select club location or set as global community

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合白色卡片选项，层级分明易识别
design_highlights.en: Dark background with white card options creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 提供全球和本地两种选项，支持一键切换位置
design_highlights.en: Offers global and local options with one-tap location change

design_highlights.cn: 底部提示可随时更改，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Bottom hint about changing later reduces user decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色CTA按钮引导用户完成创建流程
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA button guides users to complete creation

product_insight.cn: 通过二元选择简化位置设定，同时保留精确地理定位能力。提示可随时更改有效降低决策门槛，提升流程完成率。全球选项满足线上社群需求。
product_insight.en: Binary choice simplifies location setting while retaining precise geo-targeting. 'Change later' hint reduces decision friction and improves completion rate. Global option serves online community needs.

core_function.cn: 收集用户月经周期规律性信息以提供个性化追踪
core_function.en: Collect menstrual cycle regularity info for personalized tracking

design_highlights.cn: 粉色品牌色贯穿选中状态，柔和亲和符合女性健康产品调性
design_highlights.en: Pink brand color for selected state, soft and friendly for women's health

design_highlights.cn: 选中后即时展示价值承诺，让用户明确分享信息的好处
design_highlights.en: Immediate value proposition upon selection shows benefits of sharing data

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片展开式设计，选中项展示详细说明增强信息透明度
design_highlights.en: Expandable card design reveals detailed explanation for transparency

design_highlights.cn: 提供"不确定"选项降低决策压力，减少用户流失
design_highlights.en: I don't know option reduces decision pressure and user drop-off

product_insight.cn: 通过选中后展开说明的设计，将数据收集与价值传递结合，让用户理解每个问题的意义。提供模糊选项降低认知负担，体现以用户为中心的产品理念。
product_insight.en: Expandable selection design combines data collection with value communication. Offering uncertain option reduces cognitive load, demonstrating user-centered product philosophy.

core_function.cn: 收集用户孕前健康检查状态并提供个性化建议
core_function.en: Collect pre-pregnancy health check status and provide personalized advice

design_highlights.cn: 选择"Not yet"后即时展开温暖鼓励文案，消除用户焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Warm encouraging copy expands instantly when selecting 'Not yet', reducing user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 粉色高亮选中态与展开内容区分层级，视觉反馈清晰
design_highlights.en: Pink highlight for selected state with expanded content creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 承诺提供每日生育建议和可下载数据，强化产品价值感知
design_highlights.en: Promises daily fertility tips and downloadable data, reinforcing product value perception

design_highlights.cn: 单选展开式设计，选项即刻显示相关说明信息
design_highlights.en: Single-select expandable design shows relevant explanations immediately

product_insight.cn: 通过条件展开式设计，针对不同回答提供差异化引导，既收集数据又教育用户。"That's okay"开头的安抚语气降低负面选项的心理负担，提升问卷完成率。
product_insight.en: Conditional expandable design provides differentiated guidance for different answers. 'That's okay' reassurance reduces psychological burden of negative options, improving survey completion rate.

core_function.cn: 收集用户生殖健康状况以提供个性化内容支持
core_function.en: Collect reproductive health conditions for personalized content support

design_highlights.cn: 透明说明询问原因，建立信任感并降低隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Transparent explanation of why asking builds trust and reduces privacy concerns

design_highlights.cn: 提供'不确定'和'其他'选项，覆盖所有用户场景避免流失
design_highlights.en: Provides 'not sure' and 'something else' options to cover all scenarios

design_highlights.cn: 简洁卡片式列表设计，选项清晰易读便于快速选择
design_highlights.en: Clean card-style list design with clear, readable options for quick selection

design_highlights.cn: Skip按钮允许跳过敏感问题，减少用户放弃率
design_highlights.en: Skip button allows bypassing sensitive questions to reduce abandonment

product_insight.cn: 针对敏感健康话题，通过价值说明（提供相关内容支持）降低用户抗拒心理，同时提供模糊选项和跳过功能平衡数据收集与用户体验，体现以用户为中心的设计理念。
product_insight.en: For sensitive health topics, value explanation reduces user resistance. Fuzzy options and skip function balance data collection with UX, demonstrating user-centered design approach.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化饮食方案及营养目标配比
core_function.en: Display personalized diet plan with nutrition targets breakdown

design_highlights.cn: 蓝莓高清大图营造健康清新氛围，与营养主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: High-quality blueberry hero image creates fresh healthy atmosphere aligned with nutrition theme

design_highlights.cn: 环形图直观展示卡路里与三大营养素配比，数据可视化清晰
design_highlights.en: Circular chart intuitively displays calories and macro ratios with clear data visualization

design_highlights.cn: 勾选式要点列表降低认知负担，增强方案可信度和执行信心
design_highlights.en: Checkmark bullet points reduce cognitive load, enhance plan credibility and execution confidence

design_highlights.cn: "one step at a time"渐进式文案减轻用户心理压力
design_highlights.en: Progressive copy 'one step at a time' reduces user psychological pressure

product_insight.cn: 将复杂营养数据简化为可视化图表和关键数字，配合具体可执行的行动建议，既展示专业性又降低用户决策门槛，"Sources of recommendations"链接增强科学背书。
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex nutrition data into visual charts and key numbers, paired with actionable tips. Shows professionalism while lowering decision barriers. 'Sources' link adds scientific credibility.

core_function.cn: 收集用户每周计划的餐食数量偏好
core_function.en: Collect user preferences for weekly meal planning frequency

design_highlights.cn: 极简单选列表设计，选中状态采用蓝色边框和勾选图标，视觉层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist radio list design with blue border and checkmark for selected state, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 提供从少到多的渐进式选项，末尾设置Custom自定义入口满足个性化需求
design_highlights.en: Progressive options from few to many, with Custom entry for personalized needs

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定蓝色Next按钮，确保用户随时可进入下一步，降低流失率
design_highlights.en: Fixed blue Next button at bottom ensures users can proceed anytime, reducing drop-off

product_insight.cn: 通过预设常见用餐场景降低用户决策成本，同时保留Custom选项兼顾灵活性。问题表述直接明了，帮助产品后续提供精准的餐食推荐和采购清单。
product_insight.en: Preset common meal scenarios reduce decision cost while Custom option ensures flexibility. Direct question helps product deliver precise meal recommendations and shopping lists later.

core_function.cn: 基于用户目标智能推荐个性化训练方案
core_function.en: AI-powered personalized workout recommendations based on user goals

design_highlights.cn: 彩带庆祝动效配合渐变背景，营造成就感和期待氛围
design_highlights.en: Confetti celebration animation with gradient background creates achievement atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 彩色标签区分训练类型（速度/平衡/耐力），降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Color-coded labels differentiate workout types (Speed/Balanced/Endurance) to reduce decision friction

design_highlights.cn: "Based on your target goal"文案强调个性化，增强用户认同感
design_highlights.en: Personalized copy 'Based on your target goal' reinforces user connection and relevance

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局展示关键信息（时长、距离），便于快速对比选择
design_highlights.en: Card layout displays key metrics (duration, distance) for easy comparison

product_insight.cn: 在引导流程末端展示个性化推荐结果，让用户立即感受到产品价值，同时用庆祝元素强化完成问卷的成就感，有效提升转化至核心功能的意愿
product_insight.en: Displaying personalized recommendations at onboarding completion immediately demonstrates product value while celebration elements reinforce achievement, effectively driving conversion to core features

core_function.cn: 通过问答形式教育用户识别排卵期分泌物特征
core_function.en: Educate users about cervical mucus patterns for fertility tracking

design_highlights.cn: 采用问答互动形式，让用户主动参与学习，增强记忆
design_highlights.en: Interactive Q&A format encourages active learning and better retention

design_highlights.cn: 选中"No"后展开粉色教育卡片，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Pink educational card expands on 'No' selection with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 巧妙植入产品功能价值，引导用户认识Flo追踪功能的实用性
design_highlights.en: Subtly integrates product value proposition within educational content

design_highlights.cn: 条件性内容展示，根据用户选择动态呈现相关信息
design_highlights.en: Conditional content display based on user selection

product_insight.cn: 通过"你知道吗"问答形式测试用户知识水平，针对不了解的用户即时提供教育内容并植入产品价值。这种「教育即营销」策略既建立专业信任又提升功能认知，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Uses 'Did you know' quiz to assess knowledge level, instantly educating unfamiliar users while embedding product value. This 'education as marketing' approach builds trust and feature awareness simultaneously.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择膳食计划的开始时间
core_function.en: Let users choose when to start their meal plan

design_highlights.cn: 极简卡片式单选设计，选中状态以蓝色勾选清晰标识
design_highlights.en: Minimalist card-based radio selection with clear blue checkmark for selected state

design_highlights.cn: 提供三级时间灵活度：立即、周末、自定义，满足不同用户需求
design_highlights.en: Three-tier time flexibility: immediate, weekend, custom to meet various user needs

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项附带解释性副标题，降低用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Each option includes explanatory subtitle to reduce decision anxiety

product_insight.cn: 通过预设智能选项（明天/周末）降低用户决策成本，默认选中"立即开始"利用承诺一致性心理促进快速激活，同时保留自定义选项给予用户控制感。
product_insight.en: Pre-set smart options reduce decision cost. Default 'Right away' selection leverages commitment psychology for quick activation while custom option provides user control.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择健身/健康计划的开始时间
core_function.en: Let users choose when to start their fitness/health plan

design_highlights.cn: 快捷日期按钮（今天/明天/周一）降低选择成本，提升决策效率
design_highlights.en: Quick date buttons (Today/Tomorrow/Monday) reduce decision cost and improve efficiency

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合青绿色高亮，视觉层次分明，选中状态清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with teal accent creates clear visual hierarchy and selection state

design_highlights.cn: "Now"文案暗示即刻行动，配合实时日期显示增强紧迫感
design_highlights.en: "Now" copy implies immediate action, real-time date display enhances urgency

design_highlights.cn: 默认选中"Now"预设最佳转化路径，减少用户拖延
design_highlights.en: Default "Now" selection presets optimal conversion path, reduces procrastination

product_insight.cn: 通过预设"Now"为默认选项巧妙利用行为心理学，减少用户拖延行为。周一选项符合用户"新周开始"的心理预期，Custom选项则保障灵活性，兼顾转化与体验。
product_insight.en: Cleverly uses behavioral psychology by defaulting to "Now" to reduce procrastination. Monday option aligns with "fresh start" mentality, while Custom ensures flexibility balancing conversion and experience.

core_function.cn: 展示训练计划已同步至用户设备，引导完成引导流程
core_function.en: Shows workout synced to devices, guides user to complete onboarding

design_highlights.cn: 彩纸庆祝动效营造成就感，渐变背景突出设备展示
design_highlights.en: Confetti celebration effect creates achievement feeling, gradient background highlights device showcase

design_highlights.cn: 展示真实设备界面预览，让用户对即将获得的体验产生期待
design_highlights.en: Real device interface preview builds anticipation for upcoming experience

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器显示引导进度，单一CTA按钮简化完成操作
design_highlights.en: Pagination dots show progress, single CTA button simplifies completion action

design_highlights.cn: 强调多设备无缝体验，展示Apple Watch集成提升产品价值感知
design_highlights.en: Emphasizes seamless multi-device experience, Apple Watch integration enhances perceived value

product_insight.cn: 通过展示手机与智能手表的同步界面，巧妙传递产品的多设备生态价值，庆祝动效增强用户完成引导的成就感，为正式使用建立积极预期。
product_insight.en: Showcasing phone and smartwatch sync cleverly conveys multi-device ecosystem value. Celebration animation enhances completion achievement, building positive expectations for actual use.

core_function.cn: 收集用户食物过敏信息以个性化饮食推荐
core_function.en: Collect user food allergy info for personalized diet recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态采用蓝色填充背景，与未选中的白色形成强对比，视觉反馈清晰
design_highlights.en: Selected state uses blue filled background contrasting with white unselected, clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 多选列表设计支持灵活选择，复选框右对齐保持视觉整洁
design_highlights.en: Multi-select list allows flexible choices, right-aligned checkboxes maintain visual cleanliness

design_highlights.cn: 顶部安全提示文案体现对用户健康的关怀，增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Safety reminder at top shows care for user health, builds trust

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示当前步骤，降低用户放弃率
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows current step, reduces user abandonment rate

product_insight.cn: 食物类App通过收集过敏信息实现个性化推荐，同时免责提示降低法律风险。8种常见过敏原覆盖主流需求，选项设计简洁高效，用户决策成本低。
product_insight.en: Food app collects allergy info for personalization while disclaimer reduces legal risk. Eight common allergens cover mainstream needs with low decision cost for users.

core_function.cn: 引导用户关注平台上的热门运动员和好友
core_function.en: Guide users to follow popular athletes and find friends on platform

design_highlights.cn: 标题"It's not always a solo sport"强调社交归属感，激发用户连接动机
design_highlights.en: Title 'It's not always a solo sport' emphasizes social belonging and motivates connection

design_highlights.cn: 预置热门运动员推荐列表，展示粉丝数作为社交证明降低选择门槛
design_highlights.en: Pre-populated popular athletes with follower counts as social proof reduces decision friction

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配橙色CTA按钮形成强对比，Follow按钮统一右对齐便于快速操作
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange CTA creates strong contrast, aligned Follow buttons enable quick action

design_highlights.cn: 搜索入口置顶，支持主动查找与被动推荐双路径
design_highlights.en: Search entry at top supports both active search and passive recommendation paths

product_insight.cn: 通过推荐全球各地的热门运动员建立内容消费关系，利用社交证明（粉丝数）降低关注决策成本，同时为新用户快速构建初始Feed内容，提升留存
product_insight.en: Recommends global popular athletes to build content consumption relationships, uses social proof to reduce follow friction, quickly builds initial Feed for new users to boost retention

core_function.cn: 展示专业医生团队，为后续健康问卷做铺垫
core_function.en: Showcase medical team and introduce upcoming health questionnaire

design_highlights.cn: 医生头像采用圆形设计配柔和渐变边框，展现亲和力与专业感
design_highlights.en: Circular doctor photos with soft gradient borders convey approachability and professionalism

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调'健康不只是体重数字'，传递人性化关怀理念
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes health beyond numbers, conveying humanized care philosophy

design_highlights.cn: 用医生背书降低用户对敏感问题（体重营养）的抵触心理
design_highlights.en: Doctor endorsement reduces resistance to sensitive questions about weight and nutrition

design_highlights.cn: 多样化的医生阵容展示包容性，增强不同用户群体认同感
design_highlights.en: Diverse doctor lineup showcases inclusivity and builds trust across demographics

product_insight.cn: 在收集敏感健康数据前，用专业医生团队做信任背书，同时预告问题内容并解释原因，有效降低用户填写焦虑，提升问卷完成率
product_insight.en: Building trust with medical team before collecting sensitive health data, explaining why questions matter, effectively reduces anxiety and improves questionnaire completion rates

core_function.cn: 收集用户的过敏原和不喜欢的食物偏好
core_function.en: Collect user allergies and food dislikes for personalization

design_highlights.cn: 已选标签带X可快速删除，交互直观高效
design_highlights.en: Selected tags with X icon for quick removal, intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色边框区分已选项与待选项，视觉层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Blue bordered tags distinguish selected from available options

design_highlights.cn: 预设常见不喜欢食物列表，降低用户输入成本
design_highlights.en: Pre-populated common dislikes reduce user input effort

design_highlights.cn: 健康提示文案体现产品责任感和专业性
design_highlights.en: Health disclaimer shows product responsibility and professionalism

product_insight.cn: 搜索+预设列表的双重模式兼顾效率与全面性，常见禁忌按食材分类排列便于快速定位。健康提示既规避风险又增强信任感，为后续个性化推荐奠定基础。
product_insight.en: Dual-mode design with search and preset list balances efficiency and comprehensiveness. Health disclaimer mitigates risk while building trust, laying foundation for personalized recommendations.

core_function.cn: 展示推荐早餐方案，支持用户自定义替换
core_function.en: Display recommended breakfast options with swap functionality

design_highlights.cn: 真实食物图片配合清晰热量标注，增强直观感受
design_highlights.en: Real food images with clear calorie labels enhance visual appeal

design_highlights.cn: 双向箭头图标暗示可替换操作，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Swap arrows indicate replaceable items, reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 按日期分组展示让用户感知个性化方案的完整性
design_highlights.en: Date-grouped display conveys completeness of personalized plan

design_highlights.cn: 提供选择权而非强制接受，增强用户掌控感
design_highlights.en: Offering choice instead of forcing acceptance increases user control

product_insight.cn: 通过展示具体餐食方案并赋予用户修改权，既展示算法智能又尊重个人偏好，有效降低用户对订阅计划的抵触心理，提升方案接受度和后续留存。
product_insight.en: Showing specific meal plans with swap options demonstrates algorithm intelligence while respecting preferences, reducing resistance to subscription and improving plan acceptance and retention.

core_function.cn: 按日期预览并自定义每日餐食安排
core_function.en: Preview and customize daily meal arrangements by date

design_highlights.cn: 网格卡片布局清晰展示多日多餐，蓝色勾选状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Grid card layout clearly displays multi-day meals with blue checkmark states

design_highlights.cn: 点击切换选中状态，加号按钮引导添加缺失餐食，操作直观
design_highlights.en: Tap to toggle selection, plus button guides adding missing meals intuitively

design_highlights.cn: 预选大部分餐食降低用户决策成本，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Pre-selecting most meals reduces decision cost and improves completion rate

design_highlights.cn: 按天分组展示给用户掌控感，可灵活调整计划
design_highlights.en: Day-grouped display gives users control and flexibility to adjust plans

product_insight.cn: 采用默认全选策略配合可视化日历布局，让用户快速确认而非从零配置，显著降低认知负担。分餐类型展示便于用户理解订阅价值和服务范围。
product_insight.en: Default-selected strategy with visual calendar layout enables quick confirmation rather than building from scratch, significantly reducing cognitive load. Meal type breakdown helps users understand subscription value.

core_function.cn: 收集用户厨房食材储备情况以个性化推荐食谱
core_function.en: Collect user kitchen stock level to personalize recipe recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 简洁单选列表设计，选中态使用蓝色填充圆圈突出视觉反馈
design_highlights.en: Clean radio button list with blue filled circle for clear selection feedback

design_highlights.cn: 分段式进度条显示当前步骤，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar shows current step, reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配有描述性副标题，帮助用户准确自我定位
design_highlights.en: Descriptive subtitles for each option help users accurately self-identify

product_insight.cn: 通过厨房储备分级评估，产品可智能过滤需要复杂调料的食谱，避免用户因缺少食材而放弃，提升食谱推荐的实用性和完成率
product_insight.en: By assessing kitchen stock levels, the app can filter out recipes requiring complex ingredients, preventing user drop-off and improving recipe completion rates

core_function.cn: 了解用户备孕营养补充情况并提供专业建议
core_function.en: Collect user supplement habits and provide professional preconception advice

design_highlights.cn: 选择"No"后展示温暖鼓励文案，避免用户产生负面情绪
design_highlights.en: Warm encouraging copy after selecting 'No' prevents negative user emotions

design_highlights.cn: 即时提供专业医学建议（400mcg叶酸），展现产品专业价值
design_highlights.en: Instant professional medical advice (400mcg folic acid) demonstrates expertise

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变展开卡片突出教育内容，形成视觉焦点
design_highlights.en: Pink gradient expanded card highlights educational content as visual focus

design_highlights.cn: 选项点击后直接展开详情，减少页面跳转提升体验
design_highlights.en: Options expand details on click, reducing page jumps for better UX

product_insight.cn: 在数据收集环节植入健康教育内容，既完成用户画像建立，又通过专业建议建立信任，为后续提醒功能埋下使用场景的伏笔，转化自然不突兀。
product_insight.en: Embedding health education during data collection builds user profiles while establishing trust through expert advice, naturally setting up future reminder features.

core_function.cn: 收集用户烹饪技能水平以提供个性化内容
core_function.en: Collect user cooking skill level for personalized content

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的单选卡片设计，选中状态用蓝色勾选和边框强调
design_highlights.en: Clear radio card design with blue checkmark and border for selected state

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配有描述性副标题，帮助用户准确自我定位
design_highlights.en: Each option has descriptive subtitle to help users accurately self-identify

design_highlights.cn: 从Novice到Advanced的渐进式选项设计，无评判感，降低用户心理压力
design_highlights.en: Progressive options from Novice to Advanced without judgment, reducing user anxiety

product_insight.cn: 通过技能分级收集用户能力数据，为后续推荐匹配难度的食谱奠定基础。4个清晰层级覆盖全用户群体，副文案消除选择困惑，提升数据准确性和用户体验。
product_insight.en: Skill level collection enables recipe difficulty matching. Four clear tiers cover all users, with subtitle descriptions reducing selection confusion and improving data accuracy.

design_highlights.cn: 多选机制允许用户灵活选择多种购物方式
design_highlights.en: Multi-select mechanism allows flexible choice of multiple shopping methods

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示流程进度，降低用户焦虑提升完成率

product_insight.en: Precisely segments users by shopping method, building data foundation for store and delivery recommendations. Simple direct questions reduce cognitive load

design_highlights.en: Each option includes explanatory text about real impact, reducing user decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 进度条分段显示当前步骤位置，用户清晰感知流程进度
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar shows current step position, users clearly perceive flow progress

product_insight.en: Collects lifestyle data through leftover preferences, balancing time cost and shopping complexity. Option design addresses different user needs, improving retention for personalized recommendations.

design_highlights.cn: 极简单选卡片设计，选中状态用蓝色边框和勾选图标清晰区分
design_highlights.en: Minimalist radio card design with clear blue border and checkmark for selected state

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配有说明文案，降低用户理解成本和决策负担

design_highlights.en: Copy hints at consequences (grocery list length) helping users make lifestyle-aligned choices

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示完成进度，降低用户放弃率
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows completion status reducing abandonment rate

product_insight.en: Collecting variety preference balances user expectations with execution difficulty. Three-tier options cover different user types, transparent subtexts build trust and improve acceptance of generated meal plans.

core_function.en: Collect user breakfast prep time preference for personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 极简单选列表设计，选中状态用蓝色圆形勾选清晰区分
design_highlights.en: Minimalist single-select list with clear blue checkmark for selected state

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项附带时间说明，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Each option includes time description to reduce user decision cost

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条显示流程进度，增强用户完成动力
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows flow progress, enhancing user completion motivation

design_highlights.cn: 问题式标题亲切自然，营造对话感体验
design_highlights.en: Question-style title creates friendly conversational experience

product_insight.cn: 通过时间维度细分用户早餐习惯，为后续餐食推荐提供精准数据支撑。三档选项设计（快速/基础/精致）覆盖主流场景，简化选择同时保证个性化颗粒度。
product_insight.en: Segments users by breakfast time preference for precise meal recommendations. Three-tier options (quick/basic/gourmet) cover mainstream scenarios while maintaining personalization granularity.

core_function.cn: 收集用户喜欢的水果以定制个性化餐食计划
core_function.en: Collect user fruit preferences to customize personalized meal plans

design_highlights.cn: 心形图标切换选中状态，交互直观且带有情感化设计
design_highlights.en: Heart icon toggles selection state, intuitive interaction with emotional design

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示当前步骤，降低用户流失焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows current step, reducing user anxiety and drop-off

design_highlights.cn: 问句式标题营造对话感，让用户感觉被尊重和个性化服务
design_highlights.en: Question-style title creates conversational tone, making users feel respected

product_insight.cn: 通过图片化多选降低决策成本，心形收藏设计暗示用户正在构建专属内容库。预选部分选项可引导用户快速行动，同时保留自主权。这种轻量化信息收集有效提升完成率。
product_insight.en: Image-based multi-select reduces decision cost. Heart icon implies building personal content library. Pre-selected options guide quick action while preserving autonomy. Lightweight data collection improves completion rate.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择默认力量训练时长偏好
core_function.en: Let users select default strength workout duration preference

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的单选卡片设计，选中态用实心圆点突出，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clear radio card design with solid dot for selected state, distinct visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配有描述性标签（Most popular/Best for...），降低决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Descriptive labels for each option reduce decision anxiety with social proof

design_highlights.cn: 默认选中中间选项45分钟并标注Most popular，利用从众心理引导选择
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected middle option marked 'Most popular' leverages social proof for conversion

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度条明确展示当前所处步骤，设置可修改预期减少用户压力
design_highlights.en: Top progress bar shows current step, changeable settings reduce user pressure

product_insight.en: Cleverly guides users to moderate duration via pre-selection and social proof labels, balancing effectiveness without intimidating newcomers. Emphasis on changeability reduces decision barrier.

core_function.cn: 收集用户购买杂货的频率偏好
core_function.en: Collect user grocery shopping frequency preference

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态采用蓝色边框+勾选图标，视觉反馈清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Selected state uses blue border with checkmark icon for clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计，选项间距合理，触控区域充足易于操作
design_highlights.en: Radio list design with proper spacing and adequate touch targets

design_highlights.cn: 顶部分段式进度条展示流程进度，降低用户放弃率
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar at top shows flow progress to reduce abandonment

design_highlights.cn: 问题文案简洁直白，无压迫感，营造轻松填写氛围
design_highlights.en: Simple and direct question copy creates relaxed filling atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 通过收集购物频率数据，产品可精准推荐购物计划和优惠时机。分段进度条设计让用户预知流程长度，4个频率选项覆盖主流场景且不会造成选择困难。
product_insight.en: Collecting shopping frequency enables personalized shopping plans and deal timing. Segmented progress bar helps users anticipate flow length. Four frequency options cover main scenarios without causing decision fatigue.

core_function.cn: 了解伴侣是否参与备孕准备，提供个性化建议
core_function.en: Assess partner's involvement in conception preparation and provide personalized advice

design_highlights.cn: 选中选项即时展示教育性内容，消除认知盲区并传递关怀
design_highlights.en: Selected option instantly reveals educational content, addressing knowledge gaps with care

design_highlights.cn: 内嵌式信息展开设计，无需跳转即可获取深度内容
design_highlights.en: Inline expandable information design provides depth without page navigation

design_highlights.cn: 粉色高亮选中状态与白色未选形成清晰对比，视觉层级分明
design_highlights.en: Pink highlighted selection contrasts with white options for clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 包容性选项设计涵盖多种家庭形态，提升用户覆盖率
design_highlights.en: Inclusive options covering various family situations improve user coverage

product_insight.cn: 通过问卷即时教育用户「伴侣健康同样重要」的理念，将数据收集转化为价值传递时刻。选项设计充分考虑单身、LGBTQ+等多元群体，体现产品包容性，有效扩大目标用户群。
product_insight.en: Transforms data collection into value delivery by educating users that partner health matters equally. Inclusive options for single users and diverse family structures effectively expand target audience.

core_function.cn: 展示专家答疑功能，引导用户了解匿名提问服务
core_function.en: Showcase expert Q&A feature and anonymous question service

design_highlights.en: Chat bubble design simulates real conversation with doctor avatar for credibility

design_highlights.cn: 展示敏感话题问题（PCOS、体位）降低用户提问心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Displaying sensitive questions reduces psychological barrier for users to ask

design_highlights.cn: 医生真实身份展示（Dr. Allison Rodgers, OBG-YN）建立专业信任感
design_highlights.en: Real doctor identity display builds professional trust and authority

design_highlights.cn: 打字指示器动画暗示即时回复体验，增强互动期待
design_highlights.en: Typing indicator animation implies instant response experience

product_insight.cn: 通过模拟聊天界面展示功能，让用户直观感受匿名问诊体验。选择备孕敏感话题作为示例问题，精准击中目标用户痛点，同时强调匿名性消除隐私顾虑，有效提升功能吸引力。
product_insight.en: Simulated chat interface lets users experience anonymous consultation intuitively. Sensitive fertility questions target user pain points while emphasizing anonymity to address privacy concerns.

core_function.cn: 展示日历功能并引导用户记录经期数据
core_function.en: Showcase calendar feature and guide users to log period dates

design_highlights.en: Soft pink theme with cyan ovulation marker, colors aligned with feminine health product

design_highlights.cn: 98%用户成功率的社交证明数据增强产品可信度
design_highlights.en: 98% success rate social proof enhances product credibility

design_highlights.cn: 示例数据标注降低用户认知负担，直观展示功能价值
design_highlights.en: Sample data annotation reduces cognitive load and demonstrates feature value

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮聚焦用户注意力，降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button focuses attention and reduces decision cost

product_insight.cn: 通过可视化日历预览和成功数据背书双重策略，在用户输入数据前建立信任和期待，注释说明透明披露数据来源增强专业可信度
product_insight.en: Dual strategy of visual calendar preview and success data endorsement builds trust before data input; transparent footnote disclosure enhances professional credibility

core_function.en: Showcase pregnancy tracking feature and its value to users

design_highlights.en: 3D fetal development illustration with warm gradient tones creates maternal care atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 文案使用'Stay supported'传递陪伴感，降低孕期焦虑
design_highlights.en: Copy uses 'Stay supported' to convey companionship and reduce pregnancy anxiety

design_highlights.en: Shows specific feature preview (calendar + weeks) to demonstrate product value upfront

design_highlights.cn: 粉色CTA按钮与整体色调统一，'Good to know!'文案轻松友好
design_highlights.en: Pink CTA button matches overall tone, 'Good to know!' copy feels casual and friendly

product_insight.cn: 经期追踪App通过展示孕期功能，延长用户生命周期价值。用模拟界面预览降低认知成本，情感化文案建立信任，为用户从备孕到孕期的自然转化做铺垫。
product_insight.en: Period tracking app extends user LTV by showcasing pregnancy features. Simulated interface preview reduces cognitive load, emotional copy builds trust, preparing for natural transition from fertility tracking to pregnancy.

core_function.cn: 介绍性行为记录功能的核心价值和用途
core_function.en: Introduce the value and purpose of sex logging feature

design_highlights.cn: 柔和粉色背景配合简洁线性图标，营造私密舒适的视觉氛围
design_highlights.en: Soft pink background with minimal line icons creates intimate and comfortable visual atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 底部滑动上拉交互，降低敏感功能的操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Swipe up gesture reduces interaction barrier for sensitive feature

design_highlights.cn: 文案直接坦诚，用价值导向消除用户对隐私话题的顾虑
design_highlights.en: Direct and honest copy uses value proposition to ease user concerns about private topics

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的两点价值陈述，快速传达功能收益促进转化
design_highlights.en: Clear two-point value statement quickly conveys benefits to drive conversion

product_insight.cn: 针对敏感健康数据记录，通过价值前置策略消除用户心理障碍。先说明记录目的（受孕概率、生育追踪），再引导操作，让用户理解数据收集的意义，提升功能采纳率。
product_insight.en: For sensitive health data logging, uses value-first strategy to overcome user hesitation. Explaining purpose before action helps users understand data collection meaning, improving feature adoption.

core_function.cn: 引导用户同步睡眠数据，展示进食时间对睡眠的影响
core_function.en: Guide users to sync sleep data and show meal timing impact on rest

design_highlights.en: Blue-purple gradient with star decorations creates nighttime sleep atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式食物日志展示，用皇冠图标暗示优质饮食习惯
design_highlights.en: Card-style food log with crown icon implies premium eating habits

design_highlights.cn: 底部权限引导按钮结合价值说明，降低授权心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Permission button with value explanation reduces authorization resistance

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器显示引导进度，提供清晰导航预期

product_insight.en: Showing specific meal timing scenarios helps users understand data sync value before requesting permissions, improving authorization rates through value-first approach

core_function.en: Assess user's diet status and provide personalized feedback with nutrition guidance

design_highlights.cn: 选项即时反馈设计，选择后展开正向鼓励文案和产品价值说明
design_highlights.en: Immediate positive feedback upon selection with expanded encouragement and value proposition

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变卡片突出已选状态，视觉层次清晰引导用户注意力

product_insight.en: Cleverly ties user self-assessment to product value - every answer leads to Flo's nutrition services. Positive feedback builds confidence while reinforcing expertise, setting up future conversion.
