design_highlights.cn: 粉色高亮已选项并展示答案，状态反馈清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Pink highlight on selected option with answer reveals clear visual feedback

product_insight.cn: 将FAQ融入引导流程是精妙设计——既收集用户关注点用于个性化推荐，又即时提供价值建立信任，同时筛选出高意向用户。"不备孕"选项更是精准分流用户的巧思。
product_insight.en: Embedding FAQ into onboarding is brilliant—it collects user interests for personalization, delivers instant value to build trust, and filters high-intent users. The 'not trying to conceive' option cleverly segments users.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化内容准备过程，预览可用资源
core_function.en: Display personalization process while previewing available content resources

design_highlights.cn: 柔和粉紫色系插画卡片，温馨友好的女性健康视觉风格
design_highlights.en: Soft pink-purple illustration cards creating warm, friendly feminine health visual style

design_highlights.cn: "daily personalized insights"强调专属定制感，提升用户期待
design_highlights.en: "Daily personalized insights" emphasizes customization, building user anticipation

design_highlights.cn: 环形进度条配合状态文案，将等待转化为价值感知时刻
design_highlights.en: Circular progress with status text transforms waiting into value perception moment

design_highlights.cn: 加载期间预览内容卡片，提前展示产品价值减少流失
design_highlights.en: Content card preview during loading showcases product value to reduce abandonment

product_insight.cn: 巧妙利用加载等待时间展示内容预览，既缓解用户焦虑又提前建立价值认知。卡片式内容布局暗示丰富资源，环形进度条给予明确预期，是提升转化的优秀过渡页设计。
product_insight.en: Cleverly uses loading time to preview content, reducing anxiety while building value perception. Card layout hints at rich resources, circular progress sets clear expectations—excellent transitional design for conversion.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化处理进度，传达产品核心价值
core_function.en: Display personalization progress while communicating core product value

design_highlights.cn: 极简灰白配色搭配粉色进度环，视觉焦点明确
design_highlights.en: Minimalist gray-white palette with pink progress ring creates clear visual focus

design_highlights.cn: 以私密问题示例传达产品的安全感和信任感
design_highlights.en: Intimate question example conveys safety and trust for sensitive topics

design_highlights.cn: 加载等待时间转化为价值传递机会，强化用户期待
design_highlights.en: Loading time converted to value communication opportunity, building user anticipation

design_highlights.cn: 动态进度百分比提供明确的等待反馈
design_highlights.en: Dynamic percentage provides clear waiting feedback

product_insight.cn: 将技术加载时间转化为营销触点，通过"私密问题"场景示例精准击中目标用户痛点，搜索框设计暗示AI问答能力，降低敏感话题咨询门槛。
product_insight.en: Transforms technical loading into marketing touchpoint. Intimate question example precisely targets user pain points, search bar design implies AI Q&A capability, lowering barriers for sensitive topic inquiries.

core_function.cn: 展示ISO认证建立信任，同时进行个性化配置加载
core_function.en: Display ISO certification to build trust while loading personalized configuration

design_highlights.cn: 粉色盾牌徽章设计与品牌调性一致，金色丝带突出认证信息
design_highlights.en: Pink shield badge matches brand identity, golden ribbon highlights certification

design_highlights.cn: 将等待时间转化为信任建设机会，"Know your data is safe"传递安全感
design_highlights.en: Transforms waiting time into trust-building opportunity with reassuring copy

design_highlights.cn: 环形进度条显示98%即将完成，降低用户焦虑提升留存
design_highlights.en: Circular progress at 98% reduces anxiety and improves retention

design_highlights.cn: 个性化加载文案暗示后续体验将被定制，提升期待感
design_highlights.en: Personalization loading text hints at customized experience ahead

product_insight.cn: 巧妙利用加载等待时间展示ISO 27001认证，解决用户对健康类App数据隐私的核心顾虑。将技术等待转化为品牌信任建设时刻，是极佳的用户体验优化策略。
product_insight.en: Cleverly uses loading time to display ISO 27001 certification, addressing core privacy concerns for health apps. Transforms technical wait into brand trust-building moment - excellent UX optimization strategy.

core_function.cn: 展示推荐零食方案并生成最终计划
core_function.en: Display recommended snacks and finalize personalized plan

design_highlights.cn: 柔和蓝色加载动画配合半透明遮罩，传达处理进行中的状态
design_highlights.en: Soft blue loading animation with translucent overlay conveys processing state

design_highlights.cn: 可调整配对选项给予用户修改控制权，增强个性化体验
design_highlights.en: Adjust pairing options give users modification control for personalization

design_highlights.cn: 'Finalizing plan'文案营造期待感，暗示即将获得专属方案
design_highlights.en: Finalizing plan copy creates anticipation for personalized results

design_highlights.cn: 展示具体卡路里数值增强方案可信度和专业感
design_highlights.en: Displaying calorie values enhances plan credibility and professionalism

product_insight.cn: 将计划生成与内容预览结合，让用户在等待时看到即将获得的价值，减少焦虑感。食物图片和卡路里标注增强真实感和可信度，推动用户完成最后一步。
product_insight.en: Combining plan generation with content preview shows value during wait time, reducing anxiety. Food images and calorie labels enhance authenticity and credibility to drive completion.

core_function.cn: 展示系统正在为用户优化个性化健身计划
core_function.en: Display system optimizing personalized fitness schedule for user

design_highlights.cn: 火焰运动鞋插画生动传达速度与运动感，品牌调性鲜明
design_highlights.en: Flaming sneaker illustration vividly conveys speed and athleticism with strong brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 文案暗示系统正在智能工作，营造专属定制的价值感
design_highlights.en: Copy implies intelligent system working, creating sense of exclusive customization

design_highlights.cn: 珊瑚色进度条清晰展示加载状态，减少用户等待焦虑
design_highlights.en: Coral progress bar clearly shows loading status, reducing user waiting anxiety

product_insight.cn: 通过加载等待界面强化个性化计算的价值感知，让用户理解系统正在为其量身定制计划，将技术延迟转化为产品价值展示机会，提升用户对结果的期待与信任
product_insight.en: Loading screen reinforces perception of personalized calculation value, transforming technical delay into product value showcase opportunity, building user anticipation and trust in results

core_function.cn: 收集用户睡眠问题偏好以提供个性化内容
core_function.en: Collect user sleep concerns to provide personalized content

design_highlights.cn: 极简灰白配色，营造安静助眠的视觉氛围
design_highlights.en: Minimalist gray-white palette creates calm sleep-friendly atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计简化决策，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Single-select list simplifies decision-making and reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 开篇说明睡眠与受孕关联，建立功能价值认知
design_highlights.en: Opening statement links sleep to conception, establishing feature value

design_highlights.cn: 提供'我睡得好'选项尊重用户，避免强制参与
design_highlights.en: Offering 'I sleep well' option respects users and avoids forced engagement

product_insight.cn: 将睡眠功能与核心受孕目标关联，提升功能使用动机。通过问卷预筛选用户需求，为后续推送精准内容奠定基础，同时保留跳过路径降低流失率。
product_insight.en: Links sleep features to core conception goal, boosting motivation. Pre-screens user needs for personalized content delivery while skip option reduces drop-off.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择喜欢的蔬菜用于定制餐食计划
core_function.en: Let users select preferred vegetables for customized meal plans

design_highlights.cn: 高质量美食摄影配合卡片布局，真实展现食材烹饪后的效果，增强食欲感
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography with card layout showcases cooked ingredients realistically

design_highlights.cn: 心形收藏按钮交互直观，已选状态用蓝色填充明确区分，支持多选
design_highlights.en: Heart-shaped favorite buttons with blue fill for selected state, supporting multi-select

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示引导流程进度，降低用户流失率，提升完成意愿
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows onboarding progress, reducing drop-off and improving completion rate

design_highlights.cn: 展示烹饪后的成品而非原材料，让用户对未来餐食产生期待
design_highlights.en: Showing cooked dishes instead of raw ingredients creates anticipation for future meals

product_insight.cn: 通过收集蔬菜偏好实现个性化推荐，图文并茂的选项设计降低认知负担。预选部分热门选项（如西蓝花、芦笋）可加速决策，同时为用户提供定制感。
product_insight.en: Collects vegetable preferences for personalization. Visual options reduce cognitive load. Pre-selecting popular items speeds decision-making while maintaining customization feel.

core_function.cn: 收集用户喜爱或不喜爱的菜系偏好
core_function.en: Collect user preferences for liked or disliked cuisines

design_highlights.cn: 点赞/点踩双向选择机制，支持喜欢、不喜欢和中立三种状态
design_highlights.en: Thumbs up/down dual-choice mechanism supporting like, dislike and neutral states

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的列表布局，每个选项右侧统一放置操作图标，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clear list layout with consistent icon placement on right side, well-defined visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 友好的问题措辞'really love—or really don't love'降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Friendly wording 'really love—or really don't love' reduces user decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示当前步骤，减少用户流失焦虑
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows current step, reducing user dropout anxiety

product_insight.cn: 采用非强制的三态选择（喜欢/不喜欢/跳过）降低用户决策负担，蓝色图标填充状态清晰反馈已选项，菜系分类覆盖主流类型便于后续精准推荐，是饮食类App个性化推荐的经典设计模式。
product_insight.en: Non-mandatory tri-state selection reduces cognitive load. Blue filled icons provide clear feedback. Cuisine categories cover mainstream types for personalized recommendations, a classic pattern for diet apps.

core_function.cn: 通过用户对食谱的喜好评分收集口味偏好数据
core_function.en: Collect taste preferences by rating recipes users like or dislike

design_highlights.cn: 高质量美食图片占据视觉焦点，激发食欲和参与欲望
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography dominates visual focus, stimulating appetite and engagement

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的二元选择（喜欢/不喜欢）降低决策负担，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Simple binary choice (Like/Dislike) reduces decision burden and improves completion rate

design_highlights.cn: 展示卡路里信息建立健康饮食意识，强化产品专业定位
design_highlights.en: Displaying calorie info builds health awareness and reinforces professional positioning

design_highlights.cn: 分段进度条清晰展示完成进度，激励用户继续完成引导
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar clearly shows completion status, motivating users to continue

product_insight.cn: 采用Tinder式滑动评分机制收集用户偏好，通过视觉化食物展示降低问卷疲劳感。卡路里标注在早期建立用户对健康数据的认知，为后续功能使用做铺垫。
product_insight.en: Tinder-style rating mechanism collects preferences while visual food display reduces survey fatigue. Calorie labels establish early health data awareness, preparing users for core features.

core_function.cn: 通过滑块收集用户对饮食计划各因素的重视程度
core_function.en: Collect user priorities for meal plan factors via sliders

design_highlights.cn: 滑块式评分替代传统单选，交互更直观且支持精细化程度表达
design_highlights.en: Slider-based rating replaces radio buttons for intuitive and granular input

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色填充进度与灰色轨道形成清晰对比，状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Blue fill contrasts with gray track for clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示重要程度标签（Less/Important/Very important），降低决策认知负担
design_highlights.en: Real-time importance labels reduce cognitive load during decision making

design_highlights.cn: 预设合理默认值，用户只需微调，提升完成意愿
design_highlights.en: Reasonable default values let users fine-tune rather than start from scratch

product_insight.cn: 通过连续变量采集替代离散选项，获取更精准的用户偏好数据，为推荐算法提供加权参数。多维度同屏展示让用户产生全面掌控感，提升对个性化结果的期待值。
product_insight.en: Continuous slider input captures nuanced preferences for weighted recommendation algorithms. Showing all factors on one screen gives users sense of control and builds expectations for personalized results.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择偏好的生蔬菜以定制膳食计划
core_function.en: Let users select preferred raw veggies for customized meal plans

design_highlights.cn: 采用真实食物摄影的卡片布局，视觉吸引力强，帮助用户直观识别食材
design_highlights.en: Card layout with real food photography creates visual appeal and helps users identify ingredients intuitively

design_highlights.cn: 心形图标点选交互，已选状态实心蓝色，未选为空心，反馈清晰明确
design_highlights.en: Heart icon tap interaction with solid blue for selected and outline for unselected, clear feedback

design_highlights.cn: 问题措辞亲切自然，使用'would you like'营造友好对话感
design_highlights.en: Friendly question wording using 'would you like' creates conversational and welcoming tone

design_highlights.cn: 进度条显示接近完成，激励用户继续完成偏好设置流程
design_highlights.en: Progress bar shows near completion, motivating users to finish preference setup

product_insight.cn: 通过收集具体食材偏好而非笼统分类，实现高度个性化膳食推荐。心形收藏交互降低选择压力，瀑布流卡片展示提升浏览效率，为后续精准推荐奠定数据基础。
product_insight.en: Collecting specific ingredient preferences enables highly personalized meal recommendations. Heart-based selection reduces decision pressure while card layout improves browsing efficiency for precise future recommendations.

core_function.cn: 收集用户对生蔬菜的喜好以定制膳食计划
core_function.en: Collect user raw vegetable preferences to customize meal plans

design_highlights.cn: 高清食材图片配合卡片布局，直观展示选项，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: High-quality food images with card layout for intuitive visual presentation

design_highlights.cn: 心形图标点击收藏，确认弹窗防止误操作，交互反馈清晰
design_highlights.en: Heart icon for favoriting with confirmation modal to prevent accidental actions

design_highlights.cn: 限制选项确认弹窗说明原因，透明化算法逻辑增强用户信任
design_highlights.en: Confirmation modal explains limited options rationale, building user trust

design_highlights.cn: 弹窗文案"We'll stick to"体现个性化承诺，让用户感受被尊重
design_highlights.en: Copy 'We'll stick to' conveys personalized commitment, making users feel respected

product_insight.cn: 通过限制选项确认弹窗，既尊重用户选择又引导合理预期，避免后期因推荐内容不符产生流失。图文结合的多选模式降低决策成本，提升引导完成率。
product_insight.en: Confirmation modal respects user choices while setting expectations, reducing churn from mismatched recommendations. Visual multi-select reduces decision fatigue and improves onboarding completion.

core_function.cn: 通过长按交互让用户对备孕目标做出仪式感承诺
core_function.en: Create ritualistic commitment to pregnancy goal via long-press interaction

design_highlights.cn: 第一人称承诺文案「I, Julia, will use Flo to...」增强个人代入感和责任感
design_highlights.en: First-person commitment statement enhances personal ownership and accountability

design_highlights.cn: 长按Logo完成承诺的创新交互，增加仪式感和用户投入度
design_highlights.en: Long-press logo interaction creates ritual and increases user investment

design_highlights.cn: 柔和粉色背景配合呼吸光晕动效，营造温暖安心的情感氛围
design_highlights.en: Soft pink background with pulsing glow creates warm, reassuring emotional atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 承诺机制利用心理学一致性原则，提升后续付费和留存转化
design_highlights.en: Commitment mechanism leverages psychological consistency to boost retention and conversion

product_insight.cn: 借鉴行为心理学的承诺一致性原则，通过个性化承诺仪式让用户产生心理契约，这种设计显著提升用户对目标的投入度和长期留存率，值得健康类App借鉴。
product_insight.en: Leverages commitment-consistency principle from behavioral psychology. Personalized ritual creates psychological contract, significantly boosting goal investment and long-term retention. Valuable pattern for health apps.

core_function.cn: 设置每餐需要准备的用餐人数
core_function.en: Set the number of servings for each meal

design_highlights.cn: 极简卡片式布局，三餐分类清晰，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Minimalist card layout with clear meal categorization and visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 加减按钮数字选择器直观易用，降低输入成本
design_highlights.en: Plus/minus stepper controls are intuitive and reduce input friction

design_highlights.cn: 默认值为1人，符合单身用户场景预期
design_highlights.en: Default value of 1 aligns with single-user scenario expectations

product_insight.cn: 通过分餐别收集人数信息，实现精准食材用量计算和菜谱推荐。步骤进度条显示已过半，降低用户放弃率。数据颗粒度设计体现产品对个性化饮食规划的重视。
product_insight.en: Collecting per-meal servings enables precise ingredient calculation and recipe recommendations. Progress bar past halfway reduces abandonment. Granular data collection shows commitment to personalized meal planning.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化减重目标和预期达成时间
core_function.en: Display personalized weight loss goal with expected achievement date

design_highlights.cn: 山峰登顶插图隐喻目标达成，旗帜象征胜利终点
design_highlights.en: Mountain summit illustration metaphors goal achievement, flag symbolizes victory

design_highlights.cn: 具体数字+时间节点增强承诺感，附加"美味餐食"降低心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Specific numbers and timeline enhance commitment, 'delicious meals' reduces psychological barrier

design_highlights.cn: 将抽象目标转化为具体可视化承诺，提升用户完成引导流程的动力
design_highlights.en: Transforms abstract goals into concrete visual commitments, boosting onboarding completion

product_insight.cn: 通过个性化计算结果展示APP价值，用具体数字(7kg)和明确时间点(September)建立用户期待，山峰隐喻让减重旅程可视化，同时强调"美味餐食"消除用户对节食的恐惧
product_insight.en: Demonstrates app value through personalized calculations, specific numbers and timeline build expectations. Mountain metaphor visualizes the journey while 'delicious meals' eliminates diet fear

core_function.cn: 汇总展示用户已设置的饮食偏好和限制条件
core_function.en: Summarize user's dietary preferences and restrictions before proceeding

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色图标+卡片式布局，清晰分类展示四大偏好维度
design_highlights.en: Blue icons with card layout clearly categorize four preference dimensions

design_highlights.cn: 「No more busywork」情感化文案减轻用户心理负担，传递便捷价值
design_highlights.en: Emotional copy like 'No more busywork' reduces anxiety and conveys convenience

design_highlights.cn: 过敏提醒加粗显示并附安全声明，建立用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Bold allergy warnings with safety disclaimer builds user trust

design_highlights.cn: 信息分层展示：标题+详细说明，降低认知负载
design_highlights.en: Layered information with titles and descriptions reduces cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 在用户完成信息收集后用确认页汇总展示，既能让用户感受到个性化价值，又能提升数据准确性认知，同时通过预告功能（grocery list）提前建立期待感，是提升转化的关键节点设计。
product_insight.en: Summary page after data collection reinforces personalization value, improves perceived accuracy, and builds anticipation for features like grocery lists - a key conversion touchpoint design.

core_function.cn: 引导用户通过搜索功能补充餐食扫描遗漏的食物
core_function.en: Guide users to add missed foods via search after meal scanning

design_highlights.cn: 手机模拟器展示真实搜索界面，沉浸式预览功能
design_highlights.en: Phone mockup displays real search interface for immersive preview

design_highlights.cn: 智能搜索建议实时显示，包含相关食物和品牌
design_highlights.en: Smart search suggestions display related foods and brands in real-time

design_highlights.cn: "may not find it all...yet!"文案承认局限性，建立真诚信任感
design_highlights.en: Copy acknowledges limitations honestly, building authentic trust

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器显示引导进度，降低用户流失焦虑
design_highlights.en: Pagination dots show progress, reducing user drop-off anxiety

product_insight.cn: 将AI扫描功能的局限性转化为用户参与机会，通过展示强大的搜索补充能力，既管理用户预期又展示产品深度，提升用户对工具完整性的信心
product_insight.en: Transforms AI scanning limitations into engagement opportunity, managing expectations while showcasing search depth to build confidence in tool completeness

core_function.cn: 展示AI识别的餐食明细，一键批量记录
core_function.en: Display AI-detected meal items and batch log with one tap

design_highlights.cn: 手机实景展示配合底部说明卡片，真实演示产品使用场景
design_highlights.en: Real device mockup with explanation card creates authentic product demonstration

design_highlights.cn: 扫描识别后自动汇总多项食物，支持单项删除编辑
design_highlights.en: Auto-aggregates scanned items with individual delete/edit capability

design_highlights.cn: 黄色醒目CTA按钮'Log Meal'降低记录门槛，强化一键完成体验
design_highlights.en: Prominent yellow 'Log Meal' CTA reduces friction and emphasizes one-tap completion

design_highlights.cn: 'Ta-da!'趣味文案配合sparkle表情，增强完成感和愉悦感
design_highlights.en: 'Ta-da!' playful copy with sparkle emoji enhances accomplishment and delight

product_insight.cn: 通过展示完整的扫描结果列表，向用户证明AI识别的准确性和全面性，同时批量记录功能大幅降低用户手动输入负担，这是饮食追踪App留存的关键设计
product_insight.en: Showcasing complete scan results validates AI accuracy while batch logging significantly reduces manual input burden - crucial design for diet tracking app retention

core_function.cn: 展示并允许用户替换不喜欢的午餐推荐
core_function.en: Display and allow users to swap unwanted lunch recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 食物缩略图配合餐食信息，视觉层次清晰，卡路里信息一目了然
design_highlights.en: Food thumbnails with meal info create clear visual hierarchy, calories at a glance

design_highlights.cn: 双向箭头图标暗示可替换操作，降低用户学习成本
design_highlights.en: Swap arrows icon intuitively indicates replaceable action, reducing learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 标注餐食日期（Mon-Wed）让用户感受到个性化周计划的用心
design_highlights.en: Date labels (Mon-Wed) convey personalized weekly planning care

design_highlights.cn: 允许用户自主选择增强控制感，提升后续使用意愿
design_highlights.en: User control over choices increases engagement and retention intent

product_insight.cn: 通过让用户审核并替换推荐餐食，既展示了算法能力又给予用户控制权，这种「推荐+可调整」模式有效平衡了效率与个性化，减少用户对系统推荐的抵触心理。
product_insight.en: Review-and-swap model balances algorithm efficiency with user control, showcasing AI capability while reducing resistance to system recommendations through personalization.

core_function.cn: 展示AI生成的晚餐计划，支持一键替换不喜欢的菜品
core_function.en: Display AI-generated dinner plans with one-tap swap for disliked meals

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局搭配真实菜品图片，增强食欲感和信任度
design_highlights.en: Card layout with real food photos enhances appetite appeal and credibility

design_highlights.cn: 双箭头交换图标直观暗示可替换操作，降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Swap arrow icon intuitively indicates replaceable action, reducing learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 名人菜谱（Sarah Michelle Gellar）增加趣味性和社交话题
design_highlights.en: Celebrity recipe adds fun factor and social conversation starter

design_highlights.cn: 显示卡路里信息强化健康价值主张，提升用户信任
design_highlights.en: Calorie display reinforces health value proposition and builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 通过先展示AI推荐结果再允许修改的模式，既展示产品智能化能力，又给予用户控制感。日期分组显示体现计划的实用性，名人菜谱是差异化亮点。
product_insight.en: Show-then-edit pattern demonstrates AI capability while giving users control. Date grouping shows practicality, celebrity recipes create differentiation.

core_function.cn: 让用户审核并编辑推荐的碳水化合物搭配方案
core_function.en: Allow users to review and edit recommended carbohydrate pairings

design_highlights.cn: 食物图片与卡片式布局清晰展示每个碳水选项，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Food images with card layout clearly display each carb option with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 双向箭头图标暗示可替换，配对信息可展开查看详情
design_highlights.en: Swap arrows indicate replaceability, paired info expandable for details

design_highlights.cn: 文案'Edit anything that doesn't sound good'降低决策压力，鼓励个性化
design_highlights.en: Copy 'Edit anything that doesn't sound good' reduces pressure and encourages personalization

design_highlights.cn: 显示卡路里帮助用户做出健康决策，增强产品专业可信度
design_highlights.en: Calorie display helps healthy decisions and builds product credibility

product_insight.cn: 通过审核机制让用户参与餐食定制，展示配对关系增强方案完整性感知，可替换设计既保持AI推荐效率又给予用户控制感，提升方案接受度
product_insight.en: Review mechanism involves users in meal customization. Pairing display enhances plan completeness perception. Swap design balances AI efficiency with user control, improving plan acceptance

core_function.cn: 展示并编辑系统推荐的蔬菜及其搭配方案
core_function.en: Review and edit recommended vegetables with meal pairings

design_highlights.cn: 真实食物图片配合卡片式布局，直观呈现食材选项
design_highlights.en: Real food photos with card layout for intuitive ingredient display

design_highlights.cn: 双向箭头图标暗示可替换功能，降低用户学习成本
design_highlights.en: Swap icon indicates replacement option, reducing learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 友好文案'不合口味就编辑'降低修改心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy 'edit what doesn't sound good' reduces editing hesitation

design_highlights.cn: 显示热量信息帮助用户做出健康决策，增强产品专业感
design_highlights.en: Calorie display aids health decisions and enhances professional credibility

product_insight.cn: 将系统推荐与用户编辑权结合，既展现AI智能配餐能力，又给予用户掌控感。通过餐点搭配预览让用户提前看到完整膳食规划，提升方案接受度。
product_insight.en: Combines AI recommendations with user editing power, showcasing smart meal planning while giving users control. Meal pairing preview increases plan acceptance.

core_function.cn: 确认并编辑系统推荐的水果选择
core_function.en: Review and edit system-recommended fruit selection

design_highlights.cn: 简洁卡片设计，水果图片配合热量信息一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clean card design with fruit image and calorie info at a glance

design_highlights.cn: 替换按钮和调整配对选项提供灵活的修改入口
design_highlights.en: Swap button and adjust pairing option provide flexible modification entry

design_highlights.cn: 文案'Edit anything that doesn't sound good'降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Copy 'Edit anything that doesn't sound good' reduces user decision pressure

product_insight.cn: 在个性化推荐后增加确认环节，既展示AI能力又尊重用户自主权。通过低门槛的修改选项，平衡系统智能与用户控制感，提升方案接受度和满意度。
product_insight.en: Adding confirmation step after personalized recommendation showcases AI capability while respecting user autonomy. Low-barrier modification options balance system intelligence with user control, improving acceptance.

core_function.cn: 让用户审核并调整推荐的零食选项
core_function.en: Allow users to review and adjust recommended snack options

design_highlights.cn: 食物图片与文字信息清晰搭配，卡片式布局层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clear pairing of food images with text info, well-structured card layout

design_highlights.cn: 双向箭头图标暗示可替换，点击展开调整配对选项
design_highlights.en: Swap icon indicates replaceability, expandable pairing adjustment options

design_highlights.cn: 友好文案'Edit anything that doesn't sound good'降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy reduces decision pressure by encouraging edits

design_highlights.cn: 预选推荐方案降低用户操作成本，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected recommendations reduce effort and boost completion rate

product_insight.cn: 采用'先推荐后调整'策略，通过预填充降低用户认知负担。展示卡路里信息强化健康饮食心智，替换功能给予用户控制感而不失效率。
product_insight.en: Uses 'recommend-then-adjust' strategy with pre-filled options to reduce cognitive load. Calorie display reinforces health mindset while swap feature balances user control with efficiency.

core_function.cn: 让用户勾选已有食材，便于生成个性化购物清单
core_function.en: Check off available ingredients to generate personalized shopping list

design_highlights.cn: 分类分组设计，国际调料与香料清晰区分，视觉层次明确
design_highlights.en: Grouped categories with clear visual hierarchy separating international and herbs sections

design_highlights.cn: 已选中项目呈灰色淡化状态，视觉反馈直观表达'已拥有'
design_highlights.en: Checked items appear grayed out, providing intuitive visual feedback for owned items

design_highlights.cn: 显示具体用量（如2½ tbsp），减少用户估算焦虑
design_highlights.en: Showing specific quantities reduces user anxiety about ingredient estimation

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色醒目Next按钮固定底部，推动用户完成流程
design_highlights.en: Prominent blue Next button fixed at bottom drives flow completion

product_insight.cn: 通过反向勾选（标记已有而非缺少）降低用户认知负担，同时收集用户厨房数据为个性化推荐和智能购物清单打下基础，体现以用户便利为核心的设计思维
product_insight.en: Reverse checking (marking what you have vs. need) reduces cognitive load while collecting kitchen data for personalization and smart shopping lists, showing user-centric design thinking

core_function.cn: 教用户如何通过记录食物来追踪营养目标
core_function.en: Teach users to log food for tracking nutrition goals

design_highlights.cn: 弧形进度条设计直观展示完成状态，蓝色主色调传递健康积极感
design_highlights.en: Curved progress bar visually shows completion, blue theme conveys health positivity

design_highlights.cn: 模拟真实任务列表交互，勾选项提供即时反馈增强操作感知
design_highlights.en: Simulates real task list interaction, checkmark provides instant feedback

design_highlights.cn: "Final push, let's go"激励文案营造冲刺感，降低用户放弃概率
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy creates urgency, reducing user drop-off probability

design_highlights.cn: 提供Skip选项降低压迫感，同时突出Next按钮引导完成流程
design_highlights.en: Skip option reduces pressure while prominent Next button guides completion

product_insight.cn: 通过模拟实际操作场景让用户预体验核心功能，结合进度可视化和激励文案形成"承诺一致性"心理，提升后续留存率。值得借鉴的是将枯燥的教程包装成成就任务。
product_insight.en: Simulates actual feature usage for pre-experience, combines progress visualization with motivational copy for commitment consistency. Notable approach: packaging tutorials as achievement tasks.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择本周要专注培养的健康习惯
core_function.en: Let users select a health habit to focus on this week

design_highlights.cn: Emoji图标直观表达每个习惯类型，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Emoji icons intuitively represent each habit type, reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态带蓝色边框和展开描述，清晰反馈选择结果
design_highlights.en: Selected state with blue border and expanded description provides clear feedback

design_highlights.cn: 附带激励性说明文案，传达习惯带来的好处
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy explains benefits of the selected habit

design_highlights.cn: 单选设计降低决策压力，7天周期设定降低承诺门槛
design_highlights.en: Single selection reduces decision burden, 7-day cycle lowers commitment threshold

product_insight.cn: 通过单选+短周期设计降低用户心理门槛，选中项展开详情既确认选择又传递价值。9个常见习惯覆盖主流需求，渐进式目标设定提升完成率和留存。
product_insight.en: Single selection with short cycle lowers psychological barrier. Expanded details confirm choice while conveying value. Nine common habits cover mainstream needs, progressive goal setting improves completion and retention.

core_function.cn: 设置习惯养成的每日推送提醒时间
core_function.en: Set daily push notification time for habit reminders

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮时间选择器，操作直观流畅，降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker for intuitive and smooth time selection

design_highlights.cn: 温和询问式文案"Want a nudge?"降低用户抵触，提升权限开启率
design_highlights.en: Gentle copy 'Want a nudge?' reduces resistance and improves opt-in rate

design_highlights.cn: 底部提供实用小贴士，将习惯与日常行为关联，提升用户参与动机
design_highlights.en: Actionable tip at bottom links habit to existing routines, boosting engagement

design_highlights.cn: 开关与按钮统一使用蓝色强调色，视觉层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Consistent blue accent for toggle and CTA creates clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 通过"nudge"这一行为经济学概念包装提醒功能，降低用户对推送的心理防御；同时在设置流程中嵌入习惯养成技巧，体现产品专业性并增加用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Framing reminders as 'nudge' leverages behavioral economics to reduce notification resistance. Embedding habit tips during setup demonstrates expertise and increases user retention.

core_function.cn: 设置习惯提醒通知时间，帮助用户坚持新习惯
core_function.en: Set habit reminder notifications to help users stick to new habits

design_highlights.cn: "Want a nudge?"亲和文案降低推送请求的侵入感，提升接受度
design_highlights.en: Friendly 'Want a nudge?' copy reduces push notification request friction

design_highlights.cn: 底部提供习惯堆叠技巧，增加用户对功能价值的认知
design_highlights.en: Habit stacking tip at bottom increases perceived value and engagement

design_highlights.cn: 开关与时间选择器组合，简洁高效的双项设置交互
design_highlights.en: Toggle and time picker combo enables efficient two-step configuration

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式分组设计，清晰区分通知设置与操作提示区域
design_highlights.en: Card-based grouping clearly separates notification settings from tips

product_insight.cn: 将权限请求包装为用户价值（帮助坚持习惯），搭配实用小贴士增强信任感，默认开启通知但允许用户掌控时间，平衡了推送获取率与用户体验。
product_insight.en: Frames permission request as user value (habit support), pairs with actionable tip to build trust, balances push opt-in rate with user control over timing.

core_function.cn: 引导用户选择适合的断食时间方案
core_function.en: Guide users to select suitable fasting schedule

design_highlights.cn: 渐变色彩条区分难度等级，绿色代表简单、紫色中等、橙色挑战
design_highlights.en: Gradient color bars distinguish difficulty levels with intuitive color coding

design_highlights.cn: 即时错误反馈弹窗，阻止用户跳过必选步骤，确保数据完整性
design_highlights.en: Instant error modal prevents skipping required selection, ensuring data completeness

design_highlights.cn: 友好的Oops提示语和鼓励性文案，降低用户挫败感
design_highlights.en: Friendly 'Oops' tone and encouraging copy reduce user frustration

design_highlights.cn: 标注Easiest/Challenging难度标签，降低新手决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Difficulty labels like 'Easiest' lower decision barrier for beginners

product_insight.cn: 通过难度分级和清晰说明降低用户选择焦虑，错误状态设计温和友好避免流失。色彩编码系统让复杂的断食方案变得直观易懂，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Difficulty grading reduces choice anxiety. Gentle error handling prevents drop-off. Color-coded system makes complex fasting options intuitive and approachable.

core_function.cn: 设置每日断食开始时间并预估结束时间
core_function.en: Set daily fasting start time with estimated end time preview

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗时间选择器，滚轮交互自然流畅，支持小时/分钟/AM-PM独立滚动
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet time picker with smooth scroll wheels for hour/minute/AM-PM

design_highlights.cn: 选中区域高亮显示，蓝色边框突出当前选择状态，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Highlighted selection area with blue border, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示断食结束时间预估，帮助用户建立明确预期
design_highlights.en: Real-time fasting end time preview helps users set clear expectations

design_highlights.cn: 提供'当前时间'快捷入口，降低用户操作成本
design_highlights.en: Current Time shortcut reduces user effort and friction

product_insight.cn: 断食App通过时间选择器与结束时间预览的联动设计，让用户在设置阶段就能可视化整个断食周期，增强计划感和执行信心。底部弹窗模式保持上下文连贯，减少页面跳转的割裂感。
product_insight.en: The linked time picker with end time preview helps users visualize their fasting cycle during setup, building planning confidence. Bottom sheet maintains context continuity and reduces navigation friction.

core_function.cn: 设置断食开始时间，系统自动计算结束时间
core_function.en: Set fasting start time with auto-calculated end time

design_highlights.cn: 时间显示层次分明，开始时间突出显示在卡片内，结束时间灰色弱化形成对比
design_highlights.en: Clear visual hierarchy with start time highlighted in card, end time muted for contrast

design_highlights.cn: 实时计算并展示断食结束时间，用户无需手动计算，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Real-time calculation of end time reduces cognitive load for users

design_highlights.cn: 底部提示可随时修改设置，消除用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom hint about editable settings reduces user decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 默认推荐9PM开始的12小时断食方案，符合大众作息习惯
design_highlights.en: Default 9PM start for 12-hour fast aligns with common lifestyle patterns

product_insight.cn: 通过智能默认值和实时计算降低用户设置门槛，'可随时修改'的提示消除决策压力，提升完成率。简洁的信息架构让用户专注于单一决策点。
product_insight.en: Smart defaults and real-time calculation lower setup barriers. 'Always editable' reassurance reduces decision pressure and improves completion rates with focused single-decision architecture.

core_function.cn: 展示用户设定的断食计划并提供成功贴士
core_function.en: Display user's fasting plan setup with success tips

design_highlights.cn: 深绿色渐变背景配合白色卡片，营造健康专业氛围
design_highlights.en: Deep green gradient with white cards creates healthy and professional atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: "You're all set!"庆祝性文案增强用户完成设置的成就感
design_highlights.en: Celebratory 'You're all set!' copy enhances user's sense of accomplishment

design_highlights.cn: 黄色CTA按钮"Let's Do This"激励语气促进用户立即开始
design_highlights.en: Yellow CTA 'Let's Do This' with motivational tone encourages immediate action

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的双卡片布局清晰呈现断食与进食时段对比
design_highlights.en: Clean dual-card layout clearly contrasts fasting and eating windows

product_insight.cn: 设置完成页兼顾确认与教育，通过成功贴士降低用户首次使用焦虑，"Easiest"难度标签降低心理门槛，强化用户信心并提升留存可能性
product_insight.en: Completion page combines confirmation with education, success tips reduce first-use anxiety, 'Easiest' label lowers psychological barrier and builds confidence for retention

core_function.cn: 展示Premium订阅方案并请求运动健康数据权限
core_function.en: Display Premium subscription plans while requesting motion and fitness data permission

design_highlights.cn: 渐变黄色卡片突出Premium价值主张，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Gradient yellow card highlights Premium value proposition with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 67%折扣标签和年付低价策略强化转化动机
design_highlights.en: 67% savings badge and lower annual price strategy enhance conversion motivation

design_highlights.cn: 权限弹窗在订阅页出现，关联功能价值说明提高授权率
design_highlights.en: Permission popup on paywall with feature value explanation increases authorization rate

design_highlights.cn: 30天免费试用降低决策风险，消除用户顾虑
design_highlights.en: 30-day free trial reduces decision risk and eliminates user concerns

product_insight.cn: 将权限请求与付费墙结合是巧妙策略，用户在考虑付费时更愿意授权以获得完整体验。功能列表图标化展示清晰传达Premium价值，免费试用CTA降低转化门槛。
product_insight.en: Combining permission request with paywall is clever - users considering payment are more willing to authorize for full experience. Iconized feature list clearly conveys Premium value while free trial CTA lowers conversion barrier.

core_function.cn: 展示Premium订阅方案并请求通知权限
core_function.en: Display Premium subscription plans with notification permission request

design_highlights.cn: 黄色渐变卡片突出Premium价值主张，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Yellow gradient card highlights Premium value proposition with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 67%折扣标签和年付方案强调性价比，引导长期订阅
design_highlights.en: 67% discount badge and annual plan emphasis drive long-term subscription conversion

design_highlights.cn: 权限弹窗与付费墙同时出现，利用用户决策场景获取权限
design_highlights.en: Permission dialog overlays paywall, leveraging decision moment to gain notification access

design_highlights.cn: 功能列表配合图标直观展示Premium专属价值
design_highlights.en: Feature list with icons intuitively showcases Premium-exclusive benefits

product_insight.cn: 在付费转化关键节点同时请求通知权限是聪明策略，用户处于积极考虑状态时更易授权。30天免费试用降低决策门槛，双档位定价锚定效应明显引导年付选择。
product_insight.en: Requesting notification permission at paywall is strategic - users in active consideration mode are more likely to grant access. 30-day free trial reduces friction, dual pricing creates anchor effect toward annual plan.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅方案并请求通知权限，引导用户开始免费试用
core_function.en: Display subscription plans with notification permission request to drive free trial signup

design_highlights.cn: 30天免费试用标签突出显示，降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: 30-day free trial badge prominently displayed to lower decision barrier

design_highlights.cn: 时间线式布局清晰展示试用流程各节点，增强用户掌控感
design_highlights.en: Timeline layout clearly shows trial milestones, enhancing user sense of control

design_highlights.cn: "Better habits, Smarter training"渐进式文案传递产品价值主张
design_highlights.en: Progressive copy 'Better habits, Smarter training' conveys product value proposition

design_highlights.cn: 通知权限弹窗与付费墙同时出现，优化权限获取时机
design_highlights.en: Notification permission dialog timed with paywall to optimize permission acquisition

product_insight.cn: Strava将权限请求与订阅流程结合，在用户决策高峰期获取通知权限。时间线明确告知28天提醒和30天扣费节点，透明化策略增强信任，值得借鉴其将多个转化目标整合的设计思路。
product_insight.en: Strava combines permission request with subscription flow during peak decision moment. Timeline transparency about 28-day reminder and 30-day charge builds trust. Worth learning how to integrate multiple conversion goals seamlessly.

core_function.cn: 展示Premium订阅套餐及功能权益，引导用户付费
core_function.en: Display Premium subscription plans and benefits to drive conversion

design_highlights.cn: 黄色渐变卡片突出Premium品牌感，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Yellow gradient card highlights Premium branding with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 年付方案标注"Save 67%"折扣标签，锚定效应引导长期订阅
design_highlights.en: Annual plan with 'Save 67%' badge uses anchoring to drive long-term subscriptions

design_highlights.cn: 功能列表配合图标逐条展示，降低决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Feature list with icons reduces decision friction through clear benefits

design_highlights.cn: 30天免费试用CTA降低首次付费心理障碍
design_highlights.en: 30-day free trial CTA reduces psychological barrier for first payment

product_insight.cn: 采用经典的双套餐对比设计，通过高折扣率和免费试用组合拳降低转化阻力。功能权益聚焦"快速记录"核心痛点，精准匹配饮食追踪类用户需求，值得借鉴其简洁有力的价值传达方式。
product_insight.en: Classic dual-plan comparison with high discount and free trial combo reduces conversion friction. Benefits focus on 'faster logging' pain point, precisely matching diet tracking users' needs. Worth learning its concise value communication.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅价值并引导用户开启7天免费试用
core_function.en: Display subscription value and guide users to start 7-day free trial

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造冷静放松氛围，与产品调性高度契合
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient background creates calm atmosphere, matching product positioning

design_highlights.cn: 年费方案预选并标注原价划线，强化性价比感知和锚定效应
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected yearly plan with strikethrough price creates anchoring effect and value perception

design_highlights.cn: "Your plan is ready"个性化文案增强用户归属感和转化意愿
design_highlights.en: Personalized 'Your plan is ready' copy enhances belonging and conversion intent

design_highlights.cn: 7-Day Free Trial标签突出显示，降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent 7-Day Free Trial badge reduces user decision barriers

product_insight.cn: 通过图标化功能清单快速传递产品价值，年费方案预选结合60%折扣锚定，配合"随时取消"承诺有效降低用户心理负担，是冥想类产品的标准最佳实践
product_insight.en: Icon-based feature list conveys value quickly, pre-selected yearly plan with 60% discount anchoring, combined with 'cancel anytime' promise effectively reduces psychological barriers - a standard best practice for meditation apps

core_function.cn: 展示订阅价格并引导用户开启30天免费试用
core_function.en: Display subscription pricing and guide users to start 30-day free trial

design_highlights.cn: 时间轴设计清晰展示试用流程三阶段，橙色图标强化关键节点
design_highlights.en: Timeline design clearly shows three trial phases with orange icons highlighting key milestones

design_highlights.cn: "30-days free"标签置于价格卡片顶部，降低付费心理门槛
design_highlights.en: 30-days free badge on top of pricing card reduces payment anxiety

design_highlights.cn: "Better habits. Smarter training."渐进式文案强化产品价值主张
design_highlights.en: Progressive tagline 'Better habits. Smarter training.' reinforces value proposition

design_highlights.cn: 底部明确提示取消政策和扣费日期，建立用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Clear cancellation policy and billing date at bottom builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 采用时间轴可视化将抽象的试用流程具象化，28天提醒节点设计巧妙给用户足够决策时间，同时透明的价格策略（年付折算月价）有效提升转化信任度
product_insight.en: Timeline visualization makes abstract trial process tangible. 28-day reminder gives users decision time. Transparent pricing (annual billed as monthly) effectively builds conversion trust

core_function.cn: 展示订阅详情并引导用户完成Apple Pay支付确认
core_function.en: Display subscription details and guide Apple Pay confirmation

design_highlights.cn: 2周免费试用降低用户决策门槛，明确标注收费起始日期
design_highlights.en: 2-week free trial reduces decision barrier with clear billing start date

design_highlights.cn: 原生iOS支付弹窗设计，Face ID/Side Button确认增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Native iOS payment sheet with biometric confirmation enhances trust

design_highlights.cn: 背景展示用户好评'帮助我追踪排卵直到成功怀孕'强化产品价值
design_highlights.en: Background testimonial about pregnancy success reinforces product value

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的取消政策说明'随时可在设置中取消'减少订阅顾虑
design_highlights.en: Clear cancellation policy 'Cancel anytime in Settings' reduces commitment anxiety

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生支付弹窗+背景付费墙的双层设计，既保证支付流程的安全可信，又通过社交证明持续影响用户决策。免费试用+年订阅模式平衡了转化率与LTV。
product_insight.en: Dual-layer design with native iOS payment sheet over paywall maintains trust while social proof continues influencing decisions. Free trial plus annual subscription balances conversion and LTV.

core_function.cn: 通过Apple Pay确认年度订阅购买
core_function.en: Confirm annual subscription purchase via Apple Pay

design_highlights.cn: 1个月免费试用降低用户决策门槛，明确标注试用期和收费日期
design_highlights.en: 1-month free trial lowers decision barrier with clear trial period and billing date

design_highlights.cn: 原生Apple Pay底部弹窗提供熟悉安全的支付体验
design_highlights.en: Native Apple Pay bottom sheet provides familiar and secure payment experience

design_highlights.cn: 无承诺取消提示消除用户顾虑，增强信任感
design_highlights.en: No commitment cancellation notice eliminates user concerns and builds trust

product_insight.cn: 采用系统原生支付弹窗最大化用户信任，清晰展示试用期和续费价格形成透明定价，免费试用+年度订阅组合有效提升转化率和LTV
product_insight.en: Native system payment sheet maximizes user trust, transparent pricing with clear trial and renewal dates, free trial plus annual subscription combo effectively boosts conversion and LTV

core_function.cn: 确认用户订阅购买成功，提供正向反馈
core_function.en: Confirm successful subscription purchase with positive feedback

design_highlights.cn: "You're all set"温暖文案传递完成感和安心感
design_highlights.en: Warm 'You're all set' copy conveys completion and reassurance

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗设计聚焦用户注意力，单一OK按钮简化操作
design_highlights.en: Modal dialog focuses attention with single OK button for simplified action

design_highlights.cn: 背景模糊处理突出确认信息，蓝色CTA按钮引导点击
design_highlights.en: Blurred background highlights confirmation, blue CTA guides tap

product_insight.cn: 购买成功的即时反馈设计至关重要，简洁的成功确认弹窗减少用户焦虑，"all set"措辞暗示用户已准备好开始使用，自然引导进入核心功能体验
product_insight.en: Instant purchase feedback is crucial. Simple success modal reduces anxiety, 'all set' wording implies readiness to start, naturally guiding users to core experience

core_function.cn: 展示Premium+订阅方案及权益，引导用户开启免费试用
core_function.en: Display Premium+ subscription plans and benefits, guide users to start free trial

design_highlights.cn: 渐变紫色卡片突出Premium+品牌调性，与白色背景形成视觉层次
design_highlights.en: Gradient purple card highlights Premium+ branding, creating visual hierarchy against white background

design_highlights.cn: "Save 67%"徽章强化年付性价比，默认选中年付方案引导高价值转化
design_highlights.en: Save 67% badge emphasizes annual value, default annual selection guides high-value conversion

design_highlights.cn: 图标配合功能列表直观展示价值，"easy, delicious meals"情感化文案降低决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Icons with feature list intuitively showcase value, emotional copy reduces decision barriers

design_highlights.cn: 30天免费试用降低用户心理负担，Compare plans链接满足谨慎型用户需求
design_highlights.en: 30-day free trial reduces psychological burden, Compare plans link serves cautious users

product_insight.cn: 采用经典双档订阅设计，通过高折扣标签和默认年付锚定高客单价；功能列表精准聚焦用户痛点（省钱、省时、简化采购），试用期+取消提示双重降低转化阻力
product_insight.en: Classic dual-tier subscription design anchors high ARPU via discount badge and default annual plan; feature list precisely addresses user pain points with free trial and cancellation notice reducing conversion friction

core_function.cn: 展示订阅方案并确认用户已成功开通Premium
core_function.en: Display subscription plans and confirm Premium activation

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造宁静氛围，符合冥想App调性
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient background creates calm atmosphere matching meditation app

design_highlights.cn: 年费方案高亮标注7天免费试用和原价对比，强化价值感知
design_highlights.en: Yearly plan highlighted with free trial badge and original price comparison

design_highlights.cn: 成功弹窗使用祝贺语气，强化用户获得感和正向情绪
design_highlights.en: Success modal uses congratulatory tone to reinforce positive emotions

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗聚焦成功状态，简洁按钮引导下一步操作
design_highlights.en: Modal focuses on success state with simple button for next action

product_insight.cn: 采用成功确认弹窗即时反馈订阅状态，配合价值清单和价格锚定策略，既增强用户信心又为后续付费转化铺垫。弹窗设计简洁不打断主流程，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Success confirmation modal provides instant feedback while value list and price anchoring strategy build confidence and prepare for conversion. Non-intrusive modal design worth learning.

core_function.cn: 确认用户订阅成功并展示订阅权益
core_function.en: Confirm successful subscription and display benefits

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景营造冥想氛围，白色弹窗形成视觉焦点
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient creates meditation atmosphere, white modal draws focus

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的成功确认文案"You're all set"传递积极正向情绪
design_highlights.en: Concise success message 'You're all set' conveys positive emotion

design_highlights.cn: 弹窗叠加在订阅页上，保持上下文连贯强化购买决策
design_highlights.en: Modal overlay on paywall maintains context and reinforces purchase decision

design_highlights.cn: 无限符号、耳机等图标直观展示会员权益内容
design_highlights.en: Infinity symbol and headphone icons visually represent membership benefits

product_insight.cn: 采用模态弹窗确认购买成功，既给予即时反馈又保持订阅页面可见，强化用户对所购权益的认知。单一CTA按钮简化操作路径，减少用户焦虑。
product_insight.en: Modal confirmation provides instant feedback while keeping paywall visible, reinforcing value awareness. Single CTA simplifies user journey and reduces anxiety.

core_function.cn: 确认用户成功订阅Premium会员并营造庆祝氛围
core_function.en: Confirm successful premium subscription with celebratory atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 彩色纸屑动画配合跑步者群体照片，营造胜利庆祝氛围
design_highlights.en: Colorful confetti animation with group running photo creates victory celebration mood

design_highlights.cn: 皇冠图标强化Premium身份认同，个性化称呼增强归属感
design_highlights.en: Crown icon reinforces premium identity, personalized name greeting enhances belonging

design_highlights.cn: 激励性文案"smash those goals"引导用户立即开始使用服务
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy 'smash those goals' drives immediate service engagement

product_insight.cn: 订阅成功页通过庆祝仪式感降低用户付费后的认知失调，个性化称呼和群体形象强化社区归属，为后续使用和留存奠定情感基础。
product_insight.en: Success celebration reduces post-purchase cognitive dissonance, personalized greeting and group imagery strengthen community belonging, building emotional foundation for retention.

core_function.cn: 确认用户成功开通试用订阅并展示时间线
core_function.en: Confirm successful trial subscription with timeline overview

design_highlights.cn: 垂直时间线设计清晰展示试用到付费的完整流程节点
design_highlights.en: Vertical timeline clearly displays trial-to-payment milestones

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗确认购买成功，简洁明了的单按钮操作
design_highlights.en: Modal popup confirms purchase with simple single-button action

design_highlights.cn: 30天免费试用+28天提前提醒，降低用户付费心理门槛
design_highlights.en: 30-day free trial with 28-day reminder reduces payment anxiety

design_highlights.cn: "You're all set"正向文案传递完成感和安心感
design_highlights.en: Positive 'You're all set' copy conveys accomplishment and reassurance

product_insight.cn: Strava通过透明的时间线设计展示试用全流程，提前28天提醒机制建立用户信任，降低退订率。成功弹窗即时反馈增强用户决策信心，是订阅转化的优秀实践。
product_insight.en: Strava builds trust through transparent timeline showing full trial process. 28-day advance reminder reduces churn anxiety. Instant success feedback reinforces user decision confidence.

core_function.cn: 确认用户成功订阅Premium会员，引导进入应用
core_function.en: Confirm Premium subscription success and guide user to start using the app

design_highlights.cn: 彩旗和彩纸营造庆祝氛围，渐变紫粉背景传递喜悦情绪
design_highlights.en: Bunting flags and confetti create celebration atmosphere with gradient purple-pink background

design_highlights.cn: Congratulations文案强化成就感，让用户感受订阅价值
design_highlights.en: Congratulations copy reinforces achievement feeling, making users feel subscription value

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮'Let's go'简洁明确，降低决策成本快速进入主流程
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button 'Let's go' is clear and simple, reducing friction to enter main flow

design_highlights.cn: 品牌Logo居中放大展示，强化品牌认知和高端感
design_highlights.en: Centered enlarged brand logo reinforces brand recognition and premium feeling

product_insight.cn: 成功订阅后的庆祝页面是降低买家悔恨的关键节点，通过视觉庆祝强化用户正确决策的信心，同时简化后续操作路径，快速将用户带入核心功能体验，提升激活率。
product_insight.en: Post-subscription celebration page is crucial to reduce buyer's remorse. Visual celebration reinforces confidence in user's decision while simplified CTA quickly guides users to core features, improving activation rate.

core_function.cn: 对比展示Premium与Premium+功能差异，引导升级
core_function.en: Compare Premium and Premium+ features to drive upgrades

design_highlights.cn: 双色勾选图标区分层级，黄色代表Premium，蓝色代表Premium+，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Dual-color checkmarks differentiate tiers - yellow for Premium, blue for Premium+ with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: Premium+列使用浅紫色背景高亮，视觉引导用户关注高价值套餐
design_highlights.en: Premium+ column highlighted with light purple background to guide attention to higher-value plan

design_highlights.cn: 功能列表按价值递减排列，核心差异功能置顶，突出Premium+专属特性
design_highlights.en: Features listed by descending value, exclusive Premium+ features at top to highlight differentiation

design_highlights.cn: 简洁表格式布局，用户可快速扫描对比，降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Clean table layout enables quick scanning and comparison, reducing decision friction

product_insight.cn: 通过功能矩阵对比策略，将餐饮规划等高感知价值功能设为Premium+专属，利用锚定效应让用户感知Premium+物超所值，有效提升ARPU
product_insight.en: Feature matrix comparison anchors high-perceived-value features like meal planning to Premium+, leveraging anchoring effect to drive higher ARPU through perceived value

core_function.cn: 展示Premium+订阅权益，引导用户升级付费
core_function.en: Display Premium+ subscription benefits to drive upgrades

design_highlights.cn: 紫色渐变卡片突出当前方案，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Purple gradient card highlights current plan with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: "Your plan"标签强化用户归属感，降低流失风险
design_highlights.en: Your plan badge reinforces ownership and reduces churn risk

design_highlights.cn: 功能列表配合图标，用"easy""delicious"等积极词汇营造愉悦感
design_highlights.en: Feature list with icons uses positive words like easy and delicious

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的分段Tab切换，便于Premium与Premium+对比
design_highlights.en: Clear segmented tabs for easy comparison between plans

product_insight.cn: 采用"已订阅"视角展示权益清单，通过具体数字（1500+食谱、10种饮食类型）增强价值感知，同时"Plus, everything in Premium"强调增量价值，是提升用户留存和升级转化的有效策略。
product_insight.en: Displaying benefits from a subscribed perspective with specific numbers (1500+ recipes, 10 diet types) enhances value perception. The incremental value approach effectively drives retention and upgrades.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅方案并引导用户开启免费试用
core_function.en: Display subscription plans and guide users to start free trial

design_highlights.cn: 14天免费试用降低决策门槛，试用开关默认开启强化转化
design_highlights.en: 14-day free trial reduces decision barrier with toggle enabled by default

design_highlights.cn: 年度方案使用粉色高亮边框和勾选标记突出推荐选项
design_highlights.en: Yearly plan highlighted with pink border and checkmark to indicate recommendation

design_highlights.cn: 五星评价配真实用户怀孕成功故事增强信任感
design_highlights.en: 5-star rating with real user pregnancy success story builds trust

design_highlights.cn: 价格锚定策略：月均$5对比家庭版$6.67显性价比
design_highlights.en: Price anchoring: $5/mo vs family plan $6.67/mo shows value

product_insight.cn: 采用经典的付费墙设计模式：社交证明→免费试用→价格锚定三层转化漏斗，家庭版方案作为价格锚点让年度方案显得更划算，同时为后续追加销售预留空间
product_insight.en: Classic paywall pattern: social proof → free trial → price anchoring funnel. Family plan serves as price anchor making yearly plan appear more valuable while enabling future upsell opportunities

core_function.cn: 展示订阅方案及价值，引导用户开启免费试用
core_function.en: Display subscription plans and value proposition to drive free trial conversion

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合皇冠图标营造高端感，绿色勾选增强信任
design_highlights.en: Dark background with crown icon creates premium feel, green checkmarks build trust

design_highlights.cn: 年费方案标注SAVE 50%折扣标签，并显示周均价降低决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Annual plan shows SAVE 50% badge with weekly breakdown to lower decision barrier

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼Julia增强用户归属感，强调专属训练计划
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with user name Julia enhances belonging and exclusivity

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式方案选择设计清晰，当前选中状态有明确边框高亮
design_highlights.en: Card-based plan selection with clear border highlight for selected option

product_insight.cn: 通过个性化称呼、价值清单、价格锚定三重策略提升转化。年费方案作为默认推荐，周均价对比强化年费优势，1周免费试用降低尝试门槛。
product_insight.en: Triple conversion strategy: personalization, value listing, and price anchoring. Annual plan as default with weekly cost comparison emphasizes value, while 1-week free trial lowers commitment barrier.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅套餐选项，引导用户开始免费试用
core_function.en: Display subscription plans and guide users to start free trial

design_highlights.cn: 顶部五星好评+真实用户评价增强可信度，怀孕成功案例极具说服力
design_highlights.en: 5-star rating with real user review builds trust, pregnancy success story is highly persuasive

design_highlights.cn: 免费试用开关默认开启，降低用户决策门槛，粉色高亮推荐年度方案
design_highlights.en: Free trial toggle enabled by default reduces friction, pink highlight promotes yearly plan

design_highlights.cn: 价格锚定策略清晰，月费对比凸显年度方案性价比优势
design_highlights.en: Clear price anchoring strategy, monthly comparison highlights yearly plan value

design_highlights.cn: 提供Go back退出选项，避免用户感到被困，提升体验
design_highlights.en: Go back option prevents users feeling trapped, improves experience

product_insight.cn: Flo采用软付费墙策略，通过情感化用户证言（怀孕成功）建立信任，14天试用+默认开启开关大幅降低转化阻力，家庭方案拓展用户群体，三档定价满足不同需求。
product_insight.en: Flo uses soft paywall with emotional testimonial (pregnancy success) to build trust. 14-day trial with default-on toggle reduces friction significantly. Family plan expands user base with three-tier pricing.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅方案并引导用户开始免费试用
core_function.en: Display subscription plans and guide users to start free trial

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合薄荷绿强调色，皇冠图标营造高端感，价格对比清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Dark background with mint green accent, crown icon creates premium feel, clear price comparison

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼Julia增强用户归属感，50%折扣标签和周均价对比降低决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Personalized name Julia builds connection, 50% discount badge and weekly price comparison reduce decision friction

design_highlights.cn: 功能列表使用勾选图标传递完整价值，从5K到马拉松覆盖全目标用户
design_highlights.en: Checklist icons convey complete value, covering all user goals from 5K to marathon

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定CTA按钮配合试用流程说明，降低用户顾虑
design_highlights.en: Fixed bottom CTA with trial process explanation reduces user concerns

product_insight.cn: 通过个性化称呼、设备兼容性展示和阶梯式定价策略，精准锚定年度订阅为最优选择。试用流程透明化有效降低付费焦虑，值得借鉴的软性转化设计
product_insight.en: Personalized greeting, device compatibility display, and tiered pricing strategically anchor annual plan as best choice. Transparent trial process reduces payment anxiety - excellent soft conversion design

core_function.cn: 通过限时优惠促进试用用户转化为付费订阅
core_function.en: Convert trial users to paid subscribers with limited-time discount offer

design_highlights.cn: 渐变卡片配合星星装饰，营造礼物/惊喜感的视觉氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient card with sparkle decorations creates a gift/surprise visual atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: "33% OFF FOREVER"永久折扣强调长期价值，降低决策门槛
design_highlights.en: "33% OFF FOREVER" emphasizes long-term value and reduces decision barrier

design_highlights.cn: "Once you close...it's gone"制造紧迫感，触发损失厌恶心理
design_highlights.en: "Once you close...it's gone" creates urgency and triggers loss aversion

design_highlights.cn: 划线价对比呈现，$3.33/月的分摊计算降低价格感知
design_highlights.en: Strikethrough price comparison and $3.33/month breakdown reduces price perception

product_insight.cn: 采用"礼物"框架重塑折扣认知，结合稀缺性和损失厌恶策略。永久折扣承诺增强用户信任感，Cancel anytime降低承诺焦虑，是挽留流失用户的经典转化策略。
product_insight.en: Reframes discount as a 'gift' combined with scarcity and loss aversion. 'Forever' discount builds trust while 'cancel anytime' reduces commitment anxiety - classic retention conversion strategy.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅详情并引导用户完成付费确认
core_function.en: Display subscription details and guide user to confirm payment

design_highlights.cn: 1个月免费试用降低首次付费心理门槛，明确标注试用结束日期增强透明度
design_highlights.en: 1-month free trial reduces payment barrier, with clear trial end date for transparency

design_highlights.cn: 双层信息架构：上层展示价值主张，下层系统弹窗确认，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dual-layer architecture: value proposition above, system confirmation sheet below

design_highlights.cn: 渐变橙色品牌标识搭配深色背景，专业感与运动活力兼具
design_highlights.en: Orange gradient branding with dark background conveys professionalism and energy

design_highlights.cn: 侧边按钮双击确认机制防止误触，符合iOS系统规范
design_highlights.en: Double-click side button confirmation prevents accidental purchases, follows iOS standards

product_insight.cn: Strava巧妙利用iOS原生订阅弹窗增强信任感，同时在背景页面强化价值主张。'30天免费'标签与系统弹窗的'1个月试用'相呼应，全链路强化试用心智，有效提升转化率。
product_insight.en: Strava leverages native iOS subscription sheet for trust while reinforcing value proposition in background. '30-days free' badge echoes system's '1-month trial', creating cohesive conversion messaging throughout the funnel.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅详情并通过系统确认完成付费
core_function.en: Display subscription details and confirm payment via system sheet

design_highlights.cn: 免费试用+年费组合，降低首次付费心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Free trial + annual combo reduces initial payment barrier

design_highlights.cn: 原生系统弹窗设计，增强用户信任感和安全感
design_highlights.en: Native system sheet design enhances trust and security

design_highlights.cn: 双击侧边按钮确认，符合iOS原生交互习惯
design_highlights.en: Double-click side button matches iOS native interaction

design_highlights.cn: 明确标注取消政策，消除用户订阅顾虑
design_highlights.en: Clear cancellation policy eliminates subscription concerns

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生订阅弹窗而非自定义页面，利用系统信任背书提升转化率。1周试用期配合年费69.99美元的定价策略，既展现产品价值信心，又通过低门槛引导用户体验核心功能。
product_insight.en: Using native iOS subscription sheet instead of custom paywall leverages system trust to boost conversion. 1-week trial with $69.99/year pricing shows product confidence while lowering entry barrier.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅详情并通过系统级确认完成付费
core_function.en: Display subscription details and confirm payment via system sheet

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生支付弹窗设计，白色卡片与深色背景形成强对比
design_highlights.en: Native iOS payment sheet design with strong contrast between white card and dark background

design_highlights.cn: 1周免费试用+明确的续费价格，降低首次订阅心理门槛
design_highlights.en: 1-week free trial with clear renewal price reduces subscription barrier

design_highlights.cn: 侧边按钮双击确认机制，防止误操作同时保持流畅体验
design_highlights.en: Double-click side button confirmation prevents accidental purchases while maintaining smooth UX

design_highlights.cn: 透明化展示取消政策和续费日期，建立用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Transparent cancellation policy and renewal date builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生支付弹窗而非自定义界面，利用用户对系统级UI的信任感提升转化。免费试用期+明确的自动续费提示平衡了转化率与用户体验，符合App Store审核规范。
product_insight.en: Using native iOS payment sheet leverages user trust in system UI to boost conversion. Free trial with clear auto-renewal notice balances conversion and UX while meeting App Store guidelines.

core_function.cn: 展示订阅价格并通过系统弹窗确认支付
core_function.en: Display subscription price and confirm payment via system dialog

design_highlights.cn: 33%折扣标签配合紧迫性文案"before it's gone"制造稀缺感
design_highlights.en: 33% discount badge with urgency copy 'before it's gone' creates scarcity

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合渐变折扣卡片和闪光装饰，营造高端促销氛围
design_highlights.en: Dark background with gradient discount card and sparkle decorations creates premium promo feel

design_highlights.cn: 系统级底部弹窗确认，双击侧键支付降低操作摩擦
design_highlights.en: System-level bottom sheet with double-click side button reduces payment friction

design_highlights.cn: "Claim your gift"礼物式措辞将付费转化为获得感
design_highlights.en: Gift framing 'Claim your gift' transforms payment into a reward experience

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生支付确认弹窗叠加自定义促销页面，既保证支付安全信任感，又充分展示优惠信息。礼物化文案搭配倒计时式紧迫感，有效提升试用转付费转化率。
product_insight.en: Layering custom promo screen with iOS native payment sheet builds trust while showcasing offers. Gift-framed copy with urgency effectively converts trial users to paid subscribers.

core_function.cn: 展示当前订阅方案并提供切换或取消选项
core_function.en: Display current subscription plan with options to switch or cancel

design_highlights.cn: 当前订阅用红色边框高亮，替代方案使用灰色边框形成视觉层级
design_highlights.en: Current subscription highlighted with red border, alternatives use gray for visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 同时展示月费和周费单价，年订阅周单价更低形成价格锚定
design_highlights.en: Shows both monthly and weekly rates, annual plan appears cheaper per week as price anchoring

design_highlights.cn: 取消订阅入口清晰可见，符合用户体验规范降低投诉风险
design_highlights.en: Cancel subscription option clearly visible, reducing complaints and meeting UX standards

design_highlights.cn: 简洁透明的定价展示建立用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Clean and transparent pricing display builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 采用价格锚定策略，将年订阅周单价($2.30)与月订阅($4.60)对比，引导用户选择年付。同时保持取消入口透明，平衡转化与用户信任，符合App Store审核要求。
product_insight.en: Uses price anchoring by comparing annual ($2.30/week) vs monthly ($4.60/week) to encourage yearly commitment. Transparent cancellation option balances conversion with trust and App Store compliance.

core_function.cn: 展示Premium会员的全部功能权益，促进订阅转化
core_function.en: Display all Premium membership benefits to drive subscription conversion

design_highlights.cn: 黄色渐变头部卡片突出Premium品牌调性，与白底形成层次对比
design_highlights.en: Yellow gradient header card highlights Premium branding with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 9项权益按优先级排列，从核心痛点（去广告、快速记录）到增值服务递进
design_highlights.en: 9 benefits prioritized from core pain points to value-added services

design_highlights.cn: 每项功能配合简洁副标题解释价值，降低认知门槛
design_highlights.en: Each feature includes concise subtitle explaining value, reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 统一的图标设计风格，线性图标简洁专业，易于扫读
design_highlights.en: Consistent icon design with clean linear style, easy to scan

product_insight.cn: 采用功能清单式付费墙，将9大权益完整呈现，通过「去广告」「快速记录」等刚需功能开头抓住用户痛点，再延伸到个性化、社交分享等高阶需求，形成完整价值闭环。顶部双Tab暗示多档套餐，为后续定价留出空间。
product_insight.en: Feature list paywall presents 9 benefits starting with core needs like ad-free and faster logging, then extending to personalization and sharing. Dual tabs hint at multiple pricing tiers for conversion optimization.

core_function.cn: 展示Premium专属健康报告功能，引导用户订阅
core_function.en: Showcase premium health report feature to drive subscription

design_highlights.cn: 3D卡片叠加效果展示报告样式，直观呈现产品价值
design_highlights.en: 3D stacked card effect showcases report format, visually demonstrating product value

design_highlights.cn: 明确标注'Exclusive to Premium'徽章，强化付费专属感
design_highlights.en: Clear 'Exclusive to Premium' badge reinforces paid exclusivity

design_highlights.cn: 强调与医生分享的实用场景，建立健康管理信任感
design_highlights.en: Emphasizes sharing with doctor scenario, building trust in health management

design_highlights.cn: 粉紫渐变背景配合品牌色，营造女性健康应用氛围
design_highlights.en: Pink-purple gradient with brand colors creates feminine health app atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 通过具体化报告预览降低用户对付费功能的认知门槛，'与医生分享'的场景化文案精准击中用户真实需求，将抽象的数据追踪转化为有形的健康资产。
product_insight.en: Concrete report preview reduces cognitive barrier for paid features. 'Share with doctor' scenario copy precisely targets real user needs, transforming abstract tracking into tangible health assets.

core_function.cn: 欢迎用户订阅高级版并引导开始使用
core_function.en: Welcome premium subscribers and guide them to start using features

design_highlights.cn: 深邃蓝紫渐变背景营造高端尊贵感，品牌色彩一致性强
design_highlights.en: Deep blue-purple gradient creates premium feel with strong brand consistency

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的Welcome文案配合大字体Premium+强化身份认同感
design_highlights.en: Simple Welcome copy with large Premium+ text reinforces identity and exclusivity

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮降低决策成本，快速引导进入核心功能
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button reduces decision cost and quickly guides to core feature

product_insight.cn: 订阅成功后的仪式感设计非常重要，用极简界面和专属视觉语言让用户感受到付费价值，同时快速引导进入核心功能防止订阅后流失
product_insight.en: Post-subscription celebration screen is crucial. Minimalist design with exclusive visual language validates purchase while quickly directing users to core features to prevent churn

core_function.cn: 显示订阅购买处理状态，安抚用户等待
core_function.en: Display purchase processing status and reassure user during transaction

design_highlights.cn: 半透明遮罩层配合加载动画，清晰传达处理状态
design_highlights.en: Semi-transparent overlay with loading animation clearly communicates processing state

design_highlights.cn: 皇冠图标强化会员价值感知，提升付费转化意愿
design_highlights.en: Crown icon reinforces premium value perception to boost conversion

design_highlights.cn: 双订阅方案对比展示，年费标注50%折扣突出性价比
design_highlights.en: Dual subscription comparison with 50% annual discount highlights value

design_highlights.cn: 加载状态阻断用户操作，防止重复提交
design_highlights.en: Loading state blocks user interaction to prevent duplicate submissions

product_insight.cn: 在支付关键环节使用模态加载状态，既防止重复操作又降低用户焦虑。页面同时展示订阅权益清单，在等待时持续强化价值认知，减少用户中途放弃的可能性。
product_insight.en: Modal loading state during payment prevents duplicate submissions while reducing anxiety. Displaying subscription benefits during wait reinforces value perception and reduces abandonment risk.

core_function.cn: 确认用户订阅购买成功并提供操作反馈
core_function.en: Confirm successful subscription purchase with user feedback

design_highlights.cn: 极简对话框设计，白色卡片配合灰色遮罩突出核心信息
design_highlights.en: Minimalist dialog design with white card and gray overlay focusing attention

design_highlights.cn: "You're all set"积极文案传递完成感和成就感
design_highlights.en: Positive copy 'You're all set' conveys completion and accomplishment

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮简化决策，蓝色突出可点击性
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button simplifies decision with blue highlighting clickability

product_insight.cn: 购买成功弹窗采用系统原生风格增强可信度，简洁文案减少用户认知负担，单按钮设计快速引导用户回到主流程，是支付后体验的标准最佳实践
product_insight.en: Native system-style dialog enhances trust, concise copy reduces cognitive load, single button quickly guides users back to main flow - standard best practice for post-payment experience

core_function.cn: 确认订阅购买成功，给予用户即时反馈
core_function.en: Confirm successful subscription purchase with instant feedback

design_highlights.cn: "You're all set"积极文案传递成就感，增强用户信心
design_highlights.en: Positive 'You're all set' copy conveys accomplishment and builds confidence

design_highlights.cn: 简洁模态弹窗设计，白色卡片在深色背景上形成强对比
design_highlights.en: Clean modal dialog with white card creating strong contrast on dark background

design_highlights.cn: 单一OK按钮简化决策，蓝色高亮引导用户完成闭环
design_highlights.en: Single OK button simplifies decision with blue highlight guiding closure

design_highlights.cn: 个性化称呼"Julia"增强用户归属感和转化信任
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting 'Julia' enhances belonging and conversion trust

product_insight.cn: 购买成功的即时确认是关键体验节点，简洁明确的成功反馈降低用户焦虑，个性化元素和积极文案强化付费决策正确性，为后续留存打下心理基础
product_insight.en: Instant purchase confirmation is a critical UX moment. Clear success feedback reduces anxiety while personalization reinforces decision correctness, building psychological foundation for retention

core_function.cn: 邀请用户分享30天免费体验给好友
core_function.en: Invite users to share 30-day free trial with friends

design_highlights.cn: 金色礼品卡3D悬浮效果，营造高级感与价值感
design_highlights.en: 3D floating gold gift card creates premium and valuable perception

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调关爱他人，触发用户助人的情感动机
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes caring for others, triggering altruistic motivation

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的价值主张'30-day'蓝色高亮，强化免费福利感知
design_highlights.en: Clear value proposition with blue highlighted '30-day' emphasizes free benefit

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗覆盖首页，保持上下文同时聚焦邀请行为
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet overlay maintains context while focusing on referral action

product_insight.cn: 通过礼品化包装降低分享心理门槛，将邀请行为转化为关爱行为。30天超长试用期提升被邀请者转化率，同时增强分享者的社交价值感。
product_insight.en: Gift-wrapped presentation lowers sharing barrier by framing referral as caring. Extended 30-day trial boosts invitee conversion while enhancing sharer's social value.

core_function.cn: 展示经期状态和最佳受孕时机预测
core_function.en: Display period status and optimal conception timing prediction

design_highlights.cn: 粉色渐变背景营造温馨女性化氛围，周历导航简洁直观
design_highlights.en: Pink gradient background creates warm feminine atmosphere with clean weekly calendar navigation

design_highlights.cn: 大字体突出关键信息'2 days'，给予用户明确期待和希望感
design_highlights.en: Large typography highlights key info '2 days', giving users clear expectations and hope

design_highlights.cn: 横向滑动卡片推荐相关功能，引导深度使用产品
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling cards recommend related features, guiding deeper product engagement

design_highlights.cn: 症状记录入口明显，降低用户日常打卡门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent symptom logging entry reduces barrier for daily check-ins

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的生理周期数据简化为倒计时形式，降低认知负担；通过内容卡片矩阵构建备孕知识生态，提升用户粘性和信任感，符合备孕用户高焦虑高频访问的特点
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex cycle data into countdown format, reducing cognitive load; content card matrix builds fertility knowledge ecosystem, enhancing stickiness and trust for anxious, high-frequency users

core_function.cn: 展示每日精选冥想、运动、智慧内容供用户选择
core_function.en: Display curated daily meditation, movement and wisdom content for users

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造放松氛围，与冥想主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates relaxing atmosphere aligned with meditation theme

design_highlights.cn: 内容卡片配图风格多样，人物与抽象艺术结合增强视觉层次
design_highlights.en: Diverse card imagery mixing portraits and abstract art enhances visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 播放按钮悬浮于卡片左下角，降低用户操作认知成本
design_highlights.en: Play button overlay on cards reduces cognitive load for content access

design_highlights.cn: 每日内容命名富有仪式感（Daily Calm/Jay/Move/Trip），培养用户习惯
design_highlights.en: Ritualistic naming convention (Daily Calm/Jay/Move/Trip) builds habit formation

product_insight.cn: 通过每日更新的多元化内容矩阵（冥想+运动+智慧+旅程）满足不同用户需求，强化日常打卡习惯。时长标注清晰（7-12分钟）降低决策门槛，知名导师IP提升内容权威性。
product_insight.en: Diversified daily content matrix (meditation+movement+wisdom+trip) serves varied user needs while reinforcing daily habits. Clear duration labels reduce decision friction, instructor branding builds authority.

core_function.cn: 展示个性化冥想、睡眠和音乐内容推荐
core_function.en: Display personalized meditation, sleep, and music content recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合内容缩略图，营造放松氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with content thumbnails creates relaxing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 一键刷新推荐功能，增强用户探索体验
design_highlights.en: One-tap refresh recommendations enhances content discovery experience

design_highlights.cn: 内容时长标注清晰，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Clear duration labels reduce user decision-making effort

design_highlights.cn: 底部分类快捷入口引导深度探索
design_highlights.en: Bottom category shortcuts guide deeper content exploration

product_insight.cn: 通过混合展示多类型内容（冥想、音乐、睡眠故事、音景）满足不同场景需求，刷新按钮增加内容新鲜感，分类入口平衡个性化推荐与主动探索的用户路径
product_insight.en: Mixed content types serve various use cases. Refresh button adds content freshness. Category shortcuts balance personalized recommendations with active exploration paths

core_function.cn: 展示当日训练计划和完成情况，支持快速记录
core_function.en: Display daily workout plans and completion status with quick recording

product_insight.cn: 将计划与实际执行数据并列展示，让用户清晰看到配速等关键指标差异。周概览提供宏观进度感，配合天气信息辅助训练决策，形成完整的训练管理闭环。
product_insight.en: Parallel display of planned vs actual data shows key metrics like pace differences. Weekly overview provides macro progress sense, weather info aids training decisions, forming complete training management loop.

core_function.en: Personalized meditation content based on user's current mood

product_insight.en: Using mood as core recommendation dimension aligns better with immediate user needs. Mixed content types (soundscapes, music, meditation) cater to different preferences and boost conversion.

core_function.en: Display weekly training plan, weather info and daily tips

design_highlights.en: Weather card uses gradient design with cloud icon and blue-purple tones for comfort

design_highlights.cn: 周历横向滑动设计，圆点标记活动日，当前日期高亮突出
design_highlights.en: Horizontal weekly calendar with dot markers and highlighted current date

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定Record workout按钮，强化运动记录核心行为
design_highlights.en: Fixed bottom Record workout button reinforces core action engagement

design_highlights.cn: Tips for today内容展示真实用户场景，增强社区归属感
design_highlights.en: Tips section shows real user scenarios to enhance community belonging

product_insight.cn: 将天气、训练进度、内容推荐整合于一屏，降低用户决策成本。1/6周进度指示创造紧迫感，跑步与力量分离追踪满足多元健身需求，值得借鉴的信息密度平衡。
product_insight.en: Integrates weather, training progress and content in one view to reduce decision friction. Week 1/6 progress creates urgency, separate run/strength tracking serves diverse fitness needs.

core_function.cn: 展示每日训练计划、技巧和快速记录入口
core_function.en: Display daily training plan, tips and quick workout logging entry

design_highlights.cn: 彩色渐变训练类型卡片，图标配色区分不同运动强度
design_highlights.en: Colorful gradient workout cards with icons distinguishing intensity levels

design_highlights.cn: 周视图日历可快速切换日期，彩点标记训练安排
design_highlights.en: Week calendar view with colored dots indicating scheduled workouts

design_highlights.cn: 视频内容展示播放量数据，利用社交证明吸引用户观看
design_highlights.en: Video content displays view counts as social proof to attract engagement

design_highlights.cn: Tips for today个性化推荐营造专属教练感
design_highlights.en: Tips for today creates personalized coaching experience

product_insight.cn: 将训练计划、学习内容和快速记录整合在首页，降低用户操作路径。周视图日历清晰展示训练节奏，彩色卡片降低选择成本，底部固定CTA确保核心功能触手可及。
product_insight.en: Integrates training plan, learning content and quick logging on home screen to reduce user friction. Week calendar shows training rhythm clearly, colorful cards reduce decision cost, fixed bottom CTA ensures core function accessibility.

core_function.cn: 提供助眠故事、冥想和音乐内容帮助用户入睡
core_function.en: Provide sleep stories, meditations and music to help users fall asleep

design_highlights.cn: 温暖棕色渐变配色营造舒适睡眠氛围，与睡眠场景高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm brown gradient creates cozy sleep atmosphere, highly aligned with sleep context

design_highlights.cn: 横向分类标签快速筛选内容类型，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Horizontal category tabs for quick content filtering, reducing decision fatigue

design_highlights.cn: 睡前提醒卡片引导用户建立固定习惯，提升长期留存
design_highlights.en: Bedtime reminder card encourages habit formation, boosting long-term retention

design_highlights.cn: 内容卡片展示自然风景和温馨插图，传递平静放松情绪
design_highlights.en: Content cards feature nature scenes and cozy illustrations, conveying calm relaxation

product_insight.cn: 通过场景化内容分类和习惯养成提醒，将工具型App转化为日常睡眠伴侣。Featured和Winter Vibes双主题推荐既保证内容新鲜度又增强季节氛围感，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Transforms utility app into daily sleep companion through contextual content and habit reminders. Dual-theme recommendations (Featured + Winter Vibes) balance freshness with seasonal atmosphere.

core_function.cn: 展示每日训练计划、周进度和天气信息
core_function.en: Display daily workout plan, weekly progress and weather info

design_highlights.cn: 周历视图配合彩色圆点标记训练日，直观展示计划安排
design_highlights.en: Week calendar with colored dots marking workout days for intuitive planning

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局整合天气、训练计划和进度，信息层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Card-based layout integrates weather, workout plan and progress with clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 实时天气模块与训练结合，体现对用户运动场景的关怀
design_highlights.en: Real-time weather module combined with training shows care for user's exercise context

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目的紫色CTA按钮引导用户开始记录训练
design_highlights.en: Prominent purple CTA button at bottom guides users to start recording workout

product_insight.cn: 将天气信息融入跑步训练场景是精准的产品思维，周进度0/6的展示既是提醒也是激励，配合徽章系统增强用户完成训练的动力
product_insight.en: Integrating weather into running context shows precise product thinking. Weekly progress 0/6 serves as both reminder and motivation, combined with badge system to enhance completion drive

core_function.cn: 展示今日训练计划并提供快速开始入口
core_function.en: Display today's training plan with quick start options

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗使用柔和渐变色块，训练卡片层次分明
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with soft gradient blocks, clear card hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 弹窗式设计便于快速选择训练类型，支持预设和自由跑两种模式
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet enables quick training selection with preset and free run modes

design_highlights.cn: 明确的时间预估和距离标注降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Clear time and distance estimates reduce decision friction

design_highlights.cn: Easy Run标签传递轻松感，缓解运动压力
design_highlights.en: Easy Run label conveys relaxed tone, reducing exercise anxiety

product_insight.cn: 通过底部弹窗快速呈现训练选项，结合预设计划与自由模式双入口设计，既满足目标导向用户的结构化需求，又兼顾随性用户的灵活性，有效提升训练开始率
product_insight.en: Bottom sheet with dual-entry design (preset plan + free run) serves both goal-oriented users needing structure and casual users wanting flexibility, effectively boosting workout initiation rate

core_function.cn: 展示训练计划日历和每日待完成的训练任务
core_function.en: Display training calendar and daily workout tasks

design_highlights.cn: 彩色圆点标记不同训练类型，日历信息密度高但清晰易读
design_highlights.en: Colored dots indicate workout types, high-density calendar remains clear and readable

design_highlights.cn: 周次选择器(Week 1/6)配合日历联动，快速定位训练进度
design_highlights.en: Week selector (Week 1/6) syncs with calendar for quick progress navigation

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目CTA「Record workout」引导用户立即开始训练
design_highlights.en: Prominent bottom CTA 'Record workout' encourages immediate action

design_highlights.cn: 徽章图标(5级)和进度条(1/6)提供成就感和目标驱动
design_highlights.en: Badge icon (level 5) and progress bar (1/6) provide achievement and goal motivation

product_insight.cn: 将日历视图与训练计划深度整合，用户可直观看到整体安排和当日任务。周进度概览(1/6 workouts, 4/13KM)量化目标，降低训练的不确定性，提升计划执行率。
product_insight.en: Deep integration of calendar view with training plan lets users see overall schedule and daily tasks. Weekly progress overview quantifies goals, reduces uncertainty and improves plan adherence.

core_function.cn: 展示精选冥想内容，引导用户开始练习
core_function.en: Display featured meditation content and guide users to start practice

design_highlights.cn: 圆形景观图片配合星空元素，营造宁静冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Circular landscape image with starry sky creates serene meditation atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 暖色调渐变背景搭配粉色内容卡片，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with pink content cards creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: "Check In With Yourself"文案直击用户情感需求，建立连接
design_highlights.en: "Check In With Yourself" copy directly addresses emotional needs and builds connection

design_highlights.cn: "New"标签突出新内容，时长标注降低决策门槛
design_highlights.en: "New" tag highlights fresh content, duration label reduces decision friction

product_insight.cn: 首页采用沉浸式视觉设计，弱化功能感强化情感体验。精选内容区突出短时冥想（7分钟），降低用户启动门槛，符合碎片化使用场景。底部导航精简为4个核心功能，聚焦用户主要需求。
product_insight.en: Immersive visual design prioritizes emotional experience over functionality. Featured short meditation (7 min) reduces commitment barrier for fragmented usage. Streamlined 4-tab navigation focuses on core user needs.

core_function.cn: 确认用户修改体重记录的操作，防止误操作
core_function.en: Confirm weight entry modification to prevent accidental changes

design_highlights.cn: 二次确认弹窗清晰展示数据变更详情（57kg→56kg），降低误操作风险
design_highlights.en: Confirmation dialog clearly shows data change details (57kg→56kg) to reduce errors

design_highlights.cn: 弹窗设计简洁，蓝色主按钮突出确认操作，灰色取消按钮形成视觉层级
design_highlights.en: Clean modal design with blue primary button and gray cancel creates visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 友好的确认文案"Are you sure"体现对用户数据的尊重和保护
design_highlights.en: Friendly confirmation copy shows respect and protection for user data

product_insight.cn: 健康数据类产品采用二次确认机制保护用户重要数据，弹窗明确展示变更前后数值对比，既防止误操作又增强用户对数据准确性的信心，是健康追踪类App的最佳实践。
product_insight.en: Health apps use confirmation dialogs to protect important data. Showing before/after values prevents errors and builds trust in data accuracy - a best practice for health tracking apps.

core_function.cn: 展示个人运动数据和关注运动员的活动动态
core_function.en: Display personal stats and followed athletes' activity feed

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，提升运动氛围感和数据可读性
