design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates athletic atmosphere and improves data readability

design_highlights.cn: 活动卡片支持点赞、评论、分享，强化社交互动闭环
design_highlights.en: Activity cards support kudos, comments, sharing for complete social interaction loop

design_highlights.cn: Kudos点赞机制和头像堆叠展示激励用户社交参与
design_highlights.en: Kudos mechanism with stacked avatars motivates social engagement

design_highlights.cn: 顶部周报快照模块突出个人数据，引导用户持续记录
design_highlights.en: Weekly snapshot at top highlights personal data, encouraging continuous tracking

product_insight.cn: 将个人数据统计与社交动态流结合，通过关注专业运动员的活动激励普通用户。Kudos社交货币机制降低互动门槛，Follow提示引导用户扩展社交网络，形成内容消费与生产的正循环。
product_insight.en: Combines personal stats with social feed, motivating users through professional athletes' activities. Kudos as social currency lowers interaction barrier, follow prompts guide network expansion, creating positive content cycle.

core_function.cn: 展示运动动态、推荐关注用户、记录跑步成就
core_function.en: Display activity feed, recommend users to follow, showcase running achievements

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，突出运动品牌活力感
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates energetic sports brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 横向滑动推荐用户卡片，Follow/Unfollow状态切换清晰
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling user cards with clear follow/unfollow state toggle

design_highlights.cn: 活动卡片整合距离、配速、时间、成就徽章等多维数据
design_highlights.en: Activity cards integrate distance, pace, time and achievement badges

design_highlights.cn: Who to Follow模块降低社交门槛，提升用户留存
design_highlights.en: Who to Follow module reduces social friction and improves retention

product_insight.cn: Strava将社交推荐置于首页顶部，优先建立用户社交关系网络，通过运动数据可视化和成就系统激励分享，形成社区粘性闭环
product_insight.en: Strava prioritizes social connections by placing follow suggestions at top, using activity data visualization and achievements to encourage sharing and build community stickiness

core_function.cn: 引导用户开始记录运动或连接设备同步数据
core_function.en: Guide users to start recording activities or connect devices for data sync

design_highlights.cn: 真实运动场景配合智能手表界面展示，增强产品可信度和使用场景代入感
design_highlights.en: Real sports scene with smartwatch interface display enhances credibility and context immersion

design_highlights.cn: 双CTA设计提供两种路径：直接记录或设备连接，降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Dual CTA design offers two paths: direct recording or device connection, reducing decision barriers

design_highlights.cn: 展示微笑运动员形象和健康数据，传递积极健康的生活方式愿景
design_highlights.en: Smiling athlete image with health stats conveys positive healthy lifestyle vision

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式保留首页上下文，支持快速关闭继续浏览
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal preserves home context, supports quick dismiss to continue browsing

product_insight.cn: 通过场景化图片和双路径CTA，Strava巧妙解决新用户冷启动问题。既支持原生记录又兼容第三方设备，最大化用户入口覆盖，体现平台化运营思路。
product_insight.en: Strava cleverly solves new user cold start with contextual imagery and dual-path CTAs. Supporting both native recording and third-party devices maximizes user entry points, reflecting platform strategy.

core_function.cn: 推广新功能，引导用户探索户外路线
core_function.en: Promote new trail discovery feature and guide users to explore routes

design_highlights.cn: 拼贴式户外活动图片展示多场景应用，黄色活动图标点缀增强活力
design_highlights.en: Collage-style outdoor activity photos showcase multiple scenarios with vibrant yellow icon accent

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色CTA按钮搭配"Start Exploring"行动号召，降低使用门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA button with 'Start Exploring' call-to-action lowers barrier to entry

design_highlights.cn: "New!"标签营造新鲜感，"vetted by locals"建立信任与专业感
design_highlights.en: 'New!' badge creates freshness, 'vetted by locals' builds trust and authenticity

design_highlights.cn: 三种活动类型图标（徒步/骑行/自行车）直观展示功能覆盖范围
design_highlights.en: Three activity type icons (hiking/running/cycling) clearly show feature coverage

product_insight.cn: 通过弹窗形式在用户浏览路线时精准推广新功能，强调本地验证路线降低决策成本，多活动类型展示扩大目标用户群，设计策略值得借鉴
product_insight.en: Modal timing during route browsing enables precise feature promotion. Emphasizing locally-vetted routes reduces decision friction while multi-activity display broadens target audience

core_function.cn: 浏览和发现冥想内容集合，按时长和主题筛选
core_function.en: Browse and discover meditation content collections with duration and topic filters

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变棕色背景营造平静氛围，圆形和矩形卡片混合布局增加视觉层次
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient brown background creates calming atmosphere, mixed circular and rectangular cards add visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 横向滚动时长筛选器实现快速筛选，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrollable duration filter chips enable quick filtering and reduce decision cost

design_highlights.cn: 精选集封面采用真人面孔和自然意象，建立情感连接和信任感
design_highlights.en: Featured collections use real faces and natural imagery to build emotional connection and trust

design_highlights.cn: 多样化内容分类满足不同用户需求，提高内容匹配度和留存
design_highlights.en: Diversified content categories meet different user needs, improving content matching and retention

product_insight.cn: 发现页通过时长筛选器降低选择门槛，精选集设计兼顾时效性（Black History Month）和普适性（初学者），有效平衡内容曝光和个性化推荐，值得借鉴其内容运营策略
product_insight.en: Discover page reduces selection barriers with duration filters, curated collections balance timeliness and universality, effectively combining content exposure with personalized recommendations

core_function.cn: 展示每日冥想内容和功能分类入口
core_function.en: Display daily meditation content and feature category entries

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变色背景配合日落云彩意象，营造平静放松氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with sunset clouds imagery creates calm atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 六宫格图标分类清晰，支持快速导航到不同功能模块
design_highlights.en: Six-grid icon categories enable quick navigation to different modules

design_highlights.cn: 真人导师照片增强信任感和人格化连接
design_highlights.en: Real instructor photos enhance trust and personal connection

design_highlights.cn: 每日更新内容创造持续访问动机，提升用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Daily updated content creates continuous engagement motivation

product_insight.cn: 通过"Today's Dailies"强调每日仪式感，结合知名导师IP（Jay Shetty）提升内容权威性。功能分类清晰但不繁杂，降低用户决策成本，是冥想类App的标杆首页设计。
product_insight.en: Daily rituals emphasized through 'Today's Dailies' with celebrity instructor IP (Jay Shetty) for authority. Clear but simple categorization reduces decision fatigue - benchmark home design for meditation apps.

core_function.cn: 浏览和选择助眠主题播放列表内容
core_function.en: Browse and select curated sleep playlists by theme

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合倾斜卡片设计，营造沉浸式睡眠氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with tilted card design creates immersive sleep atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 横向分类标签栏快速切换内容类型，降低导航成本
design_highlights.en: Horizontal category tabs enable quick content type switching with low navigation cost

design_highlights.cn: 地域主题播放列表（欧洲/亚洲/北美）激发探索欲和旅行联想
design_highlights.en: Regional themed playlists evoke travel associations and exploration desire

design_highlights.cn: 3D倾斜相框效果使封面图更具层次感和高级感
design_highlights.en: 3D tilted frame effect adds depth and premium feel to cover images

product_insight.cn: 通过地域主题包装助眠内容，将单调的睡眠功能转化为精神旅行体验，提升用户情感价值认同。分类标签支持多维度内容组织，满足不同场景需求。
product_insight.en: Packaging sleep content with regional themes transforms mundane sleep function into mental travel experience, enhancing emotional value. Category tabs support multi-dimensional content organization for different scenarios.

core_function.cn: 展示每周训练计划、进度追踪和即将进行的训练安排
core_function.en: Display weekly training plan, progress tracking and upcoming workouts

design_highlights.cn: 进度条分段设计直观展示周训练完成情况，已完成和未完成状态色彩对比明显
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar visually shows weekly workout completion with clear color contrast

design_highlights.cn: 教练消息卡片可展开查看详情，增强个性化指导体验
design_highlights.en: Coach message card expandable for details, enhancing personalized coaching experience

design_highlights.cn: 已完成训练的勾选标记和今日任务突出显示，提供即时成就感
design_highlights.en: Checkmark for completed workouts and today's task highlight provide instant achievement

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定Record Run按钮降低操作门槛，促进用户持续记录
design_highlights.en: Fixed Record Run button at bottom reduces friction and encourages continuous tracking

product_insight.cn: 通过教练角色增强用户粘性，训练计划日历化管理降低用户决策成本，今日任务突出显示配合底部快捷操作，形成完整的行为闭环设计
product_insight.en: Coach persona enhances engagement, calendar-based plan reduces decision fatigue, today's task highlight with quick action button creates complete behavioral loop

core_function.cn: 展示5K跑步训练计划进度与预估成绩
core_function.en: Display 5K training plan progress and estimated finish time

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色徽章等级系统搭配进度条，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Blue badge ranking system with progress bar creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 预估完赛时间区间给予用户明确目标感和期待
design_highlights.en: Estimated finish time range provides clear goals and anticipation

design_highlights.cn: AI监测功能模块突出智能化卖点，强化产品价值
design_highlights.en: AI monitoring module highlights smart features and reinforces product value

design_highlights.cn: 四个快捷入口图标设计简洁，功能分区明确
design_highlights.en: Four quick-access icons with clean design and clear functional segmentation

product_insight.cn: 将训练计划与预估成绩结合展示，让用户看到努力与回报的关联。AI监测模块增强专业感和个性化体验，有效提升用户粘性和付费转化意愿。
product_insight.en: Combining training plan with estimated results shows users the effort-reward connection. AI monitoring enhances professionalism and personalization, effectively improving retention and conversion.

core_function.cn: 展示当日训练计划和周训练进度概览
core_function.en: Display daily workout plan and weekly training progress overview

design_highlights.cn: 横向日历条设计直观展示一周计划，彩色圆点标识不同训练状态
design_highlights.en: Horizontal calendar bar intuitively displays weekly plan with colored dots indicating training status

design_highlights.cn: 可滑动的提示卡片引导用户连接设备，支持一键连接或关闭
design_highlights.en: Swipeable prompt card guides device connection with one-tap connect or dismiss

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定录制按钮配合温度显示，降低运动记录门槛
design_highlights.en: Fixed bottom record button with temperature display reduces barrier to workout logging

design_highlights.cn: Week 1标识配合0/3进度营造起步阶段的仪式感
design_highlights.en: Week 1 badge with 0/3 progress creates ceremonial feel for starting journey

product_insight.cn: 首页聚焦当日任务而非全部内容，降低决策负担。周概览显示已完成/总计模式创造清晰目标感，设备连接提示在不影响核心功能情况下引导生态绑定。
product_insight.en: Homepage focuses on today's task reducing decision burden. Weekly overview with completion ratio creates clear goal sense, device connection prompt guides ecosystem binding without blocking core features.

core_function.cn: 展示每日训练计划、周进度和运动洞察
core_function.en: Display daily workouts, weekly progress and fitness insights

design_highlights.cn: 横向日历条设计简洁，用彩色圆点标记不同训练状态，信息密度高
design_highlights.en: Horizontal calendar strip with colored dots indicating workout status, high information density

design_highlights.cn: 底部悬浮Record按钮便于快速记录，减少操作路径
design_highlights.en: Floating record button at bottom enables quick workout logging with minimal steps

design_highlights.cn: 力量训练设置卡片使用提示引导，双按钮降低决策压力
design_highlights.en: Strength setup prompt card with dual buttons reduces decision friction

design_highlights.cn: 周进度0/3的展示激励用户完成目标，形成承诺感
design_highlights.en: Week progress 0/3 display motivates users to complete goals, creating commitment

product_insight.cn: 采用周计划视图而非日视图，帮助用户建立长期训练节奏。力量训练功能交叉推广自然融入首页，利用场景关联提升功能发现率，同时保留用户选择权。
product_insight.en: Weekly plan view helps users build long-term training rhythm. Strength training cross-promotion naturally integrated into home screen, leveraging contextual relevance to boost feature discovery while preserving user choice.

core_function.cn: 展示运动目标、活动记录和社交动态
core_function.en: Display fitness goals, activity records and social feed

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动感强烈，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates strong athletic vibe and clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 首次活动徽章奖励，即时正向反馈激励用户持续使用
design_highlights.en: First activity badge reward provides instant positive feedback to encourage retention

design_highlights.cn: 目标卡片可滑动切换，Set Goal按钮醒目引导用户设定目标
design_highlights.en: Swipeable goal cards with prominent Set Goal CTA guides users to set targets

design_highlights.cn: 活动卡片融合数据统计与实拍图片，信息丰富且具真实感
design_highlights.en: Activity cards combine stats with real photos for rich and authentic content

product_insight.cn: 首页整合目标设定、活动记录和成就系统三大核心模块，通过游戏化徽章和社交动态双重驱动用户活跃度，低门槛目标(1km/周)降低新用户心理压力，值得借鉴
product_insight.en: Home integrates goal setting, activity tracking and achievement system. Gamified badges and social feed drive engagement, while low-threshold goals (1km/week) reduce new user anxiety

core_function.cn: 引导用户进行深呼吸放松练习
core_function.en: Guide users through deep breathing relaxation exercise

design_highlights.cn: 渐变蓝紫色背景营造宁静冥想氛围，视觉上减轻焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Blue-purple gradient background creates calm meditation atmosphere, visually reducing anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 极简文案"take a deep breath"直接引导行动，温和不施压
design_highlights.en: Minimalist copy 'take a deep breath' directly guides action in a gentle, non-pressuring way

design_highlights.cn: 全屏沉浸式设计去除干扰元素，帮助用户专注当下
design_highlights.en: Full-screen immersive design removes distracting elements, helping users focus on the moment

product_insight.cn: 通过极简沉浸式设计降低用户认知负担，渐变色彩心理学运用恰当，符合冥想类产品"少即是多"的设计哲学，是引导放松场景的优秀范例
product_insight.en: Minimalist immersive design reduces cognitive load, gradient color psychology applied appropriately, exemplifies 'less is more' philosophy for meditation products

core_function.cn: 感谢用户反馈并引导至应用商店写评价
core_function.en: Thank users for feedback and guide them to write app store review

design_highlights.cn: 先表达感谢再请求评价，建立情感连接降低用户抵触
design_highlights.en: Express gratitude before requesting review, building emotional connection to reduce resistance

design_highlights.cn: 五星满分预填充暗示积极评价，品牌图标增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled 5-star rating suggests positive review, brand icon enhances trust

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计给予用户选择权，OK按钮提供无压力退出路径
design_highlights.en: Dual-button design gives user choice, OK button provides pressure-free exit path

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗聚焦用户注意力，背景模糊突出核心操作
design_highlights.en: Modal popup focuses attention, blurred background highlights core action

product_insight.cn: 采用情感前置策略，先感谢再请求，配合预填五星降低评价门槛。双CTA设计既保证转化又不损害用户体验，是评价引导的最佳实践。
product_insight.en: Uses gratitude-first strategy with pre-filled 5-star to lower review friction. Dual CTA design balances conversion with user experience - a best practice for review prompts.

core_function.cn: 展示与关键词相关的内容、讲述者和专辑
core_function.en: Display content, narrators and albums related to search keyword

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合圆形/方形头像区分内容类型，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with circular/square avatars to differentiate content types

design_highlights.cn: 筛选器下拉设计便于快速缩小搜索范围，支持分类和时长筛选
design_highlights.en: Dropdown filters for quick narrowing by category and duration

design_highlights.cn: 混合结果展示包含讲述者、睡眠故事、专辑等多维度匹配内容
design_highlights.en: Mixed results showing narrators, sleep stories, and albums for comprehensive matching

design_highlights.cn: 名人讲述者（ROSÉ）置顶显示，利用粉丝效应提升用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Celebrity narrator (ROSÉ) featured prominently to leverage fan engagement

product_insight.cn: 搜索结果采用多类型混合展示策略，通过名人讲述者优先排序提升转化率。筛选器设计简洁但功能完整，平衡了发现效率与探索体验，值得冥想类产品借鉴。
product_insight.en: Mixed-type search results with celebrity prioritization boosts conversion. Clean filter design balances discovery efficiency with exploration, a good pattern for meditation apps.

core_function.cn: 邀请伴侣加入备孕计划，共享受孕信息
core_function.en: Invite partner to join fertility tracking and share conception info

design_highlights.cn: 模拟手机界面展示伴侣视角，直观呈现功能价值
design_highlights.en: Simulated phone interface shows partner's view, visually demonstrating feature value

design_highlights.cn: 「New feature」标签+火焰emoji制造新鲜感，激发尝试欲望
design_highlights.en: New feature tag with fire emoji creates novelty and triggers curiosity

design_highlights.cn: 「Keep baby-making sex fun」等轻松文案降低敏感话题的心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Playful copy like 'Keep baby-making sex fun' reduces awkwardness around sensitive topic

design_highlights.cn: 提供「I'm not interested」退出选项，尊重用户选择权
design_highlights.en: Offers 'I'm not interested' option, respecting user's choice and autonomy

product_insight.cn: 通过可视化预览降低用户对邀请伴侣的顾虑，将备孕从个人行为升级为双人协作，既提升用户粘性又扩大用户基数，是典型的增长+留存双赢策略。
product_insight.en: Visual preview reduces hesitation about inviting partners. Transforms fertility tracking from solo to couple activity, boosting both retention and user acquisition—a classic growth-retention win-win strategy.

core_function.cn: 介绍膳食计划功能，引导用户开始使用
core_function.en: Introduce meal planning feature and guide users to get started

design_highlights.cn: 高品质美食摄影配合淡雅背景，营造健康生活氛围
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography with subtle background creates healthy lifestyle atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: "Say goodbye to guesswork"文案直击用户痛点，降低决策压力
design_highlights.en: Copy 'Say goodbye to guesswork' addresses user pain points and reduces decision fatigue

design_highlights.cn: Premium标识配合星标，强化高级功能价值感
design_highlights.en: Premium badge with star icon reinforces premium feature value perception

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮"Get started"降低用户行动门槛
design_highlights.en: Single 'Get started' CTA button lowers action barrier for users

product_insight.cn: 通过功能预览页展示高级功能价值，用美食实拍增强真实感和吸引力。将复杂的膳食规划简化为"告别猜测"的价值主张，有效提升Premium转化意愿。
product_insight.en: Feature preview showcases premium value with appetizing food photography. Simplifying meal planning to 'goodbye guesswork' value proposition effectively drives premium conversion intent.

core_function.cn: 全屏预览并选择环境氛围场景
core_function.en: Full-screen preview and select ambient scene

design_highlights.cn: 沉浸式全屏视频预览，让用户真实感受场景氛围
design_highlights.en: Immersive full-screen video preview for authentic scene experience

design_highlights.cn: 简洁双按钮设计，选择或移除操作路径清晰
design_highlights.en: Clean dual-button design with clear choose or remove actions

design_highlights.cn: 海岸日落场景营造放松治愈的情感氛围
design_highlights.en: Coastline sunset scene creates relaxing and healing emotional atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 采用先体验后决策的设计策略，通过全屏沉浸式预览降低用户选择焦虑，同时底部悬浮按钮不遮挡主要内容，平衡了沉浸感与操作便捷性。
product_insight.en: Uses try-before-decide strategy with immersive preview to reduce selection anxiety, floating buttons at bottom balance immersion with accessibility.

core_function.cn: 生成配对码邀请伴侣共享健康数据
core_function.en: Generate pairing code to invite partner for health data sharing

design_highlights.cn: 渐变品牌标题配合简洁白底，配对码大字体突出显示易于识别
design_highlights.en: Gradient brand title with clean white background, large pairing code for easy recognition

design_highlights.cn: 底部隐私提示强调数据安全，建立用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Privacy reminder at bottom emphasizes data security and builds user trust

design_highlights.cn: 粉色CTA按钮醒目，一键分享降低操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Eye-catching pink CTA button enables one-tap sharing to reduce friction

design_highlights.cn: Skip选项保留用户控制权，不强制完成配对流程
design_highlights.en: Skip option preserves user control without forcing pairing completion

product_insight.cn: 通过伴侣共享功能增强产品粘性和传播，配对码机制既保护隐私又便于分享。隐私声明增强信任，适合健康类App的敏感数据共享场景。
product_insight.en: Partner sharing feature enhances retention and virality. Pairing code mechanism balances privacy and shareability. Privacy statement builds trust for sensitive health data sharing.

core_function.cn: 提供用户与客服团队沟通的入口和功能反馈渠道
core_function.en: Provide user communication portal and feature request channel

design_highlights.cn: 三位客服头像并排展示，增强真人服务的亲切感和信任度
design_highlights.en: Three support agent avatars displayed side by side, enhancing authenticity and trust

design_highlights.cn: 诚实告知响应时间延长并表达感谢，建立透明沟通的品牌形象
design_highlights.en: Honest communication about delayed response with gratitude, building transparent brand image

design_highlights.cn: 灯泡emoji引导新功能请求，降低用户反馈门槛
design_highlights.en: Light bulb emoji guides feature requests, lowering feedback barrier

product_insight.cn: 将客服等待期转化为收集用户需求的机会，用真人头像和坦诚文案降低用户焦虑。功能请求入口的设置既收集产品反馈又转移等待注意力，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Transforms support waiting period into opportunity for collecting user needs. Real photos and honest copy reduce anxiety. Feature request entry collects feedback while diverting attention from wait times.

core_function.cn: 创建并发布带有位置标签的内容帖子
core_function.en: Create and publish content posts with location tags

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题界面配合红色品牌色，强化Arc'teryx品牌识别
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with red brand color reinforces Arc'teryx brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 顶部红色错误提示条清晰反馈操作状态
design_highlights.en: Top red error banner provides clear feedback on operation status

design_highlights.cn: 底部工具栏集成评论开关和媒体添加功能，操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Bottom toolbar integrates comment toggle and media addition for easy access

product_insight.cn: 作为户外品牌的社区功能，通过位置标签(New York)将用户内容与门店关联，构建本地化社区互动，同时提供评论开关让用户控制隐私。错误状态设计简洁不干扰主流程。
product_insight.en: As outdoor brand's community feature, location tags connect user content with stores for localized community engagement. Comment toggle gives privacy control. Error state design is minimal and non-intrusive.

core_function.cn: 允许用户命名并保存自定义冥想播放列表
core_function.en: Allow users to name and save custom meditation playlists

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计配合毛玻璃背景，保持上下文连贯性
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with frosted glass background maintains context continuity

design_highlights.cn: 输入框右侧清除按钮便于快速修改，降低操作成本
design_highlights.en: Clear button on input field enables quick modification with low effort

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的棕金色CTA按钮与品牌色一致，引导完成保存动作
design_highlights.en: Prominent brown-gold CTA button aligns with brand, guides save action

design_highlights.cn: 预填充默认名称降低用户决策负担，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled default name reduces decision burden and improves completion

product_insight.cn: 采用模态弹窗而非独立页面，减少跳转打断感；预设默认值+单一输入框极简设计，将创建播放列表的门槛降到最低，鼓励用户建立个人内容组织习惯。
product_insight.en: Modal approach minimizes navigation disruption; default value plus single input field lowers playlist creation barrier, encouraging users to build personal content organization habits.

core_function.cn: 确认配对码创建成功，引导伴侣完成账户关联
core_function.en: Confirm pairing code created and guide partner account linking

design_highlights.cn: 温馨情侣插画配合击掌动作，传递亲密连接感
design_highlights.en: Warm couple illustration with high-five gesture conveys intimate connection

design_highlights.cn: 绿色勾选标记配合步骤说明，营造成功完成的积极情绪
design_highlights.en: Green checkmarks with step instructions create positive completion feeling

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的三步流程说明降低用户认知负担，明确下一步操作
design_highlights.en: Clear three-step process reduces cognitive load and clarifies next action

design_highlights.cn: 粉色醒目CTA按钮引导用户继续使用核心功能
design_highlights.en: Pink prominent CTA button guides users to continue with core features

product_insight.cn: 通过伴侣共享功能提升用户粘性和留存率，将个人健康追踪转化为双人协作体验，增强产品社交属性和情感价值，同时通过邀请机制实现自然获客
product_insight.en: Partner sharing feature enhances retention by transforming personal tracking into collaborative experience, adding social attributes and enabling organic user acquisition through invitation mechanism

core_function.cn: 引导用户创建第一个膳食计划
core_function.en: Guide users to create their first meal plan

design_highlights.cn: 精致的日历插画配合柔和渐变背景，营造轻松愉悦的规划氛围
design_highlights.en: Delicate calendar illustration with soft gradient background creates a pleasant planning atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 友好的"Get started"文案降低用户心理门槛，鼓励首次尝试
design_highlights.en: Friendly 'Get started' copy lowers psychological barriers and encourages first attempt

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的蓝色CTA按钮居中放置，带加号图标强化创建行动
design_highlights.en: Prominent blue CTA button centered with plus icon reinforces creation action

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Tab切换设计支持膳食计划与购物清单两种场景无缝切换
design_highlights.en: Top tab switching design enables seamless transition between meal plan and groceries

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计简洁不空洞，通过可爱插画和单一CTA降低决策成本，引导用户快速开启核心功能。Tab分类暗示了计划到采购的完整用户旅程。
product_insight.en: Empty state design is simple yet engaging, using cute illustration and single CTA to reduce decision cost. Tab categories hint at complete user journey from planning to shopping.

core_function.cn: 用户完成餐食后进行星级评分反馈
core_function.en: Star rating feedback after completing a meal

design_highlights.cn: 食谱步骤清晰分段，食材标签化展示便于快速识别
design_highlights.en: Clear recipe steps with ingredient tags for quick identification

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗评分设计，不中断浏览体验，操作轻量化
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet rating modal doesn't interrupt browsing, lightweight interaction

design_highlights.cn: 5颗蓝色实心星营造满意氛围，默认高评分引导正向反馈
design_highlights.en: 5 filled blue stars create satisfaction atmosphere, default high rating guides positive feedback

design_highlights.cn: 评分入口时机把握精准，在用户完成食谱后自然触发
design_highlights.en: Perfect timing for rating prompt after recipe completion

product_insight.cn: 评分弹窗在食谱浏览完成时触发，抓住用户成就感最强的时刻收集反馈。默认5星设计巧妙降低评分门槛，同时为算法推荐提供数据支撑，提升个性化体验。
product_insight.en: Rating modal triggers at peak satisfaction moment after recipe completion. Default 5-star design cleverly lowers rating barrier while collecting data for personalized recommendations.

core_function.cn: 提供在线客服聊天入口，用户可反馈问题
core_function.en: Provide live chat support entry for users to report issues

design_highlights.cn: 真人头像展示增强信任感，三人组合暗示团队服务
design_highlights.en: Real team avatars build trust, trio layout implies team support

design_highlights.cn: 诚恳的等待提示文案，预期管理同时表达感谢
design_highlights.en: Honest wait time copy manages expectations while expressing gratitude

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的问题反馈入口，底部固定输入框便于快速操作
design_highlights.en: Clean problem report entry with fixed bottom input for quick action

product_insight.cn: 通过真人头像和坦诚的等待时间说明建立用户信任，预设「Report a Problem」引导用户聚焦问题反馈而非闲聊，提升客服效率。这种透明沟通策略值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Real avatars and honest wait time disclosure build trust. Pre-set 'Report a Problem' guides users to focused feedback rather than casual chat, improving support efficiency. Transparent communication strategy worth adopting.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步路线信息及社区活动数据
core_function.en: Display running route details with community activity data

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线轨迹，视觉对比强烈易识别
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route trace creates strong visual contrast

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，可上滑展开更多内容
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables one-hand operation with swipe-up expansion

design_highlights.cn: 显示44个近期活动和用户头像，增强社交证明和路线可信度
design_highlights.en: 44 recent activities with avatars enhance social proof and route credibility

design_highlights.cn: 右侧悬浮播放按钮引导用户立即开始运动
design_highlights.en: Floating play button guides users to start activity immediately

product_insight.cn: 通过展示距离、时间、难度等核心指标快速辅助决策，结合社区活动数据和实景照片，降低用户对陌生路线的心理门槛，提升路线使用转化率
product_insight.en: Core metrics like distance, time, difficulty enable quick decisions. Community data and real photos reduce uncertainty about unfamiliar routes, improving route adoption

core_function.cn: 通过神秘礼盒形式展示优惠，激发用户好奇心
core_function.en: Present offers through mystery gift box to spark user curiosity

design_highlights.cn: 明亮的黄色礼盒配合渐变丝带，搭配闪烁星星元素营造惊喜氛围
design_highlights.en: Bright yellow gift box with gradient ribbon and sparkling stars creates excitement

design_highlights.cn: "A gift just for you"个性化文案传递专属感和价值感
design_highlights.en: Personalized copy 'A gift just for you' conveys exclusivity and value

design_highlights.cn: 粉橙渐变CTA按钮醒目突出，"Open now"制造即时行动冲动
design_highlights.en: Pink-orange gradient CTA stands out, 'Open now' creates urgency to act

design_highlights.cn: 悬念式交互设计，用户需点击揭晓优惠内容，增加参与感
design_highlights.en: Suspenseful interaction requiring tap to reveal offer increases engagement

product_insight.cn: 采用游戏化拆礼盒机制替代直接展示优惠，利用好奇心驱动用户完成转化动作。极简页面聚焦单一CTA，降低决策成本，提升点击率。
product_insight.en: Gamified gift unboxing replaces direct offer display, leveraging curiosity to drive conversion. Minimal page focuses on single CTA, reducing decision friction and boosting click-through rate.

core_function.cn: 编辑保存跑步路线名称及隐私设置
core_function.en: Edit and save running route name and privacy settings

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线轨迹，视觉层次分明且专业感强
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route trace creates clear visual hierarchy and professional feel

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式保持地图上下文可见，编辑不打断用户空间感知
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet keeps map context visible, editing doesn't interrupt spatial awareness

design_highlights.cn: 收藏星标和隐私开关降低分享门槛，促进社区内容生产
design_highlights.en: Favorite star and privacy toggle lower sharing barrier, promote community content

design_highlights.cn: 自动生成路线名称减少用户输入负担，体现智能化体验
design_highlights.en: Auto-generated route name reduces input burden, reflects intelligent experience

product_insight.cn: 将路线保存与社交分享整合在同一界面，通过隐私开关默认公开和离线下载功能，既鼓励UGC内容生产又增加用户粘性，是运动社区产品的优秀设计范式。
product_insight.en: Integrating route saving with social sharing, default public privacy toggle and offline download encourages UGC while increasing retention - excellent pattern for fitness social products.

core_function.cn: 通过滑块设置偏好距离筛选跑步路线
core_function.en: Filter running routes by preferred distance using slider

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次清晰，路线一目了然
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlighting creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式筛选器，单手可操作滑块，不遮挡地图主体
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet filter with thumb-friendly slider, keeps map visible

design_highlights.cn: Reset和Apply双按钮设计，降低用户决策成本，鼓励探索
design_highlights.en: Reset and Apply buttons reduce decision cost and encourage exploration

design_highlights.cn: 滑块采用品牌橙色，与地图路线颜色呼应，强化品牌识别
design_highlights.en: Slider uses brand orange matching route color for brand consistency

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的路线筛选简化为单一维度操作，实时地图预览让用户即时看到筛选结果，降低学习成本的同时提升探索欲望，是工具类App简化复杂功能的典范设计
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex route filtering to single dimension with real-time map preview, reducing learning curve while encouraging exploration - exemplary design for simplifying complex features in utility apps

core_function.cn: 根据路线海拔起伏筛选跑步/骑行路线
core_function.en: Filter running/cycling routes by elevation preferences

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合亮橙色路线，视觉层次分明，路线清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with bright orange route creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计，单选筛选条件简洁直观，操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with radio selection provides intuitive and quick filtering

design_highlights.cn: 通过清晰文案解释每个选项含义，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Clear descriptive text for each option reduces user decision friction

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的地形筛选简化为三个直观选项（任意/平坦/起伏），满足不同体能水平用户需求。底部弹窗设计保持地图可见，用户可实时预览路线变化，提升筛选体验。
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex terrain filtering into three intuitive options for different fitness levels. Bottom sheet keeps map visible for real-time route preview, enhancing filtering experience.

core_function.cn: 选择跑步路线的路面类型偏好
core_function.en: Select preferred surface type for running routes

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlighting creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计保留地图上下文，便于即时预览筛选效果
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet preserves map context for instant filter preview

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项附带详细说明，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Detailed descriptions for each option reduce user decision friction

product_insight.cn: 将专业跑者关注的路面类型抽象为三级选项，平衡了功能专业性与操作简洁性。底部弹窗设计让用户在筛选时仍可看到地图，形成即时反馈闭环。
product_insight.en: Abstracts surface preferences into three clear options, balancing professional features with simplicity. Bottom sheet maintains map visibility for instant feedback loop during filtering.

core_function.cn: 基于周期数据预测受孕窗口期
core_function.en: Predict fertility window based on cycle data

design_highlights.cn: 极简卡片式设计，大号紫色数字突出关键信息，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist card design with prominent purple number highlighting key info

design_highlights.cn: 温和的文案措辞'could lead to'降低敏感话题的紧张感
design_highlights.en: Gentle wording 'could lead to' reduces tension around sensitive topic

design_highlights.cn: 底部免责声明建立信任，明确产品定位为教育工具
design_highlights.en: Disclaimer at bottom builds trust and clarifies educational purpose

product_insight.cn: 通过倒计时机制创造用户粘性，同时免责声明巧妙规避法律风险。将复杂的生理周期数据简化为单一数字，降低用户认知负担，提升功能易用性。
product_insight.en: Countdown mechanism creates user engagement while disclaimer mitigates legal risk. Complex cycle data simplified to single number reduces cognitive load and improves usability.

core_function.cn: 搜索并添加食物到饮食记录中
core_function.en: Search and add food items to meal tracking

design_highlights.cn: 绿色验证徽章区分官方数据与用户数据，增强可信度
design_highlights.en: Green verified badges distinguish official data from user-generated content

design_highlights.cn: 分层展示搜索结果：最佳匹配优先，更多结果其次，降低选择成本
design_highlights.en: Hierarchical results with Best Matches first reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 右侧加号按钮支持一键添加，极简操作路径提升记录效率
design_highlights.en: One-tap add buttons streamline the food logging workflow

design_highlights.cn: 清晰展示卡路里和份量信息，帮助用户快速做出选择
design_highlights.en: Clear calorie and portion info enables quick decision making

product_insight.cn: 通过分类Tab（全部/我的餐食/我的食谱/我的食物）构建个人食物库生态，提升复用率和用户粘性。Only筛选器精准过滤验证数据，平衡数据丰富性与准确性。
product_insight.en: Category tabs build personal food library ecosystem for reusability. Only filter balances data richness with accuracy by filtering verified entries.

core_function.cn: 收集用户对冥想内容的喜好反馈以优化推荐
core_function.en: Collect user preference feedback on meditation content to optimize recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计保持背景内容可见，维持上下文连贯性
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design keeps background visible, maintaining context continuity

design_highlights.cn: 二元选择简化决策，拇指图标直观表达喜好态度
design_highlights.en: Binary choice simplifies decision, thumb icons intuitively express preference

design_highlights.cn: 用「Personalize Your Recommendations」强调用户价值而非数据收集
design_highlights.en: Using 'Personalize Your Recommendations' emphasizes user value over data collection

design_highlights.cn: Clear按钮提供撤销选项，降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Clear button provides undo option, reducing user decision pressure

product_insight.cn: 通过简单的二元反馈机制收集用户偏好，既降低用户操作成本又能持续优化推荐算法。将数据收集包装为个性化服务，提升用户配合意愿，是冥想类App构建内容推荐系统的常见策略。
product_insight.en: Simple binary feedback collects preferences with low user effort while improving recommendations. Framing data collection as personalization increases user willingness, a common strategy for meditation app recommendation systems.

core_function.cn: 展示AI自动生成周餐计划的加载过程
core_function.en: Display AI-powered weekly meal plan generation loading state

design_highlights.cn: 日历式卡片布局清晰展示多日餐单，蓝色选中态区分已规划餐食
design_highlights.en: Calendar-style card layout displays multi-day meals with blue selection states

design_highlights.cn: 加载动画配合「Building meals...」文案，明确告知用户系统处理状态
design_highlights.en: Loading spinner with 'Building meals...' text clearly communicates system processing

design_highlights.cn: 渐进式展示已生成内容，减少用户等待焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Progressive display of generated content reduces user wait anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 底部Create按钮置灰但可见，暗示操作即将可用
design_highlights.en: Greyed-out Create button remains visible, hinting action will be available soon

product_insight.cn: 采用渐进式内容加载策略，让用户在等待时看到部分成果，结合明确的状态反馈，有效降低AI生成过程中的放弃率。多日餐食矩阵布局便于整体规划审视。
product_insight.en: Progressive content loading shows partial results during wait time, combined with clear status feedback to reduce abandonment during AI generation. Multi-day meal matrix layout facilitates holistic planning review.

core_function.cn: 搜索食物并引导用户创建常用餐食
core_function.en: Search food and guide users to create saved meals

design_highlights.cn: 可爱的日式食物插画（寿司、酱油瓶）营造友好氛围，减少空状态的冷清感
design_highlights.en: Cute Japanese food illustrations (sushi, soy sauce) create friendly atmosphere, reducing empty state coldness

design_highlights.cn: 分类Tab设计（All/My Meals/My Recipes/My Foods）便于快速切换不同食物来源
design_highlights.en: Category tabs (All/My Meals/My Recipes/My Foods) enable quick switching between food sources

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案强调"Log Faster"价值主张，鼓励用户创建常用餐食提升使用粘性
design_highlights.en: Empty state copy emphasizes 'Log Faster' value prop, encouraging meal creation for better retention

design_highlights.cn: "Go-To Meals"表达亲切，暗示个性化体验，降低记录门槛的心理负担
design_highlights.en: "Go-To Meals" phrasing feels personal, implying customized experience and lowering logging friction

product_insight.cn: 通过空状态引导用户建立个人食物库，这是提升饮食记录效率的关键设计。将"无内容"转化为"功能教育"机会，同时用餐食类型下拉选择器(Breakfast)帮助用户建立规律记录习惯。
product_insight.en: Empty state guides users to build personal food library, key for logging efficiency. Converts 'no content' into feature education opportunity, while meal type selector (Breakfast) helps establish regular logging habits.

core_function.cn: 浏览和选择不同类型的冥想内容
core_function.en: Browse and select various meditation content by category

design_highlights.cn: 温暖棕色渐变背景营造宁静冥想氛围，与内容主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm brown gradient background creates serene meditation atmosphere aligned with content theme

design_highlights.cn: 横向滑动标签栏实现快速分类筛选，降低内容发现成本
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling tabs enable quick category filtering, reducing content discovery friction

design_highlights.cn: 卡片展示真实场景图片与时长标签，降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Cards with real scene images and duration labels reduce user decision barriers

design_highlights.cn: "New"标签突出新内容，激发用户探索欲望提升留存
design_highlights.en: New badge highlights fresh content, stimulating exploration and improving retention

product_insight.cn: 通过分类标签+精选推荐+最近播放三层结构，满足用户快速找到内容、发现新内容、继续之前内容的多重需求，提升内容消费效率和平台粘性
product_insight.en: Three-layer structure of category tabs, featured content, and recently played meets multiple user needs for quick discovery, new exploration, and content continuity, boosting engagement

core_function.cn: 展示所有冥想课程和系列供用户浏览选择
core_function.en: Display all meditation courses and series for user browsing

design_highlights.cn: 渐变暖色背景营造平静氛围，与冥想主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates calming atmosphere aligned with meditation theme

design_highlights.cn: 高质量艺术封面图设计，每个内容视觉风格独特且统一
design_highlights.en: High-quality artistic cover images with unique yet cohesive visual styles

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式双列布局便于快速浏览，时长标签直观展示内容长度
design_highlights.en: Two-column card layout enables quick browsing with duration labels

design_highlights.cn: 导师署名增加权威感和信任度，强化专业形象
design_highlights.en: Instructor attribution adds authority and trust, reinforcing professionalism

product_insight.cn: 内容库采用精美封面+导师背书的组合策略，通过视觉差异化帮助用户快速识别内容类型。课程、系列、单次冥想的分类标注有助于用户按需求深度选择，提升内容消费效率。
product_insight.en: Library uses beautiful covers with instructor endorsements for content differentiation. Course/series/meditation labels help users choose by commitment level, improving content consumption efficiency.

core_function.cn: 展示和浏览多种类型的冥想音频内容
core_function.en: Browse and discover various meditation audio content

design_highlights.cn: 沉浸式自然风景图片作为卡片封面，营造宁静放松氛围
design_highlights.en: Immersive nature photography as card covers creates calming atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 暖色调渐变背景配合柔和配色，强化冥想主题体验
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with soft color palette reinforces meditation theme

design_highlights.cn: 横向标签筛选支持快速切换冥想类别，操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Horizontal tag filters enable quick category switching with easy access

design_highlights.cn: 显示导师名称和学历增强专业信任感
design_highlights.en: Displaying instructor credentials and titles builds professional trust

product_insight.cn: 内容库采用双列瀑布流布局最大化展示效率，每张卡片包含时长、标题、导师信息三要素，帮助用户快速决策。分类标签设计为胶囊按钮形式，当前选中态明显，降低认知负担。
product_insight.en: Dual-column grid maximizes content display efficiency. Each card includes duration, title, and instructor info for quick decision-making. Pill-shaped category tabs with clear active states reduce cognitive load.

core_function.cn: 提示用户已有订阅冲突，引导取消后重新关联企业福利
core_function.en: Alert users of subscription conflict and guide them to cancel before linking organization benefit

design_highlights.cn: 使用悲伤表情符号传达同理心，柔化错误信息的负面体验
design_highlights.en: Sad emoji conveys empathy, softening the negative error experience

design_highlights.cn: 温暖的橙棕色渐变背景营造品牌一致性，减少错误页面的压迫感
design_highlights.en: Warm orange-brown gradient maintains brand consistency and reduces pressure of error page

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的分步操作指引，告知用户具体解决路径和后续步骤
design_highlights.en: Clear step-by-step guidance explains exact solution path and next steps

product_insight.cn: 企业订阅与个人订阅的冲突处理体现了B2B2C业务复杂性。错误页面提供完整解决方案而非简单报错，降低用户流失率，同时引导用户转向企业福利计划，提升企业客户续约率。
product_insight.en: Handling conflict between enterprise and personal subscriptions reflects B2B2C complexity. Error page provides complete solution instead of simple error, reducing churn while guiding users to organization benefits.

core_function.cn: 提示用户网络连接中断，引导重试操作
core_function.en: Alert user of connection loss and prompt retry action

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的模态弹窗设计，背景半透明遮罩保持上下文可见
design_highlights.en: Clean modal design with semi-transparent overlay maintaining context visibility

design_highlights.cn: 单一OK按钮简化用户决策，蓝色CTA突出可操作性
design_highlights.en: Single OK button simplifies decision, blue CTA highlights actionability

design_highlights.cn: 餐食卡片网格布局直观，勾选状态清晰区分已选/未选
design_highlights.en: Meal card grid layout intuitive, checkmarks clearly distinguish selected/unselected

design_highlights.cn: 友好的错误文案提供解决方案而非责备用户
design_highlights.en: Friendly error copy provides solution rather than blaming user

product_insight.cn: 错误状态设计体现用户体验细节：保留背景让用户知道数据未丢失，简洁文案降低焦虑感，单按钮设计减少认知负担。餐食规划采用日历+时段矩阵布局，高效支持批量操作。
product_insight.en: Error state design shows UX attention: preserved background reassures data safety, concise copy reduces anxiety. Meal planning uses calendar+timeslot matrix for efficient batch operations.

core_function.cn: 提供助眠故事、冥想和音乐内容帮助用户入睡
core_function.en: Provide sleep stories, meditations and music to help users fall asleep

design_highlights.cn: 温暖棕色调营造舒适睡眠氛围，与内容主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm brown tones create cozy sleep atmosphere, matching content theme perfectly

design_highlights.cn: 精美插画风格封面卡片，视觉层次分明且具有艺术感
design_highlights.en: Beautiful illustrated cover cards with clear visual hierarchy and artistic appeal

design_highlights.cn: 横向分类标签便于快速筛选不同类型助眠内容
design_highlights.en: Horizontal category tabs enable quick filtering of different sleep content types

design_highlights.cn: 季节性专题'Winter Vibes'增强内容时效性和情感共鸣
design_highlights.en: Seasonal collection 'Winter Vibes' enhances content relevance and emotional connection

product_insight.cn: 通过深色暖调配色和场景化封面设计，将功能性内容转化为沉浸式体验。分类标签和专题策展结合，既保证内容发现效率又创造探索乐趣，是内容型产品的优秀范例。
product_insight.en: Dark warm tones and scenic covers transform functional content into immersive experience. Category tabs combined with curated collections balance discovery efficiency with exploration joy, exemplary for content apps.

core_function.cn: 展示周训练计划安排和完成进度
core_function.en: Display weekly training schedule and completion progress

design_highlights.cn: 分段进度条直观展示周训练完成度，配色清晰区分已完成/未完成状态
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar visually shows weekly completion with clear color distinction

design_highlights.cn: 训练卡片展示详细数据（距离/时间/配速），已完成项带勾选反馈
design_highlights.en: Workout cards display detailed metrics with checkmark feedback for completed items

design_highlights.cn: Coach Beth虚拟教练欢迎语增加人性化关怀和个性化体验
design_highlights.en: Coach Beth welcome message adds human touch and personalized experience

design_highlights.cn: 底部悬浮Record Run按钮，降低开始训练的操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Floating Record Run button reduces friction to start workout

product_insight.cn: 通过虚拟教练+结构化计划+进度可视化三重设计，将枯燥的训练计划转化为有教练陪伴的个性化体验，显著提升用户坚持率和产品粘性。
product_insight.en: Combines virtual coach, structured plan, and progress visualization to transform training into a guided personalized experience, significantly improving adherence and engagement.

core_function.cn: 展示周训练计划安排，含教练指导和各训练项目详情
core_function.en: Display weekly training schedule with coach guidance and workout details

design_highlights.cn: 左侧彩色条带区分训练类型，紫色Tempo/黄色长跑/灰色力量/蓝色轻松跑，信息层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Color-coded left borders distinguish workout types - purple tempo, yellow long run, gray strength, blue easy run

design_highlights.cn: 教练头像配合个性化消息，营造专属指导氛围，增强用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Coach avatar with personalized message creates exclusive guidance atmosphere and builds trust

design_highlights.cn: 顶部周切换器配合进度条，快速了解整体计划进度和当前位置
design_highlights.en: Week switcher with progress bar enables quick understanding of overall plan progress

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局展示训练项目，包含日期、时长、类型、距离等关键信息一目了然
design_highlights.en: Card layout displays workouts with date, duration, type, and distance at a glance

product_insight.cn: 通过教练IP人设增强用户粘性，周视图配合详细训练卡片平衡宏观规划与执行细节，色彩编码系统降低认知负担，适合跑步类产品借鉴
product_insight.en: Coach persona enhances engagement. Week view with detailed cards balances macro planning and execution. Color coding reduces cognitive load - ideal pattern for running apps

core_function.cn: 展示周训练计划、已完成和待完成的运动安排
core_function.en: Display weekly training schedule with completed and upcoming workouts

design_highlights.cn: 进度条分段设计直观展示训练完成度，颜色区分已完成与待完成
design_highlights.en: Segmented progress bar visually shows completion status with color differentiation

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局区分不同训练日，已完成项带勾选反馈，底部悬浮录制按钮便于快速操作
design_highlights.en: Card layout separates training days, checkmarks for completed items, floating record button for quick action

design_highlights.cn: AI教练头像配合个性化欢迎语，建立情感连接和信任感
design_highlights.en: AI coach avatar with personalized welcome message builds emotional connection and trust

design_highlights.cn: 清晰展示训练进度1/6和距离4/13km，激励用户完成目标
design_highlights.en: Clear display of progress 1/6 workouts and 4/13km distance motivates goal completion

product_insight.cn: 将AI教练人格化设计增强用户粘性，同时通过数字化进度追踪（次数+里程双维度）给予用户清晰的成就感，卡片化日程设计降低认知负担，值得借鉴
product_insight.en: Personified AI coach enhances engagement, dual-metric progress tracking (workouts + distance) provides clear achievement sense, card-based schedule reduces cognitive load

core_function.cn: 展示周训练计划安排和完成进度
core_function.en: Display weekly training schedule and completion progress

design_highlights.cn: 彩色进度条直观展示训练完成度，左侧色条区分运动类型
design_highlights.en: Colorful progress bars show completion, left color strips distinguish workout types

design_highlights.cn: 已完成训练显示实际数据卡片，可展开查看详细配速信息
design_highlights.en: Completed workouts show actual data cards with expandable pace details

design_highlights.cn: AI教练头像配个性化欢迎语，建立情感连接和专业指导感
design_highlights.en: AI coach avatar with personalized welcome creates emotional connection and guidance

design_highlights.cn: 底部悬浮Record Run按钮，降低开始训练的操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Floating Record Run button at bottom reduces friction to start workout

product_insight.cn: 将计划视图与实际完成数据无缝整合，用户既能看到未来安排也能回顾表现。AI教练人格化设计增强用户粘性，进度统计激励持续参与。
product_insight.en: Seamlessly integrates planned workouts with actual completion data. AI coach personification enhances engagement, progress stats motivate continued participation.

core_function.cn: 运动开始前的倒计时准备提示
core_function.en: Pre-workout countdown timer before activity starts

design_highlights.cn: 纯黑背景搭配超大白色数字，极简设计聚焦注意力
design_highlights.en: Pure black background with oversized white number, minimalist design for focus

design_highlights.cn: 自动倒计时无需用户操作，降低交互负担
design_highlights.en: Auto countdown requires no user action, reducing interaction burden

design_highlights.cn: 底部提示可关闭音频提示，体现对用户场景的贴心考虑
design_highlights.en: Tip about disabling audio cues shows thoughtful consideration for user context

product_insight.cn: 倒计时设计为用户提供心理准备缓冲期，同时底部功能提示利用等待时间进行用户教育，一举两得。纯黑界面也有助于节省电量。
product_insight.en: Countdown provides mental preparation buffer while bottom tip leverages wait time for user education. Pure black interface also helps conserve battery.

core_function.cn: 确认用户路线已成功保存并提供后续操作入口
core_function.en: Confirm route saved successfully and provide next action options

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图背景配合浅色弹窗形成强对比，聚焦用户注意力
design_highlights.en: Dark map background with light modal creates strong contrast for focus

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计提供明确的操作路径：确认或查看已保存内容
design_highlights.en: Dual-button design offers clear action paths: confirm or view saved

design_highlights.cn: 即时成功反馈增强用户操作信心和满足感
design_highlights.en: Instant success feedback enhances user confidence and satisfaction

product_insight.cn: 成功确认弹窗不仅告知结果，更通过View Saved按钮引导用户探索保存功能，提升功能发现率和用户粘性，体现了完整的用户旅程闭环设计思维
product_insight.en: Success modal not only confirms action but guides users to explore saved routes via View Saved button, improving feature discovery and engagement through complete user journey design

core_function.cn: 按难度等级筛选跑步或骑行路线
core_function.en: Filter running or cycling routes by difficulty level

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次清晰，路线一目了然
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlights creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式筛选器，单选按钮操作简单，不打断地图浏览体验
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet filter with radio buttons maintains map browsing context

design_highlights.cn: 四级难度分类简洁明了，配合圆形单选按钮设计统一
design_highlights.en: Four-tier difficulty classification with consistent radio button design

product_insight.cn: 筛选器采用底部弹窗而非全屏，让用户在调整筛选条件时仍能看到地图和路线变化，实现即时反馈。难度分级从Any到Hard覆盖全用户群，降低选择门槛。
product_insight.en: Bottom sheet filter allows users to see map changes while adjusting filters for instant feedback. Difficulty levels from Any to Hard cover all user types, lowering selection barriers.

core_function.cn: 将冥想课程分享到社交平台或保存到本地
core_function.en: Share meditation session to social platforms or save locally

design_highlights.cn: 背景保留内容详情页，增强上下文关联感
design_highlights.en: Background preserves content detail page for contextual connection

design_highlights.cn: 原生iOS分享面板设计，用户熟悉度高，操作学习成本低
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet design ensures high familiarity and low learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 预设分享文案包含链接，降低用户分享门槛促进病毒传播
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled share message with link reduces friction and promotes viral growth

product_insight.cn: 采用系统原生分享组件而非自定义设计，确保用户体验一致性。预设"Hey! I think you'd like this"的亲切文案，降低社交分享心理门槛，有效促进用户自发传播获客。
product_insight.en: Using native system share sheet ensures UX consistency. Pre-filled friendly message 'Hey! I think you'd like this' reduces social sharing friction and effectively promotes organic user acquisition.

core_function.cn: 将冥想内容分享到社交平台或保存到本地
core_function.en: Share meditation content to social platforms or save locally

design_highlights.cn: 山峰背景营造宁静氛围，与冥想主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Mountain backdrop creates serene atmosphere matching meditation theme

design_highlights.cn: 原生iOS分享面板设计，用户熟悉度高，操作无学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet design ensures familiarity and zero learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 预设分享文案"Hey! I think you'd like..."降低用户分享门槛促进传播
design_highlights.en: Pre-written share text reduces friction and encourages viral sharing

design_highlights.cn: 分享文案采用亲切推荐语气，增强社交传播意愿
design_highlights.en: Friendly recommendation tone in share copy boosts social sharing intent

product_insight.cn: 利用原生系统分享能力降低开发成本，预设推荐语文案是增长黑客手法，将用户转化为产品推广者，实现裂变式传播。内容页即分享入口的设计减少用户操作路径。
product_insight.en: Leveraging native share sheet reduces dev cost. Pre-written recommendation copy is a growth hack turning users into promoters for viral spread. Embedding share at content level minimizes user friction.

core_function.cn: 将冥想内容分享至其他应用或保存
core_function.en: Share meditation content to other apps or save locally

design_highlights.cn: 星空渐变卡片设计营造冥想氛围，与品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Galaxy gradient card design creates meditation atmosphere, consistent with brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 「You're Amazing!」正向激励标题增强用户成就感
design_highlights.en: Positive 'You're Amazing!' title enhances user sense of achievement

design_highlights.cn: 原生iOS分享面板无缝集成，操作符合用户习惯
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet integration provides familiar interaction patterns

product_insight.cn: 完成冥想后的分享场景设计精妙，通过正向激励文案强化成就感，同时预设分享文本降低用户操作成本，有效促进社交传播和用户留存。收藏按钮的心形设计也增强了情感连接。
product_insight.en: Smart post-meditation sharing design reinforces achievement through positive copy, pre-filled share text reduces friction, effectively promoting social spread and retention. Heart-shaped favorite button enhances emotional connection.

core_function.cn: 将冥想课程分享到社交平台或保存
core_function.en: Share meditation session to social platforms or save locally

design_highlights.cn: 深色太空背景与系统分享面板形成层次感，强化沉浸体验
design_highlights.en: Dark space background creates depth contrast with system share sheet

design_highlights.cn: 采用iOS原生分享组件，用户操作零学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet ensures zero learning curve for users

design_highlights.cn: 预设推荐语句降低分享门槛，促进病毒式传播
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled recommendation text lowers sharing friction for viral growth

product_insight.cn: 巧妙利用原生分享组件保持一致性体验，预设"I think you'd like this session"推荐语既真诚又降低用户编辑成本，是促进口碑传播的经典设计
product_insight.en: Leveraging native share sheet maintains consistency while pre-filled personal recommendation reduces friction and encourages organic word-of-mouth growth

core_function.cn: 展示成就卡片并提供多种分享和保存方式
core_function.en: Display achievement card with multiple sharing and saving options

design_highlights.cn: 成就卡片采用深棕色渐变背景，徽章图标精致，营造仪式感
design_highlights.en: Achievement card uses dark brown gradient with refined badge icon for ceremonial feel

design_highlights.cn: 原生iOS分享面板无缝集成，用户操作习惯零学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet integration with zero learning curve for users

design_highlights.cn: 提供CapCut背景移除功能，引导用户进行二次创作和传播
design_highlights.en: CapCut background removal option encourages secondary creation and sharing

design_highlights.cn: 冥想数据统计展示激励用户分享成就，增强社交传播动力
design_highlights.en: Mindfulness stats display motivates users to share achievements socially

product_insight.cn: 通过成就卡片可视化冥想数据，降低分享门槛；集成第三方工具(CapCut)体现开放生态思维，鼓励用户UGC创作，实现病毒式传播增长。
product_insight.en: Visualizing mindfulness data as shareable cards lowers sharing barriers; third-party tool integration shows ecosystem thinking, encouraging UGC for viral growth.

core_function.cn: 提供多种分享和保存内容的快捷操作
core_function.en: Provide quick actions for sharing and saving content

design_highlights.cn: 标准iOS原生分享面板设计，用户熟悉度高
design_highlights.en: Standard iOS native share sheet design with high user familiarity

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式便于单手操作，支持滑动关闭
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal enables one-handed operation with swipe-to-dismiss

design_highlights.cn: 分享链接带有产品标语，实现病毒式传播营销
design_highlights.en: Shared link includes product tagline for viral marketing

product_insight.cn: 利用系统原生分享能力降低用户学习成本，分享内容中嵌入"#1 rated personalized training plans"品牌信息，每次用户分享都是一次免费的口碑传播机会。
product_insight.en: Leveraging native iOS share capabilities reduces learning curve. Embedding '#1 rated' branding in shared content turns every share into free word-of-mouth marketing.

core_function.cn: 提供多种分享渠道和操作选项
core_function.en: Provide multiple sharing channels and action options

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生分享面板设计，图标辨识度高，布局清晰有序
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet design with high icon recognition and clear layout

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗形式便于单手操作，支持横向滚动查看更多应用
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet format enables one-hand operation with horizontal scroll for more apps

design_highlights.cn: 链接预览展示品牌信息和价值主张，增强分享可信度
design_highlights.en: Link preview displays brand info and value proposition to enhance sharing credibility

product_insight.cn: 利用系统原生分享组件降低用户学习成本，链接预览中嵌入"#1 rated"等社交证明话术，在用户分享时自动为品牌做口碑传播，是低成本获客的聪明设计。
product_insight.en: Leveraging native share sheet reduces learning curve. Embedding social proof like '#1 rated' in link preview enables automatic word-of-mouth marketing during sharing—a smart low-cost acquisition tactic.

core_function.cn: 将攀岩活动数据分享到社交平台或其他应用
core_function.en: Share rock climbing activity data to social platforms or other apps

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色品牌色，运动数据层次分明，指标卡片清晰易读
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange brand accent, clear data hierarchy and readable metric cards

design_highlights.cn: 原生iOS分享面板无缝集成，支持多种分享渠道快速触达
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet seamlessly integrated with multiple sharing channels

design_highlights.cn: 展示用户头像和关注状态，强化社交身份认同和成就感
design_highlights.en: Display user avatar and following status to reinforce social identity and achievement

product_insight.cn: 将运动数据与社交分享深度结合，通过展示详细指标（时长、心率、卡路里）激励用户分享成就，利用社交传播实现产品增长，同时增强用户粘性
product_insight.en: Deep integration of fitness data with social sharing, encouraging users to share achievements through detailed metrics, leveraging social distribution for growth while enhancing retention

core_function.cn: 按叙述者浏览和选择睡眠故事内容
core_function.en: Browse and select sleep stories by narrator

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造助眠氛围，与Sleep功能定位高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates calming sleep atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 圆形头像设计增加亲和力，名人与IP角色混搭丰富内容层次
design_highlights.en: Circular avatars with mix of celebrities and characters add variety

design_highlights.cn: 简洁列表布局便于快速浏览，单手操作友好
design_highlights.en: Clean list layout enables quick browsing with one-hand operation

design_highlights.cn: 融入知名IP（小黄人Agnes）增加趣味性和情感连接
design_highlights.en: Popular IP characters like Minions add fun and emotional connection

product_insight.cn: 将叙述者作为独立筛选维度，满足用户对熟悉声音的情感依赖。名人与IP混合策略既提升内容权威性，又增加趣味性，是差异化竞争的有效手段。
product_insight.en: Narrator as a filter dimension leverages emotional attachment to familiar voices. Mixing celebrities with IP characters balances credibility and fun for content differentiation.

core_function.cn: 提供用户自助服务和常见问题解答入口
core_function.en: Provide self-service support and FAQ access for users

design_highlights.cn: 采用品牌标志性自然风景图作为头部背景，延续App冥想主题调性
design_highlights.en: Uses signature nature landscape as header background, maintaining meditation app theme

design_highlights.cn: 搜索框居中突出，支持用户快速定位问题；右下角悬浮客服入口便于即时咨询
design_highlights.en: Centered search bar for quick issue lookup; floating chat button for instant support

design_highlights.cn: 友好的问候语'Hi. Need any help?'降低求助心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Friendly greeting 'Hi. Need any help?' reduces psychological barrier to seeking help

product_insight.cn: 帮助中心采用WebView嵌入方式，保持品牌一致性的同时降低维护成本。分类清晰的FAQ结构配合智能客服，形成自助+人工的分层服务体系，有效降低客服压力。
product_insight.en: WebView-embedded help center maintains brand consistency while reducing maintenance costs. Clear FAQ categories with chatbot create tiered self-service and human support system, effectively reducing support workload.

core_function.cn: 提供消息支持和自助帮助文档搜索
core_function.en: Provide message support and self-service help documentation

design_highlights.cn: 深色头部与白色内容区形成强对比，头像组增加亲和力
design_highlights.en: Dark header contrasts with white content area, avatar group adds human touch

design_highlights.cn: 个性化问候语配合挥手emoji，营造友好支持氛围
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting with waving emoji creates friendly support atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 分层信息架构：消息入口→搜索→常见问题列表，降低用户获取帮助门槛
design_highlights.en: Layered IA: message entry→search→FAQ list reduces barrier to getting help

product_insight.cn: 帮助中心采用人性化设计，通过真人头像和个性化称呼建立情感连接。分层设计让用户可选择人工或自助服务，同时展示响应时间预期管理用户期望，减少客服压力。
product_insight.en: Humanized help center design with real avatars and personalized greeting builds emotional connection. Layered approach offers human or self-service options while setting response time expectations.

core_function.cn: 提供训练指南和常见问题解答
core_function.en: Provide training guides and FAQ support

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的列表布局配合箭头指引，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Clean list layout with arrow indicators, clear information hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 顶部搜索栏便于用户快速定位所需帮助内容
design_highlights.en: Top search bar enables quick access to needed help content

design_highlights.cn: 作者头像增添人性化元素，增强内容可信度
design_highlights.en: Author avatars add human touch and enhance content credibility

product_insight.cn: 将帮助文档按训练目标分类（5K/10K/半马/全马），精准匹配用户不同阶段需求，降低信息检索成本，同时展示73篇文章和12位作者凸显内容专业度与丰富度
product_insight.en: Categorizing help docs by training goals (5K/10K/Half/Full Marathon) precisely matches user needs at different stages, while showcasing 73 articles and 12 authors highlights content expertise and richness

core_function.cn: 展示分段训练动作列表及时长安排
core_function.en: Display sectioned exercise list with duration for workout planning

design_highlights.cn: 深色视频预览区与浅色列表形成鲜明对比，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark video preview contrasts with light list, creating clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 每个动作配有播放按钮，支持单独预览动作示范
design_highlights.en: Each exercise has play button for individual demonstration preview

design_highlights.cn: 红色进度条醒目标识当前所在章节，状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Red progress bar clearly indicates current section status

design_highlights.cn: 分区提示如'Legs only'、'Include shoulder taps'给予动作要点提醒
design_highlights.en: Section hints like 'Legs only' provide exercise focus reminders

product_insight.cn: 采用Section分段式设计将复杂训练拆解为可执行单元，配合动作缩略图和时长标注降低用户认知负担，红色进度条增强当前位置感知，提升训练跟练体验。
product_insight.en: Section-based design breaks complex workouts into executable units. Thumbnails and duration labels reduce cognitive load while red progress bar enhances position awareness for better follow-along experience.

core_function.cn: 按周展示训练计划，支持添加和管理每日训练项目
core_function.en: Display weekly training plans with daily workout management

design_highlights.cn: 彩色左边框区分不同训练类型，跑步蓝色、力量训练黄/绿色，视觉识别度高
design_highlights.en: Color-coded left borders distinguish workout types - blue for running, yellow/green for strength

design_highlights.cn: 每日快捷添加按钮设计，支持同一天多项训练并排显示
design_highlights.en: Quick add button per day with multiple workouts displayed side by side

design_highlights.cn: 周视图折叠设计显示周总里程，进度统计一目了然（4/13km）
design_highlights.en: Collapsible week view showing total mileage with clear progress indicator (4/13km)

design_highlights.cn: Rest Day标签和空白日期设计传达合理休息理念，避免过度训练焦虑
design_highlights.en: Rest Day label and empty date design promotes balanced training mentality

product_insight.cn: 日历式训练计划将复杂课表可视化，周目标+每日明细的层级设计降低认知负担。色彩编码系统帮助用户快速识别训练类型，Reset按钮提供灵活调整空间，体现以用户为中心的计划管理理念。
product_insight.en: Calendar-based training visualization reduces cognitive load with week goals and daily details. Color-coding enables quick workout type recognition, Reset button offers flexibility for user-centered plan management.

core_function.cn: 按周展示并管理跑步和力量训练计划
core_function.en: Display and manage weekly running and strength training schedule

design_highlights.cn: 彩色左边框区分训练类型，蓝色跑步、黄色力量、绿色下肢，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Color-coded left borders differentiate workout types - blue for running, yellow/green for strength

design_highlights.cn: 每日支持添加多项训练，灵活组合跑步与力量训练
design_highlights.en: Each day supports adding multiple workouts, flexible combination of running and strength

design_highlights.cn: 周次标签和总里程统计清晰展示训练进度，4/13km直观呈现完成情况
design_highlights.en: Week labels and total distance stats clearly show training progress with 4/13km completion

design_highlights.cn: Rest Day标签体现科学训练理念，关注用户恢复需求
design_highlights.en: Rest Day label reflects scientific training philosophy, caring for user recovery needs

product_insight.cn: 将跑步计划与力量训练整合到统一日历视图，通过颜色编码和周统计帮助用户掌控整体训练节奏，Reset按钮降低计划调整门槛，符合跑者综合训练需求
product_insight.en: Integrates running and strength training into unified calendar view, color coding and weekly stats help users manage training rhythm, Reset button lowers plan adjustment barrier

core_function.cn: 展示用户保存的运动路线列表，支持查看详情
core_function.en: Display saved workout routes with details and map previews

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配地图缩略图，左图右文布局清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with map thumbnails, clear left-image right-text layout

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式列表设计便于滑动浏览和快速识别路线
design_highlights.en: Card-based list enables easy scrolling and quick route identification

design_highlights.cn: 难度标签用橙色Easy标识，关键信息一目了然
design_highlights.en: Orange Easy difficulty tags make key info instantly visible

design_highlights.cn: 显示创建时间增强用户对运动记录的归属感
design_highlights.en: Creation timestamps enhance user ownership of activity records

product_insight.cn: 路线管理页通过地图预览+核心数据(距离/海拔/时长)的组合，让用户快速定位目标路线。底部导航Groups红点暗示社交功能，引导用户分享路线形成社区互动。
product_insight.en: Route management combines map previews with key metrics for quick identification. Red badge on Groups tab hints at social features, encouraging route sharing and community engagement.

core_function.cn: 引导用户开始首次感恩打卡记录
core_function.en: Guide users to start their first gratitude check-in

design_highlights.cn: 渐变紫蓝色背景营造宁静冥想氛围，与感恩主题呼应
design_highlights.en: Gradient purple-blue background creates calm meditation atmosphere matching gratitude theme

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案温和无压力，用'yet'暗示积极开始
design_highlights.en: Gentle empty state copy with 'yet' implying positive encouragement to begin

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮设计清晰，胶囊形状易于点击
design_highlights.en: Single clear CTA with capsule button shape for easy tapping

design_highlights.cn: 右上角加号提供快捷入口，降低操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Plus icon in header provides quick access, reducing friction

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计优雅且有引导性，通过情感化文案和简洁CTA降低首次使用门槛。渐变背景与健康冥想类App调性一致，双入口设计（按钮+加号）提升功能可发现性。
product_insight.en: Elegant empty state with emotional copy and clear CTA reduces first-use friction. Gradient background aligns with wellness app aesthetics. Dual entry points enhance feature discoverability.

core_function.cn: 提示用户创建自定义食物以便快速记录
core_function.en: Prompt users to create custom foods for easy logging

design_highlights.cn: 可爱的墨西哥卷饼插图配合友好文案，降低空状态的挫败感
design_highlights.en: Cute taco illustration with friendly copy reduces frustration of empty state

design_highlights.cn: 幽默标题"14 Million Foods Isn't Enough"化解搜索无结果的尴尬
design_highlights.en: Witty headline turns no-results frustration into engagement opportunity

design_highlights.cn: 分类标签栏清晰区分全部、我的餐食、食谱和自定义食物
design_highlights.en: Category tabs clearly separate All, My Meals, My Recipes and My Foods

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计巧妙将「搜索失败」转化为「功能引导」，用幽默文案和可爱插图消解负面情绪，同时暗示数据库规模（1400万）建立专业信任感，引导用户创建个性化内容增强粘性。
product_insight.en: Empty state cleverly converts search failure into feature discovery, using humor and cute illustration to defuse frustration while subtly showcasing database scale to build trust and encourage custom content creation.

core_function.cn: 展示无新通知时的友好提示状态
core_function.en: Display friendly message when no new notifications exist

design_highlights.cn: 3D风格喇叭插图配合品牌色，视觉吸引力强且传达通知含义
design_highlights.en: 3D megaphone illustration with brand colors, visually appealing and contextually relevant

design_highlights.cn: 庆祝表情符号配合积极文案，将空状态转化为正向成就感
design_highlights.en: Celebration emoji with positive copy transforms empty state into accomplishment feeling

design_highlights.cn: 极简留白设计突出核心信息，减少用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Minimalist whitespace design highlights core message and reduces cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计将「无内容」转化为「已完成」的积极体验，通过情感化文案和品牌化插图提升用户对通知功能的认知，同时暗示用户保持关注以获取未来通知。
product_insight.en: Empty state transforms 'no content' into positive 'all caught up' experience, using emotional copy and branded illustration to build notification feature awareness while encouraging future engagement.

core_function.cn: 展示应用通知的空状态，告知用户暂无新消息
core_function.en: Display empty state for notifications, indicating no new messages

design_highlights.cn: 3D风格喇叭插画，品牌色绿色与渐变设计增强视觉吸引力
design_highlights.en: 3D megaphone illustration with brand teal color and gradient enhances visual appeal

design_highlights.cn: 庆祝表情emoji搭配积极文案，将无通知转化为正向成就感
design_highlights.en: Celebration emoji with positive copy transforms empty state into achievement feeling

design_highlights.cn: 极简布局大量留白，页面清爽不给用户压迫感
design_highlights.en: Minimalist layout with generous whitespace creates clean, non-intrusive experience

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计将潜在负面体验（无通知）转化为积极反馈（已阅完），同时预告功能价值（通知将在此显示），降低用户困惑并保持期待感。
product_insight.en: Empty state transforms potentially negative experience into positive feedback while previewing feature value, reducing user confusion and maintaining engagement expectations.

core_function.cn: 引导用户添加跑鞋以追踪里程和磨损情况
core_function.en: Guide users to add running shoes for mileage and wear tracking

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景配合3D立体跑鞋插画，视觉层次丰富有质感
design_highlights.en: Gradient background with 3D shoe illustration creates rich visual depth

design_highlights.cn: "Let's log some miles!"文案充满激励性，激发用户行动欲望
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy 'Let's log some miles!' encourages user engagement

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮设计，消除选择障碍，提升转化率
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button eliminates choice paralysis and boosts conversion

design_highlights.cn: 极简页面布局，信息层级清晰，聚焦核心价值主张
design_highlights.en: Minimalist layout with clear hierarchy focuses on core value proposition

product_insight.cn: 通过空状态页面清晰传达跑鞋追踪功能的价值——帮助用户了解何时更换跑鞋。友好的插画和激励文案降低使用门槛，单一行动按钮引导用户快速完成首次添加，符合首次使用体验优化原则。
product_insight.en: Empty state clearly communicates shoe tracking value proposition. Friendly illustration and motivational copy lower barriers, while single CTA guides quick first-time setup, following FTUE optimization principles.

core_function.cn: 引导用户创建自定义运动路线
core_function.en: Guide users to create custom workout routes

design_highlights.cn: 双设备插图展示桌面端创建、移动端使用的跨平台体验
design_highlights.en: Dual-device illustration shows cross-platform experience from desktop creation to mobile usage

design_highlights.cn: 右上角+号与文案提示形成明确的操作引导闭环
design_highlights.en: Top-right plus icon and text hint form clear action guidance loop

design_highlights.cn: 简洁友好的空状态设计降低用户焦虑，传递功能价值
design_highlights.en: Clean friendly empty state reduces user anxiety and conveys feature value

product_insight.cn: Strava通过空状态页面巧妙展示路线功能的跨平台特性，暗示用户可在桌面端创建复杂路线后同步至手机使用，提升了功能的感知价值和使用场景的多样性。
product_insight.en: Strava cleverly showcases cross-platform route capabilities through empty state, implying users can create complex routes on desktop and sync to mobile, enhancing perceived value and use case diversity.

core_function.cn: 告知用户无消息功能访问权限并提供了解更多入口
core_function.en: Inform users they lack messaging access and provide learn more option

design_highlights.cn: 品牌化插画设计，橙色拟人角色表达沮丧情绪，与深色背景形成强对比
design_highlights.en: Branded illustration with orange character expressing frustration, strong contrast against dark background

design_highlights.cn: 用幽默可爱的插画软化负面信息，减少用户挫败感
design_highlights.en: Humorous cute illustration softens negative message, reducing user frustration

design_highlights.cn: 提供"Learn more"链接引导用户了解如何获取权限
design_highlights.en: Learn more link guides users to understand how to gain access

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计体现产品成熟度，用情感化插画将权限限制转化为引导机会，橙色CTA链接与品牌色一致，既保持视觉统一又不给用户过度压力，是权限分层策略的良好实践。
product_insight.en: Empty state design reflects product maturity, transforming access restriction into guidance opportunity with emotional illustration. Orange CTA maintains brand consistency without pressuring users, exemplifying tiered permission strategy.

core_function.cn: 告知用户无消息访问权限并提供了解详情入口
core_function.en: Inform users of no messaging access and provide learn more option

design_highlights.cn: 品牌化插图设计，橙色卡通角色与深色背景形成强烈对比，保持视觉趣味性
design_highlights.en: Branded illustration with orange cartoon character contrasting against dark background

design_highlights.cn: 角色呈现沮丧姿态（X眼睛、低头坐姿），拟人化表达受限状态，降低负面情绪
design_highlights.en: Character shows frustrated pose with X eyes, humanizing the restricted state

design_highlights.cn: 提供Learn more链接引导用户了解原因或解决方案，避免用户困惑
design_highlights.en: Learn more link guides users to understand reasons or solutions

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计采用情感化插图而非冷冰冰的文字提示，既传达了功能受限信息，又维护了品牌调性。橙色CTA与整体设计系统一致，引导用户主动了解而非直接流失。
product_insight.en: Empty state uses emotional illustration instead of cold text, conveying restriction while maintaining brand tone. Orange CTA guides users to learn more rather than abandon.

core_function.cn: 管理离线下载的睡眠故事内容
core_function.en: Manage offline downloaded sleep story content

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景从金色过渡到深褐色，营造助眠氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background from gold to deep brown creates sleep-inducing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 空状态配合云朵下载图标和温馨文案，引导而非责备
design_highlights.en: Empty state with cloud icon and warm copy guides users without blame

design_highlights.cn: 分类标签横向排列，快速切换不同内容类型
design_highlights.en: Horizontal category tabs enable quick switching between content types

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计精妙：通过友好提示引导用户下载内容，而非显示冰冷的空白。渐变背景与睡眠主题高度契合，保持页面在无内容时仍具视觉吸引力，减少用户流失。
product_insight.en: Elegant empty state design guides users to download content with friendly prompts. Gradient background maintains visual appeal even without content, reducing user drop-off.

core_function.cn: 邀请伴侣共享生理周期和健康数据以获得更好支持
core_function.en: Invite partner to share cycle and health data for better support

design_highlights.cn: 双手持手机配合心形连线插画，温馨传递伴侣连接概念
design_highlights.en: Two hands holding phones with heart-shaped dotted line warmly conveys partner connection

design_highlights.cn: 通知预览展示真实使用场景，如'性爱秘密'视频和症状分享，增强功能吸引力
design_highlights.en: Notification previews show real scenarios like intimacy tips and symptom sharing to enhance appeal

design_highlights.cn: Premium专属标签突出付费价值，粉色渐变CTA按钮引导转化
design_highlights.en: Premium exclusive badge highlights paid value, pink gradient CTA button drives conversion

design_highlights.cn: 柔和粉紫渐变背景配合圆润卡片设计，营造亲密温馨氛围
design_highlights.en: Soft pink-purple gradient with rounded cards creates intimate and warm atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 通过伴侣功能强化用户关系网络，增加产品粘性和付费转化率。展示具体通知内容让用户直观感受功能价值，降低决策成本，是提升Premium转化的有效策略。
product_insight.en: Partner feature strengthens user relationship network, increasing stickiness and conversion. Showing specific notification content helps users visualize value, reducing decision friction for Premium upsell.

core_function.cn: 展示每日膳食安排和卡路里追踪
core_function.en: Display daily meal schedule with calorie tracking

design_highlights.cn: 高质量食物图片配卡片式布局，增强视觉食欲吸引力
design_highlights.en: High-quality food images with card layout enhance visual appetite appeal

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Create/Edit/More三按钮设计，操作入口清晰高效
design_highlights.en: Top Create/Edit/More buttons provide clear and efficient action entry points

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示每日卡路里与减重目标，强化用户健康动力
design_highlights.en: Real-time calorie and weight loss goals display reinforces health motivation

design_highlights.cn: Meal Planner与Groceries标签联动，引导用户深度使用功能闭环
design_highlights.en: Meal Planner and Groceries tabs create functional loop to increase engagement

product_insight.cn: 将膳食计划与减重目标数据化呈现，通过食物美图降低健康饮食心理门槛。卡路里差额提醒设计巧妙，既给用户自由度又保持目标意识，平衡了约束与体验。
product_insight.en: Visualizes meal planning with weight loss goals, using appetizing food images to lower healthy eating barriers. Calorie gap reminder balances user freedom with goal awareness.

core_function.cn: 在使用健身功能前进行法律免责告知和安全提醒
core_function.en: Legal disclaimer and safety reminder before using fitness features

design_highlights.cn: 深色半透明模态框设计，聚焦用户注意力于免责内容
design_highlights.en: Dark semi-transparent modal design focuses attention on disclaimer content

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计提供明确的取消和继续选项，尊重用户选择权
design_highlights.en: Dual-button design provides clear cancel and continue options, respecting user choice

design_highlights.cn: Continue按钮使用蓝色高亮，视觉引导用户完成确认流程
design_highlights.en: Blue highlighted Continue button visually guides users to complete confirmation

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调关注身体和咨询医生，传递品牌责任感和关怀
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes body awareness and doctor consultation, conveying brand responsibility

product_insight.cn: 健身App通过前置免责声明降低法律风险，同时以人性化文案（数据不是唯一指标）展现品牌对用户健康的真诚关怀，建立信任感
product_insight.en: Fitness app reduces legal risk with upfront disclaimer while showing genuine care for user health through humanized copy, building trust

core_function.cn: 展示跑步训练计划详情并引导用户开始运动
core_function.en: Display running workout details and guide users to start exercise

design_highlights.cn: 顶部渐变绿色背景营造运动活力氛围，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Green gradient header creates energetic sports atmosphere with clear information hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 教练头像配合个性化寄语增强信任感和陪伴感
design_highlights.en: Coach avatar with personalized message enhances trust and companionship

design_highlights.cn: 室外/跑步机双模式切换满足不同场景需求
design_highlights.en: Outdoor/Treadmill toggle meets different scenario requirements

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定醒目CTA按钮降低操作门槛提升转化
design_highlights.en: Fixed prominent CTA button at bottom reduces friction and boosts conversion

product_insight.cn: 页面将训练指导人格化，通过教练语音化文案传递专业感。配速提示强调'不是目标而是上限'的表述降低用户心理压力，体现以用户为中心的产品理念。
product_insight.en: Humanizes training guidance through coach persona. Pace instruction emphasizing 'limit not target' reduces psychological pressure, reflecting user-centered product philosophy.

core_function.cn: 展示单次训练计划详情，提供开始训练入口
core_function.en: Display workout plan details and provide entry to start training

design_highlights.cn: 顶部渐变背景配合波浪纹理，营造运动活力氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient background with wave texture creates energetic athletic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 教练头像配合个性化鼓励文案，增强用户信任感和动力
design_highlights.en: Coach avatar with personalized encouragement enhances trust and motivation

design_highlights.cn: 室外/跑步机切换标签，适配不同运动场景需求
design_highlights.en: Outdoor/Treadmill toggle adapts to different exercise scenarios

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目CTA按钮搭配音乐入口，降低启动门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent CTA button with music entry reduces friction to start

product_insight.cn: 通过教练人格化沟通和详细配速指导降低用户焦虑，强调'对话配速'概念让新手不惧怕运动强度，音乐入口暗示愉悦体验，整体设计以降低心理门槛为核心目标
product_insight.en: Coach personalization and detailed pace guidance reduce anxiety. 'Conversational pace' concept reassures beginners. Music entry suggests enjoyable experience. Design focuses on lowering psychological barriers.

core_function.cn: 展示单次跑步训练的完整计划和执行指导
core_function.en: Display complete running workout plan with execution guidance

design_highlights.cn: 顶部渐变绿色波纹背景营造运动活力氛围，与跑步主题呼应
design_highlights.en: Gradient green wave background creates energetic athletic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 三步状态指示器清晰展示训练流程：拉伸-关联-完成
design_highlights.en: Three-step status indicator clearly shows workout flow: stretch-link-complete

design_highlights.cn: Coach Steph教练寄语增强人性化陪伴感，降低用户孤独感
design_highlights.en: Coach Steph message enhances personal coaching feel and reduces isolation

design_highlights.cn: 明确标注配速限制'No faster than 9:00/km'引导正确执行
design_highlights.en: Clear pace limit guidance ensures proper workout execution

product_insight.cn: 将简单的跑步任务结构化为可追踪的训练单元，通过教练人格化IP、进度可视化和详细指导降低用户执行门槛，提升训练计划的完成率和用户粘性
product_insight.en: Structures simple runs into trackable workout units with coach persona, progress visualization, and detailed guidance to reduce friction and improve completion rates

core_function.cn: 展示跑步训练计划详情及配速指导
core_function.en: Display running workout details with pace guidance

design_highlights.cn: 渐变绿色背景营造清新运动氛围，顶部波浪纹理增加层次感
design_highlights.en: Green gradient background creates fresh athletic vibe with wave texture adding depth

design_highlights.cn: 友善的文案设计，强调'这是上限而非目标'，降低用户压力
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy emphasizing 'limit not target' reduces user pressure and anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 室外/跑步机切换按钮让用户快速选择运动场景
design_highlights.en: Outdoor/Treadmill toggle allows quick selection of exercise environment

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定Select按钮，黑色高对比度设计引导快速决策
design_highlights.en: Fixed bottom Select button with high contrast black design guides quick decisions

product_insight.cn: 通过'conversational pace'概念简化复杂配速理论，用通俗语言降低新手门槛；明确时间预估（35-40分钟）帮助用户规划安排，体现以用户为中心的设计思维
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex pace theory with 'conversational pace' concept, lowering barrier for beginners. Clear time estimates help users plan, reflecting user-centered design thinking

core_function.cn: 展示跑步训练计划详情并启动训练
core_function.en: Display running workout details and start the session

design_highlights.cn: 渐变绿色背景配合波浪纹理，营造运动活力氛围
design_highlights.en: Green gradient background with wave texture creates energetic athletic vibe

design_highlights.cn: 强调'conversational pace'配合详细说明，降低用户运动压力
design_highlights.en: Emphasizes conversational pace with detailed explanation to reduce exercise anxiety

design_highlights.cn: OUTDOOR/TREADMILL切换标签便于用户快速选择运动场景
design_highlights.en: OUTDOOR/TREADMILL toggle tabs enable quick exercise environment selection

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目的Start Workout按钮配合音乐入口，一键开始训练
design_highlights.en: Prominent Start Workout button with music shortcut enables one-tap workout start

product_insight.cn: 页面设计注重降低用户运动门槛，通过'不是目标而是上限'的文案消除配速焦虑，WARM-UP STRETCHES功能入口体现对用户安全的关注，整体体验贴心专业
