product_insight.en: Design focuses on lowering exercise barriers, using 'limit not target' copy to reduce pace anxiety. Warm-up stretches entry shows care for user safety, creating a thoughtful professional experience

core_function.cn: 展示训练计划详情并支持开始运动
core_function.en: Display workout plan details and enable starting exercise

design_highlights.cn: 渐变绿色背景搭配动态曲线，传达运动活力感
design_highlights.en: Gradient green background with dynamic curves conveys athletic vitality

design_highlights.cn: 状态图标组清晰展示完成进度，支持一键移除训练
design_highlights.en: Status icon group clearly shows completion progress with one-tap removal

design_highlights.cn: 对话式配速说明降低用户压力，强调'easy'轻松理念
design_highlights.en: Conversational pace guidance reduces pressure, emphasizing 'easy' concept

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目CTA按钮配合音乐入口，降低开始运动门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent bottom CTA with music entry lowers barrier to start workout

product_insight.cn: 页面通过多维度状态反馈（已关联、已完成）增强用户成就感，配速建议采用限制而非目标的表述方式，有效缓解新手跑者的速度焦虑，体现以用户体验为中心的设计理念
product_insight.en: Multi-dimensional status feedback enhances achievement sense. Pace guidance framed as limit rather than target effectively reduces speed anxiety for novice runners, reflecting user-centric design philosophy

core_function.cn: 在地图上浏览和发现附近的跑步/骑行路线
core_function.en: Browse and discover nearby running/cycling routes on map

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明且减少夜间使用眼疲劳
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlights creates clear visual hierarchy and reduces eye strain

design_highlights.cn: 底部卡片展示路线详情，支持滑动查看多条路线，操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Bottom card shows route details with swipe to browse multiple routes

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的'Create Route'悬浮按钮引导用户从浏览转向创作
design_highlights.en: Prominent 'Create Route' floating button guides users from browsing to creating

design_highlights.cn: 筛选标签栏支持多维度筛选（长度、海拔、路面、难度），信息架构清晰
design_highlights.en: Filter tabs support multi-dimensional filtering with clear information architecture

product_insight.cn: 将路线发现与地图深度结合，通过可视化路线轨迹降低用户决策成本。底部卡片设计既展示关键信息（距离、时长、位置），又保留地图视野，平衡了信息密度与空间利用。
product_insight.en: Deep integration of route discovery with map reduces decision cost through visualized routes. Bottom card design balances key info display with map visibility, optimizing information density and spatial usage.

core_function.cn: 在地图上浏览和筛选附近的跑步路线
core_function.en: Browse and filter nearby running routes on map

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图主题配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明且护眼
design_highlights.en: Dark map theme with orange route highlights creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部卡片展示路线详情，支持滑动查看多条路线
design_highlights.en: Bottom card shows route details with swipe gesture for multiple routes

design_highlights.cn: 显示难度标签和距离信息，帮助用户快速决策选择路线
design_highlights.en: Difficulty tags and distance info help users quickly decide on routes

design_highlights.cn: 多维度筛选条件（长度、海拔、路面、难度）满足个性化需求
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimensional filters for length, elevation, surface, difficulty

product_insight.cn: 将路线发现与地图可视化结合，通过底部卡片预览降低用户决策成本。筛选器横向排列节省空间，'Create Route'悬浮按钮鼓励用户生成内容，形成社区生态
product_insight.en: Combines route discovery with map visualization. Bottom card preview reduces decision cost. Horizontal filters save space while floating 'Create Route' button encourages UGC for community ecosystem

core_function.cn: 在地图上浏览和筛选运动路线
core_function.en: Browse and filter activity routes on an interactive map

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明且科技感强
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlights creates clear visual hierarchy and tech-forward aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 底部卡片展示路线详情，支持滑动浏览24条路线
design_highlights.en: Bottom card shows route details with swipeable access to 24 routes

design_highlights.cn: 路线信息包含难度、距离、时长，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Route info includes difficulty, distance, duration to reduce decision friction

design_highlights.cn: 筛选标签横向排列，快速切换路线类型和条件
design_highlights.en: Horizontal filter chips enable quick switching between route types and conditions

product_insight.cn: 通过地图可视化呈现路线走向，结合多维筛选器和路线卡片，满足户外运动用户探索新路线的核心需求。'NEW'标签和Groups红点设计增强社交属性和内容新鲜感。
product_insight.en: Map visualization of route paths combined with multi-dimensional filters and route cards addresses outdoor enthusiasts' core need for route discovery. 'NEW' badge and Groups notification dot enhance social engagement and content freshness.

core_function.cn: 将冥想内容添加到已有或新建播放列表
core_function.en: Add meditation content to existing or new playlist

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计保持上下文，背景显示当前内容信息
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet maintains context with content info visible in background

design_highlights.cn: 绿色勾选图标即时反馈已选状态，操作确认清晰
design_highlights.en: Green checkmark provides instant feedback for selection state

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目CTA引导创建新播放列表，提升用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Prominent bottom CTA encourages new playlist creation for engagement

product_insight.cn: 播放列表功能是提升用户留存的关键，让用户投入内容整理成本后更难离开。简洁的弹窗设计降低操作门槛，同时保持内容上下文增强连贯感。
product_insight.en: Playlist feature is key for retention by creating switching costs. Clean bottom sheet design lowers friction while maintaining content context for seamless experience.

core_function.cn: 将内容添加到已有或新建的播放列表中
core_function.en: Add content to existing or new playlists

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计，圆角卡片风格简洁优雅，与主界面层次分明
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design with rounded corners, clean and elegant, clear hierarchy from main interface

design_highlights.cn: 选中状态用绿色勾选图标即时反馈，操作结果一目了然
design_highlights.en: Green checkmark icon provides instant feedback for selection state, clear result indication

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目的棕色CTA按钮引导用户创建新播放列表，扩展使用场景
design_highlights.en: Prominent brown CTA button at bottom guides users to create new playlists, expanding use cases

design_highlights.cn: 播放列表缩略图展示山景图片，呼应冥想/放松主题营造宁静氛围
design_highlights.en: Playlist thumbnail shows mountain scenery, echoing meditation theme to create calm atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 采用半屏底部弹窗模式减少用户操作中断感，同时保留主界面上下文。绿色勾选与棕色按钮形成视觉对比，既确认当前选择又引导新增行为，平衡了即时操作与功能扩展。
product_insight.en: Half-screen bottom sheet reduces interruption while maintaining context. Green checkmark and brown button create visual contrast, confirming selection while guiding creation, balancing immediate action with feature expansion.

core_function.cn: 追踪跑鞋使用里程和磨损状态
core_function.en: Track running shoe mileage and wear status

design_highlights.cn: 极简卡片设计，状态标签醒目，进度条直观展示鞋子寿命
design_highlights.en: Minimalist card design with prominent status badge and intuitive lifespan progress bar

design_highlights.cn: 右上角快捷添加入口，支持多鞋管理的扩展性设计
design_highlights.en: Quick add button in top-right corner, scalable design for multiple shoe management

design_highlights.cn: Active状态标签传递装备健康感，绿色进度条暗示鞋子状态良好
design_highlights.en: Active status badge conveys equipment health, green progress indicates good condition

product_insight.cn: 将装备管理融入跑步App是高级功能体现，通过可视化里程追踪帮助用户科学管理跑鞋更换周期，提升用户粘性并展现产品专业度，也为运动装备推荐创造商业化入口。
product_insight.en: Integrating equipment management into a running app shows advanced product thinking. Visual mileage tracking helps users scientifically manage shoe replacement cycles, increasing retention and demonstrating professionalism while creating monetization opportunities.

core_function.cn: 添加运动装备并设置默认适用的运动类型
core_function.en: Add sports gear and configure default activity types

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动图标直观区分活动类型
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent, sport icons visually differentiate activity types

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗多选设计，支持一双鞋关联多种运动场景
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet multi-select allows one gear to associate with multiple sports

design_highlights.cn: 表单字段分组清晰，下拉选择器降低输入成本
design_highlights.en: Clear form field grouping with dropdown selectors reduces input effort

design_highlights.cn: 支持自定义昵称，增强用户对装备的情感连接
design_highlights.en: Custom nickname support enhances emotional connection with gear

product_insight.cn: 装备管理是跑步App的高级功能，通过追踪鞋子里程帮助用户判断更换时机。多运动类型关联设计考虑到用户一鞋多用场景，提升数据准确性和用户体验。
product_insight.en: Gear management is an advanced feature for runners to track shoe mileage. Multi-sport association design considers users who use one pair for various activities, improving data accuracy.

core_function.cn: 录入跑步装备信息并设置里程提醒
core_function.en: Add running gear details and set mileage notifications

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，层次分明的表单布局
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color, clear hierarchical form layout

design_highlights.cn: 下拉选择器简化品牌和型号输入，降低操作成本
design_highlights.en: Dropdown selectors simplify brand and model input, reducing friction

design_highlights.cn: 底部健康提示增强用户安全意识，体现产品关怀
design_highlights.en: Health tip at bottom enhances safety awareness, showing product care

design_highlights.cn: 预设1000km提醒阈值高于行业标准，延长用户使用周期
design_highlights.en: Default 1000km reminder exceeds industry standard, extending usage cycle

product_insight.cn: 装备管理功能结合智能提醒，将枯燥的数据录入转化为健康守护体验。预设提醒值略高于行业建议，既尊重用户选择又提供专业参考，平衡了实用性与用户自主权。
product_insight.en: Gear management with smart reminders transforms data entry into health protection. Default value above industry recommendation balances utility with user autonomy while providing professional guidance.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步训练计划周次安排和每日训练任务
core_function.en: Display weekly running training schedule and daily workout tasks

design_highlights.cn: 周次下拉选择器直观展示6周训练周期，进度条显示完成情况
design_highlights.en: Week dropdown selector shows 6-week training cycle with progress bar indicating completion

design_highlights.cn: 底部悬浮"Record Run"按钮便于快速开始记录运动
design_highlights.en: Floating 'Record Run' button at bottom enables quick workout recording

design_highlights.cn: 教练头像配合个性化欢迎语增强用户归属感和信任感
design_highlights.en: Coach avatar with personalized welcome message builds user trust and belonging

design_highlights.cn: 已完成训练打勾标记，配合今日任务突出显示，激励持续参与
design_highlights.en: Checkmarks on completed workouts with highlighted today's task motivate continued engagement

product_insight.cn: 将周次选择与进度可视化结合，配合教练陪伴元素，既让用户清晰掌握整体计划进度，又通过人性化设计降低训练压力感，提升长期留存。
product_insight.en: Combining week selector with progress visualization and coach companion element helps users track overall progress while humanized design reduces training pressure, improving long-term retention.

core_function.cn: 提供路线编辑、复制和导航等操作选项
core_function.en: Provide route editing, copying and navigation options

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线轨迹，视觉层次分明，路线清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route trace creates clear visual hierarchy and legibility

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式操作菜单，符合iOS设计规范，操作可达性强
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet action menu follows iOS design guidelines with good reachability

design_highlights.cn: Easy难度标签配合详细数据（距离/时长），降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Easy difficulty tag with detailed stats reduces user decision anxiety

product_insight.cn: 路线详情页聚合了保存、离线、分享、开始等高频操作，底部弹窗提供进阶编辑功能，分层设计既保持界面简洁又满足专业用户需求，是户外运动App的典型交互范式
product_insight.en: Route detail aggregates high-frequency actions while bottom sheet provides advanced editing, layered design balances simplicity and pro user needs, typical outdoor app interaction pattern

core_function.cn: 为用户创建的群组挑战设置名称和描述
core_function.en: Set name and description for user-created group challenge

design_highlights.cn: 副标题"别担心，稍后可以修改"降低用户决策压力
design_highlights.en: Subtitle 'you can edit it later' reduces user decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合高对比度输入框，聚焦内容输入
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high-contrast input fields focuses on content entry

design_highlights.cn: 实时字符计数器帮助用户控制输入长度
design_highlights.en: Real-time character counter helps users control input length

design_highlights.cn: 描述设为可选项，降低创建门槛提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Optional description lowers creation barrier and improves completion rate

product_insight.cn: 通过"可选"标签和"可稍后编辑"的安抚文案，有效降低用户创建挑战的心理门槛，这种渐进式完善策略能显著提升功能使用率和用户留存。
product_insight.en: Using 'optional' labels and reassuring 'edit later' copy effectively lowers psychological barriers, this progressive refinement strategy significantly improves feature adoption and retention.

core_function.cn: 一键将购物清单发送至Whole Foods下单
core_function.en: One-tap send grocery list to Whole Foods for ordering

design_highlights.cn: 极简单屏设计，品牌logo居中聚焦，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist single-screen design with centered brand logo and clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮策略：主CTA强调行动，次级跳过降低决策压力
design_highlights.en: Dual button strategy: primary CTA for action, secondary skip reduces decision pressure

design_highlights.cn: 简洁文案突出省时价值，配合emoji增添亲和力
design_highlights.en: Concise copy highlights time-saving value, emoji adds friendliness

product_insight.cn: 通过与知名零售品牌深度集成，将食谱应用的价值延伸至购物环节，形成完整闭环。单屏聚焦设计降低认知负担，Skip选项尊重用户自主权，平衡转化与体验。
product_insight.en: Deep integration with premium retail brand extends recipe app value to shopping, creating complete loop. Single-screen focus reduces cognitive load while skip option respects user autonomy, balancing conversion and experience.

core_function.cn: 引导用户安装Spotify完成音乐服务集成
core_function.en: Guide users to install Spotify for music service integration

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计配合地图背景，层次分明不遮挡核心内容
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design with map background, clear hierarchy without blocking core content

design_highlights.cn: 醒目绿色CTA按钮与Spotify品牌色一致，强化安装引导
design_highlights.en: Prominent green CTA button matches Spotify branding, reinforcing install guidance

design_highlights.cn: 简洁友好的文案告知用户下一步操作，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Simple friendly copy informs next steps, reducing cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 通过位置场景（Brooklyn Bridge Promenade）触发音乐服务连接，将地理位置与音乐体验结合，可能是基于位置推荐音乐的创新功能，第三方集成采用渐进式引导策略
product_insight.en: Location-triggered music service connection links geography with audio experience, possibly a location-based music recommendation feature with progressive third-party integration strategy

core_function.cn: 展示膳食计划生成的食材采购清单，支持勾选管理
core_function.en: Display grocery items from meal plan with checkbox management

design_highlights.cn: 极简卡片设计配合柔和蓝色调，清单界面清爽易读
design_highlights.en: Minimalist card design with soft blue tones creates clean, readable list interface

design_highlights.cn: 右侧复选框设计便于单手操作，勾选状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Right-aligned checkboxes enable one-handed operation with clear selection states

design_highlights.cn: Shop按钮直接连接购物场景，缩短从计划到购买的路径
design_highlights.en: Shop button directly links to shopping context, shortening plan-to-purchase path

design_highlights.cn: 显示具体数量(如3个柚子、105g蓝莓)增强计划掌控感
design_highlights.en: Specific quantities (3 grapefruits, 105g blueberries) enhance sense of control

product_insight.cn: 将膳食计划与购物清单无缝整合，通过自动生成食材列表降低用户执行难度。分类展示(Produce)和精确数量显示体现专业营养管理思维，Shop功能暗示与购物平台的整合可能性。
product_insight.en: Seamlessly integrates meal planning with grocery lists, reducing execution friction through auto-generated ingredients. Category organization and precise quantities reflect professional nutrition management, with Shop feature suggesting e-commerce integration potential.

core_function.cn: 提供多种举报类型供用户选择并提交违规内容
core_function.en: Allow users to select report categories and submit violations

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的分类列表设计，每个选项配有详细描述说明
design_highlights.en: Clear categorized list with detailed descriptions for each option

design_highlights.cn: 单选圆形按钮提供明确的选中反馈，填充式高亮显示当前选择
design_highlights.en: Radio buttons with filled highlight provide clear selection feedback

design_highlights.cn: 可选的补充说明文本框降低用户举报门槛，减轻心理负担
design_highlights.en: Optional explanation field lowers reporting barrier and reduces user anxiety

product_insight.cn: 举报功能采用全面的分类体系覆盖主要违规类型，详细描述帮助用户准确判断。可选说明字段平衡了信息收集与用户体验，体现了对社区治理的重视
product_insight.en: Comprehensive violation categories with detailed descriptions help accurate reporting. Optional explanation balances data collection with UX, showing commitment to community safety

core_function.cn: 解释心率指标含义及使用方法
core_function.en: Explains heart rate metrics and how to use them

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的层级结构，标题与正文区分明显，阅读体验流畅
design_highlights.en: Clear hierarchy with distinct headings and body text for smooth reading

design_highlights.cn: 内嵌超链接引导用户跳转设置页面，降低操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Embedded hyperlinks guide users to settings, reducing friction

design_highlights.cn: 采用问答式标题结构，降低用户学习成本和理解负担
design_highlights.en: Q&A style headings reduce learning curve and cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 采用模态弹窗形式呈现帮助内容，不打断用户主流程。问答式结构精准解决用户疑问，内嵌操作入口实现教育与行动的无缝衔接，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Modal presentation keeps users in context. Q&A structure addresses specific questions while embedded links seamlessly connect education to action.

core_function.cn: 展示虚拟跑步路线的卫星地图视图
core_function.en: Display satellite map view of virtual running route

design_highlights.cn: 卫星地图搭配紫色路线高亮，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Satellite map with purple route highlight creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部START按钮采用醒目橙色，引导用户开始运动
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange START button at bottom guides users to begin workout

design_highlights.cn: 底部功能图标栏提供多种运动辅助功能快捷入口
design_highlights.en: Bottom icon bar provides quick access to various workout assistance features

design_highlights.cn: 右侧浮动按钮支持图层切换、3D视角和定位功能
design_highlights.en: Floating buttons on right enable layer switching, 3D view and location

product_insight.cn: 虚拟跑步应用通过卫星地图展示真实世界路线，配合Brooklyn Bridge等知名地标作为虚拟跑步场景，增强用户沉浸感和运动动力，将枯燥的室内跑步转化为有趣的虚拟旅行体验
product_insight.en: Virtual running app uses satellite maps with iconic landmarks like Brooklyn Bridge to transform indoor running into immersive virtual travel experiences, boosting user motivation

core_function.cn: 保存并命名已规划的步行路线，设置隐私和离线选项
core_function.en: Save and name planned walking route with privacy and offline options

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明，路径清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlight creates clear visual hierarchy and path visibility

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗承载保存表单，保留地图上下文，操作流畅自然
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet contains save form while preserving map context for smooth interaction

design_highlights.cn: 星标收藏功能增加情感归属，Morning Walk命名引导生活化场景
design_highlights.en: Star favorite feature adds emotional attachment, lifestyle-oriented naming suggestion

design_highlights.cn: 离线下载选项提升高级功能感知，增强产品价值
design_highlights.en: Offline download option enhances premium feature perception and product value

product_insight.cn: 路线保存页采用地图+底部表单的经典布局，让用户在完成路线规划后无缝进入保存流程。隐私开关和离线下载选项体现对户外场景的深度理解，值得借鉴其功能分层策略。
product_insight.en: Classic map + bottom sheet layout enables seamless transition from route planning to saving. Privacy toggle and offline download options show deep understanding of outdoor scenarios, with noteworthy feature layering strategy.

core_function.cn: 保存并命名用户规划的步行路线
core_function.en: Save and name user-planned walking route

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合亮橙色路线轨迹，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark map with bright orange route trace creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，表单字段简洁高效
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables one-hand operation with concise form fields

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色保存按钮与收藏星标引导用户完成保存动作
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange save button and star icon guide users to complete saving

design_highlights.cn: 默认命名'Morning Walk'降低用户决策成本，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Default name 'Morning Walk' reduces decision fatigue and improves completion

product_insight.cn: 将路线保存设计为底部弹窗而非跳转页面，保持地图上下文不中断。隐私开关和离线下载选项满足进阶需求，同时不干扰基础保存流程，体现渐进式披露原则。
product_insight.en: Bottom sheet for route saving maintains map context without interruption. Privacy toggle and offline download options serve advanced needs while keeping basic flow simple, demonstrating progressive disclosure.

core_function.cn: 保存并命名跑步路线，设置隐私和离线下载选项
core_function.en: Save and name running route with privacy and offline settings

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线轨迹，视觉层次分明，路线走向清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route trace creates clear visual hierarchy and route visibility

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计将核心操作集中展示，支持快速编辑和一键保存
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design consolidates core actions for quick editing and one-tap save

design_highlights.cn: 收藏星标和隐私开关设计降低分享门槛，促进社区内容生产
design_highlights.en: Favorite star and privacy toggle reduce sharing barriers, encouraging community content

design_highlights.cn: 显示距离和海拔数据强化成就感，离线下载体现对用户场景的贴心考虑
design_highlights.en: Distance and elevation data reinforce achievement; offline download shows user-centric thinking

product_insight.cn: 将路线保存与分享功能整合在地图上下文中，用户可直观预览路线同时完成命名和隐私设置，离线下载功能解决户外网络不稳定痛点，体现对运动场景的深度理解
product_insight.en: Integrates route saving with map context for intuitive preview while editing. Offline download addresses outdoor connectivity issues, showing deep understanding of athletic use cases

core_function.cn: 确认路线已保存并提供后续操作入口
core_function.en: Confirm route saved and provide next action options

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图背景搭配半透明弹窗，层次分明且保持上下文可见
design_highlights.en: Dark map background with semi-transparent modal maintains context visibility

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计提供清晰选择：确认或查看已保存内容
design_highlights.en: Dual-button design offers clear choices: confirm or view saved content

design_highlights.cn: 即时反馈文案简洁明确，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Instant feedback with concise copy reduces cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 弹窗设计兼顾确认反馈与功能引导，"View Saved"按钮巧妙引导用户探索已保存路线功能，提升功能发现率和用户粘性，是轻量级引导的优秀实践
product_insight.en: Modal balances confirmation feedback with feature discovery. 'View Saved' button cleverly guides users to explore saved routes, increasing feature adoption and engagement

core_function.cn: 确认用户路线已保存并提供后续操作入口
core_function.en: Confirm route saved and provide access to saved routes

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高对比度显示，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark map with high-contrast orange route creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗即时反馈保存成功，双按钮设计方便快速操作或查看
design_highlights.en: Modal popup provides instant save feedback with dual-action buttons

design_highlights.cn: 底部展示路线相关的精美风景照片，激发用户运动欲望
design_highlights.en: Beautiful scenic photos at bottom inspire users to explore the route

design_highlights.cn: 提供离线下载、分享、开始等多功能入口，促进用户行动
design_highlights.en: Multiple action buttons (Offline, Share, Start) drive user engagement

product_insight.cn: 保存确认弹窗设计简洁高效，既确认操作成功又提供快捷跳转。底部风景图片与路线关联，增强场景代入感，同时功能按钮布局清晰，降低用户决策成本，提升功能使用率。
product_insight.en: Efficient save confirmation modal balances feedback and navigation. Route-related scenic photos enhance emotional connection while clear action buttons reduce decision friction and boost feature adoption.

core_function.cn: 确认用户已保存跑步路线并提供后续操作
core_function.en: Confirm route saved and provide follow-up actions

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线轨迹，视觉层次分明，路线清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route trace creates clear visual hierarchy and route visibility

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗即时反馈保存成功，提供OK和查看已保存两个明确选项
design_highlights.en: Modal popup provides instant save feedback with clear OK and View Saved options

design_highlights.cn: 展示44位用户近期活动，营造社区活跃氛围增强用户参与感
design_highlights.en: Showing 44 recent activities creates community atmosphere and engagement

design_highlights.cn: 底部实景照片预览增加路线吸引力，激励用户开始运动
design_highlights.en: Bottom scenic photos increase route appeal and motivate users to start

product_insight.cn: 保存确认弹窗设计简洁高效，同时保留底层详情页可见，让用户保持上下文认知。社交证明元素（活跃用户数）和实景照片共同提升路线可信度和吸引力，推动转化为实际运动。
product_insight.en: Clean save confirmation keeps context visible. Social proof with active users and scenic photos boost route credibility and appeal, driving conversion to actual exercise.

core_function.cn: 展示用户的日记记录列表，支持新建条目
core_function.en: Display user journal entries with option to create new ones

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景从蓝色过渡到暖橙色，营造日出/日落的宁静氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient background transitions from blue to warm peach, creating serene sunrise/sunset atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 空状态设计简洁不压迫，鼓励用户开始记录而非制造焦虑
design_highlights.en: Clean empty state design encourages journaling without creating pressure or anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 右上角加号按钮位置符合单手操作习惯，降低新建门槛
design_highlights.en: Plus button in top-right corner enables easy one-handed access for quick entry creation

product_insight.cn: 日记类产品采用空旷渐变背景而非提示文案，通过视觉氛围营造冥想感，降低用户对'必须写点什么'的心理压力，契合正念日记的产品定位。
product_insight.en: Using atmospheric gradient instead of instructional prompts reduces psychological pressure to write, aligning with mindful journaling positioning and creating a meditative experience.

core_function.cn: 展示单一食材的用量及关联食谱信息
core_function.en: Display ingredient quantity and linked recipe information

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸食材实拍图营造真实感，增强食材辨识度
design_highlights.en: Large real food photography creates authenticity and enhances ingredient recognition

design_highlights.cn: 关联食谱卡片可点击跳转，形成清晰的信息关联
design_highlights.en: Linked recipe card is tappable, creating clear information connection

design_highlights.cn: 展示使用场景让用户理解购买目的，减少决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Showing usage context helps users understand purchase purpose, reducing decision anxiety

product_insight.cn: 将购物清单与食谱深度关联，用户不仅知道买什么，还清楚为什么买、用在哪里。这种上下文设计大幅提升购物效率，减少食材浪费，是餐饮规划类产品的核心差异化点。
product_insight.en: Deep linking shopping list with recipes helps users understand not just what to buy, but why and where to use it. This contextual design improves shopping efficiency and reduces food waste.

core_function.cn: 展示食谱详情并确认已成功记录到饮食日记
core_function.en: Display recipe details and confirm meal logging to food diary

design_highlights.cn: 轻量级弹窗确认操作成功，不打断用户浏览上下文
design_highlights.en: Lightweight popup confirms success without interrupting browsing context

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的食谱步骤编号和分段布局，提升可读性
design_highlights.en: Clear numbered recipe steps with segmented layout improves readability

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定CTA按钮配合弹窗快捷入口，双重引导用户完成记录
design_highlights.en: Fixed bottom CTA with popup shortcut provides dual guidance for logging

design_highlights.cn: 即时反馈「Meal Logged」给予用户完成感和正向激励
design_highlights.en: Instant 'Meal Logged' feedback provides accomplishment and positive reinforcement

product_insight.cn: 将食谱浏览与饮食追踪无缝整合，用户可直接从菜谱记录餐食，减少操作步骤。弹窗设计既确认操作又提供跳转入口，平衡了反馈及时性与操作连续性。
product_insight.en: Seamlessly integrates recipe browsing with diet tracking, allowing direct meal logging from recipes. Popup design balances immediate feedback with navigation options, maintaining user flow continuity.

core_function.cn: 选择运动类型以开始活动追踪
core_function.en: Select sport type to start activity tracking

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，运动氛围浓厚，图标设计清晰统一
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates sporty atmosphere, consistent icon design

design_highlights.cn: 顶部快捷入口展示常用运动，减少用户选择成本
design_highlights.en: Top shortcuts display frequently used sports, reducing selection effort

design_highlights.cn: 智能推荐用户高频运动，个性化提升使用效率
design_highlights.en: Smart recommendation of user's top sports improves personalized efficiency

product_insight.cn: 通过'Your Top Sports'个性化推荐降低操作路径，分类列表满足全量需求，橙色勾选状态提供明确反馈，平衡了高频场景效率与功能完整性
product_insight.en: Personalized 'Your Top Sports' shortcuts reduce friction, categorized list covers all needs, orange checkmark provides clear feedback, balancing efficiency with completeness

core_function.cn: 设置运动目标的类型、周期和具体数值
core_function.en: Configure sport goals with type, timeframe and target value

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，运动类App经典配色，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent, classic sports app color scheme with clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 分段式选择器让复杂目标设置变得简单直观，渐进式表单降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Segmented selectors simplify complex goal setup, progressive form reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: "Moment of truth"文案增添趣味性，让目标设定更有仪式感
design_highlights.en: "Moment of truth" copy adds fun and ritual feeling to goal setting

design_highlights.cn: 灰色禁用态暗示已有目标，引导用户尝试新类型或编辑现有目标
design_highlights.en: Greyed-out states indicate existing goals, guiding users to try new types

product_insight.cn: 将目标设置拆解为运动类型、时间周期、目标类型、具体数值四步，降低决策复杂度。灰色已选项既避免重复设置，又巧妙引导用户探索更多目标维度，提升功能粘性。
product_insight.en: Breaking goal setup into 4 clear steps reduces decision complexity. Greyed existing goals prevent duplicates while guiding users to explore more dimensions, increasing feature stickiness.

core_function.cn: 查看周训练计划并编辑单次训练详情
core_function.en: View weekly training plan and edit individual workout details

design_highlights.cn: 日历视图与底部弹窗结合，层级分明便于快速编辑
design_highlights.en: Calendar view with bottom sheet overlay creates clear hierarchy for quick editing

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗支持时间调整和跳过操作，降低用户操作成本
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with time adjustment and skip options reduces user effort

design_highlights.cn: 训练项目用彩色标记区分类型，视觉引导清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Color-coded workout types provide clear visual guidance and distinction

product_insight.cn: 训练日历采用周视图+详情弹窗的双层架构，用户既能总览计划又能快速修改单项。提供Skip workout选项体现对用户灵活性的尊重，降低计划执行压力。
product_insight.en: Dual-layer architecture with week view and detail sheet allows both overview and quick edits. Skip workout option respects user flexibility and reduces pressure.

core_function.cn: 为训练计划设置具体执行时间和时长
core_function.en: Set specific time and duration for scheduled workout

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮式时间选择器直观易用，符合iOS原生交互习惯
design_highlights.en: Drum roller time picker intuitive and follows iOS native patterns

design_highlights.cn: 训练详情卡片清晰展示类型、距离、时长等关键信息
design_highlights.en: Workout card clearly displays type, distance, and duration details

design_highlights.cn: 提供'设为默认时间'选项减少重复操作，提升用户效率
design_highlights.en: Default time option reduces repetitive actions and improves efficiency

design_highlights.cn: '跳过训练'选项给予用户灵活性，减少计划带来的压力感
design_highlights.en: Skip workout option provides flexibility and reduces planning pressure

product_insight.cn: 底部弹窗模式保持上下文连贯性，时间选择器与默认设置结合降低操作成本。跳过选项体现产品对用户自主性的尊重，避免强制计划带来的负面体验。
product_insight.en: Bottom sheet maintains context continuity. Time picker with default setting reduces friction. Skip option respects user autonomy and avoids negative experience from forced planning.

core_function.cn: 解释Runna分数的计算方式和含义
core_function.en: Explains how Runna Score is calculated and what it means

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的层级结构，使用粗体标题和段落分隔提升可读性
design_highlights.en: Clear hierarchy with bold headings and paragraph separation for readability

design_highlights.cn: 用颜色关联分数状态，绿色渐变直观传达进步与退步
design_highlights.en: Color-coded score states using green gradients to convey progress intuitively

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式便于快速查阅后返回，不打断主流程
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal allows quick reference without interrupting main flow

product_insight.cn: 通过详细解释核心指标的计算逻辑，降低用户困惑，增强对系统的信任感。Note区域预告迭代计划，管理用户预期的同时展示产品持续优化的态度。
product_insight.en: Detailed explanation of core metric builds user trust and reduces confusion. Note section manages expectations while demonstrating commitment to continuous improvement.

core_function.cn: 解释相对努力指标的计算原理和使用方式
core_function.en: Explains how Relative Effort metric works and how to use it

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的纯文字排版，层级分明的标题结构便于阅读
design_highlights.en: Clean text-only layout with clear heading hierarchy for easy reading

design_highlights.cn: 用具体场景举例（10K跑步、骑车）帮助用户理解抽象概念
design_highlights.en: Uses relatable scenarios (10K run, cycling) to explain abstract concepts

design_highlights.cn: 内嵌超链接（心率区间、感知努力）支持深度探索相关知识
design_highlights.en: Embedded hyperlinks enable deeper exploration of related topics

product_insight.cn: Strava通过详细的功能说明页降低用户对专业指标的认知门槛，用生活化比喻和场景化举例让复杂算法变得易懂，增强用户对数据的信任和使用意愿。
product_insight.en: Strava reduces cognitive barriers to professional metrics through detailed explanations, using relatable analogies and scenarios to make complex algorithms accessible, building user trust in data.

core_function.cn: 自定义地图显示类型、热力图和图层叠加
core_function.en: Customize map display types, heatmaps and layer overlays

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，提升骑行场景下的可读性
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent improves readability during rides

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，分类清晰层次分明
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables one-hand operation with clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 图标化预览让用户直观理解每个选项效果
design_highlights.en: Icon previews help users intuitively understand each option

design_highlights.cn: 热力图分类展示骑行数据价值，增强用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Heatmap categories showcase riding data value, enhancing retention

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的地图配置通过可视化预览简化，热力图功能（全球/周/夜间/个人）体现数据沉淀价值，是骑行应用差异化竞争的核心功能点
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex map configuration through visual previews. Heatmap features (Global/Weekly/Night/Personal) demonstrate data accumulation value, a key differentiator for cycling apps

core_function.cn: 自定义地图类型、热力图和图层叠加显示
core_function.en: Customize map types, heatmaps and layer overlays

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，突出户外运动专业感，缩略图直观展示各选项效果
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accents conveys outdoor sports professionalism, thumbnails visually preview options

design_highlights.cn: 底部抽屉式面板设计，保留3D地图预览，支持边调整边查看实时效果
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet panel preserves 3D map preview, enabling real-time effect preview while adjusting

design_highlights.cn: NEW标签醒目标识新功能，引导用户发现Winter、Avalanche等专业图层
design_highlights.en: NEW badges highlight new features, guiding users to discover Winter and Avalanche layers

design_highlights.cn: 分层展示基础到专业功能，Personal热力图暗示数据积累价值，提升留存
design_highlights.en: Tiered display from basic to pro features, Personal heatmap implies data accumulation value

product_insight.cn: 将专业户外地图功能通过可视化缩略图降低认知门槛，分类清晰的图层系统满足从徒步到雪崩预警的多场景需求，NEW标签持续制造新鲜感促进功能探索
product_insight.en: Visual thumbnails lower cognitive barrier for professional outdoor map features. Clear layer categorization serves multiple scenarios from hiking to avalanche alerts. NEW badges create freshness driving feature exploration

core_function.cn: 展示跑步路线信息，支持保存、分享和开始导航
core_function.en: Display running route details with save, share and navigation options

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明，夜间模式友好
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlight creates clear visual hierarchy, night mode friendly

design_highlights.cn: 底部抽屉式详情面板，支持上滑展开更多内容，操作自然流畅
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet detail panel supports pull-up for more content, natural interaction flow

design_highlights.cn: 快捷操作栏集成保存、离线、分享、开始四大核心功能，降低行动门槛
design_highlights.en: Quick action bar integrates save, offline, share, start functions to reduce friction

design_highlights.cn: 展示实景照片增加路线吸引力，激发用户探索欲望
design_highlights.en: Real photos of route scenery increase appeal and inspire exploration desire

product_insight.cn: 通过难度标签、距离时长预估等关键数据降低用户决策成本，离线下载功能解决户外信号问题，实景图片构建情感连接，整体设计围绕「快速决策-立即行动」的转化路径优化
product_insight.en: Key metrics like difficulty, distance and time estimates reduce decision cost. Offline download solves outdoor signal issues. Real photos build emotional connection. Design optimizes for quick decision-to-action conversion path

core_function.cn: 展示跑步路线信息，支持保存、分享和开始运动
core_function.en: Display running route details with save, share and start options

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配橙色路线轨迹，视觉对比鲜明，路线清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route trace creates strong visual contrast for clear path visibility

design_highlights.cn: 底部抽屉式卡片设计，上滑可查看更多详情，地图与信息分层展示
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet card design with swipe-up for more details, layered map and info display

design_highlights.cn: 橙色星标收藏按钮突出，快捷操作栏降低使用门槛
design_highlights.en: Highlighted orange star button and quick action bar reduce friction to engage

design_highlights.cn: 底部实景照片展示路线风景，激发用户探索欲望
design_highlights.en: Real photos at bottom showcase scenic views, inspiring users to explore the route

product_insight.cn: 将路线难度、距离、时长等关键信息前置展示，配合实景照片增强用户对路线的感知。快捷操作栏整合保存/离线/分享/开始功能，形成完整的决策-行动闭环。
product_insight.en: Key info like difficulty, distance, duration displayed upfront with real photos to enhance route perception. Quick action bar integrates save/offline/share/start for complete decision-to-action loop.

core_function.cn: 展示用户悲伤日记记录，支持查看和添加新条目
core_function.en: Display grief journal entries with ability to view and add new ones

design_highlights.cn: 渐变天空背景营造平静治愈的氛围，从深蓝到暖橙象征情绪过渡
design_highlights.en: Gradient sky background creates calm healing atmosphere, blue to orange symbolizes emotional transition

design_highlights.cn: 填空式日记提示引导用户深度表达内心悲伤情绪
design_highlights.en: Fill-in-the-blank prompts guide users to deeply express inner grief emotions

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的卡片设计配合右上角加号按钮，操作路径清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Clean card design with plus button in corner provides clear intuitive interaction

product_insight.cn: 针对悲伤疗愈场景，采用引导式写作提示降低用户表达门槛，渐变背景的情感化设计有助于创造安全的情绪释放空间，值得心理健康类产品借鉴
product_insight.en: Guided writing prompts lower expression barriers for grief healing. Gradient emotional design creates safe space for emotional release, valuable for mental health products

core_function.cn: 展示用户活动成就和系统通知消息
core_function.en: Display user activity achievements and system notifications

design_highlights.cn: 使用鼓励性文案"Way to go"配合鼓掌emoji，增强用户成就感
design_highlights.en: Encouraging copy 'Way to go' with clapping emoji enhances user achievement feeling

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题设计，通知卡片简洁突出，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with clean notification cards, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部导航栏带红点提示，引导用户关注未读内容
design_highlights.en: Bottom nav with red badge indicators guides attention to unread content

product_insight.cn: 通知设计融入游戏化激励元素，用「Kudos」等积极语言强化用户完成活动后的正向反馈，有效提升用户粘性和持续运动的动力。简约列表设计降低认知负担。
product_insight.en: Notification design integrates gamification with positive language like 'Kudos' to reinforce positive feedback after activities, boosting engagement and motivation. Minimal list design reduces cognitive load.

core_function.cn: 选择运动类型以筛选适合的路线
core_function.en: Select sport type to filter suitable routes

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色高亮，运动感强烈且视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates strong athletic vibe and clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，选中状态有明确的勾选反馈
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables one-handed use with clear checkmark feedback for selection

design_highlights.cn: 图标风格统一，分类清晰区分步行类和骑行类运动
design_highlights.en: Consistent icon style with clear categorization between foot and cycle sports

design_highlights.cn: 背景地图保持可见，让用户始终感知当前路线探索场景
design_highlights.en: Background map remains visible, maintaining user context of route exploration

product_insight.cn: 将运动类型作为路线筛选的前置步骤，确保后续推荐精准匹配用户需求。分类设计（步行/骑行）降低认知负担，单选模式简化决策流程，提升路线探索效率。
product_insight.en: Sport type as pre-filter ensures precise route recommendations. Categorization (foot/cycle) reduces cognitive load, single-select simplifies decisions and improves route discovery efficiency.

core_function.cn: 确认用户是否删除已记录的个人最佳成绩
core_function.en: Confirm whether user wants to delete a recorded personal best

design_highlights.cn: 删除按钮使用红色警示色，视觉层级清晰区分危险操作
design_highlights.en: Red warning color for delete button, clear visual hierarchy for dangerous actions

design_highlights.cn: 双重确认机制防止误操作，提供X关闭和Cancel两种取消方式
design_highlights.en: Double confirmation prevents accidental deletion with X and Cancel options

design_highlights.cn: 标题直接显示06:00 PB具体信息，让用户明确删除对象
design_highlights.en: Title shows specific 06:00 PB info, making deletion target crystal clear

product_insight.cn: 删除PB成绩涉及用户核心数据资产，采用模态弹窗+二次确认的防误删设计符合行业最佳实践。取消按钮置于删除下方，符合iOS设计规范，降低误触风险。
product_insight.en: Deleting PB records involves core user data. Modal with double confirmation follows best practices. Cancel button placement below Delete aligns with iOS guidelines, reducing accidental taps.

core_function.cn: 二次确认用户删除训练记录的操作意图
core_function.en: Confirm user intent before deleting workout record

design_highlights.cn: 黄色警告图标配合警示文案，视觉层级清晰传达操作风险
design_highlights.en: Yellow warning icon with alert text clearly conveys operation risk

design_highlights.cn: 删除按钮采用黑色实心设计，Cancel文字链形式降低误操作概率
design_highlights.en: Solid black delete button with text-only cancel reduces accidental deletion

design_highlights.cn: 简洁明确的确认文案，减少用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Clear and concise confirmation copy reduces user decision anxiety

product_insight.cn: 采用经典确认弹窗模式保护用户数据安全，删除按钮视觉权重高于取消符合破坏性操作的设计规范，背景模糊聚焦用户注意力于当前决策
product_insight.en: Classic confirmation dialog protects user data. Delete button's higher visual weight follows destructive action design patterns. Blurred background focuses attention on current decision.

core_function.cn: 裁剪GPS轨迹活动并确认不可逆操作
core_function.en: Crop GPS activity track with irreversible action confirmation

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图背景配橙色轨迹线，视觉层次分明，裁剪区域清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange track line, clear visual hierarchy highlighting crop area

design_highlights.cn: 双滑块精准控制起止点，支持时间戳微调，操作直观高效
design_highlights.en: Dual sliders for precise start/end point control with timestamp adjustment

design_highlights.cn: 警告弹窗明确告知操作不可撤销，降低用户误操作风险和焦虑
design_highlights.en: Warning modal clearly states action is irreversible, reducing user error anxiety

design_highlights.cn: Save按钮使用品牌橙色突出，引导用户完成操作
design_highlights.en: Save button uses brand orange color to guide user completion

product_insight.cn: 运动App中轨迹裁剪是高级需求，通过可视化地图预览+时间轴双重确认机制，既满足专业用户精细编辑需求，又通过不可逆警告保护数据安全，平衡了功能性与安全性。
product_insight.en: Track cropping addresses power user needs. Visual map preview with timeline dual-confirmation balances precision editing with data protection through irreversible action warnings.

core_function.cn: 裁剪运动轨迹并显示后台处理状态反馈
core_function.en: Crop activity route with background processing status feedback

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图背景配合橙色轨迹线形成高对比度，路径清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route creates high contrast for clear path visibility

design_highlights.cn: 双滑块时间轴设计，支持精确选择起止点进行裁剪
design_highlights.en: Dual slider timeline enables precise start/end point selection for cropping

design_highlights.cn: 即时弹窗反馈「后台处理中」降低用户等待焦虑
design_highlights.en: Instant popup feedback about background processing reduces user waiting anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 起点终点带左右箭头，支持微调时间点
design_highlights.en: Start/end points with arrows allow fine-tuning of time markers

product_insight.cn: 运动类App的轨迹编辑是高级功能，采用后台异步处理+即时反馈的模式，既保证数据处理质量又不阻塞用户操作，体现了对用户时间的尊重
product_insight.en: Async background processing with instant feedback for route editing respects user time while ensuring data quality, a smart approach for workout apps

core_function.cn: 展示购物清单已全部完成的状态
core_function.en: Display completion state of grocery shopping list

design_highlights.cn: 精美插画配合蓝色购物篮，传达完成感与满足感
design_highlights.en: Delightful illustration with blue shopping basket conveys completion and satisfaction

design_highlights.cn: 积极正向的文案'All items completed'给予用户成就感
design_highlights.en: Positive copy 'All items completed' provides users with sense of achievement

design_highlights.cn: 保留'Show completed items'入口，方便用户回顾已购物品
design_highlights.en: Retains 'Show completed items' link for users to review purchased items

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计不仅告知用户当前状态，更通过情感化插画和积极文案强化完成感。保留历史记录入口体现了对用户需求的完整考虑，值得在任务完成类场景中借鉴。
product_insight.en: Empty state design not only informs status but reinforces completion through emotional illustration and positive copy. Retaining history access shows complete user need consideration, worth referencing in task completion scenarios.

core_function.cn: 管理和追踪购物清单，支持勾选已购买商品
core_function.en: Manage and track grocery shopping list with completion checkboxes

design_highlights.cn: 清爽的蓝白配色，分类清晰的商品列表布局
design_highlights.en: Clean blue-white color scheme with well-organized category layout

design_highlights.cn: 复选框交互设计，已完成项目显示删除线视觉反馈
design_highlights.en: Checkbox interaction with strikethrough visual feedback for completed items

design_highlights.cn: 友好的空状态弹窗提示，引导用户理解当前状态并给出解决方案
design_highlights.en: Friendly modal explaining empty state with clear guidance for resolution

product_insight.cn: 将购物清单与餐饮规划深度整合，通过模态弹窗清晰解释分享功能的前提条件，降低用户困惑。商品按分类展示、显示数量和重量，提升购物效率。
product_insight.en: Deep integration of grocery list with meal planning. Modal clearly explains sharing prerequisites to reduce confusion. Category grouping with quantity/weight display improves shopping efficiency.

core_function.cn: 管理购物清单，勾选已完成的食材采购项
core_function.en: Manage grocery list with checkable items for shopping

design_highlights.cn: 已完成项目采用删除线和灰色样式，视觉层级清晰区分待购与已购
design_highlights.en: Completed items use strikethrough and gray styling for clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗提供隐藏已完成项目功能，保持列表整洁可控
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet offers option to hide completed items for a cleaner list

design_highlights.cn: 按食材类别（Produce）分组展示，每项显示数量单位便于采购
design_highlights.en: Items grouped by category with quantity units for easy shopping reference

product_insight.cn: 将膳食计划与购物清单打通，用户可直接从食谱生成采购列表。复选框交互简单高效，分类展示和隐藏已购功能提升购物体验，形成完整的餐饮规划闭环。
product_insight.en: Integrates meal planning with grocery shopping. Simple checkbox interaction, category grouping, and hide-completed feature create a seamless meal-to-shop workflow.

core_function.cn: 展示购物清单已全部完成的状态
core_function.en: Display completed grocery shopping list status

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色购物篮插图传达任务完成的积极情绪，视觉简洁友好
design_highlights.en: Blue shopping basket illustration conveys positive completion mood with clean visuals

design_highlights.cn: 鼓励性文案'Looks like you have everything you need'营造成就感
design_highlights.en: Encouraging copy creates sense of accomplishment and satisfaction

design_highlights.cn: 提供'Show completed items'链接便于用户回顾已完成项目
design_highlights.en: Show completed items link allows users to review finished tasks

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计不仅告知状态，更通过正向反馈强化用户完成任务的成就感。保留查看历史功能满足回顾需求，避免用户对数据丢失的焦虑。
product_insight.en: Empty state design reinforces accomplishment through positive feedback while maintaining history access to prevent user anxiety about data loss.

core_function.cn: 通过填空引导用户进行悲伤情绪的自我觉察和表达
core_function.en: Guide users to self-reflect and express grief through fill-in prompts

design_highlights.cn: 渐变天空背景配合漂浮爱心营造温暖治愈氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient sky background with floating hearts creates warm healing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 填空式引导降低表达门槛，帮助用户直面悲伤情绪
design_highlights.en: Fill-in-blank format lowers expression barrier, helps users confront grief

design_highlights.cn: 单一问题聚焦设计，减少认知负担提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Single question focus reduces cognitive load and improves completion rate

product_insight.cn: 悲伤疗愈类应用通过填空式句子引导，降低用户情感表达难度。视觉氛围设计温柔细腻，漂浮爱心元素传递关怀与陪伴感，适合情感类产品借鉴。
product_insight.en: Grief healing app uses sentence completion to lower emotional expression barriers. Gentle visual atmosphere with floating hearts conveys care and companionship, ideal reference for emotional wellness products.

core_function.cn: 搜索用户自定义食谱，引导添加新食谱
core_function.en: Search custom recipes and guide users to add new ones

design_highlights.cn: 温馨的烤面包插图配合蒸汽动效，营造家庭烹饪氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm toast illustration with steam effect creates homey cooking atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: "Mom's Meatloaf"亲切文案唤起家庭回忆，降低空状态的挫败感
design_highlights.en: Mom's Meatloaf copy evokes family memories, reducing empty state frustration

design_highlights.cn: 分类Tab设计（All/My Meals/My Recipes/My Foods）便于快速切换数据源
design_highlights.en: Category tabs enable quick switching between different food data sources

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计巧妙运用情感化文案和温馨插图，将"无结果"转化为"添加食谱"的引导机会，既降低用户挫败感，又推动UGC内容建设，提升用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Empty state cleverly uses emotional copy and warm illustrations to transform 'no results' into recipe-adding guidance, reducing frustration while driving UGC content and user engagement.

core_function.cn: 通过输入邀请码访问私密活动空间
core_function.en: Access private event spaces by entering invitation code

design_highlights.cn: 顶部展示活动群组照片，营造社区归属感和活力氛围
design_highlights.en: Group event photo at top creates community belonging and energetic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 极简单一输入框设计，降低操作门槛，专注核心任务
design_highlights.en: Minimalist single input field reduces friction and focuses on core task

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的珊瑚色CTA按钮，与整体浅色调形成对比引导点击
design_highlights.en: Prominent coral CTA button contrasts with light theme to guide clicks

design_highlights.cn: 私密空间概念增强专属感，提升用户加入意愿
design_highlights.en: Private space concept enhances exclusivity and increases join motivation

product_insight.cn: 通过邀请码机制构建私密社区入口，既保护活动隐私又增强专属感。顶部真实活动照片展示让用户预见加入后的体验，是运动社交类产品常用的转化策略。
product_insight.en: Invitation code mechanism builds private community access, protecting privacy while enhancing exclusivity. Real event photo preview shows users what to expect, a common conversion strategy in sports social apps.

core_function.cn: 展示用户每日冥想反思记录的空状态引导
core_function.en: Empty state guiding users to start daily calm reflections

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景从深蓝过渡到暖橙，营造宁静冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient background from deep blue to warm orange creates calming meditation atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案温和引导而非冷冰冰提示，降低用户心理压力
design_highlights.en: Gentle empty state copy reduces psychological pressure instead of cold prompts

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮突出显示，清晰引导用户开始首次反思
design_highlights.en: Single prominent CTA button clearly guides users to start first reflection

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计体现冥想产品的情感化关怀，通过温暖渐变背景和柔和文案降低新功能尝试门槛，右上角+号暗示未来可添加自定义反思，为高级用户留有扩展空间。
product_insight.en: Empty state reflects emotional care in meditation apps. Warm gradient and soft copy lower barriers for trying new features. Plus icon hints at future custom reflection options for power users.

core_function.cn: 提供内容排序方式选择，支持热门和最新排序
core_function.en: Provide content sorting options between most popular and most recent

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计简洁，圆角白底与模糊背景形成层次
design_highlights.en: Clean bottom sheet design with rounded corners and blurred background creates depth

design_highlights.cn: 单选Radio按钮交互清晰，选中状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Radio button interaction is clear with obvious selected state

design_highlights.cn: 选项间用分割线区分，视觉层级分明
design_highlights.en: Divider line separates options for clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 采用底部弹窗而非跳转页面的轻量化设计，减少用户操作成本。仅提供两个核心排序选项，避免选择困难，体现「少即是多」的产品理念。
product_insight.en: Lightweight bottom sheet design reduces user friction. Only two core sorting options avoid decision paralysis, embodying the 'less is more' product philosophy.

core_function.cn: 从相册中选择照片添加到项目或内容中
core_function.en: Select photos from library to add to projects or content

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景搭配橙色强调色，形成高对比度的视觉层次
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange accent creates high-contrast visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部浮动栏实时显示选中数量和位置信息，操作反馈即时清晰
design_highlights.en: Floating bottom bar shows real-time selection count and location info with instant feedback

design_highlights.cn: 网格布局紧凑高效，支持快速浏览大量图片
design_highlights.en: Compact grid layout enables efficient browsing of large photo collections

design_highlights.cn: Photos/Collections分段切换，支持按相册或照片流两种浏览模式
design_highlights.en: Segmented control for Photos/Collections enables dual browsing modes

product_insight.cn: 选择器设计注重效率与信息透明，选中计数器配合位置标签让用户清楚了解操作状态，搜索入口前置降低查找成本，适合内容创作类产品借鉴。
product_insight.en: Picker design prioritizes efficiency and transparency. Selection counter with location tag keeps users informed, prominent search reduces finding friction - ideal pattern for content creation apps.

core_function.cn: 选择本地照片并授权第三方应用访问
core_function.en: Select photos and grant third-party app access

design_highlights.cn: 网格布局展示照片缩略图，信息密度高且浏览效率佳
design_highlights.en: Grid layout displays photo thumbnails with high information density

design_highlights.cn: 隐私提示横幅清晰说明访问权限，增强用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Privacy banner clearly explains access permissions, building user trust

design_highlights.cn: 橙色主题色与深色背景形成对比，突出品牌识别
design_highlights.en: Orange accent color contrasts with dark background, enhancing brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 底部状态栏显示位置信息已包含，减少用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom bar shows location is included, reducing user decision anxiety

product_insight.cn: iOS私有访问模式设计体现了隐私优先理念，通过显眼的权限说明和Learn More入口，既保护用户隐私又降低授权门槛，值得第三方应用借鉴此透明化沟通策略
product_insight.en: iOS private access mode reflects privacy-first philosophy. The prominent permission explanation and Learn More link protect privacy while lowering authorization barriers—a transparent communication strategy worth emulating.

core_function.cn: 从相册中选择照片并添加到内容中
core_function.en: Select photos from library to add to content

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景突出照片内容，网格布局清晰展示缩略图
design_highlights.en: Dark background highlights photos, grid layout clearly displays thumbnails

design_highlights.cn: 橙色圆形选中标记，底部实时显示已选数量和位置信息
design_highlights.en: Orange circular selection indicator with real-time count and location info at bottom

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Photos/Collections分段控件快速切换浏览模式
design_highlights.en: Segmented control for quick switching between Photos and Collections

design_highlights.cn: 位置信息提示增强用户信任感和透明度
design_highlights.en: Location info notice enhances user trust and transparency

product_insight.cn: 照片选择器采用原生iOS风格但加入品牌橙色调，底部状态栏实时反馈选择数量并预告位置信息将被包含，既保持操作效率又兼顾隐私透明，是媒体上传场景的优秀实践
product_insight.en: Photo picker uses native iOS style with brand orange accent. Bottom status bar shows selection count and location privacy notice, balancing efficiency with transparency - excellent practice for media upload flows

core_function.cn: 搜索并选择城市或地点位置
core_function.en: Search and select city or location

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合清晰的文字层级，搜索结果易于浏览
design_highlights.en: Dark background with clear text hierarchy for easy browsing

design_highlights.cn: 实时搜索建议，输入即显示匹配结果，减少用户操作步骤
design_highlights.en: Real-time search suggestions appear instantly while typing

design_highlights.cn: 双行信息展示：主标题+详细地址，信息完整且不拥挤
design_highlights.en: Two-line display with title and detailed address for complete info

product_insight.cn: 搜索结果涵盖多种类型地点（城市、商店、餐厅、机构），满足不同场景需求。通过展示完整地址帮助用户准确识别目标位置，提升选择效率。
product_insight.en: Search results cover diverse location types (cities, shops, restaurants, institutions) for various use cases. Full addresses help users accurately identify and select the right location.

core_function.cn: 通过摄像头扫描商品条码快速录入食品信息
core_function.en: Scan product barcodes via camera to quickly log food items

design_highlights.cn: 创意条码设计融入奶牛剪影，强化产品品牌识别
design_highlights.en: Creative barcode design with cow silhouette enhances brand recognition

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色扫描框实时追踪条码位置，提供清晰视觉反馈
design_highlights.en: Blue scanning frame tracks barcode position with clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 底部手动输入备选方案降低扫描失败导致的流失
design_highlights.en: Manual entry fallback at bottom reduces drop-off from scan failures

product_insight.cn: 扫码录入是健康追踪类App的核心效率功能，通过自动识别大幅降低用户输入成本。手动输入兜底设计确保100%场景覆盖，体现对边缘情况的周全考虑。
product_insight.en: Barcode scanning is a core efficiency feature for health tracking apps, significantly reducing input friction. Manual entry fallback ensures 100% scenario coverage, showing thoughtful edge case handling.

core_function.cn: 解释Runna评分机制及调整方法
core_function.en: Explains Runna Score system and adjustment methods

design_highlights.cn: 开篇即安抚用户情绪，强调分数下降不代表退步，降低焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Opens with reassurance that score drop doesn't mean lack of progress, reducing anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的层级结构，使用项目符号和编号列表提升可读性
design_highlights.en: Clear hierarchy with bullet points and numbered lists for improved readability

design_highlights.cn: 底部emoji反馈收集用户满意度，简单直观的交互方式
design_highlights.en: Bottom emoji feedback collects user satisfaction with simple intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 提供具体操作路径引导用户调整设置，增强用户掌控感
design_highlights.en: Provides specific action paths to adjust settings, enhancing user control

product_insight.cn: 通过透明化算法逻辑和赋予用户调整能力，将潜在的负面体验（分数下降）转化为教育用户和增强信任的机会，同时预告未来优化计划展示产品迭代承诺
product_insight.en: Transforms potential negative experience (score drop) into opportunity for user education and trust building by transparently explaining algorithm logic and giving users adjustment control, while previewing future improvements

core_function.cn: 显示用户运动路线轨迹并支持保存分享
core_function.en: Display user activity route with save and share options

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图主题搭配醒目橙色标记，起终点清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map theme with vibrant orange markers, clear start/end points

design_highlights.cn: 3D视图切换和图层控制，增强地图探索体验
design_highlights.en: 3D view toggle and layer controls enhance map exploration

design_highlights.cn: 左下角缩略图展示运动照片，增加成就感和回忆感
design_highlights.en: Thumbnail photo in corner adds sense of achievement and memory

product_insight.cn: 将运动轨迹与照片结合展示，强化用户的成就感和分享欲望。保存路线功能鼓励用户重复使用同一路线，增加粘性。社交属性（发布者信息）促进社区互动。
product_insight.en: Combining route tracking with photos reinforces achievement and sharing desire. Save route feature encourages repeated use. Social elements with poster info promote community engagement.

core_function.cn: 在地图上搜索和浏览骑行/跑步路线
core_function.en: Search and browse cycling/running routes on interactive map

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明，夜间模式友好
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlights creates clear visual hierarchy and night-friendly UI

design_highlights.cn: 长按地图调整起点的引导提示，降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Press-and-hold tooltip for adjusting start point reduces learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 底部路线卡片展示关键信息（难度、距离、时间），促进路线选择
design_highlights.en: Bottom route card displays key info (difficulty, distance, time) to drive route selection

design_highlights.cn: 多维度筛选器（长度、海拔、路面、难度）支持精准搜索
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimensional filters (length, elevation, surface, difficulty) enable precise search

product_insight.cn: 将路线密度可视化在地图上，让用户直观感知区域路线丰富度。底部卡片采用渐进式披露，先展示核心信息吸引点击，3D视图和图层切换满足专业用户需求
product_insight.en: Visualizing route density on map helps users perceive area richness. Bottom card uses progressive disclosure showing key info first. 3D view and layer toggle serve power users

core_function.cn: 引导用户暂停并感知当下情绪状态
core_function.en: Guide users to pause and notice their current emotional state

design_highlights.cn: 柔和渐变背景营造平静氛围，模糊效果减少视觉干扰
design_highlights.en: Soft gradient background creates calm atmosphere, blur effect reduces visual distraction

design_highlights.cn: 温和邀请式文案「Take a moment」降低用户心理压力
design_highlights.en: Gentle invitation copy 'Take a moment' reduces user psychological pressure

design_highlights.cn: 极简双圆点设计暗示可滑动或点选的交互方式
design_highlights.en: Minimalist dual-dot design implies swipeable or tappable interaction

design_highlights.cn: 大面积留白聚焦核心内容，符合冥想场景的沉浸需求
design_highlights.en: Generous whitespace focuses on core content, suits immersive meditation needs

product_insight.cn: 通过极简界面和温暖色调创造沉浸式正念体验，情绪感知作为冥想前置步骤有助于用户建立自我觉察习惯，提升功能粘性和使用深度。
product_insight.en: Creates immersive mindfulness experience through minimal UI and warm tones. Emotion check-in as pre-meditation step helps users build self-awareness habits, increasing feature stickiness and engagement depth.

core_function.cn: 浏览和探索不同类型的健身训练课程
core_function.en: Browse and explore various workout routines by category

design_highlights.cn: 高质量真人训练图片配合圆角卡片设计，直观展示动作预览
design_highlights.en: High-quality real trainer photos with rounded cards for intuitive workout preview

design_highlights.cn: 水平滑动卡片设计暗示更多内容，引导用户探索
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling cards hint at more content, encouraging exploration

design_highlights.cn: 分类文案强调功能价值如'核心力量''功能性运动'，明确训练收益
design_highlights.en: Category copy emphasizes functional benefits like core strength and functional movement

design_highlights.cn: 显示时长和类型标签降低决策门槛，6分钟标识强调高效训练
design_highlights.en: Duration and type labels reduce decision friction, 6-minute tag emphasizes efficiency

product_insight.cn: 采用分类浏览+横向滑动模式降低用户选择负担，短时高效的课程设计契合现代用户碎片化时间，教练真人出镜增强信任感和专业度
product_insight.en: Category browsing with horizontal scroll reduces choice overload. Short efficient workouts match modern users' fragmented time. Real trainer images build trust and professionalism

core_function.cn: 录入运动装备信息并选择类型
core_function.en: Input sports gear details and select gear type

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，突出运动类别图标辨识度
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color highlights sport category icons

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗选择器模式，单选项带勾选反馈清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet picker with clear checkmark selection feedback

design_highlights.cn: 表单字段层级分明，下拉选择器统一灰色边框设计
design_highlights.en: Clear form field hierarchy with consistent dropdown border styling

product_insight.cn: 装备管理功能提升用户数据追踪精度，支持品牌/型号/昵称等多维度信息录入，便于后续里程统计和磨损提醒，增强运动数据的专业性和粘性。
product_insight.en: Gear management enhances tracking accuracy with multi-dimensional inputs like brand/model/nickname, enabling mileage stats and wear alerts to boost data professionalism and engagement.

core_function.cn: 加载训练视频时提供等待反馈与跳过选项
core_function.en: Provide loading feedback and skip option while preparing workout videos

design_highlights.cn: 大字号蓝色标题"Get Ready"营造即将开始的运动氛围
design_highlights.en: Large blue 'Get Ready' title creates anticipation for workout

design_highlights.cn: 气泡提示框引导用户注意跳过选项，降低等待焦虑
design_highlights.en: Tooltip bubble guides users to skip option, reducing wait anxiety

design_highlights.cn: "Can't wait?"文案体现对用户急切心情的理解和关怀
design_highlights.en: "Can't wait?" copy shows empathy for user's eagerness

design_highlights.cn: 提供无视频版本作为降级方案，确保用户能快速开始训练
design_highlights.en: Offers video-free alternative as fallback to ensure quick workout start

product_insight.cn: 通过提供跳过选项巧妙解决视频加载慢的体验痛点，既保留了高质量视频内容，又给急切用户提供替代方案，平衡了内容质量与用户耐心。
product_insight.en: Cleverly addresses video loading pain point by offering skip option, balancing content quality with user patience while providing alternatives for eager users.

core_function.cn: 介绍手绘路线功能并引导用户使用Beta新特性
core_function.en: Introduce hand-drawn route feature and guide users to try Beta functionality

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线轨迹，高对比度突出路线清晰可见
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route trace creates high contrast for clear visibility

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模态框设计，不遮挡地图主体，用户可预览功能效果
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal design keeps map visible, allowing users to preview feature

design_highlights.cn: Beta标签传递尝鲜感，文案坦诚说明功能可能变化，建立信任
design_highlights.en: Beta label creates exclusivity, transparent copy about changes builds trust

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的橙色CTA按钮与简洁文案'Got it'降低行动门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA with simple 'Got it' copy reduces action barrier

product_insight.cn: 通过Beta功能提前曝光策略，让核心用户参与新功能测试并收集反馈。明确告知功能可能变更，既管理预期又营造参与感，是成熟产品迭代的优秀实践。
product_insight.en: Beta feature exposure strategy engages core users in testing while managing expectations. Transparent communication about potential changes builds trust and creates co-creation feeling.

core_function.cn: 确认用户是否要删除活动记录，防止误操作
core_function.en: Confirm activity deletion to prevent accidental data loss

design_highlights.cn: 删除按钮使用红色警示色，视觉层级清晰区分危险操作
design_highlights.en: Red color for delete button clearly indicates dangerous action

design_highlights.cn: 提供明确的取消选项，支持一键关闭，降低误操作风险
design_highlights.en: Clear cancel option and close button minimize accidental deletion

design_highlights.cn: 简洁友好的确认文案，不带压力感但明确传达后果
design_highlights.en: Simple friendly copy clearly communicates consequences without pressure

product_insight.cn: 删除确认弹窗采用经典的双按钮设计，红色描边按钮既突出危险操作又不过于激进，取消按钮作为安全出口置于下方，符合用户心理模型，有效防止数据误删。
product_insight.en: Classic two-button confirmation dialog with red outlined delete button balances visibility and caution. Cancel as safe exit below follows user mental model, effectively preventing accidental data loss.

core_function.cn: 二次确认用户删除评论的操作意图
core_function.en: Confirm user intent before deleting a comment

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗设计，背景模糊突出操作焦点，防止误操作
design_highlights.en: Modal dialog with blurred background focuses attention and prevents accidental actions

design_highlights.cn: 删除按钮采用红色警示色，视觉上强调破坏性操作
design_highlights.en: Red color for delete button visually emphasizes destructive action

design_highlights.cn: 简洁明确的询问文案，降低用户决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Clear and concise confirmation text reduces user decision anxiety

product_insight.cn: 经典的破坏性操作确认模式，通过颜色区分主次按钮降低误删风险。取消按钮无边框设计引导用户优先考虑取消，体现对用户数据的保护意识。
product_insight.en: Classic destructive action confirmation pattern. Borderless cancel button guides users to reconsider, showing data protection awareness. Color differentiation reduces accidental deletion risk.

core_function.cn: 确认用户是否清除所有已保存的帖子
core_function.en: Confirm whether to clear all saved posts

design_highlights.cn: 深色主按钮与浅色取消按钮形成视觉层级，引导用户注意力
design_highlights.en: Dark primary button contrasts with light cancel button creating visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗配合背景模糊遮罩，聚焦用户决策
design_highlights.en: Modal dialog with blurred background overlay focuses user attention on decision

design_highlights.cn: 明确警告文案提示操作不可逆，降低误操作风险
design_highlights.en: Clear warning text about irreversible action reduces accidental deletion risk

product_insight.cn: 采用破坏性操作二次确认模式，文案明确告知后果不可逆。黑色CTA按钮强调操作严肃性，同时提供取消选项保护用户数据安全，是防误删的标准设计范式。
product_insight.en: Uses destructive action confirmation pattern with clear irreversibility warning. Black CTA emphasizes seriousness while cancel option protects user data, following standard deletion prevention design.

core_function.cn: 运动间隙休息倒计时，帮助用户控制休息时间
core_function.en: Countdown timer for rest periods between exercises

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色渐变背景营造轻松休息氛围，与运动状态形成对比
design_highlights.en: Blue gradient background creates relaxing rest atmosphere, contrasting with workout state

design_highlights.cn: 红色进度条直观显示剩余时间，增强时间感知
design_highlights.en: Red progress bar visually indicates remaining time, enhancing time awareness

design_highlights.cn: 大字体"Rest"提示用户当前状态，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Large 'Rest' text clearly indicates current state, reducing cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 休息页面采用冷色调和极简设计，与运动时的紧张感形成鲜明对比。底部显示"End of Workout"提示用户即将完成，提供成就感和心理预期管理。
product_insight.en: Rest screen uses cool tones and minimal design, contrasting workout intensity. 'End of Workout' indicator provides achievement sense and manages user expectations.

core_function.cn: 指导用户将Runna训练计划同步至日历应用
core_function.en: Guide users to sync Runna workout plans with calendar apps

design_highlights.cn: 纯净白底配合清晰层级的排版，标题加粗突出重点信息
design_highlights.en: Clean white background with clear typography hierarchy, bold titles highlight key info

design_highlights.cn: 斜体黄色提示框强调重要注意事项，降低用户预期落差
design_highlights.en: Italic highlighted notes manage user expectations and reduce confusion

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式便于快速关闭返回，不打断主流程
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal allows quick dismissal without interrupting main flow

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的技术集成功能以分步骤文档形式呈现，预先说明同步限制（全天事件、更新延迟），有效管理用户预期，减少支持工单。这种透明沟通策略值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Presenting complex technical integration as step-by-step documentation while proactively addressing limitations (all-day events, sync delay) manages expectations and reduces support tickets. Transparent communication strategy worth adopting.

core_function.cn: 从品牌列表中选择装备品牌进行记录
core_function.en: Select gear brand from alphabetical brand list

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，选中状态清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color, clear selected state indication

design_highlights.cn: 右侧字母索引支持快速跳转，提升长列表浏览效率
design_highlights.en: Right-side alphabet index enables quick navigation through long list

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计保持上下文关联，拖拽指示器暗示可交互
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design maintains context, drag indicator suggests interactivity

product_insight.cn: 运动装备追踪App通过预置品牌库降低用户输入成本，字母索引解决长列表浏览痛点。选中状态使用品牌色勾选双重反馈，确保用户操作确认感。
product_insight.en: Sports gear tracking app reduces input friction with pre-populated brand database. Alphabet index solves long list navigation pain point. Checkmark with brand color provides dual confirmation feedback.

core_function.cn: 确认用户是否要退出未完成的训练
core_function.en: Confirm if user wants to exit incomplete workout

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗阻断操作，强制用户做出明确选择防止误退出
design_highlights.en: Modal dialog blocks action, forcing explicit choice to prevent accidental exit

design_highlights.cn: 红色退出按钮突出警示性，与蓝色取消形成对比引导用户留下
design_highlights.en: Red exit button signals warning, contrasting with blue cancel to encourage staying

design_highlights.cn: 显示进度2/11和已消耗卡路里，用沉没成本心理挽留用户
design_highlights.en: Showing 2/11 progress and calories burned leverages sunk cost psychology

design_highlights.cn: 背景保留训练界面，视觉上提醒用户训练仍在进行中
design_highlights.en: Background shows workout interface, visually reminding user session is ongoing

product_insight.cn: 通过确认弹窗+进度展示双重机制降低用户流失，红蓝按钮的色彩心理学设计巧妙引导用户回归训练，同时尊重用户退出意愿保持体验平衡
product_insight.en: Dual mechanism of confirmation dialog plus progress display reduces churn. Color psychology with red-blue buttons subtly guides users back while respecting exit intent for balanced UX

core_function.cn: 设置装备使用里程达标提醒阈值
core_function.en: Set notification threshold for gear mileage tracking

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，选中状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color makes selection state clearly visible

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式，单选列表操作简洁直观
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet pattern with single-select list for intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 预设合理里程区间，体现对跑者装备损耗的专业理解
design_highlights.en: Preset reasonable mileage ranges show professional understanding of runner gear wear

product_insight.cn: 将装备管理与里程追踪结合，通过智能提醒帮助用户及时更换磨损装备，既保护用户健康又创造复购机会，是运动类App的增值服务亮点。
product_insight.en: Combining gear management with mileage tracking creates smart reminders for equipment replacement, protecting user health while creating repurchase opportunities - a value-added feature for fitness apps.

core_function.cn: 关联运动设备数据或手动添加训练活动
core_function.en: Link device activity data or manually add training activities

design_highlights.cn: 空状态设计简洁清晰，留白充分，视觉焦点集中
design_highlights.en: Clean empty state design with ample whitespace and focused visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模态设计，支持取消操作，交互路径短
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal with cancel option, minimizing interaction steps

design_highlights.cn: 友好的空状态文案，引导用户下一步行动而非责备
design_highlights.en: Friendly empty state copy guides users to next action without blame

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计体现了良好的用户体验意识，不仅说明当前状态，还明确指出两种解决方案（Runna App或兼容设备），降低用户困惑，提升完成率
product_insight.en: Empty state design shows UX maturity - explains current state while clearly presenting two solutions (Runna App or compatible device), reducing confusion and improving completion rates

core_function.cn: 确认跑步路线已下载，支持离线使用
core_function.en: Confirm route downloaded for offline use

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配色搭配橙色路线，视觉层次清晰，路线高度突出
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route creates clear visual hierarchy and highlights the path

design_highlights.cn: 下载成功弹窗提供双选项，可直接查看已保存或关闭继续浏览
design_highlights.en: Success modal offers dual options to view saved routes or dismiss

design_highlights.cn: 即时反馈确认离线可用，消除用户对网络依赖的担忧
design_highlights.en: Instant feedback confirms offline availability, reducing anxiety about connectivity

design_highlights.cn: 底部功能栏集成保存、离线、分享、开始四大核心操作
design_highlights.en: Bottom action bar integrates save, offline, share, and start as core CTAs

product_insight.cn: 针对跑步场景的离线需求设计，提前下载路线解决户外网络不稳定痛点。布鲁克林大桥路线配合实景图片，增强用户对路线的认知和期待感。
product_insight.en: Designed for runners' offline needs, solving outdoor connectivity issues. Brooklyn Bridge route with real photos enhances route recognition and anticipation.

core_function.cn: 提供客服支持、功能反馈和帮助文档查询
core_function.en: Provides customer support, feature requests and help article access

design_highlights.cn: 深色客服入口卡片配合头像，增强人性化和信任感
design_highlights.en: Dark customer support card with avatar enhances personalization and trust

design_highlights.cn: 分类清晰的帮助文章列表，支持搜索快速定位问题
design_highlights.en: Well-categorized help articles with search for quick problem location

design_highlights.cn: 功能请求和问题反馈并列，降低用户反馈门槛提升留存
design_highlights.en: Feature request and problem report side by side reduces feedback friction

design_highlights.cn: 专业运动知识分类（训练/伤病/营养）体现品牌专业度
design_highlights.en: Professional sports categories (training/injury/nutrition) show brand expertise

product_insight.cn: 将客服支持与自助知识库结合，通过分类明确的训练、伤病、营养内容建立专业形象，同时降低人工客服压力。功能请求入口体现用户共创理念，增强用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Combines live support with self-service knowledge base. Categorized training, injury, and nutrition content builds expertise while reducing support load. Feature request entry shows user co-creation philosophy.

core_function.cn: 展示运动数据并提供3D地图分享视图
core_function.en: Display workout stats with 3D map for sharing

design_highlights.cn: 3D卫星地图视角营造沉浸式运动轨迹展示，视觉冲击力强
design_highlights.en: 3D satellite map view creates immersive route visualization with strong visual impact

design_highlights.cn: Display Statistics开关让用户自主控制分享内容的数据展示
design_highlights.en: Display Statistics toggle gives users control over data visibility in shared content

design_highlights.cn: 橙色定位点与深色地图形成对比，突出用户位置成就感
design_highlights.en: Orange location marker contrasts with dark map, highlighting user achievement

design_highlights.cn: 右上角分享按钮便捷触达，促进社交传播
design_highlights.en: Share button at top-right enables quick social sharing and viral spread

product_insight.cn: Strava深谙运动社交本质，通过精美的3D地图分享卡片设计，将枯燥的运动数据转化为可炫耀的社交资产，极大提升用户分享意愿和产品传播力。
product_insight.en: Strava understands social fitness, transforming workout data into shareable social assets through stunning 3D map cards, significantly boosting sharing intent and viral growth.

core_function.cn: 介绍间歇性断食功能特点并引导用户开始使用
core_function.en: Introduce intermittent fasting features and guide users to get started

design_highlights.cn: 秒表主题插画搭配活力配色，直观传达时间管理概念
design_highlights.en: Stopwatch-themed illustration with vibrant colors conveys time management concept

design_highlights.cn: 底部医学声明体现专业性与责任感，建立用户信任
design_highlights.en: Medical disclaimer at bottom shows professionalism and builds user trust

design_highlights.cn: 三点式价值主张清晰呈现，降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Three-point value proposition clearly presented, lowering decision barriers

design_highlights.cn: 可点击的FAQ链接满足不同用户的信息需求层次
design_highlights.en: Clickable FAQ link addresses different user information needs

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的断食功能通过结构化要点呈现，结合健康声明规避风险。通过"了解更多"链接分层信息架构，既不让新手感到压力，又满足进阶用户的求知欲。
product_insight.en: Complex fasting features presented through structured bullet points with health disclaimers to mitigate risks. Layered information architecture via 'learn more' link serves both beginners and advanced users.

core_function.cn: 介绍力量训练计划功能并引导用户开始创建个性化方案
core_function.en: Introduce strength training program and guide users to create personalized plans

design_highlights.cn: 3D哑铃图标设计精致，视觉辨识度高，强化力量训练主题
design_highlights.en: Refined 3D dumbbell icon with high visual recognition reinforces strength training theme

design_highlights.cn: 双CTA按钮设计，主次分明，降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Dual CTA buttons with clear hierarchy reduce user decision barriers

design_highlights.cn: 要点列表清晰展示个性化维度，增强用户对定制化的信任感
design_highlights.en: Bullet points clearly show personalization dimensions, building trust in customization

product_insight.cn: 将力量训练作为跑步计划的增值服务推出，通过强调个性化定制（运动类型、经验、时长、器械）降低用户心理门槛，底部弹窗形式保持上下文连贯性，是功能扩展的优秀实践。
product_insight.en: Positions strength training as value-added service to running. Emphasizing personalization (type, experience, duration, equipment) lowers barriers. Bottom sheet maintains context continuity - excellent feature expansion practice.

core_function.cn: 展示用户收藏的食谱列表，便于快速查找
core_function.en: Display user's bookmarked recipes for quick access

design_highlights.cn: 高质量美食摄影配合卡片式布局，视觉吸引力强
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography with card layout creates strong visual appeal

design_highlights.cn: 书签图标一键收藏/取消，操作直观便捷
design_highlights.en: One-tap bookmark icon for intuitive save/unsave action

design_highlights.cn: RD认证徽章增加食谱专业可信度
design_highlights.en: RD Approved badge adds professional credibility to recipes

product_insight.cn: 收藏页采用双列瀑布流布局最大化展示效率，卡路里信息前置帮助健康追踪用户快速决策，RD认证徽章强化专业背书，提升用户对内容的信任度和付费意愿
product_insight.en: Two-column grid maximizes display efficiency, calorie info upfront aids health-conscious decision making, RD badge strengthens professional endorsement and user trust

core_function.cn: 切换地图显示模式，选择路线、路段或纯地图视图
core_function.en: Switch map display modes between routes, segments, or map-only view

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配色搭配橙色热力图路线，视觉层次分明且专业
design_highlights.en: Dark map theme with orange heatmap routes creates clear visual hierarchy and professional look

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式图层选择，单选按钮操作简洁，不遮挡主地图内容
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet layer selection with radio buttons, simple operation without blocking main map

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配有图标和详细描述，降低用户理解成本
design_highlights.en: Each option has icon and detailed description to reduce cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 社区数据驱动的路线推荐凸显平台价值，增强用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Community-powered route recommendations highlight platform value and boost retention

product_insight.cn: 通过分层展示社区贡献的路线和路段数据，既满足不同用户需求，又持续强调UGC内容价值，形成正向循环。简洁的切换方式降低功能发现门槛。
product_insight.en: Layered display of community-contributed routes and segments serves diverse user needs while emphasizing UGC value, creating positive feedback loop. Simple toggle reduces feature discovery barrier.

core_function.cn: 在地图上浏览和发现热门运动路段
core_function.en: Browse and discover popular athletic segments on map

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配橙色路径高亮，视觉层次分明，运动路线一目了然
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlights creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 多维度筛选器（路段/长度/坡度/路面）支持精准搜索
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimensional filters enable precise segment discovery

design_highlights.cn: 展示完成人数和总努力次数，激发用户挑战欲望
design_highlights.en: Displaying athlete counts and total efforts motivates user participation

design_highlights.cn: 徽章标识热门路段，营造社区认可感和成就感
design_highlights.en: Badge icons on popular segments create sense of community validation

product_insight.cn: 将UGC路段数据可视化呈现，通过社交证明（226K运动员、1.9M次努力）降低用户决策成本，同时地图+列表双模式满足不同浏览习惯，是运动社交产品的核心差异化功能。
product_insight.en: Visualizing UGC segment data with social proof (226K athletes, 1.9M efforts) reduces decision friction. Map+list dual mode caters to different browsing preferences, creating core differentiation for fitness social apps.

core_function.cn: 提供编辑和删除操作的快捷选项
core_function.en: Provide quick options for edit and delete actions

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的底部弹窗设计，白色背景配合圆角卡片，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Clean bottom sheet design with white background and rounded corners, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 背景模糊遮罩突出操作焦点，Cancel按钮独立分组便于误触取消
design_highlights.en: Blurred background overlay focuses attention, separate Cancel button prevents accidental actions

design_highlights.cn: 图标配合文字的操作项设计，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Icon with text design reduces cognitive load for users

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生Action Sheet模式，用户熟悉度高。将危险操作（删除）与普通操作分开展示，取消按钮独立分组，有效防止误操作，体现对用户数据安全的重视。
product_insight.en: Uses native iOS Action Sheet pattern for high familiarity. Separating delete from edit and isolating cancel button prevents accidental actions, showing respect for user data safety.

core_function.cn: 提供活动记录的编辑、保存、删除等操作入口
core_function.en: Provides editing, saving, and deletion options for activity records

design_highlights.cn: 深色毛玻璃底部弹窗与3D地图背景形成层次对比，视觉层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark frosted glass bottom sheet contrasts with 3D map background, creating clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 菜单项按功能优先级排列，删除操作红色高亮警示，防止误操作
design_highlights.en: Menu items ordered by priority, delete action highlighted in red as warning

design_highlights.cn: 3D地形地图展示运动轨迹，提供沉浸式地理数据可视化体验
design_highlights.en: 3D terrain map displays route trajectory for immersive geo-visualization

design_highlights.cn: Cancel按钮独立分区，给用户安全退出的心理保障
design_highlights.en: Separate Cancel button provides psychological safety for users to exit

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生ActionSheet模式降低学习成本，将高频操作（添加媒体、编辑）置顶、危险操作（删除）用红色区分，体现对用户数据的保护意识和专业的交互规范
product_insight.en: Uses native iOS ActionSheet pattern to reduce learning curve, prioritizes frequent actions at top and distinguishes dangerous actions in red, showing data protection awareness and professional interaction standards

core_function.cn: 裁剪运动轨迹的起点和终点范围
core_function.en: Crop start and end points of recorded route

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色轨迹线形成强对比，裁剪区域清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route creates strong contrast, cropped areas clearly visible

design_highlights.cn: 双滑块设计独立控制起终点，时间戳实时反馈裁剪位置
design_highlights.en: Dual slider design for independent start/end control with real-time timestamp feedback
