design_highlights.cn: 起点绿色圆点与终点棋盘旗图标形成直观的视觉语义区分
design_highlights.en: Green dot for start and checkered flag for end provide intuitive visual semantics

design_highlights.cn: 左右箭头按钮支持精细微调，满足精确裁剪需求
design_highlights.en: Arrow buttons enable fine-tuning for precise cropping requirements

product_insight.cn: 针对运动记录常见的起终点误差问题提供专业编辑工具，双滑块+微调按钮的组合兼顾效率与精度，灰色虚线标示被裁剪部分的设计降低用户认知负担
product_insight.en: Professional editing tool for common start/end point errors in activity tracking. Dual sliders plus fine-tune buttons balance efficiency and precision, dashed lines for cropped sections reduce cognitive load

core_function.cn: 展示运动挑战的规则、奖励和参与条件
core_function.en: Display challenge rules, rewards and participation requirements

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合分段式信息架构，层次分明易于阅读
design_highlights.en: Dark background with segmented information architecture for clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 激励性文案设计，'One month. 100 kilometers. You in?'激发参与欲望
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy 'One month. 100 kilometers. You in?' inspires participation

design_highlights.cn: 数字徽章奖励机制降低参与门槛，增强完成动力
design_highlights.en: Digital badge rewards lower barrier to entry and boost completion motivation

product_insight.cn: 通过将100K目标分解为灵活的多次活动，降低用户心理负担；规则透明化设计建立信任，GPS/虚拟/手动多种记录方式提升包容性，值得社交健身产品借鉴
product_insight.en: Breaking 100K goal into flexible activities reduces psychological burden; transparent rules build trust, multiple tracking methods (GPS/virtual/manual) enhance inclusivity

core_function.cn: 展示跑步路段信息和运动员完成数据
core_function.en: Display running segment info and athlete completion statistics

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配橙色路线高亮，视觉层次分明便于追踪路线
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlighting creates clear visual hierarchy for route tracking

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计可上下滑动，既展示信息又不遮挡地图
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design allows swipe interaction, showing info without blocking map view

design_highlights.cn: 展示186万次完成记录，激发用户挑战热门路段的动力
design_highlights.en: Displaying 1.86M total efforts motivates users to challenge popular segments

design_highlights.cn: 橙色CTA按钮引导用户查看详情，收藏和分享功能促进互动
design_highlights.en: Orange CTA guides to details, star and share functions encourage engagement

product_insight.cn: 通过社交证明展示226,000名运动员参与数据，既验证路段价值又营造社区归属感，底部弹窗模式平衡信息密度与地图可视性，是运动类App的经典交互范式
product_insight.en: Social proof showing 226K athletes validates segment value and builds community belonging. Bottom sheet balances info density with map visibility - a classic pattern for fitness apps

core_function.cn: 展示特定跑步路段的距离、海拔和排行榜数据
core_function.en: Display specific running segment stats with distance, elevation and leaderboards

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色路线高亮，路径清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route highlight creates clear path visibility

design_highlights.cn: 分类排行榜入口设计简洁，支持按性别和时间维度筛选
design_highlights.en: Clean leaderboard categories with gender and time-based filtering options

design_highlights.cn: 验证徽章和官方认证标识增强数据可信度
design_highlights.en: Verified badge and official certification builds data credibility

design_highlights.cn: 右侧海拔剖面图直观展示路段起伏特征
design_highlights.en: Elevation profile on right side intuitively shows terrain changes

product_insight.cn: Strava通过官方认证路段建立权威性，结合多维度排行榜激发用户竞争心理，同时海拔剖面图帮助运动员提前了解路况，体现专业运动社区的核心价值
product_insight.en: Strava builds authority through verified segments, multi-dimensional leaderboards drive competition, while elevation profiles help athletes prepare, reflecting core value of professional sports community

core_function.cn: 展示单次训练课程的详细信息和私人笔记
core_function.en: Display detailed information and private notes for a workout session

design_highlights.cn: 渐变绿色背景营造平静专注的运动氛围，与Mobility主题呼应
design_highlights.en: Gradient green background creates calm and focused atmosphere, aligned with mobility theme

design_highlights.cn: 私人笔记区域支持快速添加，右侧加号按钮便于单手操作
design_highlights.en: Private notes section with quick add button positioned for easy one-hand operation

design_highlights.cn: 极简信息层级设计，减少认知负担，专注核心训练内容
design_highlights.en: Minimalist information hierarchy reduces cognitive load and focuses on core workout content

product_insight.cn: 采用极简详情页设计，通过私人笔记功能增强用户参与感和数据所有权。Sources标签暗示内容来源可追溯，增强专业可信度。留白设计为后续功能扩展预留空间。
product_insight.en: Minimalist detail page with private notes enhances user engagement and data ownership. Sources tag suggests content traceability for credibility. Whitespace reserves room for future features.

core_function.cn: 通过AI识别拍摄的餐食内容并分析营养成分
core_function.en: AI-powered meal recognition to analyze nutritional content

design_highlights.cn: 高清食物图片居中展示，色彩鲜艳引发食欲同时便于AI识别
design_highlights.en: High-quality food image centered with vibrant colors for easy AI recognition

design_highlights.cn: 单按钮极简操作，降低用户认知负担，一键完成扫描
design_highlights.en: Single-button minimalist interaction reduces cognitive load for one-tap scanning

design_highlights.cn: 笑脸图标按钮传递友好亲切感，降低技术功能的冰冷感
design_highlights.en: Smiley face button icon conveys friendliness and reduces tech coldness

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的AI图像识别功能简化为一键操作，通过清晰的引导文案和友好的图标设计降低使用门槛。预览图展示真实食物增强用户对识别准确度的信心，是健康追踪类应用的核心差异化功能。
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex AI image recognition into one-tap action. Preview of real food builds confidence in accuracy. This is a key differentiator for health tracking apps.

core_function.cn: 展示食谱营养信息、食材清单及烹饪时长
core_function.en: Display recipe nutrition info, ingredients list and cooking time

design_highlights.cn: 环形图直观呈现三大营养素占比，配色清晰区分碳水、脂肪、蛋白质
design_highlights.en: Circular chart intuitively shows macros ratio with distinct colors for carbs, fat, protein

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定换一个按钮，支持快速切换食谱，降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Fixed bottom swap button enables quick recipe switching, reducing decision friction

design_highlights.cn: 大图沉浸式展示成品，激发食欲并建立品质感
design_highlights.en: Large immersive food photo stimulates appetite and establishes quality perception

design_highlights.cn: 5分钟时长+88条评分营造简单易做的心理预期
design_highlights.en: 5-min duration and 88 ratings create expectation of easy preparation

product_insight.cn: 页面将营养数据与食谱结合，精准满足健康饮食用户需求。换食谱按钮降低跳出率，评分系统建立信任。克重精确到个位，体现专业度，适合追踪热量的用户群体。
product_insight.en: Combining nutrition data with recipes precisely meets health-conscious users' needs. Swap button reduces bounce rate, ratings build trust. Precise gram measurements show professionalism for calorie-tracking users.

core_function.cn: 展示食谱详细营养成分和热量信息
core_function.en: Display detailed nutritional information and calorie breakdown for recipes

design_highlights.cn: 高质量食物配图搭配深色陶碗，营造健康自然的视觉氛围
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography with rustic bowl creates healthy and natural visual atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗展示营养详情，保持主页面上下文的同时提供深度信息
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet reveals nutrition details while maintaining main page context

design_highlights.cn: 环形进度图直观展示宏量营养素占比，颜色编码区分碳水/脂肪/蛋白质
design_highlights.en: Circular progress chart visualizes macro ratios with color-coded carbs/fat/protein

design_highlights.cn: 5分钟准备时间强调便捷性，降低用户执行心理门槛
design_highlights.en: 5-minute prep time emphasizes convenience, lowering psychological barriers to execution

product_insight.cn: 将营养信息以底部弹窗形式呈现，既满足关注健康用户的深度需求，又不影响普通用户的浏览体验。宏量营养素百分比设计帮助用户快速判断是否符合饮食目标。
product_insight.en: Nutrition info in bottom sheet satisfies health-conscious users' deep needs without disrupting casual browsing. Macro percentage display helps users quickly assess diet goal alignment.

core_function.cn: 提供备孕时机、频率及常见问题的综合指导
core_function.en: Comprehensive guidance on conception timing, frequency and FAQs

design_highlights.cn: 柔和的橙色渐变头图配合温馨插图，营造亲切舒适的备孕氛围
design_highlights.en: Soft orange gradient header with warm illustrations creates intimate pregnancy atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式导航+FAQ折叠面板，让复杂信息分层呈现，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Card navigation with collapsible FAQ panels presents complex info in layers

design_highlights.cn: 多样化内容形式（信息图、视频）配合贴心的常见问题，消除用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Diverse content formats with caring FAQs help reduce user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 搜索框置顶便于快速查找，引导用户深度使用内容资源
design_highlights.en: Top-placed search bar facilitates quick access and deeper content engagement

product_insight.cn: 页面将医学知识转化为易懂的视觉内容，通过信息图和视频降低理解门槛。FAQ模块直击用户痛点，增强信任感。卡片式分类让用户按需获取信息，体现以用户为中心的内容架构策略。
product_insight.en: Transforms medical knowledge into digestible visual content via infographics and videos. FAQ module addresses user pain points directly, building trust. Card-based categorization enables on-demand information access.

core_function.cn: 播放焦虑舒缓冥想音频，提供沉浸式聆听体验
core_function.en: Play anxiety-calming meditation audio with immersive listening experience

design_highlights.cn: 深青色渐变背景营造宁静氛围，与冥想主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Deep teal gradient background creates tranquil atmosphere matching meditation theme

design_highlights.cn: 前进后退15秒快捷按钮，便于用户重复聆听关键段落
design_highlights.en: 15-second skip forward/backward buttons for easy replay of key segments

design_highlights.cn: 评分引导提示浮窗，鼓励用户反馈以优化个性化推荐
design_highlights.en: Rating tooltip encourages feedback to improve personalized recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 极简界面设计减少视觉干扰，帮助用户专注于冥想体验
design_highlights.en: Minimalist interface reduces visual distraction for focused meditation

product_insight.cn: 播放器设计以情绪疗愈为核心，深色调降低视觉刺激，评分引导在非干扰位置巧妙植入，既收集数据又不破坏冥想氛围，值得借鉴这种场景化的反馈收集策略
product_insight.en: Player design centers on emotional healing with dark tones reducing stimulation. Rating prompt cleverly placed to collect data without disrupting meditation atmosphere - a smart contextual feedback strategy

core_function.cn: 提供视频播放速度、音频和字幕的快捷设置选项
core_function.en: Quick access to playback speed, audio and subtitle settings

design_highlights.cn: 宇宙星空背景营造沉浸式观影氛围，与内容主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Cosmic starfield background creates immersive viewing atmosphere matching content theme

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式设置面板，支持快速访问常用控制项而不中断播放
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet settings panel allows quick access without interrupting playback

design_highlights.cn: 半透明磨砂玻璃效果的设置面板，层次分明又不遮挡内容
design_highlights.en: Semi-transparent frosted glass panel provides clear hierarchy without blocking content

design_highlights.cn: 前进后退10秒快捷按钮，符合用户观看习惯的精准控制
design_highlights.en: 10-second skip buttons provide precise control matching user viewing habits

product_insight.cn: 将高频设置项（播放速度、音频、字幕）整合在可展开面板中，平衡了功能丰富性与界面简洁性。折叠式设计让用户专注内容的同时保持控制触手可及，是流媒体产品的标准交互范式。
product_insight.en: Consolidating high-frequency settings in expandable panel balances feature richness with interface simplicity. Collapsible design keeps users focused on content while maintaining accessible controls - a standard streaming interaction paradigm.

core_function.cn: 提供影响睡眠的关键因素及专家建议
core_function.en: Provides key sleep factors and expert tips for better rest

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的内容层级，粗体标题与正文形成良好对比，阅读体验舒适
design_highlights.en: Clear content hierarchy with bold headings contrasting body text for comfortable reading

design_highlights.cn: 趣味文案如'Less sugar = sweeter dreams'增强记忆点和亲和力
design_highlights.en: Playful copywriting like 'sweeter dreams' creates memorable and friendly tone

design_highlights.cn: 将抽象概念转化为具体可执行建议，如饮水量和运动时间
design_highlights.en: Converts abstract concepts into actionable advice with specific metrics

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗设计，右上角X按钮便于快速关闭返回主流程
design_highlights.en: Modal design with X button allows quick dismissal and return to main flow

product_insight.cn: 通过教育内容建立产品专业度和用户信任，将睡眠追踪数据与生活习惯关联，引导用户理解产品价值并调整目标设置，提升长期留存
product_insight.en: Educational content builds trust and expertise, connecting sleep tracking with lifestyle habits to help users understand product value and increase long-term retention

core_function.cn: 提供HYROX功能性健身与跑步训练的专业指导内容
core_function.en: Provide professional guidance on HYROX functional fitness and running training

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的层级排版，大标题配合小字摘要，正文使用粗体强调关键段落
design_highlights.en: Clear typographic hierarchy with bold headings, summary text, and emphasized paragraphs

design_highlights.cn: 作者头像与更新时间增强内容可信度，营造专业社区氛围
design_highlights.en: Author avatar and update time enhance credibility and professional community feel

design_highlights.cn: 顶部关闭和返回按钮提供清晰的导航路径，模态弹窗式阅读体验
design_highlights.en: Close and back buttons provide clear navigation, modal-style reading experience

product_insight.cn: 通过专业深度内容建立品牌权威性，将训练指南作为用户留存和转化的软性入口，作者署名增强信任感，是内容营销与产品结合的优秀案例
product_insight.en: Builds brand authority through professional content, using training guides as soft entry for retention and conversion, author attribution enhances trust

core_function.cn: 收集用户对睡眠故事的偏好反馈以优化推荐
core_function.en: Collect user feedback on sleep stories to optimize recommendations

design_highlights.cn: 深色渐变背景营造沉浸式睡眠氛围，与内容主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Dark gradient background creates immersive sleep atmosphere matching content theme

design_highlights.cn: 简化二元选择（喜欢/不喜欢）降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Simplified binary choice (like/dislike) reduces user decision cost

design_highlights.cn: 明星IP（ROSÉ）增强情感连接，提升内容吸引力
design_highlights.en: Celebrity IP (ROSÉ) enhances emotional connection and content appeal

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计不打断体验流程，自然收集反馈数据
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design collects feedback naturally without interrupting experience

product_insight.cn: 通过内容消费后的即时反馈机制构建用户偏好画像，二元选择设计既降低操作门槛又获取清晰信号，为个性化推荐引擎提供高质量训练数据。明星合作内容策略有效提升用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Post-consumption feedback mechanism builds user preference profiles. Binary choice lowers friction while providing clear signals for personalization engine. Celebrity collaboration effectively boosts user engagement.

core_function.cn: 冥想开始前引导用户进行情绪状态自检
core_function.en: Guide users to reflect on emotional state before meditation session

design_highlights.cn: 渐变卡片设计从青色到紫色过渡，营造平静冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient card transitioning from cyan to purple creates calming meditation atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 手写体"feeling"字样配合笑脸图标，增强亲和力与情感连接
design_highlights.en: Handwritten 'feeling' text with smiley icon enhances warmth and emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 倒计时设计给用户缓冲时间，三层按钮提供灵活选择权
design_highlights.en: Countdown timer provides buffer time, three-tier buttons offer flexible user choices

design_highlights.cn: "Never Show Again"选项尊重用户偏好，减少打扰提升留存
design_highlights.en: 'Never Show Again' option respects user preference, reduces friction and improves retention

product_insight.cn: 通过冥想前情绪签到建立用户自我觉察习惯，收集情绪数据可追踪效果变化，同时倒计时机制创造仪式感，三级跳过选项平衡功能完整性与用户体验
product_insight.en: Pre-session emotional check-in builds self-awareness habits while collecting mood data for progress tracking. Countdown creates ritual feeling, tiered skip options balance feature completeness with user experience

core_function.cn: 冥想开始前引导用户进行情绪状态自我反思
core_function.en: Guide users to reflect on emotional state before meditation session

design_highlights.cn: 渐变卡片设计配合温暖橙色背景，营造平静放松的冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient card with warm orange background creates calm meditation atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 倒计时设计增加仪式感，"6秒后开始"让用户心理准备就绪
design_highlights.en: Countdown timer adds ritual feeling, mentally preparing users for session

design_highlights.cn: 三层选项设计（签到/跳过/永不显示）满足不同用户偏好
design_highlights.en: Three-tier options (check-in/skip/never show) cater to different user preferences

design_highlights.cn: 主按钮白色突出，次要操作视觉弱化但可及性强
design_highlights.en: Primary button stands out in white while secondary options remain accessible

product_insight.cn: 通过冥想前情绪签到收集用户状态数据，既增强用户自我觉察，又为个性化推荐提供依据。"永不显示"选项尊重用户选择，避免打扰高频用户，体现产品克制。
product_insight.en: Pre-session emotional check-in collects user state data for personalization while enhancing self-awareness. 'Never show again' option respects user autonomy and avoids disrupting power users.

core_function.cn: 展示核心训练课程内容、时长及动作列表
core_function.en: Display core workout content, duration and exercise list

design_highlights.cn: 顶部视频预览配合播放按钮，直观展示训练内容
design_highlights.en: Video preview with play button provides intuitive workout preview

design_highlights.cn: 动作卡片带缩略图和时长，支持快速浏览课程结构
design_highlights.en: Exercise cards with thumbnails and duration for quick course structure overview

design_highlights.cn: 双CTA按钮设计，区分记录和开始训练两种用户意图
design_highlights.en: Dual CTA buttons distinguish logging vs starting workout user intents

design_highlights.cn: 强调无器械、6分钟快速训练，降低用户心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Emphasizing zero equipment and 6-minute workout lowers psychological barriers

product_insight.cn: 课程详情页采用渐进式信息展示，从视频预览到文字介绍再到动作列表，符合用户决策心智。双按钮设计巧妙区分新用户和复训用户，提升转化效率。
product_insight.en: Progressive information disclosure from video to description to exercise list matches user decision flow. Dual buttons cleverly distinguish new users from repeat trainers, improving conversion.

core_function.cn: 展示训练课程分段内容和动作列表
core_function.en: Display workout sections and exercise list with timing

design_highlights.cn: 深色视频预览区与浅色列表形成强对比，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark video preview contrasts with light list area for clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 红色进度条直观显示当前播放位置，右侧播放按钮便于快速操作
design_highlights.en: Red progress bar shows playback position, play buttons enable quick access

design_highlights.cn: 分段式设计（Section 0/1/2）清晰划分训练阶段，便于理解课程结构
design_highlights.en: Sectioned layout clearly divides workout phases for easy comprehension

design_highlights.cn: 动作缩略图配合时长标注，降低用户对训练强度的焦虑
design_highlights.en: Exercise thumbnails with duration reduce anxiety about workout intensity

product_insight.cn: 采用分段式训练结构设计，让用户清晰了解课程组成。每个动作配备缩略图和时长，降低认知负担，提升训练完成率。Section标签设计便于用户快速定位和跳转。
product_insight.en: Sectioned workout structure helps users understand course composition. Thumbnails with duration reduce cognitive load and improve completion rates. Section labels enable quick navigation.

core_function.cn: 提供音视频内容的播放控制与交互操作
core_function.en: Provide playback controls and interaction for audio/video content

design_highlights.cn: 极简纯黑背景设计，突出播放控件，营造沉浸式观看体验
design_highlights.en: Minimalist pure black background highlights controls for immersive viewing

design_highlights.cn: 10秒快进/快退按钮清晰对称布局，便于单手操作
design_highlights.en: 10-second skip buttons in symmetric layout enable easy one-handed operation

design_highlights.cn: 顶部工具栏集成关闭、画中画、分享、收藏、下载等常用功能
design_highlights.en: Top toolbar integrates close, PiP, share, favorite, and download functions

product_insight.cn: 播放器采用全屏沉浸式设计，控件在暗色背景下高对比度呈现。顶部功能栏提供完整的内容交互选项，底部进度条支持精确定位，整体设计符合主流流媒体产品范式。
product_insight.en: Full-screen immersive design with high-contrast controls on dark background. Complete interaction options in top bar with precise progress scrubbing, following mainstream streaming platform patterns.

core_function.cn: 调节音视频播放速度，支持多档位选择
core_function.en: Adjust media playback speed with multiple speed options

design_highlights.cn: 星空背景营造沉浸式冥想氛围，深色主题减少视觉干扰
design_highlights.en: Cosmic background creates immersive meditation atmosphere with dark theme reducing visual distraction

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式速度选择器，当前选项带勾选标记，操作直观
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet speed selector with checkmark on current option for intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 毛玻璃效果面板与背景融合，层次分明又保持整体性
design_highlights.en: Frosted glass panel blends with background, maintaining clear hierarchy and visual unity

design_highlights.cn: 前进后退10秒快捷按钮，配合进度条实现精准定位
design_highlights.en: 10-second skip buttons combined with progress bar enable precise navigation

product_insight.cn: 冥想/音频类App提供播放速度控制满足不同场景需求，0.5x适合深度放松，1.25-2x适合快速浏览。毛玻璃弹窗设计既不打断沉浸体验又便于操作，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Meditation/audio apps offer speed control for various scenarios - 0.5x for deep relaxation, 1.25-2x for quick review. Frosted glass popup maintains immersion while enabling easy control.

core_function.cn: 选择音频输出设备进行无线播放
core_function.en: Select audio output device for wireless playback

design_highlights.cn: 深色模糊背景与浅色卡片形成优雅对比，保持沉浸式播放体验
design_highlights.en: Dark blurred background with light card creates elegant contrast for immersive experience

design_highlights.cn: 当前播放设备自动显示正在播放的曲目信息，状态清晰可见
design_highlights.en: Current device shows now-playing track info with clear status indication

design_highlights.cn: 圆角卡片式弹窗设计，符合iOS设计语言，操作区域聚焦明确
design_highlights.en: Rounded card modal follows iOS design language with focused interaction area

product_insight.cn: 采用系统原生AirPlay样式保持用户认知一致性，弹窗内展示当前播放信息减少用户切换焦虑，勾选标记提供即时状态反馈，设计简洁高效。
product_insight.en: Native AirPlay style maintains cognitive consistency. Showing now-playing info in modal reduces user anxiety. Checkmark provides instant status feedback with clean efficient design.

core_function.cn: 选择视频投屏输出设备
core_function.en: Select device for video streaming output

design_highlights.cn: 深色毛玻璃弹窗与视频背景形成层次感，保持沉浸式观看体验
design_highlights.en: Dark frosted glass modal creates depth while maintaining immersive viewing experience

design_highlights.cn: 当前设备自动勾选，单选即时切换无需确认按钮
design_highlights.en: Current device auto-checked with instant switching, no confirmation needed

design_highlights.cn: 图标与文字左对齐，勾选标记右对齐，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Icon and text left-aligned, checkmark right-aligned for clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 遵循iOS原生AirPlay设计规范，降低用户学习成本。弹窗半透明设计让用户感知视频仍在播放，减少操作焦虑。极简选项列表适合快速决策场景。
product_insight.en: Follows iOS native AirPlay design patterns to reduce learning curve. Semi-transparent modal indicates video continues playing, reducing user anxiety. Minimal list suits quick decision scenarios.

core_function.cn: 展示详细烹饪步骤与配料清单，支持记录饮食日志
core_function.en: Display cooking steps with ingredients, support meal logging

design_highlights.cn: 步骤编号清晰，配料标签化展示便于快速识别
design_highlights.en: Clear step numbering with ingredient tags for quick scanning

design_highlights.cn: 底部Toast提示记录成功，可直接跳转查看日记
design_highlights.en: Bottom toast confirms logging with quick access to diary

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计（编辑/记录）降低操作门槛，促进持续使用
design_highlights.en: Dual CTA buttons (Edit/Log) reduce friction for continued engagement

product_insight.cn: 将食谱与饮食追踪无缝结合，用户烹饪即可一键记录，形成「做饭-记录-追踪」闭环，提升产品粘性和数据完整性
product_insight.en: Seamlessly integrates recipes with meal tracking, enabling one-tap logging to create a cook-track-analyze loop, boosting retention and data completeness

core_function.cn: 展示食谱完整信息并支持记录到饮食日记
core_function.en: Display complete recipe info with diet diary logging

design_highlights.cn: 高质量美食摄影占据顶部视觉焦点，激发食欲和烹饪欲望
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography as hero image stimulates appetite and cooking desire

design_highlights.cn: RD Approved专业认证徽章增强可信度，提升用户对营养信息的信任
design_highlights.en: RD Approved badge enhances credibility and trust in nutritional information

design_highlights.cn: 营养数据可视化展示配合可展开详情，平衡信息密度与易读性
design_highlights.en: Nutrition data visualization with expandable details balances density and readability

design_highlights.cn: 标签系统(Gut Health/Vegetarian)帮助用户快速识别食谱属性
design_highlights.en: Tag system helps users quickly identify recipe attributes and health benefits

product_insight.cn: 将食谱内容与饮食追踪无缝整合，通过一键LOG TO DIARY实现内容到行为的转化闭环，专业认证徽章建立权威性，三大宏量营养素百分比展示符合健康饮食用户心智模型
product_insight.en: Seamlessly integrates recipe content with diet tracking via one-click logging, creating content-to-action loop. Professional certification builds authority while macro percentage display matches health-conscious users' mental model

core_function.cn: 视频播放时切换音频语言和无障碍音轨
core_function.en: Switch audio language and accessibility tracks during video playback

design_highlights.cn: 宇宙星空背景营造沉浸式观影氛围，底部弹窗采用毛玻璃效果保持视觉连贯
design_highlights.en: Cosmic starfield background creates immersive atmosphere, bottom sheet uses frosted glass for visual continuity

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，音轨选项清晰分组且支持快速切换
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet enables one-hand operation, audio options clearly grouped with quick switching

design_highlights.cn: 提供English AD无障碍音轨选项，体现产品的包容性和人文关怀
design_highlights.en: English AD accessibility track option shows product inclusivity and user care

product_insight.cn: 将无障碍功能(Audio Description)与标准音轨并列展示，既满足视障用户需求又不增加操作复杂度，体现了以用户为中心的设计理念。底部弹窗模式确保播放不中断。
product_insight.en: Placing Audio Description alongside standard tracks serves visually impaired users without adding complexity, reflecting user-centered design. Bottom sheet ensures uninterrupted playback.

core_function.cn: 提供沉浸式健身教学视频播放体验
core_function.en: Deliver immersive fitness workout video playback experience

design_highlights.cn: 全屏沉浸式视频播放，真实家居场景增强代入感
design_highlights.en: Full-screen immersive video with realistic home setting enhances engagement

design_highlights.cn: 简洁播放控制，中央大号播放按钮便于快速操作
design_highlights.en: Minimal playback controls with prominent center play button for easy access

design_highlights.cn: 明亮通透的室内环境传递积极健康的运动氛围
design_highlights.en: Bright, airy indoor environment conveys positive and healthy workout atmosphere

product_insight.cn: MyFitnessPal通过集成视频内容扩展产品边界，从单一的热量追踪工具升级为综合健康平台。9分钟时长的课程设计降低用户参与门槛，提升留存率。
product_insight.en: MyFitnessPal expands beyond calorie tracking into comprehensive wellness by integrating video content. 9-minute workout duration lowers barrier to entry and improves retention.

core_function.cn: 播放运动训练教学视频，支持字幕和速度调节
core_function.en: Play athletic training videos with subtitles and speed control

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景突出视频内容，字幕清晰易读不遮挡画面
design_highlights.en: Dark background highlights video content, clear subtitles without blocking view

design_highlights.cn: 快进/快退10秒按钮便于精确定位教学动作节点
design_highlights.en: 10-second skip buttons for precise navigation to specific training moments

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗提供播放速度和字幕设置，操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet provides playback speed and subtitle settings with easy access

design_highlights.cn: 实景跑道拍摄增强专业感和真实训练氛围
design_highlights.en: Real track location filming enhances professionalism and authentic training atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 运动教学视频播放器设计注重可控性，10秒跳转适合反复观看动作细节，速度调节满足不同学习节奏，字幕功能降低理解门槛，提升学习效率和用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Training video player emphasizes controllability with 10-second skip for reviewing movements, speed control for different learning paces, and subtitles to lower comprehension barriers and boost retention.

core_function.cn: 展示教练指导的跑后拉伸训练动作列表
core_function.en: Display coach-guided post-run stretching exercises list

design_highlights.cn: 真实跑道场景配合教练示范，增强专业感和沉浸体验
design_highlights.en: Real track scene with coach demonstration enhances professionalism and immersion

design_highlights.cn: 动作卡片配动态插图，清晰展示每个拉伸姿势和时长
design_highlights.en: Exercise cards with animated illustrations clearly show each stretch pose and duration

design_highlights.cn: 以教练命名的训练计划，建立个人化指导信任感
design_highlights.en: Coach-named routine establishes personalized guidance and trust

product_insight.cn: 将教练IP化设计（Coach Steph）既增强品牌辨识度，又让用户感受到专业指导的陪伴感。动作预览+时长的组合降低用户认知负担，一键开始设计减少操作阻力。
product_insight.en: Coach IP branding (Coach Steph) enhances brand recognition while creating a sense of professional companionship. Exercise preview with duration reduces cognitive load, and one-tap start minimizes friction.

core_function.cn: 确认用户已成功分享内容并给予正向反馈
core_function.en: Confirm successful content sharing with positive feedback

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的白色卡片弹窗配合深色沉浸式背景，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clean white card modal against dark immersive background creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 轻量级Toast反馈，不打断视频播放体验，自动消失设计
design_highlights.en: Lightweight toast feedback without interrupting video playback, auto-dismiss design

design_highlights.cn: 勾选图标配合感谢文案，给予用户即时正向激励
design_highlights.en: Checkmark icon with thank you copy provides instant positive reinforcement

product_insight.cn: 分享成功后的即时反馈设计简洁高效，采用非模态弹窗避免打断用户观看流程。感谢语增强用户认同感，鼓励后续分享行为，是提升用户分享率的细节优化。
product_insight.en: Instant share success feedback uses non-modal toast to avoid interrupting viewing. Thank you message builds user appreciation and encourages future sharing behavior.

core_function.cn: 展示艺人资料及其专属睡眠故事内容
core_function.en: Display artist profile and exclusive sleep story content

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸艺人形象照配合梦幻紫色云彩背景，营造沉浸式视觉体验
design_highlights.en: Large artist portrait with dreamy purple cloud background creates immersive visual experience

design_highlights.cn: 温暖的琥珀色渐变底色传递放松助眠氛围，与品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Warm amber gradient background conveys relaxing sleep atmosphere aligned with brand tone

design_highlights.cn: 内容卡片突出时长信息(31min)，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Content card highlights duration (31min) to reduce user decision friction

product_insight.cn: 通过明星IP合作打造差异化睡眠内容，利用粉丝经济提升付费转化。艺人形象与助眠场景的结合创造独特情感价值，值得内容型产品借鉴其IP联名策略。
product_insight.en: Leverages celebrity IP collaboration for differentiated sleep content, using fan economy to boost conversion. The combination of artist image with sleep scenarios creates unique emotional value worth learning for content products.

core_function.cn: 展示冥想导师个人介绍及其相关课程内容
core_function.en: Display meditation instructor bio and related course content

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸人物头像配合柔和蓝色背景，建立专业且亲和的形象
design_highlights.en: Large portrait with soft blue background creates professional yet approachable image

design_highlights.cn: 强调25年冥想经验，通过专业背景建立用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Emphasizing 25 years experience builds user trust through expertise

design_highlights.cn: 底部持续播放器保持用户沉浸体验，支持无缝切换内容
design_highlights.en: Persistent mini player at bottom enables seamless content switching

design_highlights.cn: 课程卡片采用高质量配图，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Course cards with high-quality imagery create clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 通过导师人格化设计增强内容价值感知，将冥想从工具升级为有温度的人际连接。持续播放器设计提升用户粘性，缩短内容发现到消费的路径。
product_insight.en: Humanizing instructors elevates content value perception, transforming meditation from tool to personal connection. Persistent player increases engagement and shortens content discovery to consumption path.

core_function.cn: 展示增强免疫力的健康食谱合集
core_function.en: Display health recipes collection for immune support

design_highlights.cn: 双列瀑布流卡片布局，高质量美食摄影营造食欲感
design_highlights.en: Two-column masonry card layout with high-quality food photography

design_highlights.cn: 每张卡片配备收藏图标，支持快速保存喜欢的食谱
design_highlights.en: Bookmark icon on each card enables quick recipe saving

design_highlights.cn: 显示卡路里信息降低决策门槛，满足健康饮食需求
design_highlights.en: Calorie display reduces decision friction for health-conscious users

product_insight.cn: 通过主题化食谱分类（免疫支持）精准切入用户健康需求，卡路里标注强化产品的健康定位，RD认证标识增加专业可信度，是健康饮食App的优秀内容组织方式。
product_insight.en: Thematic recipe categorization targets specific health needs. Calorie display reinforces health positioning while RD certification badge adds professional credibility.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步热身动作列表并提供视频指导
core_function.en: Display warm-up exercises with video guidance for running

design_highlights.cn: 顶部视频预览配合运动场景，营造专业运动氛围
design_highlights.en: Video preview with track scene creates professional athletic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 动作卡片展示配图与时长，信息层次清晰易扫视
design_highlights.en: Exercise cards with illustrations and duration, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 教练人设化命名增强信任感和专业指导感
design_highlights.en: Coach persona naming builds trust and professional guidance feeling

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目Start按钮降低行动门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent Start button at bottom reduces friction to begin

product_insight.cn: 将热身动作拆解为独立卡片配合时长提示，降低用户认知负担。教练人设命名增加专业可信度，视频+图示双重指导模式适应不同学习偏好，提升完成率。
product_insight.en: Breaking warm-up into individual cards with duration reduces cognitive load. Coach persona adds credibility, while video plus illustration dual guidance accommodates different learning preferences.

core_function.cn: 视频播放时切换字幕语言和显示模式
core_function.en: Switch subtitle language and display mode during video playback

design_highlights.cn: 宇宙星空背景营造沉浸式观影氛围，深色主题降低视觉干扰
design_highlights.en: Cosmic starry background creates immersive viewing atmosphere with dark theme reducing visual distraction

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，选项清晰带勾选状态反馈
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables one-hand operation with clear options and checkmark state feedback

design_highlights.cn: Auto推荐标签降低用户决策成本，体现智能化体验
design_highlights.en: Auto recommended label reduces user decision cost, reflecting intelligent experience

product_insight.cn: 字幕设置采用底部弹窗而非全屏切换，保持视频可见性减少观看中断感。Auto推荐选项体现产品对用户场景的理解，简化选择流程同时保留自定义能力。
product_insight.en: Subtitle settings use bottom sheet instead of full-screen transition, maintaining video visibility and reducing interruption. Auto recommended option shows product understanding of user scenarios, simplifying selection while retaining customization.

core_function.cn: 播放跑步热身视频，展示动作列表和计时
core_function.en: Play running warm-up video with exercise list and timer

design_highlights.cn: 视频与动作列表分层设计，视觉层次清晰，插图风格统一
design_highlights.en: Layered video and exercise list design with clear visual hierarchy and consistent illustrations

design_highlights.cn: 长按完成按钮设计防止误触，暂停/停止操作明确分离
design_highlights.en: Hold-to-finish button prevents accidental taps, pause/stop actions clearly separated

design_highlights.cn: 教练个人品牌化命名增强信任感和专业感
design_highlights.en: Coach-branded naming builds trust and professional credibility

design_highlights.cn: 当前动作卡片高亮显示，带进度条指示执行状态
design_highlights.en: Current exercise card highlighted with progress bar indicating execution status

product_insight.cn: 将热身训练与跑步主流程结合，通过教练IP增强用户粘性。动作可视化降低学习门槛，长按完成设计平衡操作效率与防误触，值得运动类App借鉴。
product_insight.en: Integrates warm-up with running workflow, using coach branding for retention. Visual exercise demos lower learning curve, hold-to-finish balances efficiency with error prevention.

core_function.cn: 展示冥想完成状态并收集用户反馈偏好
core_function.en: Display session completion and collect user preference feedback

design_highlights.cn: "You're Amazing!"正向激励文案配合星空视觉营造成就感
design_highlights.en: Positive reinforcement with 'You're Amazing!' and cosmic visuals creates accomplishment

design_highlights.cn: 分享按钮附带30天免费Guest Pass促进病毒式传播
design_highlights.en: Share button with 30-day free Guest Pass incentivizes viral growth

design_highlights.cn: 拇指上下图标的二元反馈机制简化用户决策
design_highlights.en: Binary thumbs up/down feedback simplifies user decision making

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合卡片设计层次分明
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with card design creates clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 完成页巧妙整合成就激励、社交裂变、偏好收集三大目标，分享附带Guest Pass将用户成就感转化为获客渠道，二元反馈降低认知负担同时持续优化推荐算法
product_insight.en: Completion page integrates achievement motivation, viral growth, and preference collection. Guest Pass sharing converts user accomplishment into acquisition, binary feedback reduces cognitive load while improving recommendations

core_function.cn: 播放健身动作教学视频，展示臀桥动作示范
core_function.en: Play fitness tutorial video demonstrating glute bridge exercise

design_highlights.cn: 全屏沉浸式视频播放，深色背景突出运动员动作示范
design_highlights.en: Full-screen immersive video with dark background highlighting athlete demonstration

design_highlights.cn: 10秒快进/快退按钮，方便用户精准控制播放进度
design_highlights.en: 10-second skip forward/backward buttons for precise playback control

design_highlights.cn: 左下角显示动作名称和序号，清晰标识当前训练内容
design_highlights.en: Exercise name and number displayed in bottom-left for clear workout identification

design_highlights.cn: 底部进度条配合时间显示，直观掌握视频播放状态
design_highlights.en: Bottom progress bar with timestamps for intuitive playback status tracking

product_insight.cn: 采用真人户外场景拍摄增强专业可信度，极简播放控件降低操作门槛，动作标注设计便于用户跟练时快速识别当前动作，提升训练效率和用户体验。
product_insight.en: Real outdoor filming enhances professional credibility. Minimalist controls lower operation barriers. Exercise labels help users quickly identify current movements during follow-along workouts.

core_function.cn: 播放冥想音频内容，提供舒缓焦虑的引导体验
core_function.en: Play meditation audio with calming anxiety guidance

design_highlights.cn: 全屏山景背景营造沉浸式冥想氛围，深色调传递宁静感
design_highlights.en: Full-screen mountain backdrop creates immersive meditation atmosphere with calming dark tones

design_highlights.cn: 标题直击用户痛点'Calming Anxiety'，3分钟时长降低使用门槛
design_highlights.en: Title directly addresses user pain point, 3-minute duration lowers commitment barrier

design_highlights.cn: 分享提示设计巧妙，30天免费邀请好友机制促进病毒传播
design_highlights.en: Smart share prompt with 30-day free guest pass drives viral growth

design_highlights.cn: 播放控制清晰完整，15秒快进快退符合音频使用习惯
design_highlights.en: Clear playback controls with 15-second skip matches audio consumption habits

product_insight.cn: Calm通过视觉沉浸+情感化文案+社交裂变三重设计，将内容消费转化为增长引擎。播放页嵌入分享激励是高明的增长黑客策略，用户最放松时分享意愿最强。
product_insight.en: Calm combines visual immersion, emotional copy, and viral mechanics. Embedding share incentives in the player is a growth hack leveraging peak relaxation moments for sharing.

core_function.cn: 播放冥想音频并提供分享反馈功能
core_function.en: Play meditation audio with sharing feedback confirmation

design_highlights.cn: 山脉背景图营造宁静氛围，深色调降低视觉刺激
design_highlights.en: Mountain backdrop creates serene atmosphere with calming dark tones

design_highlights.cn: 分享成功toast提示简洁明确，带有勾选动画强化正向反馈
design_highlights.en: Clean share confirmation toast with checkmark animation reinforces positive feedback

design_highlights.cn: 标题'Calming Anxiety'直击用户痛点，建立情感连接
design_highlights.en: Title 'Calming Anxiety' addresses user pain point, establishing emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 播放控制栏功能完整，支持快进快退15秒精准控制
design_highlights.en: Complete playback controls with 15-second skip for precise navigation

product_insight.cn: 冥想类产品通过沉浸式视觉设计强化治愈感，分享功能结合即时反馈鼓励社交传播。3分钟短时长降低使用门槛，适合碎片化场景，提升完播率和用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Meditation apps use immersive visuals to enhance healing experience. Share feature with instant feedback encourages social spread. 3-minute duration lowers usage barrier for fragmented scenarios, improving completion rate.

core_function.cn: 播放焦虑舒缓冥想音频并管理收藏
core_function.en: Play anxiety-calming meditation audio with playlist management

design_highlights.cn: 山景背景营造宁静氛围，深色调配合冥想主题增强沉浸感
design_highlights.en: Mountain landscape background creates serene atmosphere with dark tones enhancing meditation immersion

design_highlights.cn: "Calming Anxiety"标题直击用户痛点，3分钟时长降低使用门槛
design_highlights.en: Title directly addresses user pain point, 3-minute duration lowers usage barrier

design_highlights.cn: 点赞、收藏、分享、添加播放列表一键操作，即时Toast反馈确认
design_highlights.en: One-tap like, favorite, share, playlist actions with instant toast confirmation feedback

design_highlights.cn: 金棕色图标与白色文字形成优雅对比，品牌色统一应用
design_highlights.en: Golden-brown icons contrast elegantly with white text, consistent brand color application

product_insight.cn: 播放器设计聚焦减压场景，通过沉浸式视觉+简短内容时长降低用户心理负担，收藏/播放列表功能促进内容复用和用户留存，Toast反馈增强操作确定性
product_insight.en: Player design focuses on stress-relief scenarios, immersive visuals with short duration reduces psychological burden, playlist features drive content reuse and retention

core_function.cn: 播放自我觉察冥想音频，帮助用户调整身心状态
core_function.en: Play self-awareness meditation audio to help users tune into their needs

design_highlights.cn: 深棕红渐变背景营造温暖沉浸的冥想氛围，金色点缀提升质感
design_highlights.en: Warm burgundy gradient background creates immersive meditation atmosphere with gold accents

design_highlights.cn: 标题"Check In With Yourself"传递自我关怀理念，文案温暖治愈
design_highlights.en: Title 'Check In With Yourself' conveys self-care concept with warm, healing copy

design_highlights.cn: 播放控制简洁直观，15秒前进后退按钮便于精准定位
design_highlights.en: Clean playback controls with 15-second skip buttons for precise navigation

design_highlights.cn: 品牌合作植入（Nissan Murano）实现内容商业化
design_highlights.en: Brand partnership integration (Nissan Murano) enables content monetization

product_insight.cn: 将品牌赞助内容与冥想练习自然结合，既保持用户体验的纯净感，又开辟了内容商业化新路径。播放器设计极简，减少干扰，专注于内容本身。
product_insight.en: Naturally integrates brand sponsorship with meditation practice, maintaining pure UX while opening new monetization paths. Minimalist player design reduces distractions and focuses on content.

core_function.cn: 播放儿童冥想音频内容，提供沉浸式放松体验
core_function.en: Play children's meditation audio with immersive relaxation experience

design_highlights.cn: 渐变蓝色背景配合小黄人IP形象，营造轻松愉悦的儿童友好氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient blue background with Minion IP character creates child-friendly joyful atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 将冥想与热门动画IP结合，降低儿童对冥想的陌生感和抵触情绪
design_highlights.en: Combining meditation with popular animation IP reduces children's unfamiliarity and resistance

design_highlights.cn: 标准音频控制布局，包含快进/快退15秒、收藏、分享等常用功能
design_highlights.en: Standard audio controls with 15-sec skip, favorite, share and playlist functions

design_highlights.cn: 圆形金色按钮设计统一，视觉层次清晰，操作区域明确
design_highlights.en: Unified golden circular buttons with clear visual hierarchy and defined interaction areas

product_insight.cn: 借助知名IP（小黄人/Agnes）将枯燥的冥想练习游戏化、故事化，极大降低儿童用户的使用门槛。叙述者设置为'Agnes & the Minions'增强代入感，是儿童心理健康产品的优秀设计范例。
product_insight.en: Leveraging famous IP (Minions/Agnes) to gamify and storify meditation practice significantly lowers barriers for children. Setting narrator as 'Agnes & the Minions' enhances immersion - excellent design pattern for children's mental wellness products.

core_function.cn: 播放ROSÉ配音的冥想助眠音频内容
core_function.en: Play meditation and sleep audio narrated by ROSÉ

design_highlights.cn: 渐变紫粉色星空背景营造梦幻助眠氛围，与内容主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Gradient purple-pink starry background creates dreamy sleep atmosphere matching content theme

design_highlights.cn: 明星IP（BLACKPINK ROSÉ）作为叙述者，强化情感连接与品牌吸引力
design_highlights.en: Celebrity IP (BLACKPINK ROSÉ) as narrator strengthens emotional connection and brand appeal

design_highlights.cn: 播放控制布局清晰，15秒快进/后退便于用户精准控制进度
design_highlights.en: Clear playback controls with 15-second skip for precise progress control

design_highlights.cn: 棕金色功能按钮与整体配色协调，点赞收藏分享按钮设计精致
design_highlights.en: Bronze-gold buttons harmonize with overall palette, refined like/save/share design

product_insight.cn: 通过明星IP合作差异化竞争，沉浸式视觉设计强化冥想场景感。30分钟时长设计符合睡前使用习惯，创作者信息完整展示增强内容专业可信度。
product_insight.en: Celebrity IP collaboration differentiates product. Immersive visuals enhance meditation experience. 30-min duration fits bedtime habits, complete creator credits build content credibility.

core_function.cn: 展示小黄人IP系列冥想和睡眠故事内容
core_function.en: Display Minions IP themed meditation and sleep story content

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸IP角色形象占据视觉焦点，暖色渐变背景营造温馨氛围
design_highlights.en: Large IP character image as visual focus with warm gradient background creating cozy atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 借助深受喜爱的动画角色建立情感连接，降低儿童使用门槛
design_highlights.en: Leveraging beloved animation characters to build emotional connection and lower barriers for children

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式内容布局清晰展示时长和类型，便于快速选择
design_highlights.en: Card-based content layout clearly showing duration and type for quick selection

design_highlights.cn: 内容分类多样（冥想、睡眠故事）满足不同场景需求
design_highlights.en: Diverse content categories (meditation, sleep stories) meeting different scenario needs

product_insight.cn: 通过知名IP联动策略吸引儿童用户群体，将冥想内容游戏化、故事化，有效降低正念练习的认知门槛，是儿童健康类应用的优秀变现和获客策略
product_insight.en: IP collaboration strategy attracts children users, gamifying meditation content through storytelling, effectively lowering cognitive barriers for mindfulness practice - excellent monetization and acquisition strategy for children's wellness apps

core_function.cn: 展示跑步运动摄影作品的全屏预览
core_function.en: Full-screen preview of running photography content

design_highlights.cn: 沉浸式全屏图片展示，上下延伸的模糊渐变营造纵深感
design_highlights.en: Immersive full-screen display with blurred gradient extensions creating depth

design_highlights.cn: 极简导航控件，返回/收藏/更多操作悬浮于顶部不遮挡内容
design_highlights.en: Minimal floating navigation controls at top without blocking content

design_highlights.cn: 底部作者信息栏采用深色背景与头像，清晰展示发布者身份
design_highlights.en: Dark bottom bar with avatar clearly displays author identity and metadata

product_insight.cn: 设计团队采用图片上下色彩延伸的手法填充非图片区域，既保持内容完整性又避免黑边突兀，底部信息栏保留社交属性，值得内容型产品借鉴
product_insight.en: Color extension technique fills non-image areas while preserving content integrity. Bottom info bar maintains social context, a pattern worth adopting for content-focused apps

core_function.cn: 调节视频播放速度，支持0.5x至2x倍速选择
core_function.en: Adjust video playback speed from 0.5x to 2.0x

design_highlights.cn: 深色半透明底部弹窗设计，与视频内容形成层次分离
design_highlights.en: Dark translucent bottom sheet creates visual hierarchy with video content

design_highlights.cn: 当前选中速度以勾选标记清晰指示，操作反馈明确
design_highlights.en: Checkmark clearly indicates current selection with immediate feedback

design_highlights.cn: 播放控制区采用居中大按钮设计，配合前进后退10秒快捷操作
design_highlights.en: Centered large play controls with 10-second skip buttons for easy navigation

design_highlights.cn: 字幕实时显示训练指导语，增强学习沉浸感
design_highlights.en: Real-time subtitles with training instructions enhance learning immersion

product_insight.cn: 健身视频场景下倍速控制是刚需功能，0.5x适合跟练复杂动作，1.25x/1.5x适合熟练用户提效。底部弹窗设计不遮挡视频主体，体现对用户观看体验的尊重。
product_insight.en: Speed control is essential for fitness videos - 0.5x for complex moves, faster speeds for experienced users. Bottom sheet design respects viewing experience by not blocking main content.

core_function.cn: 按健康目标分类浏览食谱，支持收藏和卡路里查看
core_function.en: Browse recipes by health goals with calorie info and bookmarking

design_highlights.cn: 高质量美食摄影配合干净的卡片布局，食物呈现诱人有食欲
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography with clean card layout makes dishes appetizing

design_highlights.cn: 横向滑动卡片设计节省垂直空间，支持快速浏览多个分类
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling cards save vertical space and enable quick category browsing

design_highlights.cn: 每个食谱直接显示卡路里数值，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Calorie display on each recipe reduces user decision-making effort

design_highlights.cn: 按功能目标分类（免疫支持、运动前）契合用户健康意图
design_highlights.en: Goal-based categories (Immune Support, Pre-Workout) align with user health intentions

product_insight.cn: 将食谱按健康功能场景分类而非传统菜系分类，精准匹配健身App用户的目标导向需求。卡路里信息前置展示减少用户跳转，提升内容消费效率和用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Categorizing recipes by health function rather than cuisine type precisely matches fitness app users' goal-oriented needs. Upfront calorie display reduces navigation and improves content consumption efficiency.

core_function.cn: 按功能分类展示健康食谱，支持收藏和卡路里查看
core_function.en: Display healthy recipes by category with calorie info and bookmark feature

design_highlights.cn: 高质量美食摄影配合白底卡片，视觉食欲感强烈
design_highlights.en: High-quality food photography with white card background creates strong visual appetite appeal

design_highlights.cn: 横向滚动卡片设计节省纵向空间，便于快速浏览多个分类
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling cards save vertical space for quick browsing across categories

design_highlights.cn: RD认证标识增强专业信任度，促进用户尝试食谱
design_highlights.en: RD certified badge enhances professional credibility and encourages recipe trial

design_highlights.cn: 按使用场景分类（免疫支持、运动前）贴近用户生活需求
design_highlights.en: Context-based categories (Immune Support, Pre-Workout) align with users' lifestyle needs

product_insight.cn: 通过场景化分类而非传统食材分类，精准切入用户健康目标。卡路里信息前置降低决策成本，收藏功能促进回访留存。RD认证标识是健康类App建立专业度的有效策略。
product_insight.en: Context-based categorization targets user health goals precisely. Upfront calorie info reduces decision cost. RD certification badge effectively establishes professional credibility for health apps.

core_function.cn: 视频播放时提供字幕语言选择与开关控制
core_function.en: Subtitle language selection and toggle control during video playback

design_highlights.cn: 深色播放器界面搭配浮层弹窗，层次分明，聚焦用户操作
design_highlights.en: Dark player interface with floating panel creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，选项简洁直观带勾选反馈
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables one-hand operation with clear checkmark feedback

design_highlights.cn: 字幕实时显示运动指导文案，降低用户跟练焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Real-time subtitle guidance reduces user anxiety during workout follow-along

product_insight.cn: 健身视频增加字幕功能提升无障碍体验，Auto推荐选项减少用户决策成本；字幕呈现动作要点（如膝盖抬起、核心收紧），体现内容专业度和教学细节把控。
product_insight.en: Subtitle feature enhances accessibility for fitness videos. Auto-recommended option reduces decision fatigue. Subtitles display key movement cues, demonstrating professional content and instructional attention to detail.

core_function.cn: 视频引导用户完成热身或训练动作
core_function.en: Video-guided workout with exercise queue and timer

design_highlights.cn: 真人实景视频展示动作，配合简洁的动作预览卡片设计
design_highlights.en: Real-person video demo with clean exercise preview cards

design_highlights.cn: 长按完成设计避免误触，暂停/停止与完成按钮明确分离
design_highlights.en: Hold-to-finish prevents accidental taps, clear pause/stop separation

design_highlights.cn: 下方展示后续动作队列，让用户对训练进度有预期感
design_highlights.en: Upcoming exercise queue gives users sense of workout progress

design_highlights.cn: 进度条与计时器结合，清晰展示当前动作剩余时间
design_highlights.en: Progress bar with timer clearly shows remaining time

product_insight.cn: 通过展示即将进行的动作列表，降低用户对未知训练的焦虑感，Hold to Finish的设计既防误触又增加完成仪式感，提升训练完成率
product_insight.en: Showing upcoming exercises reduces anxiety about unknown workouts. Hold-to-finish design prevents accidental completion while adding ritual feeling, improving workout completion rates

core_function.cn: 引导用户进行呼吸冥想练习，享受当下时刻
core_function.en: Guide users through breathing meditation to enjoy the present moment

design_highlights.cn: 渐变紫蓝背景营造沉浸式冥想氛围，色彩过渡柔和舒适
design_highlights.en: Gradient purple-blue background creates immersive meditation atmosphere with smooth color transitions

design_highlights.cn: 简洁正念文案传递平静感，引导用户专注当下
design_highlights.en: Minimalist mindfulness copy conveys calmness and guides users to focus on the present

design_highlights.cn: 动态圆形呼吸指示器直观展示呼吸节奏变化
design_highlights.en: Dynamic circular breathing indicator visually demonstrates breathing rhythm changes

product_insight.cn: 极简设计消除视觉干扰，让用户完全沉浸于冥想体验。双圆形动画暗示呼吸节奏，无需复杂说明即可引导用户跟随练习，降低认知负担的同时提升专注度。
product_insight.en: Minimalist design eliminates visual distractions for full meditation immersion. Dual-circle animation suggests breathing rhythm, guiding users without complex instructions while reducing cognitive load.

core_function.cn: 播放运动训练视频并展示当前及后续动作
core_function.en: Play workout video with current and upcoming exercise display

design_highlights.cn: 真实场景视频配合简洁动作卡片，专业感与易读性兼顾
design_highlights.en: Real-scene video with clean exercise cards balances professionalism and readability

design_highlights.cn: 长按结束设计防止误触，Resume/Finish双按钮明确操作意图
design_highlights.en: Hold-to-finish prevents accidental taps, dual buttons clarify user intent

design_highlights.cn: 进度条和倒计时给予用户明确预期，减少运动焦虑
design_highlights.en: Progress bar and countdown set clear expectations, reducing workout anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 动作图标配合时长标注，快速传达下一步训练内容
design_highlights.en: Exercise icons with duration labels quickly communicate upcoming movements

product_insight.cn: 采用视频+动作队列的设计模式，用户既能跟练当前动作又能预知后续内容，长按结束的防误触设计体现了对运动场景的深度理解，值得健身类产品借鉴
product_insight.en: Video plus exercise queue design lets users follow along while previewing next moves. Hold-to-finish shows deep understanding of workout context, worth adopting for fitness apps

core_function.cn: 为跑者提供比赛周营养建议的详细内容阅读
core_function.en: Detailed nutrition tips article for race week preparation

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的长文排版，大标题配合适当行距，阅读舒适度高
design_highlights.en: Clean long-form typography with proper line spacing for comfortable reading

design_highlights.cn: 使用"110%"等激励性表达，强调个人差异化建议传递关怀
design_highlights.en: Motivating language like '110%' and personalized advice shows care for users

design_highlights.cn: 作者头像与更新时间增加内容可信度，链接文字使用橙色高亮
design_highlights.en: Author avatar and update time build credibility, orange hyperlinks for visibility

product_insight.cn: 跑步App通过专业教练撰写的深度内容建立权威性，文章强调"没有一刀切"的个性化理念，既提供价值又降低用户焦虑，增强品牌信任度和用户粘性
product_insight.en: Running app builds authority through coach-written content, emphasizing personalization to reduce anxiety while providing value, enhancing brand trust and user retention

core_function.cn: 展示正念名言，引导用户进入冥想状态
core_function.en: Display mindfulness quotes to guide users into meditation

design_highlights.en: Dreamy gradient background creates serene atmosphere with blur effect

design_highlights.cn: 引用一行禅师名言，通过权威人物增强内容可信度与深度
design_highlights.en: Thich Nhat Hanh quote adds credibility and depth through authority figure

design_highlights.cn: 优雅衬线字体居中排版，留白充足提升阅读舒适度
design_highlights.en: Elegant serif typography with generous whitespace enhances readability

design_highlights.cn: 简洁单按钮设计，减少决策负担，引导用户专注当下
design_highlights.en: Single button design reduces decision load, guides focus on present moment

product_insight.cn: 通过名人名言建立情感连接，云朵与呼吸的比喻呼应App核心功能。全屏沉浸式设计让用户在进入正式冥想前完成心理准备，提升后续练习的完成率。
product_insight.en: Celebrity quotes build emotional connection. Cloud-breathing metaphor echoes core app function. Full-screen immersive design prepares users mentally before meditation, improving session completion rates.

core_function.cn: 介绍轻松跑训练概念并提供配套音乐

design_highlights.cn: 深色视频缩略图与白底内容区形成清晰视觉分层

design_highlights.cn: 温和鼓励性文案降低用户运动压力，强调享受过程
design_highlights.en: Encouraging copy reduces exercise pressure, emphasizing enjoyment over performance

design_highlights.cn: 底部音乐播放CTA整合Apple Music和Spotify双平台入口

design_highlights.en: Embedded YouTube video provides multimedia learning experience

product_insight.en: Deeply integrates running education with music services, builds trust through professional content while enhancing training experience with playlists, creating a complete content-tool ecosystem

core_function.en: Provide usage guide and help information for Clubs feature

design_highlights.en: Clear breadcrumb navigation hierarchy helps users locate current position

design_highlights.cn: 搜索框置顶设计，方便用户快速查找问题
design_highlights.en: Top-positioned search bar enables quick problem lookup

design_highlights.cn: 项目列表采用圆点标记，信息层次分明易扫读
design_highlights.en: Bullet list format provides clear information hierarchy for easy scanning

product_insight.cn: 帮助中心采用标准化文档结构，作者信息和更新时间增强内容可信度，关注按钮促进用户与内容创作者的连接，是SaaS产品自助服务的经典范式
product_insight.en: Standard documentation structure with author info and update time enhances credibility. Follow button promotes user-creator connection, a classic SaaS self-service paradigm

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的列表式布局，图标统一风格，层次分明易于浏览
design_highlights.en: Clean list layout with consistent icon style and clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: NEW标签突出新功能，引导用户探索周报功能

product_insight.en: Placing premium entry at top with achievement data reinforces membership value. Clear feature grouping covering diet, exercise, and sleep reflects comprehensive health management approach.

design_highlights.cn: 每日名人语录设计增强用户情感共鸣与回访动力

product_insight.en: Placing social referral at profile top ensures visibility without disrupting core features. Badge achievements with daily quotes use gamification and emotional design to boost engagement and retention.

design_highlights.en: IP collaboration cards (Minions) add fun and brand partnership value

design_highlights.cn: 横向分类标签栏快速切换Dashboard/Library/History等模块

design_highlights.en: Premium badge and My Premium+ entry at top reinforces membership identity

design_highlights.cn: NEW标签突出新功能，激发用户探索欲望
design_highlights.en: NEW tag highlights new features to stimulate user exploration

product_insight.en: Placing achievement data at top serves as motivation and retention; feature entries are ordered by usage frequency and business priority, with Premium features prioritized for monetization

core_function.en: Display subscription status and guide users to manage renewal settings

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造安心感，与品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates reassuring atmosphere consistent with brand

design_highlights.cn: 文案清晰透明，主动告知续订时间和取消方式，建立信任
design_highlights.en: Clear transparent copy proactively explains renewal dates and cancellation options

design_highlights.cn: 提供帮助中心快捷入口，降低用户困惑时的流失
design_highlights.en: Help Center shortcut reduces user frustration and potential churn

product_insight.cn: 订阅管理页采用透明化策略，主动告知用户续订信息和取消方式，虽看似增加流失风险，实则通过建立信任提升长期留存，符合App Store政策要求同时优化用户体验。
product_insight.en: Transparent subscription management proactively shows renewal info and cancellation options. While seemingly risky, it builds trust for long-term retention while complying with App Store policies.

core_function.cn: 管理用户个人信息、订阅状态及应用设置
core_function.en: Manage user profile, subscription status and app settings

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的列表式布局，图标与文字搭配增强可读性，层级分明
design_highlights.en: Clean list layout with icon-text pairing for enhanced readability and clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 试用提醒卡片采用橙色高亮边框，醒目展示转化时间和取消提示
design_highlights.en: Trial reminder card uses orange highlight border to prominently display conversion date and cancellation notice

design_highlights.cn: 头像下方皇冠徽章暗示会员身份，增强用户尊贵感
design_highlights.en: Crown badge below avatar implies premium status, enhancing user sense of exclusivity

product_insight.cn: 将订阅状态卡片置于个人信息下方最显眼位置，既方便用户管理订阅，又作为持续的付费转化触点。透明展示到期日期和取消政策，建立用户信任的同时提升转化率。
product_insight.en: Placing subscription card prominently below profile serves dual purpose: convenient subscription management and continuous conversion touchpoint. Transparent display of expiry date and cancellation policy builds trust while improving conversion.

core_function.cn: 展示用户运动记录并提供内容创建入口
core_function.en: Display user activities and provide content creation options

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动感十足的图片展示
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color, dynamic sports imagery

design_highlights.cn: 浮动创建按钮展开多种内容类型选项，操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Floating action button expands to multiple content creation options

design_highlights.cn: 首次活动徽章奖励机制激励新用户，增强成就感
design_highlights.en: First activity badge rewards motivate new users with achievement

design_highlights.cn: 底部社交引导提示发现好友，促进用户留存
design_highlights.en: Bottom social prompt encourages finding friends for retention

product_insight.cn: 采用类Strava的活动流设计，通过徽章系统和社交引导双重机制提升新用户激活率。FAB多选项设计降低了不同类型内容创建的门槛，值得运动类App借鉴。
product_insight.en: Strava-like activity feed design uses badge system and social prompts to boost new user activation. FAB with multiple options lowers barrier for different content types.

core_function.cn: 展示用户基本信息、减重成果和社交关系
core_function.en: Display user info, weight loss progress and social connections

design_highlights.cn: 极简留白设计，信息层级清晰，头像与数据分区明确
design_highlights.en: Minimalist whitespace design with clear information hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: Edit Profile入口明显，降低用户修改资料的操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent Edit Profile entry reduces friction for profile updates

design_highlights.cn: 用绿色强调减重成果（1kg Lost），正向激励用户持续使用
design_highlights.en: Green highlight on weight loss achievement provides positive reinforcement

product_insight.cn: 将减重数据作为核心展示指标，结合社交好友数形成双重激励。空状态内容区为用户生成内容预留空间，暗示产品的社区属性和内容分享功能。
product_insight.en: Weight loss data as core metric combined with friend count creates dual motivation. Empty content area suggests community features and content sharing potential.

core_function.cn: 展示教练背景资质，建立专业信任感
core_function.en: Display coach credentials and background to build professional trust

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸真人头像配合品牌服饰，传递专业亲和感
design_highlights.en: Large authentic photo with branded apparel conveys professionalism and approachability

design_highlights.cn: 视频介绍入口降低用户与教练的心理距离
design_highlights.en: Video introduction reduces psychological distance between user and coach

design_highlights.cn: 社交媒体链接增强真实性，提升用户信任转化
design_highlights.en: Social media links enhance authenticity and boost user trust conversion

product_insight.cn: 通过展示教练的专业认证（England Athletics、IRONMAN）和创始人身份，将个人品牌与产品品牌深度绑定，有效降低用户对线上训练的信任门槛，提升付费转化意愿。
product_insight.en: By showcasing professional certifications and founder status, the design deeply binds personal brand with product brand, effectively reducing trust barriers for online training and improving conversion intent.

core_function.cn: 允许用户修改个人头像、姓名和邮箱信息
core_function.en: Allow users to modify avatar, name and email information

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计风格，淡蓝色头像背景营造柔和亲切感
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with soft blue avatar background creating friendly atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 头像编辑入口通过小铅笔图标清晰标识，降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Avatar edit entry clearly marked with pencil icon, reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 字段分区明确，标签与内容层级清晰，便于快速定位
design_highlights.en: Clear field sections with distinct label-content hierarchy for quick navigation

product_insight.cn: 采用最小化信息采集策略，仅保留核心字段（姓名、邮箱），降低用户填写压力。箭头暗示可点击编辑，交互一致性好，适合注重隐私的用户群体。
product_insight.en: Minimal data collection strategy with only essential fields reduces user friction. Arrow indicators maintain interaction consistency, suitable for privacy-conscious users.

core_function.cn: 设置每日饮水目标、容器容量和提醒
core_function.en: Configure daily water goal, container volume and reminders

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮选择器设计，支持流畅滑动选择数值，减少输入成本
design_highlights.en: Scroll wheel picker enables smooth value selection with minimal input effort

design_highlights.cn: 青色强调色突出当前设置值，视觉层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Cyan accent color highlights current values with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 提供平均饮水量参考提示，帮助用户建立合理预期
design_highlights.en: Reference tip about average intake helps users set reasonable goals

product_insight.cn: 设置页采用分组布局，将目标值、容器和提醒三个维度清晰分离。滚轮选择器比输入框更适合移动端，参考数据降低用户决策成本，提升设置完成率。
product_insight.en: Grouped layout separates goal, container and reminders clearly. Wheel picker suits mobile better than input fields. Reference data reduces decision friction and improves completion rate.

core_function.cn: 配置冥想/放松场景的音量、视频和主题选择
core_function.en: Configure meditation scene volume, video playback and theme selection

design_highlights.cn: 沉浸式深蓝渐变背景配合自然风景卡片，营造放松氛围
design_highlights.en: Immersive deep blue gradient background with nature scene cards creates relaxing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 场景卡片带月亮图标标识当前选中状态，视觉反馈清晰
design_highlights.en: Moon icon on scene card indicates current selection with clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 贴心提示深色模式自动切换场景版本，体现个性化关怀
design_highlights.en: Thoughtful dark mode tip shows personalized care for user experience

design_highlights.cn: 音量滑块配合喇叭图标直观控制，支持应用外播放设置
design_highlights.en: Volume slider with speaker icons for intuitive control, supports background playback

product_insight.cn: 将环境音设置与视觉场景结合，通过高质量自然风景图和精细的控制选项，提升冥想体验的沉浸感。深色模式自适应提示体现了对用户使用场景的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Combining ambient sound settings with visual scenes, using high-quality nature images and refined controls to enhance meditation immersion. Dark mode adaptation tip shows deep understanding of user context.

core_function.cn: 配置冥想/睡眠场景的音量、视频和背景音效
core_function.en: Configure volume, video and ambient sounds for meditation/sleep scenes

design_highlights.cn: 暖色调渐变背景与场景主题呼应，营造沉浸式氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background echoes scene theme, creating immersive atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 水平滑动卡片式场景选择，支持预览并带有选中状态反馈
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling cards for scene selection with preview and selection feedback

design_highlights.cn: 深色模式提示体现产品关怀，照顾用户夜间使用场景
design_highlights.en: Dark mode hint shows product care for nighttime usage scenarios

design_highlights.cn: 音量滑块和开关控件简洁直观，即时反馈播放状态
design_highlights.en: Clean volume slider and toggle controls with instant playback feedback

product_insight.cn: 将场景选择和音频控制整合在一个底部弹窗中，减少页面跳转。卡片预览设计让用户快速感知内容，暖色背景随场景变化增强沉浸感，适合睡眠冥想类产品借鉴。
product_insight.en: Integrating scene selection and audio controls in one bottom sheet reduces navigation. Card previews enable quick content perception, warm backgrounds adapt to scenes for immersion—ideal for sleep/meditation apps.

core_function.cn: 集中管理体重、营养和健身目标参数
core_function.en: Centralized management of weight, nutrition and fitness goal parameters

design_highlights.cn: 分组式信息架构，通过灰色背景区分体重/营养/健身三大模块
design_highlights.en: Grouped information architecture with gray backgrounds separating weight/nutrition/fitness modules

design_highlights.cn: 可点击行项目右侧蓝色值显示当前状态，暗示可编辑交互
design_highlights.en: Blue values on right side indicate current state and suggest editable interaction

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的列表式布局，每项配有说明文字降低理解成本
design_highlights.en: Clean list layout with descriptive subtitles reducing cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 显示起始体重日期增强用户记忆与承诺感
design_highlights.en: Showing starting weight date enhances user memory and commitment

product_insight.cn: 将所有目标相关设置整合在单一页面，降低用户寻找成本。通过分层信息展示（体重→营养→健身）建立清晰的目标层级，帮助用户系统化管理减重计划，提升完成率。
product_insight.en: Consolidating all goal settings on a single page reduces navigation friction. Layered display (weight→nutrition→fitness) establishes clear goal hierarchy, helping users systematically manage weight loss plans.

core_function.cn: 设置每日卡路里和宏量营养素目标
core_function.en: Set daily calorie and macronutrient goals

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的数值与百分比双重展示，蓝色高亮突出关键数据
design_highlights.en: Clear dual display of values and percentages with blue highlights for key data

design_highlights.cn: 默认目标与自定义目标分区设计，支持灵活的个性化配置
design_highlights.en: Separated default and custom goals sections for flexible personalization

design_highlights.cn: 情景化引导文案"Craving flexibility"激发用户创建自定义目标
design_highlights.en: Contextual copy 'Craving flexibility' encourages custom goal creation

design_highlights.cn: 周视图柱状图预览让用户直观感受灵活计划的价值
design_highlights.en: Weekly bar chart preview helps users visualize the value of flexible planning

product_insight.cn: 通过默认目标降低新用户门槛，同时提供自定义功能满足进阶需求。周视图小插图巧妙展示功能价值，"周末/训练日"场景化文案精准触达用户痛点，提升功能发现率。
product_insight.en: Default goals lower barrier for new users while custom options serve advanced needs. The weekly preview illustration cleverly demonstrates value, and scenario-based copy about weekends/workout days precisely addresses user pain points.

core_function.cn: 设置场景音效在App外的持续播放时长
core_function.en: Set duration for ambient sounds playback outside the app

design_highlights.cn: 毛玻璃底部弹窗效果，与背景场景形成层次感
design_highlights.en: Frosted glass bottom sheet creates visual depth with scene background

design_highlights.cn: 滚动列表式选择器，选项丰富覆盖0分钟到12小时
design_highlights.en: Scrollable list picker with comprehensive options from 0 min to 12 hours

design_highlights.cn: 蓝紫渐变配色营造放松冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Blue-purple gradient creates relaxing meditation atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 通过提供灵活的后台播放时长选项，满足用户不同场景需求（短暂休息到整夜睡眠），体现对用户使用场景的深度理解，同时通过该功能增强产品粘性。
product_insight.en: Flexible background playback duration options cater to various user scenarios from short breaks to overnight sleep, demonstrating deep user understanding while enhancing product stickiness.

core_function.cn: 配置跑步训练的配速目标和热身选项
core_function.en: Configure pace targets and warm-up options for running workouts

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的开关控件设计，黑白配色清晰区分开启/关闭状态
design_highlights.en: Clean toggle design with black/white color clearly indicating on/off states

design_highlights.cn: 每个设置项配有详细说明文字，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Each setting includes detailed explanatory text to reduce cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 专业运动术语与场景化描述结合，体现产品专业度
design_highlights.en: Professional sports terminology combined with scenario descriptions shows expertise

product_insight.cn: 针对专业跑者设计的细分设置，通过详细的使用场景说明（如跑道训练、GPS精度差场景）帮助用户理解功能价值，体现产品对核心用户需求的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Granular settings for serious runners with detailed scenario explanations (track running, poor GPS) help users understand feature value, showing deep understanding of core user needs.

core_function.cn: 调节场景音量大小，控制应用音效体验
core_function.en: Adjust scene volume level for audio experience control

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造沉浸式氛围感，与冥想/放松场景高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates immersive atmosphere matching meditation/relaxation scenes

design_highlights.cn: 极简滑块设计配合静音/音量图标，操作直观清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist slider with mute/volume icons provides intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 大面积留白与柔和色调传递平静放松的情感体验
design_highlights.en: Generous whitespace and soft tones convey calm and relaxing emotional experience

product_insight.cn: 设置页采用与主场景一致的沉浸式视觉风格，而非传统白底列表，保持用户在调节音量时的放松状态不被打断，体现了冥想类应用对情境一致性的极致追求。
product_insight.en: Settings page maintains immersive visual style consistent with main scenes rather than traditional white list, keeping users relaxed during adjustments, showcasing meditation apps' pursuit of contextual consistency.

core_function.cn: 允许用户导出个人健康数据为CSV文件
core_function.en: Allow users to export personal health data as CSV files

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的FAQ式信息架构，问答形式降低理解成本
design_highlights.en: Clear FAQ-style information architecture reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: Premium标识强化付费功能价值感知，提升会员转化
design_highlights.en: Premium badge reinforces paid feature value, boosting membership conversion

design_highlights.cn: 日期范围可选择，提供数据导出灵活性和控制感
design_highlights.en: Selectable date range provides flexibility and user control

design_highlights.cn: 透明展示导出内容和去向，建立用户数据信任
design_highlights.en: Transparent display of export content builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 数据导出功能作为Premium特权，既满足用户数据所有权需求，又作为付费转化触点。FAQ式布局预先解答用户疑虑，减少客服压力，体现对用户隐私的尊重。
product_insight.en: Data export as Premium feature satisfies data ownership needs while serving as conversion touchpoint. FAQ layout preemptively addresses concerns, reducing support load and showing privacy respect.

core_function.cn: 选择文字转语音的朗读声音和语言区域
core_function.en: Select text-to-speech voice and language region

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的单选列表设计，每个选项清晰展示名称和语言区域标识
design_highlights.en: Clean radio list design with clear name and locale identifier for each option

design_highlights.cn: 单选圆形按钮右侧对齐，选中状态一目了然，操作直观
design_highlights.en: Right-aligned radio buttons with clear selection state for intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 使用人名命名语音角色（Gordon、Karen等），增加亲和力和人格化体验
design_highlights.en: Human names for voice personas add warmth and personality to the experience

product_insight.cn: 将语音按地区分类（en-US/en-AU/en-GB）体现了国际化产品思维，人名命名策略让技术功能更具亲和力，App Default设置降低用户决策成本，是TTS类产品的标准做法。
product_insight.en: Regional voice categorization reflects internationalization thinking. Human naming makes tech features approachable. App Default reduces decision fatigue - standard practice for TTS products.

core_function.cn: 设置每日正念练习提醒时间和重复日期
core_function.en: Set daily mindfulness practice reminder time and repeat days

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造放松氛围，与正念主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates relaxing atmosphere, aligned with mindfulness theme

design_highlights.cn: 星期选择采用圆形勾选设计，默认全选工作日降低操作成本
design_highlights.en: Circular checkboxes for day selection, weekdays pre-selected to reduce user effort

design_highlights.cn: 开篇阐述正念益处（睡眠、专注、生活质量），增强用户设置动机
design_highlights.en: Opening text highlights mindfulness benefits to motivate users to set reminders

design_highlights.cn: 预设7:00pm黄金时间，符合用户晚间放松习惯，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Default 7:00pm aligns with evening relaxation habits, boosting completion rate

product_insight.cn: 通过智能默认值（时间+工作日）降低决策成本，价值前置说明提升设置动机。闹钟图标强化提醒概念，整体设计温和不强迫，符合正念App调性。
product_insight.en: Smart defaults reduce decision fatigue. Value proposition upfront increases motivation. Gentle design tone matches mindfulness app personality without being pushy.

core_function.cn: 设置每日正念练习的提醒时间和重复周期
core_function.en: Set daily mindfulness practice reminder time and repeat schedule

design_highlights.cn: 深棕色渐变背景营造温暖平静的冥想氛围，与白色时间选择器形成层次对比
design_highlights.en: Warm brown gradient background creates calm meditation atmosphere, contrasting with white time picker

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式时间选择器，滚轮交互直观自然，符合iOS原生体验
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet time picker with scroll wheel interaction, natural and iOS-native experience

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调改善睡眠、提升专注等具体益处，激发用户设置提醒的动机
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes specific benefits like better sleep and focus to motivate reminder setup

design_highlights.cn: 预设全周七天默认选中，降低用户决策成本，提高提醒功能开启率
design_highlights.en: All weekdays pre-selected by default reduces decision cost and increases reminder activation

product_insight.cn: 通过预设合理默认值（当前时间、全周重复）降低用户操作成本，同时用温暖视觉和益处文案建立情感连接，是提升功能采纳率的典型设计策略，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Smart defaults (current time, all days selected) reduce friction while warm visuals and benefit-focused copy build emotional connection - classic strategy to boost feature adoption.

core_function.cn: 设置每日就寝提醒时间和重复日期
core_function.en: Set daily bedtime reminder time and repeat days

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造夜晚入睡氛围，与功能场景高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates sleepy nighttime atmosphere matching the feature context

design_highlights.cn: 星期选择器采用可视化圆形复选框，工作日与周末区分清晰
design_highlights.en: Day selector uses visual circular checkboxes with clear weekday/weekend distinction

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调规律作息的健康价值，引导用户建立习惯认同感
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes health value of regular sleep schedule, building habit commitment

design_highlights.cn: 预设合理默认值(11点、工作日)降低设置成本，提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Smart defaults (11pm, weekdays) reduce setup friction and boost completion rate

product_insight.cn: 通过情境化视觉设计和智能默认值，将功能性设置转化为情感化体验。预选工作日符合多数用户作息习惯，开关式提醒控制给予用户掌控感，整体设计降低用户决策负担。
product_insight.en: Transforms functional settings into emotional experience through contextual visuals and smart defaults. Pre-selected weekdays match common patterns, toggle control empowers users while reducing decision burden.

core_function.cn: 设置每日正念练习提醒时间和重复周期
core_function.en: Configure daily mindfulness reminder time and repeat schedule

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造放松氛围，与正念主题高度契合
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates relaxing atmosphere aligned with mindfulness theme

design_highlights.cn: 周几选择采用圆形复选框设计，单击即可切换，操作直观高效
design_highlights.en: Day selection uses circular checkboxes with single-tap toggle for intuitive operation

design_highlights.cn: 顶部文案强调睡眠、专注、生活质量等核心价值，激发用户坚持动机
design_highlights.en: Header copy emphasizes sleep, focus, and life quality benefits to motivate consistency

design_highlights.cn: 默认开启提醒并预设常用时间，降低设置门槛提升功能激活率
design_highlights.en: Pre-enabled reminders with default time reduces friction and boosts feature activation

product_insight.cn: 通过预设7pm黄金时段和工作日全选的默认配置，巧妙引导用户建立规律习惯。温暖配色与功能定位完美匹配，整体设计体现对用户心理的精准把握。
product_insight.en: Smart defaults with 7pm evening time and weekdays pre-selected guide users toward regular habits. Warm color scheme perfectly matches functionality, showing deep understanding of user psychology.

core_function.cn: 管理订阅、账户、通知及个性化偏好设置
core_function.en: Manage subscription, account, notifications and personalization preferences

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合白色卡片区块，视觉层次分明且符合冥想应用调性
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with white card sections creates clear hierarchy matching meditation app tone

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件与箭头导航清晰区分即时操作与深层设置
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches and arrow navigation clearly distinguish immediate actions from deeper settings

design_highlights.cn: 设置项按功能分组留白，信息密度适中易于扫描
design_highlights.en: Settings grouped by function with whitespace, moderate density for easy scanning

product_insight.cn: 设置页将高频功能（订阅管理、通知）前置，同时提供组织订阅入口支持B2B场景，Show Streaks开关体现对用户心理压力的关怀，平衡游戏化与用户体验
product_insight.en: Prioritizes high-frequency features like subscription management, supports B2B with organization linking, Show Streaks toggle shows care for user mental pressure, balancing gamification with UX

core_function.cn: 设置跑步开始前的倒计时时长和启动方式
core_function.en: Configure countdown duration and motion-triggered start for runs

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计风格，单选项清晰分组，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with clear option grouping and visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 动作触发开关+倒计时选项组合，提供灵活的启动方式
design_highlights.en: Motion trigger toggle combined with countdown options for flexible start modes

design_highlights.cn: 贴心的功能说明文案，降低用户理解成本
design_highlights.en: Helpful explanatory text reduces cognitive load for users

product_insight.cn: 针对跑者真实场景设计：动作触发避免手动操作，倒计时给予准备时间。选项精简为3档，降低决策负担，体现对运动场景的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Designed for real runner scenarios: motion trigger eliminates manual operation, countdown provides prep time. Three simple options reduce decision fatigue, showing deep understanding of sports context.

core_function.cn: 配置运动记录时的音频提示和自动控制选项
core_function.en: Configure audio cues and auto-control options for workout recording

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的分组结构，通过灰色标题区分音频提示与启停控制两大模块
design_highlights.en: Clear grouped structure with gray section headers separating audio cues and start/stop controls

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件与详情选择器结合，复杂设置支持二级页面跳转
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches combined with detail selectors, complex settings support secondary page navigation

design_highlights.cn: 每个功能配有简洁说明文字，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Each feature includes concise description text to reduce cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 将专业运动功能拆解为易懂选项，Auto Pause和Start on Motion体现对跑步场景的深度理解，语音选择和倒计时设置增强个性化体验，平衡了功能丰富性与易用性。
product_insight.en: Breaks down professional features into understandable options. Auto Pause and Start on Motion show deep understanding of running scenarios. Voice and countdown settings enhance personalization while balancing richness with usability.

core_function.cn: 配置跑步记录时的语音提示和自动控制功能
core_function.en: Configure audio cues and auto-control features for run tracking

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的分组布局，用灰色小标题区分功能模块
design_highlights.en: Clear grouped layout with gray section headers to distinguish feature modules

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件即时反馈，右侧箭头暗示更多选项可探索
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches with instant feedback, right arrows indicate more options

design_highlights.cn: 每个功能配有简洁说明文字，降低用户理解成本
design_highlights.en: Each feature includes concise description text to reduce cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 将运动场景的专业需求（语音提示、自动暂停、动作触发）模块化呈现，满足不同用户的个性化偏好，同时保持设置页的简洁性，体现对跑步场景的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Modular presentation of professional running needs (audio cues, auto-pause, motion trigger) satisfies diverse user preferences while maintaining settings simplicity, showing deep understanding of running scenarios.

core_function.cn: 管理用户账户信息和删除账户操作
core_function.en: Manage user account details and account deletion

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景从金棕色过渡到深棕色，营造沉稳氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background from golden brown to deep brown creates calm atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 极简列表设计，仅展示两个核心操作，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Minimalist list design with only two core options reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 使用X图标标识删除操作，符合用户心理预期的危险操作暗示
design_highlights.en: X icon for delete action follows user mental model for destructive operations

product_insight.cn: 账户设置页面采用极简设计策略，将账户相关操作独立分组，避免用户误操作。删除账户入口清晰但不突出，平衡合规要求与用户留存目标。
product_insight.en: Minimalist account settings isolates account operations to prevent errors. Delete option is accessible but not prominent, balancing compliance requirements with retention goals.

core_function.cn: 自定义运动计划和数据的计量单位偏好
core_function.en: Customize measurement units for workout plans and tracking data

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的分组设计，三个功能区域用灰色标题分隔，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clear grouping with gray section headers separating three functional areas

design_highlights.cn: 单选按钮与开关控件混合使用，根据选项类型选择最合适的交互形式
design_highlights.en: Mixed use of radio buttons and toggle switches based on option types

design_highlights.cn: 每个分组下方提供简洁说明文案，降低用户理解成本
design_highlights.en: Concise helper text below each section reduces user cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 面向全球用户的运动App必备功能，通过公里/英里、公斤/磅等单位切换满足不同地区用户习惯。特别设计了「计划单位」与「显示单位」分离选项，兼顾专业性与灵活性。
product_insight.en: Essential for global fitness apps, separating plan generation units from display units offers both professional precision and user flexibility for different regional preferences.

core_function.cn: 管理已下载内容，释放设备存储空间
core_function.en: Manage downloaded content and free up device storage

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合简洁图标，与冥想App调性一致
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with minimal icons matches meditation app tone

design_highlights.cn: 按内容类型分类展示，每项显示占用空间，操作清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Categorized by content type with storage size shown, clear and intuitive

design_highlights.cn: 底部说明消除用户删除顾虑，强调不影响历史记录
design_highlights.en: Bottom note reassures users that deletion won't affect session history

product_insight.cn: 将存储管理按内容类型细分，让用户精准控制删除范围，同时提供数据安全承诺，降低用户决策压力，提升清理意愿和App好感度
product_insight.en: Granular storage control by content type with data safety assurance reduces user anxiety, encourages cleanup and improves app perception

core_function.cn: 允许用户选择应用界面显示语言
core_function.en: Allow users to select app display language

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景营造舒适氛围，与睡眠类产品调性一致
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates comfortable atmosphere aligned with sleep app identity

design_highlights.cn: 单选列表设计清晰，勾选状态即时反馈当前选择
