design_highlights.en: Clear radio list design with instant visual feedback on current selection

design_highlights.cn: 语言选项使用原生文字展示，便于非英语用户快速识别
design_highlights.en: Language options displayed in native text for easy recognition by non-English users

product_insight.cn: 支持9种语言体现产品全球化战略，语言列表按使用人数排序，优先展示主流市场语言。原生文字显示降低用户认知门槛，提升国际用户体验。
product_insight.en: Supporting 9 languages reflects global strategy. Native language display reduces cognitive load for international users, enhancing accessibility and user experience.

core_function.cn: 管理已下载内容，释放设备存储空间
core_function.en: Manage downloaded content and free up device storage

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合分类图标，降低删除操作的焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with category icons reduces deletion anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 二次确认弹窗设计，防止误删并明确告知操作后果
design_highlights.en: Confirmation dialog prevents accidental deletion with clear consequences

design_highlights.cn: 底部安抚文案说明不影响历史记录，消除用户顾虑
design_highlights.en: Reassuring copy stating session history won't be affected eases user concerns

product_insight.cn: 通过分类展示存储占用和可重新下载的承诺，降低用户清理顾虑。确认弹窗简洁明了，Cancel/Ok双按钮符合平台规范，整体体验流畅无压力。
product_insight.en: Categorized storage display with re-download assurance reduces cleanup hesitation. Clean confirmation dialog with standard button pattern ensures smooth, pressure-free experience.

core_function.cn: 管理已加入习惯的提醒设置和退出选项
core_function.en: Manage reminder settings and exit options for joined habits

design_highlights.cn: 水滴图标配合蓝色主题，视觉语义清晰传达饮水习惯
design_highlights.en: Water drop icon with blue theme clearly conveys hydration habit

design_highlights.cn: 底部习惯堆叠小贴士，提供行为心理学指导增强用户成功率
design_highlights.en: Habit stacking tip provides behavioral psychology guidance to improve success rate

design_highlights.cn: 开关和时间选择器操作简洁，降低设置门槛
design_highlights.en: Toggle and time picker are simple, reducing setup friction

design_highlights.cn: 退出操作使用红色文字置于底部，降低流失但保留用户控制感
design_highlights.en: Exit action in red at bottom reduces churn while preserving user control

product_insight.cn: 页面通过习惯堆叠技巧教育用户科学养成习惯，同时将退出入口弱化处理，体现了留存优先但尊重用户的产品理念。提醒时间默认12:00AM需优化为更合理时段。
product_insight.en: The habit stacking tip educates users on behavior science while de-emphasizing the exit option, showing retention-first but user-respecting design. Default reminder time at 12:00AM needs optimization.

core_function.cn: 管理邮件营销和推送通知的偏好设置
core_function.en: Manage email marketing and push notification preferences

design_highlights.cn: Email营销选项使用浅紫色卡片突出显示，与普通设置形成视觉层级区分
design_highlights.en: Email marketing option highlighted with light purple card, creating visual hierarchy from regular settings

design_highlights.cn: Toggle开关统一右对齐，操作区域明确，支持快速批量调整
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches aligned right with clear touch targets, enabling quick batch adjustments

design_highlights.cn: 每个通知类型配有友好说明文案，帮助用户理解开启价值
design_highlights.en: Each notification type has friendly description to help users understand the value of enabling

product_insight.cn: 通过分组设计（邮件/推送/社区）降低认知负荷，将高价值营销通知置顶并视觉强调，平衡用户控制感与产品触达需求，是通知权限管理的最佳实践。
product_insight.en: Grouped design reduces cognitive load. High-value marketing notification placed at top with visual emphasis balances user control with product reach needs - a best practice for notification management.

core_function.cn: 管理应用通知偏好和提醒时间设置
core_function.en: Manage app notification preferences and reminder schedules

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合白色图标，营造舒适冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with white icons creates calming meditation atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 开关与时间选择器分层展示，操作层级清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches and time pickers displayed in clear hierarchical layers

design_highlights.cn: 提醒项目命名体现关怀感，如'心情签到'、'感恩签到'
design_highlights.en: Reminder naming shows care with terms like Mood Check-In and Gratitude Check-In

design_highlights.cn: 默认开启推荐和促销通知，保持用户触达渠道
design_highlights.en: Recommendations and promotional offers enabled by default to maintain user touchpoints

product_insight.cn: 将通知设置细分为营销类、功能提醒类、自我反思类三层，既保障商业触达又强化产品核心价值。签到提醒直接关联用户习惯养成，提升长期留存。
product_insight.en: Notification settings segmented into marketing, functional reminders, and self-reflection categories. Check-in reminders directly support habit formation for long-term retention.

core_function.cn: 管理邮件营销和各类推送通知的开关偏好
core_function.en: Manage email marketing and push notification preferences

design_highlights.cn: 邮件营销选项采用橙色高亮卡片设计，突出重要性并区分层级
design_highlights.en: Email marketing option uses highlighted orange card to emphasize importance and create hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 分组式列表布局，按功能类型划分推送通知与社区通知
design_highlights.en: Grouped list layout separates push notifications and community notifications by function type

design_highlights.cn: 文案亲切友好，如'the fun stuff'增加品牌温度感
design_highlights.en: Friendly copywriting like 'the fun stuff' adds brand warmth and personality

design_highlights.cn: 提醒时间可独立点击设置，提供精细化控制体验
design_highlights.en: Reminder time is separately clickable for granular control experience

product_insight.cn: 通过分层设计将营销类通知与功能性通知区分，既满足运营需求又尊重用户选择权。社区通知独立分组体现产品对社交功能的重视，有助于提升用户活跃度和留存。
product_insight.en: Layered design separates marketing from functional notifications, balancing business needs with user control. Separate community notification group shows emphasis on social features for better engagement and retention.

core_function.cn: 展示应用隐私政策和数据收集说明
core_function.en: Display app privacy policy and data collection information

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的层级结构，标题与正文对比明显，阅读体验舒适
design_highlights.en: Clear hierarchy with distinct title and body contrast for comfortable reading

design_highlights.cn: 品牌色深棕色导航栏与白色内容区形成对比，保持品牌一致性
design_highlights.en: Brand brown navigation bar contrasts with white content area, maintaining brand consistency

design_highlights.cn: 保留底部导航栏，用户可快速切换到其他主要功能
design_highlights.en: Bottom navigation retained for quick access to other main features

product_insight.cn: 隐私政策页面采用简洁的长文本布局，通过加粗关键词（Calm、we、us）帮助用户快速理解主体信息，体现合规透明的产品态度，增强用户信任感。
product_insight.en: Clean long-text layout with bold keywords helps users quickly understand key entities, demonstrating compliance transparency and building user trust.

core_function.cn: 管理AI数据共享权限及查看法律条款
core_function.en: Manage AI data sharing permissions and access legal documents

design_highlights.cn: 极简白底设计，分组卡片清晰划分功能区域，视觉层级分明
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white design with card grouping for clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 透明化说明数据用途，强调匿名处理和不用于训练，缓解用户隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Transparent data usage explanation emphasizing anonymization to ease privacy concerns

design_highlights.cn: Toggle开关默认开启状态，配合详细说明文案降低用户决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Toggle switch with detailed explanation reduces user decision friction

product_insight.cn: 通过主动披露AI数据处理方式，明确承诺数据不用于模型训练，建立用户信任。将隐私控制权交给用户的同时，通过默认开启引导用户接受数据共享以获取个性化服务。
product_insight.en: Proactively disclosing AI data handling builds trust. Default-on toggle guides users to accept sharing while empowering them with control over their privacy choices.

core_function.cn: 控制运动活动的隐私可见范围
core_function.en: Control privacy visibility scope for activity data

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计配合暗色主题，层级分明易于聚焦
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with dark theme creates clear hierarchy and focus

design_highlights.cn: 单选按钮清晰标识当前选择状态，橙色高亮增强反馈
design_highlights.en: Radio buttons with orange highlight clearly indicate current selection

design_highlights.cn: 详尽的隐私说明文案降低用户决策焦虑，建立信任感
design_highlights.en: Detailed privacy explanations reduce decision anxiety and build trust

design_highlights.cn: 每个选项配备图标辅助识别，提升信息可读性
design_highlights.en: Icons accompany each option to enhance recognition and readability

product_insight.cn: Strava将隐私控制分为三层递进设计，每层都详细解释影响范围，既满足社交需求又尊重隐私诉求。详尽的说明文案体现了对用户知情权的重视，值得隐私敏感型产品借鉴。
product_insight.en: Strava's three-tier progressive privacy design with detailed impact explanations balances social needs with privacy concerns. The thorough copy demonstrates respect for user informed consent, valuable for privacy-sensitive products.

core_function.cn: 保存运动活动时设置可见性与隐藏数据项
core_function.en: Configure visibility and hidden details when saving workout activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合圆角卡片，层次分明易于扫视
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with rounded cards creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗展示隐藏详情选项，支持精细化开关控制
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet reveals granular toggle controls for hidden details

design_highlights.cn: 私密笔记区域明确标注'Only you can see'，增强安全感
design_highlights.en: Private notes area explicitly states 'Only you can see' for trust

product_insight.cn: 运动社交App深谙用户既想分享成就又担心隐私的心理，通过分层隐私控制（整体可见性+细项隐藏）平衡社交需求与隐私保护，降低分享心理门槛。
product_insight.en: Fitness social app balances sharing achievements with privacy concerns through layered controls (overall visibility + granular hiding), lowering psychological barriers to sharing.

core_function.cn: 控制运动轨迹的起点终点隐私显示范围
core_function.en: Control privacy visibility of activity route start and end points

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配合橙色轨迹线形成高对比度，清晰展示隐藏范围
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route creates high contrast, clearly showing hidden range

design_highlights.cn: 滑块实时调节隐藏距离，0-47米可视化即时反馈
design_highlights.en: Slider adjusts hiding distance in real-time with instant visual feedback from 0-47 meters

design_highlights.cn: 隐私保护功能体现对用户安全的关怀，增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Privacy protection features show care for user safety, building trust

product_insight.cn: 运动类App的隐私痛点解决方案，通过可视化地图预览+滑块交互让用户直观理解隐藏效果，降低隐私泄露焦虑，提升分享意愿。分层设置满足不同隐私需求。
product_insight.en: Solves fitness app privacy concerns through visual map preview and slider interaction, reducing anxiety about location exposure and encouraging sharing. Layered settings meet diverse privacy needs.

core_function.cn: 管理运动轨迹和位置数据的隐私可见性
core_function.en: Manage privacy visibility of activity routes and location data

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合简洁图标，层级清晰易识别
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with clean icons, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 三级隐私选项渐进式设计，从局部到完全隐藏
design_highlights.en: Progressive privacy options from partial to complete hiding

design_highlights.cn: 文案直白易懂，降低用户对隐私设置的认知负担
design_highlights.en: Clear straightforward copy reduces cognitive load for privacy settings

product_insight.cn: 运动类App的隐私设置采用渐进式选项设计，满足不同隐私敏感度用户的需求。从隐藏特定地址到完全隐藏地图，体现了对用户安全的重视，值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: Fitness app privacy settings use progressive options catering to different privacy sensitivity levels. From hiding specific addresses to complete map hiding, shows commitment to user safety.

core_function.cn: 设置隐私区域半径，隐藏活动起止点位置
core_function.en: Set privacy zone radius to hide activity start/end points

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，符合运动类App调性
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color fits fitness app style

design_highlights.cn: 滑块交互直观展示隐藏范围，实时反馈米数变化
design_highlights.en: Slider intuitively shows hidden range with real-time meter feedback

design_highlights.cn: 明确提示隐私保护代价（不参与区域竞赛），帮助用户权衡决策
design_highlights.en: Clear trade-off warning about segment competition eligibility helps informed decisions

product_insight.cn: 运动追踪类产品的隐私功能设计典范：通过可视化滑块降低设置门槛，同时坦诚告知功能限制，平衡隐私保护与社交竞争需求，增强用户信任感
product_insight.en: Exemplary privacy feature design for fitness tracking: visual slider reduces friction, transparent trade-off communication balances privacy and social competition, building user trust

core_function.cn: 隐藏活动起点和终点以保护用户位置隐私
core_function.en: Hide activity start/end points to protect location privacy

design_highlights.cn: 连续滑块设计，提供Off到1600米的精细隐私半径控制
design_highlights.en: Continuous slider provides granular privacy radius control from Off to 1600m

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，层次分明且护眼
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates clear hierarchy and eye comfort

design_highlights.cn: 明确告知功能代价（影响赛段竞争资格），建立用户信任
design_highlights.en: Transparent trade-off disclosure builds user trust about segment eligibility

product_insight.cn: 运动类App将隐私保护做成可调节功能而非简单开关，既满足住址保护需求又给用户选择权。清晰说明功能限制体现产品透明度，"Learn more"链接降低决策门槛。
product_insight.en: Making privacy protection adjustable rather than binary satisfies home protection needs while giving user control. Clear trade-off disclosure shows product transparency, with 'Learn more' link reducing decision friction.

core_function.cn: 控制活动地图数据的可见性和隐私保护
core_function.en: Control visibility and privacy of activity map data

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合简洁布局，开关控件醒目易识别
design_highlights.en: Dark background with clean layout, toggle control is prominent and recognizable

design_highlights.cn: 橙色链接文字引导用户了解更多，降低决策焦虑
design_highlights.en: Orange link text guides users to learn more, reducing decision anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 明确告知隐藏地图的代价（无法参与赛段竞争），帮助用户权衡
design_highlights.en: Clearly states the trade-off of hiding maps (no segment competitions), helping users decide

product_insight.cn: 运动社交App通过透明告知功能代价，平衡隐私保护与社交激励。将负面影响前置展示是诚实设计的体现，增强用户信任感。
product_insight.en: Sports social app balances privacy protection with social incentives through transparent trade-off disclosure. Upfront negative impact display reflects honest design, building user trust.

core_function.cn: 管理第三方应用、日历和智能设备的连接
core_function.en: Manage connections to third-party apps, calendars and smart devices

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的分组设计，应用、日历、手表、穿戴设备四个类别一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clear categorization with four distinct sections for apps, calendars, watches and wearables

design_highlights.cn: 统一的列表行交互模式，右箭头暗示可点击进入详情配置
design_highlights.en: Consistent list row pattern with chevrons indicating tap-to-configure action

design_highlights.cn: 顶部说明文案阐述连接价值，降低用户配置心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Header copy explains value proposition, reducing friction for device setup

product_insight.cn: 通过开放生态连接策略增强产品粘性，支持主流健身应用和智能设备，满足用户数据统一管理需求，同时品牌图标增强信任感和专业度
product_insight.en: Open ecosystem strategy enhances stickiness by supporting major fitness apps and devices, meeting users' unified data management needs while brand icons build trust

core_function.cn: 管理Apple Health数据同步和连接状态
core_function.en: Manage Apple Health data sync and connection status

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计风格，白色背景配合清晰的层级划分，信息一目了然
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with white background and clear hierarchy for easy scanning

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件直观明确，断开连接采用红色文字突出警示性操作
design_highlights.en: Toggle switch is intuitive, red text for disconnect highlights destructive action

design_highlights.cn: 顶部说明文字降低用户操作顾虑，告知可通过系统设置禁用
design_highlights.en: Top instruction reduces user anxiety by explaining settings app alternative

product_insight.cn: 健康数据集成设置采用最简化设计，仅保留核心同步开关和断开选项，降低用户认知负担。红色断开链接符合用户对危险操作的心理预期，体现了谨慎的产品设计思维。
product_insight.en: Minimalist health integration settings with only essential sync toggle and disconnect option reduces cognitive load. Red disconnect link matches user expectations for destructive actions, showing thoughtful product design.

core_function.cn: 管理Apple Health数据同步与运动记录导入
core_function.en: Manage Apple Health data sync and workout import

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计风格，清晰的分组层次，留白充足提升可读性
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with clear section hierarchy and ample whitespace

design_highlights.cn: Toggle开关即时反馈同步状态，Import按钮支持单条导入操作
design_highlights.en: Toggle switch for instant sync status, Import button for individual workout import

design_highlights.cn: 显示历史运动记录列表，降低用户导入数据的心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Showing workout history reduces friction for data import decisions

product_insight.cn: 将健康数据集成作为独立设置页，体现对用户数据主权的尊重。支持按条目选择性导入而非全量同步，给予用户精细化控制权，增强信任感和使用意愿。
product_insight.en: Dedicated health integration page respects user data sovereignty. Selective import instead of bulk sync gives users granular control, building trust and encouraging adoption.

core_function.cn: 告知用户需先取消订阅才能删除账户
core_function.en: Inform users to cancel subscription before account deletion

design_highlights.cn: 暖色渐变背景营造柔和氛围，降低删除账户的负面情绪
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background creates soft atmosphere, reducing negative emotions

design_highlights.cn: 开头'We're sorry to see you go'表达惋惜，体现人性化关怀
design_highlights.en: Opening phrase 'We're sorry to see you go' shows empathy and care

design_highlights.cn: 通过订阅取消前置条件设置流失障碍，增加用户留存机会
design_highlights.en: Subscription cancellation prerequisite creates friction to retain users

design_highlights.cn: 提供清晰的操作路径指引，链接到订阅管理设置
design_highlights.en: Clear action path guidance with link to subscription management

product_insight.cn: 账户删除流程设置订阅取消前置步骤，既符合法规要求又创造挽留窗口。简洁说明降低用户焦虑，同时通过额外操作步骤增加用户重新考虑的机会，是平衡用户体验与商业目标的典型设计。
product_insight.en: Account deletion requires subscription cancellation first, creating retention opportunity while complying with regulations. Clean instructions reduce anxiety while extra steps encourage reconsideration - balancing UX with business goals.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择接收提醒通知的具体时间点
core_function.en: Allow users to select specific time for reminder notifications

design_highlights.cn: 极简单选列表设计，圆形选中指示器清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Minimalist single-select list with clear circular selection indicator

design_highlights.cn: 预设常用时间选项，减少用户输入成本，一键完成选择
design_highlights.en: Preset common time options reduce input effort with one-tap selection

design_highlights.cn: 贴心标注"night before"帮助用户理解提醒逻辑
design_highlights.en: Thoughtful 'night before' labels help users understand reminder logic

product_insight.cn: 将时间选择限定为6个常用预设值而非自由输入，既降低了决策成本，又确保用户选择的时间点符合产品通知策略，提升触达有效性。区分前夜和当天提醒体现了对用户场景的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Limiting to 6 preset times instead of free input reduces decision cost and ensures notification timing aligns with product strategy. Distinguishing night-before and same-day reminders shows deep understanding of user scenarios.

core_function.cn: 调节应用音频提示的音量大小
core_function.en: Adjust volume level for audio cues and notifications

design_highlights.cn: 极简单选列表设计，三档音量选项清晰明了
design_highlights.en: Minimalist radio button list with three clear volume options

design_highlights.cn: 单选互斥逻辑，即时反馈当前选中状态
design_highlights.en: Mutually exclusive selection with immediate visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 大量留白营造呼吸感，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Generous whitespace creates breathing room and reduces cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 采用预设档位而非滑块设计，降低决策成本的同时避免用户反复微调。三档设置覆盖主流使用场景，体现了对用户体验的克制与简化思维。
product_insight.en: Preset levels instead of slider reduce decision fatigue and prevent endless tweaking. Three-tier options cover common scenarios, reflecting restraint and simplification in UX design.

core_function.cn: 配置运动过程中的语音提示类型和时机
core_function.en: Configure voice prompts during workout activities

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合分组布局，层级清晰易于浏览
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with grouped layout creates clear hierarchy for easy scanning

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件即时反馈，点击即可切换状态
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches provide instant feedback with tap-to-change states

design_highlights.cn: 订阅功能标注清晰，引导用户升级解锁高级功能
design_highlights.en: Clear subscriber-only labeling guides users to upgrade for premium features

product_insight.cn: 将功能按运动类型和场景分组，降低用户认知负担。通过"订阅专属"标签巧妙植入付费转化点，在不打断用户流程的情况下展示高级功能价值。
product_insight.en: Grouping by activity type reduces cognitive load. Subtle 'subscribers only' labels serve as conversion touchpoints without disrupting user flow, showcasing premium value.

core_function.cn: 让用户选择活动地图的视觉样式和主题
core_function.en: Allow users to choose visual styles and themes for activity maps

design_highlights.cn: 实时地图预览占据上半屏，让用户直观看到样式效果
design_highlights.en: Real-time map preview takes upper half screen for instant visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 网格卡片布局便于快速浏览和选择，选中状态用橙色勾标识
design_highlights.en: Grid card layout enables quick browsing with orange checkmark for selection

design_highlights.cn: 区分免费与订阅地图，通过高级样式驱动付费转化
design_highlights.en: Separates free and subscriber maps to drive premium conversion

design_highlights.cn: 提供Pride、BLM等主题地图，增强用户情感认同和社区归属感
design_highlights.en: Pride and BLM themed maps enhance emotional connection and community belonging

product_insight.cn: 通过地图样式个性化满足用户表达需求，同时巧妙设置订阅专属样式形成差异化卖点。社会议题主题地图展现品牌价值观，提升用户认同感。
product_insight.en: Map personalization meets self-expression needs while subscriber-exclusive styles create differentiated value. Social cause themes demonstrate brand values and strengthen user affinity.

core_function.cn: 选择日历平台同步健身计划和训练记录
core_function.en: Select calendar platforms to sync workouts and training records

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的品牌图标识别，Google、Outlook等日历选项一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clear brand icons for easy recognition of Google, Outlook and other calendar options

design_highlights.cn: 偏好设置使用开关控件，操作直观且状态明确
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches for preferences provide intuitive operation with clear state indication

design_highlights.cn: 提供多种日历选项降低用户接入门槛，提升功能采用率
design_highlights.en: Multiple calendar options reduce friction and increase feature adoption rate

product_insight.cn: 通过日历同步将健身计划融入用户日常时间管理，增强产品粘性。分离「计划训练」和「全部历史」的同步选项，满足不同用户对数据隐私和整洁度的需求。
product_insight.en: Calendar sync integrates fitness plans into daily time management, enhancing product stickiness. Separate sync options for planned vs all past workouts address different user needs for privacy and tidiness.

core_function.cn: 整合附加功能、资源链接和应用设置入口
core_function.en: Consolidate additional features, resources and app settings access

design_highlights.cn: Premium Offers采用深色渐变卡片突出显示，与其他选项形成强对比
design_highlights.en: Premium Offers uses dark gradient card to stand out with strong contrast

design_highlights.cn: 分组列表设计清晰区分功能类别，便于用户快速定位
design_highlights.en: Grouped list design clearly separates feature categories for quick navigation

design_highlights.cn: Premium入口置于顶部显眼位置并标注26个可用优惠，激发探索欲
design_highlights.en: Premium entry placed prominently at top with 26 available offers to drive exploration

design_highlights.cn: Haptics触觉反馈滑块设计增强交互体验的趣味性
design_highlights.en: Haptics slider design adds playfulness to interaction experience

product_insight.cn: 将付费功能入口融入日常设置页而非单独弹窗，降低用户抵触感。通过数字标注（26 available）制造价值感知，同时功能分组清晰，兼顾商业转化与用户体验。
product_insight.en: Embedding premium entry in settings rather than popup reduces user resistance. Numeric badge (26 available) creates value perception while clear grouping balances monetization with UX.

core_function.cn: 配置骑行活动的各项功能开关和传感器连接
core_function.en: Configure ride activity features and sensor connections

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，突出激活状态，符合运动类App风格
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent highlights active states, fits sports app style

design_highlights.cn: 图标化设计，每个设置项配有直观图标，提升可识别性和扫描效率
design_highlights.en: Icon-based design with intuitive icons for each setting, improving scanability

design_highlights.cn: 网格布局平衡展示6个核心设置，减少滚动操作，一屏可见
design_highlights.en: Grid layout displays 6 core settings without scrolling, all visible at once

product_insight.cn: 将骑行相关设置独立成页，采用2x3网格布局让用户快速定位关键功能。橙色仅用于已激活状态，形成清晰的视觉层级，降低认知负担。
product_insight.en: Dedicated ride settings page with 2x3 grid allows quick access. Orange only for active states creates clear visual hierarchy, reducing cognitive load.

core_function.cn: 展示用户服务协议和法律条款内容
core_function.en: Display user service agreement and legal terms

design_highlights.cn: 米色背景搭配深色文字，阅读体验舒适护眼
design_highlights.en: Warm beige background with dark text for comfortable reading

design_highlights.cn: 隐私政策设置可点击链接，便于跳转相关文档
design_highlights.en: Privacy Policy as clickable link for easy navigation to related documents

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的层级结构，标题加粗区分不同用户群体适用条款
design_highlights.en: Clear hierarchy with bold headings distinguishing terms for different user regions

product_insight.cn: 针对不同地区用户（美国/EEA/英国/瑞士）分别说明适用条款，体现合规意识和全球化运营策略，降低法律风险的同时提升用户信任度
product_insight.en: Regional differentiation of terms (US/EEA/UK/Switzerland) demonstrates compliance awareness and global operation strategy, reducing legal risks while building user trust

core_function.cn: 控制录制时屏幕自动锁定和变暗的行为
core_function.en: Control screen auto-lock and dimming behavior during recording

design_highlights.cn: 极简深色界面设计，橙色开关形成视觉焦点，层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist dark interface with orange toggle as visual focus, clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件即时反馈，Duration可点击进入详细选项
design_highlights.en: Toggle provides instant feedback, Duration tappable for detailed options

design_highlights.cn: 顶部说明文字清晰解释功能用途，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Clear explanatory text at top reduces cognitive load for users

product_insight.cn: 针对录制场景的专项设置，体现产品对用户核心使用场景的深度理解。分离自动锁定和变暗两个维度，给予用户精细控制权，平衡功能需求与电池续航。
product_insight.en: Dedicated settings for recording scenarios show deep understanding of core use cases. Separating auto-lock and dimming gives users granular control, balancing functionality with battery life.

core_function.cn: 管理群组距离挑战的参与者和规则设置
core_function.en: Manage group distance challenge participants and rules

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合红色强调色，突出危险操作按钮
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with red accent highlighting destructive action button

design_highlights.cn: 列表式设置项带箭头指示，清晰引导下一步操作
design_highlights.en: List-style settings with arrow indicators for clear navigation

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件控制邀请权限，降低挑战创建者的管理负担
design_highlights.en: Toggle switch for invite permissions reduces creator management burden

product_insight.cn: 挑战设置页面采用层级分明的信息架构，将核心管理功能（参与者、规则、编辑）与危险操作（删除）明确分离，红色删除按钮置底符合用户心理模型，降低误操作风险。
product_insight.en: Challenge settings use clear information hierarchy, separating core management functions from destructive actions. Red delete button at bottom follows user mental model, reducing accidental deletion risk.

core_function.cn: 展示应用信息、法律条款和招聘入口
core_function.en: Display app info, legal terms and career opportunities

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景从深棕到金色，营造舒适放松的品牌氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient from brown to gold creates relaxing brand atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: "Made with ❤️ in San Francisco"传递温情与人文关怀
design_highlights.en: Made with love tagline conveys warmth and human touch

design_highlights.cn: 手写风格品牌logo增强亲和力与辨识度
design_highlights.en: Handwritten style logo enhances approachability and brand recognition

product_insight.cn: 关于页采用极简设计，仅保留必要法律条款和招聘入口，通过品牌色彩和温情文案强化用户对Calm的情感认同，体现冥想类产品注重心理连接的特质
product_insight.en: Minimalist about page retains only essential legal links and hiring entry, reinforcing emotional connection through brand colors and warm copy, reflecting meditation app's focus on psychological bonding

core_function.cn: 设置录屏时屏幕自动变暗前的等待时长
core_function.en: Set waiting time before screen dims during recording

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗选择器设计，当前选项高亮显示便于识别
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet picker with highlighted current selection for easy recognition

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮式选项列表，未选中项透明度降低形成焦点引导
design_highlights.en: Wheel-style option list with reduced opacity for unselected items guides focus

product_insight.cn: 针对录屏场景的防锁屏功能设计精细，时长选项简洁（15秒/30秒/1分钟），平衡了省电与用户体验，体现了专业工具类App的细节把控
product_insight.en: Refined screen lock prevention for recording scenarios with concise duration options balances power saving and UX, reflecting professional tool app's attention to detail

core_function.cn: 管理账户、通知、下载及应用偏好设置
core_function.en: Manage account, notifications, downloads and app preferences

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景从深棕到橙黄，营造舒适冥想氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background from brown to orange creates calming meditation atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件采用简洁Toggle设计，状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clean toggle switches with clear on/off states for quick recognition

design_highlights.cn: 图标风格统一采用线性设计，与整体简约风格协调
design_highlights.en: Consistent linear icon style harmonizes with overall minimalist design

design_highlights.cn: 显示连续记录(Streaks)功能，增强用户习惯养成动力
design_highlights.en: Show Streaks feature enhances user motivation for habit building

product_insight.cn: 设置页将游戏化元素(Streaks)和自动播放功能作为独立开关突出展示，体现产品对用户粘性和内容消费流畅度的重视。分组清晰便于用户快速定位，底部显示版本和账户信息增强信任感。
product_insight.en: Highlighting gamification (Streaks) and auto-play as prominent toggles shows focus on user retention and content consumption flow. Clear grouping aids navigation while version info builds trust.

core_function.cn: 设置运动过程中距离播报的频率间隔
core_function.en: Configure distance announcement frequency during workouts

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，符合运动App专业感
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates professional fitness app aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式呈现选项，保持上下文可见减少跳转
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal keeps context visible while presenting options

design_highlights.cn: 选中项高亮显示，状态反馈清晰明确
design_highlights.en: Selected option highlighted with clear visual feedback

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的三选项设计（关闭/半公里/公里），降低决策成本
design_highlights.en: Simple three-option design reduces cognitive load for quick decisions

product_insight.cn: 运动App的语音播报是提升用户体验的关键功能，通过细粒度的间隔控制满足不同训练强度需求。弹窗式选择器保持操作流畅，避免页面跳转中断设置流程。
product_insight.en: Audio cues are key to fitness UX. Granular interval control serves different training intensities. Modal picker maintains flow without disruptive navigation.

core_function.cn: 选择同步训练计划的日历服务并配置同步偏好
core_function.en: Choose calendar services to sync workouts and configure sync preferences

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的品牌图标识别，Google、Outlook等日历服务一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clear brand icons for instant recognition of Google, Outlook and other calendar services

design_highlights.cn: 开关控件直观展示同步状态，支持细粒度的同步偏好设置
design_highlights.en: Toggle switches intuitively show sync status with granular preference controls

design_highlights.cn: 红色警示色标注禁用选项，降低用户误操作断开连接的概率
design_highlights.en: Red warning color for disable option reduces accidental disconnection

product_insight.cn: 通过多平台日历整合提升用户粘性，将健身计划融入日常生活工具链。分层的同步选项（过去计划/全部历史）满足不同用户需求，体现了对数据控制权的尊重。
product_insight.en: Multi-platform calendar integration increases user stickiness by embedding fitness into daily workflow. Layered sync options respect user data control preferences and cater to different needs.

core_function.cn: 配置跑步和骑行活动的自动暂停功能
core_function.en: Configure auto-pause feature for running and cycling activities

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景搭配橙色开关，视觉层次分明，开关状态一目了然
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange toggles creates clear visual hierarchy and obvious switch states

design_highlights.cn: 独立开关设计让用户可针对不同运动类型单独配置，操作直观
design_highlights.en: Separate toggles allow independent configuration for different activity types

design_highlights.cn: 底部说明文案清晰解释功能适用场景，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Explanatory text clarifies use cases and reduces user decision burden

product_insight.cn: 将跑步和骑行的自动暂停分开设置，体现了对不同运动场景的深度理解。说明文案强调使用条件（手持或贴身携带手机），有效管理用户预期，减少功能误用导致的负面体验。
product_insight.en: Separating auto-pause for running and riding shows deep understanding of different activity contexts. The explanatory text manages expectations by clarifying usage conditions, reducing negative experiences from feature misuse.

core_function.cn: 控制实时赛段通知的开关设置
core_function.en: Toggle live segment notifications on or off

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色开关，视觉焦点突出且符合运动类App风格
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange toggle creates visual focus and matches fitness app aesthetics

design_highlights.cn: 单一开关设计极简，降低用户认知负担和操作成本
design_highlights.en: Single toggle design minimizes cognitive load and interaction cost

design_highlights.cn: 简洁说明文案清晰传达功能价值，帮助用户理解开启的意义
design_highlights.en: Concise description clearly communicates feature value and benefits

product_insight.cn: 将单一功能独立成页面，体现了Strava对细粒度用户控制的重视。这种设计让用户能精确管理通知偏好，平衡功能价值与打扰程度，提升长期留存。
product_insight.en: Dedicating a page to single feature shows Strava's commitment to granular user control. This design enables precise notification management, balancing feature value with user disturbance.

core_function.cn: 配置实时位置分享给紧急联系人
core_function.en: Configure live location sharing with safety contacts

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色强调色，突出安全功能的重要性和品牌识别
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange accent color emphasizes safety importance and brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 设备切换开关设计直观，支持手机和Garmin设备灵活选择
design_highlights.en: Intuitive device toggle switches allow flexible selection between mobile and Garmin

design_highlights.cn: 预设友好的分享消息模板，降低用户编辑门槛同时传递关怀
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled friendly message template reduces friction while conveying care

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的CTA按钮引导用户添加安全联系人，完成功能闭环
design_highlights.en: Prominent CTA button guides users to add safety contacts, completing the feature loop

product_insight.cn: Strava将安全功能独立成模块，通过设备兼容和自定义消息降低使用门槛，体现运动App对用户安全的重视，同时限制3位联系人控制了功能边界和隐私风险
product_insight.en: Strava isolates safety as a dedicated module with device compatibility and custom messaging, demonstrating commitment to user safety while limiting to 3 contacts controls scope and privacy risks

core_function.cn: 选择跑步时播放音乐或播客的来源平台
core_function.en: Select music or podcast streaming platform for running

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的品牌图标识别，Apple Music和Spotify图标一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clear brand icon recognition with Apple Music and Spotify logos

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模态设计，外部链接图标暗示跳转第三方应用
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal with external link icons indicating third-party app redirect

design_highlights.cn: 提供自有播客内容作为备选，增加用户粘性和内容生态
design_highlights.en: Offers proprietary podcast content as alternative to increase engagement

product_insight.cn: 通过集成主流音乐平台降低使用门槛，同时推广自有Runna Podcast内容，构建内容生态。分平台展示播客选项体现了精细化运营思维，满足不同用户的平台偏好。
product_insight.en: Integrating mainstream music platforms lowers barriers while promoting proprietary Runna Podcast content. Platform-specific podcast options show refined operational thinking to accommodate user preferences.

core_function.cn: 扫描并连接外部心率传感器设备
core_function.en: Scan and connect external heart rate sensor devices

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，符合运动App视觉风格
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color matches fitness app aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 加载动画指示器明确展示扫描状态，减少用户等待焦虑
design_highlights.en: Loading spinner clearly indicates scanning status, reducing wait anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 简洁说明文案搭配Learn more链接，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Concise instructions with Learn more link reduces cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 设备配对页采用极简设计，通过实时扫描状态和清晰的操作提示降低蓝牙连接的技术门槛，Learn more链接为新手用户提供帮助入口而不干扰主流程。
product_insight.en: Minimalist device pairing design reduces Bluetooth connection complexity through real-time scanning status and clear instructions. Learn more link provides help for novice users without disrupting main flow.

core_function.cn: 展示官方团队发布的用户征集活动帖子
core_function.en: Display official team post for user testimonial collection campaign

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸活动现场图片增强社区活跃感和品牌影响力
design_highlights.en: Large event photo enhances community vitality and brand influence

design_highlights.cn: 3个月Premium奖励激励用户参与UGC内容创作
design_highlights.en: 3-month Premium reward incentivizes user-generated content participation

design_highlights.cn: 强调'真实跑者'和'社区故事'建立情感认同
design_highlights.en: Emphasizing 'real runners' and 'community stories' builds emotional connection

design_highlights.cn: 悬浮POST按钮方便用户快速发布内容参与互动
design_highlights.en: Floating POST button enables quick content publishing and engagement

product_insight.cn: 通过官方征集活动激发UGC内容，用实质奖励(Premium会员)降低参与门槛，同时获取真实用户证言用于营销。大型活动照片展示品牌影响力，增强用户归属感。
product_insight.en: Official campaign drives UGC with tangible rewards (Premium membership), lowering participation barriers while collecting authentic testimonials for marketing. Event photo showcases brand influence and builds community belonging.

core_function.cn: 用户编辑并发布文字动态至社区
core_function.en: Compose and publish text posts to community

design_highlights.cn: 纯黑背景搭配白色文字，极简沉浸式编辑体验
design_highlights.en: Pure black background with white text creates immersive minimal editing experience

design_highlights.cn: 键盘直接调起数字符号面板，便于快速输入特殊字符
design_highlights.en: Keyboard with quick access to numbers and symbols for efficient input

design_highlights.cn: 以地点命名频道（Arc'teryx New York），增强社区归属感
design_highlights.en: Location-based channel naming enhances community belonging

product_insight.cn: Arc'teryx将品牌门店作为社区节点，让用户在特定地理位置的频道发布动态，构建线下+线上融合的品牌社区生态，增强用户粘性与品牌认同。
product_insight.en: Arc'teryx uses store locations as community nodes, enabling location-based posting that bridges offline retail with online community, strengthening brand loyalty and user engagement.

core_function.cn: 邀请好友获得Calm Premium免费体验
core_function.en: Invite friends to get free Calm Premium guest passes

design_highlights.cn: 金色高级卡片设计传递Premium价值感，与品牌色形成对比
design_highlights.en: Golden premium card design conveys high value, contrasting with brand colors

design_highlights.cn: 限时延长优惠从7天升级至30天，删除线强化促销感知
design_highlights.en: Extended offer from 7 to 30 days with strikethrough text enhances urgency

design_highlights.cn: 系统原生分享面板无缝集成，降低分享操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet integration reduces friction for sharing

design_highlights.cn: 双赢文案设计，强调分享者获得奖励激励推荐行为
design_highlights.en: Win-win copy design emphasizes rewards for referrers to motivate sharing

product_insight.cn: 通过限时升级策略（7天→30天）刺激分享行为，结合系统原生分享能力降低操作成本。推荐奖励机制形成病毒式增长闭环，是低成本获客的有效手段。
product_insight.en: Time-limited upgrade (7→30 days) stimulates sharing behavior. Native share sheet reduces friction. Referral rewards create viral growth loop for cost-effective user acquisition.

core_function.cn: 生成配对码邀请伴侣加入应用共同备孕
core_function.en: Generate pairing code to invite partner for joint pregnancy tracking

design_highlights.cn: 品牌渐变色标题醒目，配对码采用大字体高对比度设计便于识别
design_highlights.en: Brand gradient title stands out, pairing code uses large font with high contrast for easy recognition

design_highlights.cn: 调用系统原生分享面板，支持多渠道一键分享，降低操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet integration enables one-tap sharing across multiple channels

design_highlights.cn: 预设情感化分享文案「maximize our chances of pregnancy together」提升邀请成功率
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled emotional message about maximizing pregnancy chances boosts invite conversion

design_highlights.cn: For Partners定位强调共同参与，让备孕成为双方共同目标
design_highlights.en: For Partners positioning emphasizes joint participation, making pregnancy a shared goal

product_insight.cn: 通过伴侣配对功能实现用户裂变增长，预设温情文案降低分享心理门槛，同时增强产品粘性——双方共同使用形成互相绑定效应，大幅降低流失率。
product_insight.en: Partner pairing enables viral growth through referrals. Pre-set emotional copy reduces sharing barriers while creating mutual binding effect that significantly reduces churn rate.

core_function.cn: 管理对特定运动员的关注偏好和通知设置
core_function.en: Manage follow preferences and notification settings for specific athletes

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计，操作便捷且不中断浏览体验
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables convenient actions without interrupting browsing

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合红色强调色，层次分明的视觉层级
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with red accent color creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 静默取关选项体现对用户社交关系的尊重
design_highlights.en: Silent mute option shows respect for user social relationships

design_highlights.cn: 收藏功能置顶，引导用户建立深度社交连接
design_highlights.en: Favorites option at top guides users to build deeper social connections

product_insight.cn: 通过精细化的关注管理选项，平衡信息获取与社交压力，收藏和静音机制让用户掌控内容流，提升长期留存和社区健康度
product_insight.en: Fine-grained follow options balance information access with social pressure. Favorites and mute mechanisms give users content control, improving retention and community health

core_function.cn: 设置关注用户的动态优先级和通知偏好
core_function.en: Configure feed priority and notification preferences for followed users

design_highlights.cn: 深色模态弹窗与橙色CTA形成强对比，视觉层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark modal with orange CTA creates strong contrast and clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗展示完整选项列表，支持多维度关注设置
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet displays complete options list with multi-dimensional follow settings

design_highlights.cn: 透明化隐私说明，明确告知对方可见性，建立用户信任
design_highlights.en: Transparent privacy disclosure about visibility builds user trust

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计降低决策压力，Ok按钮突出引导确认
design_highlights.en: Dual button design reduces decision pressure with highlighted Ok button

product_insight.cn: Strava将关注行为细分为收藏、通知、静音三级，满足不同社交深度需求。隐私说明的前置展示既保护用户知情权，也避免后续信任危机，体现成熟社交产品的设计智慧。
product_insight.en: Strava segments follow actions into favorites, notifications, and mute for varying social depths. Upfront privacy disclosure protects user rights and prevents trust issues, showing mature social product design.

core_function.cn: 展示用户对跑步活动帖子的评论互动
core_function.en: Display user comments and interactions on running activity post

design_highlights.cn: Top Contributor徽章用蓝色高亮标识，增强社区活跃用户辨识度
design_highlights.en: Top Contributor badge highlighted in blue to identify active community members

design_highlights.cn: 点赞计数与回复折叠设计，保持评论区整洁有序
design_highlights.en: Like counts and collapsible replies keep comment section clean and organized

design_highlights.cn: 评论充满鼓励性语言和emoji表情，营造积极社区氛围
design_highlights.en: Comments filled with encouraging words and emojis create positive community vibe

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定评论输入框，降低用户参与门槛
design_highlights.en: Fixed comment input at bottom reduces barrier to user engagement

product_insight.cn: 通过Top Contributor标签激励高质量用户，评论中自然流露的马拉松、NYC等关键词形成跑圈社交认同，运动类产品通过社区互动提升用户粘性和留存
product_insight.en: Top Contributor badges incentivize quality users. Natural mentions of marathon and NYC create running community identity. Social interactions boost retention in fitness apps

core_function.cn: 展示帖子评论列表，支持用户互动和回复
core_function.en: Display post comments with user interaction and replies

design_highlights.cn: 用户角色标签差异化设计，Top Contributor和Runna Team用不同颜色标识身份
design_highlights.en: Differentiated user role badges with distinct colors for Top Contributor and Runna Team

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的点赞和回复交互，底部固定评论输入框降低参与门槛
design_highlights.en: Simple like and reply interactions with fixed comment input at bottom for easy engagement

design_highlights.cn: 支持emoji表情丰富评论表达，增强社区活跃氛围
design_highlights.en: Emoji support enriches comment expression and enhances community atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 展示用户真实跑步经历分享，强化产品使用场景的社交证明
design_highlights.en: Real user running experience sharing strengthens social proof of product usage

product_insight.cn: 通过Top Contributor等荣誉标识激励核心用户持续贡献，官方团队参与评论拉近品牌距离。评论区围绕赛事话题形成自然UGC，有效提升用户粘性和社区归属感。
product_insight.en: Honor badges like Top Contributor incentivize core users to contribute. Official team engagement builds brand connection. Race-focused UGC naturally boosts retention and community belonging.

core_function.cn: 查看和发表帖子评论，支持回复互动
core_function.en: View and post comments with reply interactions

design_highlights.cn: 头像+用户名+时间戳的标准社交布局，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Standard social layout with avatar, username and timestamp for clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 支持评论展开回复、点赞交互，回复链可折叠
design_highlights.en: Expandable reply threads and like interactions with collapsible chains

design_highlights.cn: 用户可使用emoji表情丰富评论内容，增强社交氛围
design_highlights.en: Emoji support enriches comments and enhances social atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: Top Contributor标签激励用户积极互动以获得认可
design_highlights.en: Top Contributor badge motivates users to engage for recognition

product_insight.cn: 通过贡献者标签体系建立社区层级，激励高质量互动；评论区紧扣运动主题（马拉松、跑步），强化垂直社区属性，提升用户归属感和留存
product_insight.en: Contributor badge system establishes community hierarchy and incentivizes quality engagement; sport-focused comments reinforce vertical community identity and boost retention

core_function.cn: 通过系统分享面板邀请好友加入Strava
core_function.en: Invite friends to join Strava via system share sheet

design_highlights.cn: 调用iOS原生分享面板，用户熟悉操作无学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet provides familiar interaction with zero learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景与分享面板形成视觉层次，突出操作区域
design_highlights.en: Dark background creates visual hierarchy highlighting the share panel

design_highlights.cn: 提供多渠道分享选项（AirDrop、消息、邮件等）降低分享阻力
design_highlights.en: Multiple sharing channels reduce friction for user referrals

product_insight.cn: 利用系统原生分享组件实现邀请功能，既保证了用户体验一致性，又能触达用户所有社交渠道，是成熟产品的标准做法。Saved Messages入口暗示Telegram集成优先级。
product_insight.en: Leveraging native share sheet ensures UX consistency while accessing all social channels. Saved Messages shortcut indicates Telegram integration priority for viral growth.

core_function.cn: 确认用户是否放弃正在编辑的帖子内容
core_function.en: Confirm whether user wants to discard post draft

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计符合iOS规范，操作便捷触达
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet follows iOS guidelines for easy thumb reach

design_highlights.cn: 红色Discard按钮强调破坏性操作的警示性
design_highlights.en: Red discard button emphasizes destructive action warning

design_highlights.cn: 保留继续编辑选项，降低用户误操作的挫败感
design_highlights.en: Keep editing option reduces frustration from accidental taps

product_insight.cn: 采用双选项确认模式而非直接退出，保护用户内容创作成果。蓝色保留vs红色放弃的色彩对比引导用户优先选择继续编辑，体现对UGC内容的重视。
product_insight.en: Dual-option confirmation protects user content. Blue vs red color contrast guides users toward keeping edits, showing commitment to UGC retention.

core_function.cn: 邀请好友试用获取专属奖励，追踪推荐进度
core_function.en: Invite friends for free trials and track referral progress for rewards

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景配合金色品牌卡片，营造高端会员专属感
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient with golden brand card creates premium membership feeling

design_highlights.cn: 里程碑式进度条设计，锁定图标激励用户持续邀请解锁奖励
design_highlights.en: Milestone progress bar with lock icons motivates continuous referrals

design_highlights.cn: 限时延长优惠（7天改30天）强调稀缺性和额外价值
design_highlights.en: Extended offer (7 to 30 days) emphasizes scarcity and added value

design_highlights.cn: 底部奖励卡片展示即将获得的专属内容，激发期待心理
design_highlights.en: Bottom reward cards showing exclusive content create anticipation

product_insight.cn: 通过游戏化里程碑机制将单次分享转化为持续行为，延长试用期降低邀请门槛，同时独家内容奖励精准触达核心用户群体，实现病毒式增长闭环
product_insight.en: Gamified milestones convert one-time sharing into continuous behavior; extended trial lowers barriers while exclusive content rewards target core users for viral growth loop

core_function.cn: 通过推荐好友获取免费Premium奖励
core_function.en: Earn free Premium rewards by referring friends

design_highlights.cn: 金色会员卡设计配合深蓝背景，营造高端尊贵感
design_highlights.en: Gold membership card with deep blue background creates premium feel

design_highlights.cn: 延长优惠从7天升级30天，划线价强调价值提升
design_highlights.en: Extended offer from 7 to 30 days with strikethrough emphasizing value

design_highlights.cn: 里程碑进度条设计，1-3-5-10-30阶梯式解锁奖励
design_highlights.en: Milestone progress bar with 1-3-5-10-30 tiered unlock rewards

design_highlights.cn: 分享成功即时反馈弹窗，正向激励用户行为
design_highlights.en: Instant success feedback modal positively reinforces sharing behavior

product_insight.cn: 采用游戏化阶梯奖励机制，终极奖励「终身会员」具有极强吸引力。30天Guest Pass降低朋友试用门槛，形成病毒式传播闭环，是低成本获客的优秀范例。
product_insight.en: Gamified tiered rewards with 'Lifetime Premium' as ultimate prize creates strong motivation. 30-day guest pass lowers friction for viral growth, an excellent low-cost acquisition strategy.

core_function.cn: 邀请好友获得专属奖励和免费试用
core_function.en: Invite friends to earn exclusive rewards and free trials

design_highlights.cn: 金棕色渐变背景营造高级感，与品牌调性一致
design_highlights.en: Gold-brown gradient background creates premium feel aligned with brand

design_highlights.cn: 延长优惠标签(Extended Offer)配合删除线价格制造紧迫感
design_highlights.en: Extended offer badge with strikethrough creates urgency and value perception

design_highlights.cn: 里程碑解锁机制(1/3/5/10/30)激励持续邀请
design_highlights.en: Milestone unlock mechanism (1/3/5/10/30) incentivizes continuous referrals

design_highlights.cn: 首个奖励卡片展示未解锁状态激发用户行动欲望
design_highlights.en: First reward card showing locked state motivates user action

product_insight.cn: 通过阶梯式奖励机制和限时优惠策略双重激励用户传播，将30天试用作为诱饵降低分享阻力，解锁进度可视化增强持续参与动力，是病毒式增长的经典设计。
product_insight.en: Dual incentive through tiered rewards and limited-time offers drives viral growth. 30-day trial as bait reduces sharing friction, while visible unlock progress enhances engagement motivation.

core_function.cn: 设置关注用户的通知和动态显示偏好
core_function.en: Configure notification and feed preferences for followed users

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，铃铛图标居中突出通知主题
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color, centered bell icon emphasizes notification theme

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计配合单选项，降低操作复杂度
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with radio options reduces interaction complexity

design_highlights.cn: 透明告知隐私规则，用户可见开启通知状态，建立信任
design_highlights.en: Transparent privacy disclosure about notification visibility builds user trust

design_highlights.cn: 橙色CTA按钮与灰色取消形成对比，引导用户确认操作
design_highlights.en: Orange CTA contrasts with gray cancel button, guiding user confirmation

product_insight.cn: Strava将关注细分为收藏、通知、静音三级，满足不同社交深度需求。二次确认弹窗同时做隐私告知，平衡功能推广与用户知情权，是社交产品的优秀实践。
product_insight.en: Strava segments following into favorites, notifications, and mute levels for varied social depth. Confirmation modal doubles as privacy disclosure, balancing feature promotion with user transparency.

core_function.cn: 创建和参与群组运动挑战，设定目标并邀请成员
core_function.en: Create and join group fitness challenges with custom goals

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动感十足，挑战徽章设计精美有收藏感
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accents creates sporty feel, beautiful collectible badge designs

design_highlights.cn: 顶部突出展示创建挑战功能，配合真实场景图片激发用户参与欲望
design_highlights.en: Prominent CTA for creating challenges with real scenario imagery to drive engagement

design_highlights.cn: 倒计时显示剩余天数营造紧迫感，激励用户立即加入挑战
design_highlights.en: Countdown showing days left creates urgency, motivating users to join immediately

design_highlights.cn: 分类标签页设计清晰，Active/Challenges/Clubs三种社交模式一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clear tab navigation separating Active, Challenges and Clubs modes

product_insight.cn: 通过赋予用户创建挑战的权力，将被动参与者转化为社区组织者，显著提升用户粘性和社交裂变。徽章系统和品牌联名（Brooks）增加挑战价值感和完成动力。
product_insight.en: Empowering users to create challenges transforms passive participants into community organizers, boosting retention and viral growth. Badge system and brand partnerships (Brooks) add value and motivation.

core_function.cn: 搜索并关注平台上的运动员和好友
core_function.en: Search and follow athletes and friends on the platform

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色品牌色，运动类App专业感强，关注按钮醒目突出
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates professional sports app feel, follow buttons stand out

design_highlights.cn: 多维度好友发现入口（推荐/Facebook/通讯录/二维码），降低添加好友门槛
design_highlights.en: Multiple friend discovery channels (suggested/Facebook/contacts/QR) lower barriers to connect

design_highlights.cn: 显示粉丝数量作为社交证明，Follow All批量关注提升转化效率
design_highlights.en: Follower counts as social proof, Follow All button improves conversion efficiency

design_highlights.cn: 底部邀请好友CTA引导用户扩展社交网络，增强平台粘性
design_highlights.en: Bottom invite CTA encourages network expansion and platform stickiness

product_insight.cn: 通过算法推荐热门运动员配合社交关系链导入，快速构建用户社交图谱。粉丝数量展示利用从众心理促进关注，批量关注功能降低操作成本，是社交类产品冷启动的典型策略。
product_insight.en: Combines algorithm-recommended popular athletes with social graph import to quickly build user connections. Follower counts leverage social proof to drive follows, batch follow reduces friction - classic cold-start strategy for social products.

core_function.cn: 通过多种渠道查找并添加社交好友
core_function.en: Find and add friends through multiple channels

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，品牌识别度高且视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates strong brand identity and visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 多入口好友发现方式（推荐/Facebook/通讯录/二维码）降低添加门槛
design_highlights.en: Multiple friend discovery methods reduce friction for adding connections

design_highlights.cn: 底部邀请按钮持续可见，鼓励用户扩展社交网络带来新增长
design_highlights.en: Persistent invite button at bottom encourages viral growth through referrals

design_highlights.cn: Connect Securely文案传递安全感，降低隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: Connect Securely copy builds trust and reduces privacy concerns

product_insight.cn: 整合多种社交图谱导入方式，通过Facebook等成熟平台快速构建用户关系网络，底部邀请入口形成增长闭环，体现运动类App对社交激励的重视
product_insight.en: Integrates multiple social graph import methods to quickly build user networks, with persistent invite CTA creating growth loop, reflecting fitness apps' emphasis on social motivation

core_function.cn: 展示冥想里程碑成就并分享至社交平台
core_function.en: Display meditation milestone and share to social platforms

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合深色成就卡片，营造沉稳专注氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with dark achievement card creates calm, focused atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 徽章式设计强化成就感，"Mindful Day"文案激励用户持续练习
design_highlights.en: Badge-style design reinforces accomplishment, motivating continuous practice

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗提供多种分享渠道，降低分享操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet offers multiple sharing options, reducing friction for sharing

design_highlights.cn: 品牌水印嵌入分享卡片，实现用户自发传播获客
design_highlights.en: Brand watermark in shareable card enables organic user acquisition

product_insight.cn: 通过可分享的精美成就卡片设计，将用户成就转化为社交货币，既满足用户炫耀心理，又实现品牌病毒式传播，是低成本获客的经典范式。
product_insight.en: Beautifully designed shareable achievement cards transform user milestones into social currency, satisfying users' desire to showcase while enabling viral brand spread - a classic low-cost acquisition strategy.

core_function.cn: 将训练成果分享给好友或社交平台
core_function.en: Share workout achievements with friends or social platforms

design_highlights.cn: 顶部展示团队训练照片，增强社交氛围和运动感染力
design_highlights.en: Group workout photo at top enhances social atmosphere and fitness inspiration

design_highlights.cn: 调用系统原生分享面板，用户熟悉度高，操作无学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet provides familiar interaction with zero learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 分享面板内嵌品牌推广链接，实现用户裂变传播
design_highlights.en: Embedded brand promotion link in share sheet enables viral user acquisition

product_insight.cn: 将训练分享与品牌推广巧妙结合，用户分享成就的同时自然传播产品链接，通过社交裂变降低获客成本，是运动App常用的增长策略。
product_insight.en: Cleverly combines workout sharing with brand promotion. Users naturally spread product links while sharing achievements, reducing acquisition costs through social virality.

core_function.cn: 提供评论的分享和删除操作选项
core_function.en: Provide share and delete options for comments

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗采用圆角卡片设计，与背景模糊形成层次感
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet uses rounded card design with blurred background for depth

design_highlights.cn: 删除操作使用红色警示色，防止误操作
design_highlights.en: Delete action uses red warning color to prevent accidental taps

design_highlights.cn: 图标与文字左对齐，操作项清晰易识别
design_highlights.en: Icons and text left-aligned for clear and recognizable actions

product_insight.cn: 精简的操作菜单设计，仅保留分享和删除两个核心功能，降低用户决策成本。删除用红色标识符合用户心智模型，Cancel按钮独立分组增强安全感。
product_insight.en: Minimalist action menu with only share and delete options reduces decision cost. Red delete color matches user mental model, separated Cancel button enhances safety.

core_function.cn: 确认是否静音某位运动员的动态更新
core_function.en: Confirm muting an athlete's feed updates

design_highlights.cn: 带斜线的眼睛图标直观传达"隐藏/静音"概念，深色弹窗与背景形成层级
design_highlights.en: Crossed-eye icon intuitively conveys mute concept, dark modal creates visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 明确告知用户对方不会收到通知，减轻社交压力和愧疚感
design_highlights.en: Clearly states the athlete won't be notified, reducing social pressure and guilt

design_highlights.cn: 橙色Ok按钮与灰色取消形成对比，引导用户完成操作决策
design_highlights.en: Orange Ok button contrasts with gray cancel, guiding user decision

product_insight.cn: 静音功能设计充分考虑社交关系维护，强调"对方不知情"降低用户心理负担，比直接取消关注更温和，有助于用户留存同时保持信息流清洁。
product_insight.en: Mute feature thoughtfully preserves social relationships by emphasizing privacy, offering a gentler alternative to unfollowing that maintains retention while keeping feeds clean.

core_function.cn: 通过链接或二维码分享训练内容给好友
core_function.en: Share workout with friends via link or QR code

design_highlights.cn: 顶部群体运动照片营造社交氛围，增强分享动机
design_highlights.en: Group workout photo at top creates social atmosphere and motivates sharing

design_highlights.cn: 双重分享方式：系统分享按钮+QR码，满足不同场景需求
design_highlights.en: Dual sharing options: system share button and QR code for different scenarios

design_highlights.cn: 突出的黑色CTA按钮与简洁文案降低分享门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent black CTA button with concise copy reduces sharing friction

design_highlights.cn: "with your friends"文案强调社交连接，增强情感共鸣
design_highlights.en: "With your friends" copy emphasizes social connection and emotional resonance

product_insight.cn: 底部弹窗形式保持用户上下文，双分享机制覆盖线上线下场景。QR码设计适配健身房面对面社交场景，体现对真实用户行为的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Bottom sheet maintains user context. Dual sharing covers online and offline scenarios. QR code design fits gym face-to-face social interactions, showing deep understanding of real user behavior.

core_function.cn: 将运动数据生成精美卡片分享至社交平台
core_function.en: Generate beautiful activity cards for social media sharing

design_highlights.cn: 全屏沉浸式照片背景配合运动数据叠加，视觉冲击力强
design_highlights.en: Full-screen immersive photo background with overlaid activity data creates strong visual impact

design_highlights.cn: 用户个人照片融入分享卡片，增强成就感和社交展示欲
design_highlights.en: Personal photos integrated into share cards enhance achievement sense and social display desire

design_highlights.cn: 底部横向排列多种分享渠道，一键快速分享简化操作流程
design_highlights.en: Multiple sharing channels horizontally arranged at bottom enable one-tap quick sharing

product_insight.cn: Strava深谙社交传播对运动App的增长价值，通过精美的分享卡片设计将用户变成品牌传播者，左上角品牌水印实现免费曝光，兼顾用户炫耀需求和产品增长目标
product_insight.en: Strava understands social sharing's growth value for fitness apps, turning users into brand ambassadors through beautiful share cards with brand watermark for free exposure while satisfying users' showing-off needs

core_function.cn: 确认用户取消关注运动员的操作并说明影响
core_function.en: Confirm unfollow action with clear impact explanation

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗叠加模态对话框的双层交互，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Layered interaction with bottom sheet and modal dialog overlay

design_highlights.cn: 红色Unfollow按钮强调破坏性操作，与Cancel形成对比
design_highlights.en: Red unfollow button highlights destructive action, contrasting with cancel

design_highlights.cn: 清晰告知取消关注后的影响，降低用户焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Clear explanation of consequences reduces user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 关注选项支持多维度控制：收藏、通知、静音功能分离
design_highlights.en: Follow options separated into favorites, notifications, and mute controls

product_insight.cn: 采用二次确认防止误操作，同时在确认弹窗中明确说明关联偏好设置会被禁用，体现了对用户决策的尊重和信息透明原则，值得借鉴的防误触设计模式。
product_insight.en: Double confirmation prevents accidental unfollows while transparently explaining that related preferences will be disabled, demonstrating respect for user decisions and information transparency.

core_function.cn: 通过手机通讯录发现并关注Strava好友
core_function.en: Discover and follow Strava friends via phone contacts

design_highlights.cn: 橙色品牌色贯穿CTA按钮，空状态图标简洁清晰
design_highlights.en: Orange brand color throughout CTAs, clean empty state icon

design_highlights.cn: 多维度好友发现入口（推荐/Facebook/通讯录/二维码）降低操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Multiple friend discovery channels reduce friction for user connection

design_highlights.cn: 底部常驻邀请入口，双CTA策略同时覆盖新老用户拉新
design_highlights.en: Persistent invite button at bottom, dual CTA strategy for user acquisition

design_highlights.cn: "Connect Securely"强调安全感，消除隐私顾虑
design_highlights.en: "Connect Securely" messaging addresses privacy concerns

product_insight.cn: 社交健身产品的核心增长飞轮依赖好友关系链，通过多渠道好友发现+安全承诺降低连接门槛，空状态引导而非放弃，最大化社交网络效应
product_insight.en: Social fitness apps rely on friend networks for growth. Multi-channel discovery with security assurance reduces connection friction, maximizing network effects through guided empty states.

core_function.cn: 通过二维码快速添加好友，简化社交连接流程
core_function.en: Add friends quickly via QR code scanning

design_highlights.cn: 橙色品牌色二维码设计，视觉识别度高，与深色背景形成强对比
design_highlights.en: Orange branded QR code with high visual recognition against dark background

design_highlights.cn: 多种添加好友方式平行展示，用户可自由选择最便捷途径
design_highlights.en: Multiple friend-adding methods displayed in parallel for user choice

design_highlights.cn: 二维码中心嵌入Strava品牌Logo，强化品牌认知同时保持功能性
design_highlights.en: Strava logo embedded in QR center reinforces brand while maintaining functionality

product_insight.cn: 将二维码作为独立添加方式与推荐、Facebook、通讯录并列，降低线下社交场景中的添加门槛，同时品牌化二维码设计增强用户分享意愿，是线上线下社交融合的优秀实践。
product_insight.en: Positioning QR code alongside suggested, Facebook, and contacts reduces friction for offline social connections. Branded QR design encourages sharing, excellently bridging online-offline social experiences.

core_function.cn: 展示运动活动获得的点赞互动记录
core_function.en: Display kudos received for an activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题设计，符合运动类App沉浸式体验
design_highlights.en: Dark theme design for immersive fitness app experience

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案直接明了，告知用户当前无点赞
design_highlights.en: Clear empty state message informing no kudos yet

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的返回导航，支持快速返回活动详情
design_highlights.en: Simple back navigation for quick return to activity

product_insight.cn: Kudos机制是Strava的核心社交功能，空状态设计虽简洁但缺乏引导用户分享或邀请好友的CTA，可优化为鼓励社交行为的触点
product_insight.en: Kudos is Strava's core social feature. Empty state is minimal but lacks CTA to encourage sharing or inviting friends - a missed opportunity for social engagement

core_function.cn: 用户发起投票讨论跑步话题，促进社区互动
core_function.en: User-initiated poll discussion on running topics to drive community engagement

design_highlights.cn: 投票选项用emoji图标区分，视觉直观易识别
design_highlights.en: Poll options distinguished by emoji icons for intuitive visual recognition

design_highlights.cn: 投票结果实时显示百分比和进度条，反馈即时
design_highlights.en: Real-time percentage and progress bar display for immediate voting feedback

design_highlights.cn: Top Contributor标识激励用户参与，建立社区认同感
design_highlights.en: Top Contributor badge incentivizes participation and builds community identity

design_highlights.cn: 底部评论入口降低互动门槛，促进UGC产出
design_highlights.en: Bottom comment entry lowers interaction barrier to encourage UGC

product_insight.cn: 通过投票功能降低用户互动门槛，结合贡献者标识体系建立社区荣誉感，评论折叠设计控制信息密度同时保持可探索性，是构建活跃运动社区的经典设计范式
product_insight.en: Polls lower engagement barriers while contributor badges build community honor system. Comment folding controls information density while maintaining explorability - classic pattern for active fitness communities

core_function.cn: 用户对登山活动进行点赞和评论互动
core_function.en: Users engage with climbing activities through likes and comments

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合头像群组展示，突出社交参与度
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with avatar cluster highlights social engagement

design_highlights.cn: 底部输入框设计简洁，支持快速评论发送
design_highlights.en: Clean bottom input field enables quick comment submission

design_highlights.cn: 113个点赞配合真实头像，营造活跃社区氛围
design_highlights.en: 113 likes with real avatars create vibrant community atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 通过展示点赞数量和用户头像群组，有效利用社交证明激励用户参与互动。简洁的评论入口降低发言门槛，促进UGC内容产生。
product_insight.en: Displays like count and avatar cluster as social proof to encourage engagement. Simple comment input lowers barrier for UGC generation.

core_function.cn: 搜索并邀请关注者加入活动或挑战
core_function.en: Search and invite followers to join activities or challenges

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色CTA按钮，品牌色突出且易于识别
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange CTA button, prominent brand color for easy recognition

design_highlights.cn: 顶部搜索栏便于快速筛选关注者，降低邀请操作成本
design_highlights.en: Top search bar enables quick filtering of followers, reducing invitation friction

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案清晰说明列表来源，消除用户困惑
design_highlights.en: Empty state copy clearly explains list source, eliminating user confusion

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计引导用户理解功能逻辑，同时提供站外邀请入口扩大用户拉新渠道，双轨策略平衡留存与增长目标
product_insight.en: Empty state guides users to understand functionality while providing external invite option to expand acquisition channels, balancing retention and growth goals

core_function.cn: 搜索并邀请关注你的运动员好友
core_function.en: Search and invite athletes who follow you

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题设计，搜索栏采用低对比度灰色背景融入界面
design_highlights.en: Dark theme design with low-contrast gray search bar blending into interface

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗设计，Close和Invite对称布局便于操作
design_highlights.en: Modal sheet design with symmetrical Close and Invite buttons for easy operation

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案简洁明确，无干扰地提示当前无结果
design_highlights.en: Clean empty state copy clearly indicates no results without distraction

product_insight.cn: 基于社交关系链（关注者）进行好友邀请，降低用户搜索成本；简约的空状态设计避免用户焦虑，但可考虑添加引导用户扩大社交圈的建议。
product_insight.en: Leverages social graph (followers) to reduce search friction for invitations. Minimal empty state avoids anxiety but could add suggestions to expand social circle.

core_function.cn: 展示用户发布的跑步话题讨论及投票互动
core_function.en: Display running topic discussion with poll and user interactions

design_highlights.cn: 投票组件嵌入帖子，降低参与门槛，提升互动率
design_highlights.en: Embedded poll widget lowers participation barrier and boosts engagement

design_highlights.cn: emoji图标配合选项文字，视觉化表达增强选项辨识度
design_highlights.en: Emoji icons paired with text options enhance visual recognition

design_highlights.cn: 友好请求语气和表情符号营造轻松社区氛围
design_highlights.en: Friendly request tone with emojis creates relaxed community atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: Top Contributor标签激励用户积极贡献内容
design_highlights.en: Top Contributor badge motivates users to actively contribute content

product_insight.cn: 通过投票机制将单向内容消费转化为双向互动，Top Contributor身份标识建立社区层级体系，激励优质内容产出。评论展示精简但保留展开入口，平衡信息密度与可读性。
product_insight.en: Poll mechanism transforms passive consumption into active interaction. Top Contributor badges establish community hierarchy to incentivize quality content. Collapsed replies balance information density with readability.

core_function.cn: 提供分享、举报、屏蔽等用户交互操作选项
core_function.en: Provide sharing, reporting, and blocking options for user interactions

design_highlights.cn: 图标与文字左对齐，视觉层次清晰，危险操作用红色警示
design_highlights.en: Left-aligned icons with text, clear hierarchy, red color for dangerous actions

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式便于单手操作，Cancel按钮独立便于取消
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet pattern enables one-hand operation, separate Cancel button for easy dismissal

design_highlights.cn: Block User使用红色强调严重性，提醒用户谨慎操作
design_highlights.en: Red color on Block User emphasizes severity, reminds users to act carefully

product_insight.cn: 将用户管理和内容举报功能整合在统一的操作面板中，既保证了功能可达性，又通过颜色区分操作严重程度，平衡了社区安全与用户体验。
product_insight.en: Integrates user management and content reporting in a unified action sheet, balancing community safety with UX through color-coded action severity.

core_function.cn: 展示团体距离挑战目标、规则及成员进度
core_function.en: Display group distance challenge goals, rules and member progress

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动感强烈，信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates athletic feel and clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 顶部醒目的邀请CTA按钮，鼓励用户扩大社交圈层
design_highlights.en: Prominent invite CTA at top encourages users to expand social circle

design_highlights.cn: "Here we go"开场语营造起跑线仪式感，激发参与热情
design_highlights.en: "Here we go" opening creates starting line ritual, inspiring participation

design_highlights.cn: 底部显示个人当前进度0km，形成隐性激励提示用户开始运动
design_highlights.en: Personal progress at bottom showing 0km creates implicit motivation to start

product_insight.cn: 通过团体挑战机制将个人运动转化为社交行为，空状态设计巧妙利用0km进度制造紧迫感，邀请机制促进病毒式传播，评论区预留增强社区互动预期
product_insight.en: Transforms solo exercise into social behavior through group challenges. Empty 0km state creates urgency, invite mechanism enables viral growth, comments section builds community engagement expectation

core_function.cn: 确认用户举报已提交并提供后续操作选项
core_function.en: Confirm report submission and offer follow-up actions

design_highlights.cn: 感谢用户贡献的温暖文案，增强社区归属感
design_highlights.en: Warm thank-you copy builds community belonging

design_highlights.cn: 提供屏蔽选项作为即时补救措施，给用户控制权
design_highlights.en: Block option as immediate remedy gives users control

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的信息层级，分段展示处理流程和可选操作
design_highlights.en: Clear information hierarchy with segmented process and actions

design_highlights.cn: 红色屏蔽按钮突出显示，引导用户完成安全闭环
design_highlights.en: Red block button stands out to guide safety loop completion

product_insight.cn: 举报流程闭环设计优秀：确认收到→说明处理时间→提供主动防护选项。透明的处理预期和即时的自助工具降低用户焦虑，体现平台对社区安全的重视。
product_insight.en: Excellent report flow closure: confirmation, timeline expectation, and proactive protection option. Transparency and self-service tools reduce anxiety and show platform's commitment to community safety.

core_function.cn: 展示已接受挑战邀请的参与者列表
core_function.en: Display list of participants who accepted the challenge

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色品牌色突出重要元素，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange brand accent highlights key elements with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: Accepted/Invited分段切换便于快速查看不同状态参与者
design_highlights.en: Accepted/Invited segmented tabs enable quick filtering of participant status

design_highlights.cn: 右上角添加用户图标引导用户邀请更多好友参与
design_highlights.en: Add user icon in top right guides users to invite more friends

product_insight.cn: 通过分离已接受和待邀请列表，清晰展示社交挑战的参与状态，降低用户管理成本。添加好友入口的设计鼓励病毒式传播，提升产品社交粘性。
product_insight.en: Separating accepted and invited lists clearly shows challenge participation status. The add friend entry encourages viral spread and enhances social engagement.

core_function.cn: 确认是否屏蔽特定用户的操作弹窗
core_function.en: Confirmation dialog for blocking a specific user

design_highlights.cn: 红色Block按钮突出警示性操作，与Cancel形成视觉层级对比
design_highlights.en: Red Block button highlights warning action, contrasting with Cancel for visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗+背景模糊聚焦用户注意力，减少误操作
design_highlights.en: Modal dialog with blurred background focuses attention and reduces misclicks

design_highlights.cn: 简洁明确的确认文案，用户名个性化显示增强操作确定性
design_highlights.en: Clear confirmation copy with personalized username enhances action certainty

product_insight.cn: 屏蔽用户作为敏感操作采用二次确认设计，红色CTA传递操作严重性。弹窗简洁无冗余说明，符合用户快速决策心理，同时保留Cancel选项降低操作压力。
product_insight.en: Block action uses double confirmation for sensitive operations. Red CTA conveys severity while minimal copy supports quick decisions. Cancel option reduces pressure.

core_function.cn: 展示挑战活动中已邀请但未响应的用户列表
core_function.en: Display users invited to challenge but not yet responded

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，突出Tab选中状态
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent highlighting active tab state

design_highlights.cn: Accepted/Invited双Tab切换，清晰区分参与者状态
design_highlights.en: Dual tab switch clearly differentiates participant status

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案友好明确，告知用户当前无待处理邀请
design_highlights.en: Friendly empty state copy clearly indicates no pending invites

product_insight.cn: 通过分离已接受与已邀请状态，帮助挑战发起者清晰掌握参与情况，便于追踪邀请转化。右上角添加好友入口促进社交裂变，提升挑战参与率。
product_insight.en: Separating accepted and invited status helps challenge creators track participation. Top-right add friend entry promotes social viral growth and increases challenge engagement.

core_function.cn: 用户在社区频道中创建和发布新帖子
core_function.en: Create and publish new posts in community channels

design_highlights.cn: 极简白色背景配合醒目的红色频道标签，视觉层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background with prominent red channel tag, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 占位符文案"What are your thoughts?"降低发帖心理门槛，引导用户表达
design_highlights.en: Placeholder text reduces psychological barrier and encourages user expression

design_highlights.cn: POST按钮采用深色高对比设计，位置固定便于快速发布
design_highlights.en: High-contrast POST button with fixed position enables quick publishing

design_highlights.cn: 支持图片和列表格式的底部工具栏，丰富内容表达形式
design_highlights.en: Bottom toolbar with image and list options enriches content formats

product_insight.cn: 发帖页采用沉浸式全屏设计，去除干扰元素让用户专注创作。频道标签前置显示帮助用户确认发布位置，Cancel和POST双按钮符合用户心智模型，整体设计降低UGC门槛。
product_insight.en: Immersive full-screen design removes distractions for focused creation. Pre-displayed channel tag confirms posting location, dual Cancel/POST buttons match user mental model, overall reducing UGC barriers.

core_function.cn: 分享运动路线至社交平台或保存
core_function.en: Share workout route to social platforms or save locally

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配橙色路线轨迹形成强烈视觉对比，突出运动数据
design_highlights.en: Dark map with orange route creates strong visual contrast highlighting workout data

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生分享面板设计，用户熟悉的交互模式降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet design reduces learning curve with familiar interaction patterns

design_highlights.cn: 预置常用分享渠道和快捷操作，缩短分享路径提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Pre-set sharing channels and quick actions shorten path to increase share completion rate

product_insight.cn: Strava通过深度链接集成系统分享面板，让运动路线分享无缝衔接社交传播。保存消息入口暗示了私密分享场景，兼顾公开与私密需求，提升用户社交粘性。
product_insight.en: Strava integrates system share sheet via deep link for seamless social sharing. Saved Messages option addresses private sharing needs, balancing public and private use cases to boost social engagement.

core_function.cn: 将运动活动分享至社交平台或其他应用
core_function.en: Share workout activity to social platforms or other apps

design_highlights.cn: 活动预览采用高质量人物照片，增强分享吸引力
design_highlights.en: High-quality photo preview enhances sharing appeal

design_highlights.cn: 原生iOS分享面板，用户熟悉的交互模式降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet provides familiar interaction patterns

design_highlights.cn: 深度链接(strava.app.link)便于追踪分享转化和用户获取
design_highlights.en: Deep link enables tracking share conversion and user acquisition

product_insight.cn: 采用原生分享组件保持系统一致性，深度链接策略实现病毒式传播追踪，活动卡片视觉设计强调社交属性，是健身App用户增长的关键触点。
product_insight.en: Native share component maintains system consistency. Deep linking enables viral growth tracking. Activity card visual design emphasizes social attributes as key growth touchpoint.

core_function.cn: 展示和创建运动俱乐部，促进社区建设
core_function.en: Discover and create athletic clubs for community building

design_highlights.cn: 真实用户群体照片营造活力社交氛围，深色背景突出内容层次
design_highlights.en: Authentic group photo creates vibrant social atmosphere, dark theme enhances content hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色CTA按钮引导创建俱乐部，搭配新功能提示增强转化
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA for club creation with new feature tooltip enhances conversion

design_highlights.cn: 展示近600万会员的官方俱乐部，利用社交证明激发归属感
design_highlights.en: Showcasing official club with ~6M members leverages social proof to inspire belonging

design_highlights.cn: 三标签分类设计（Active/Challenges/Clubs）便于快速切换浏览模式
design_highlights.en: Three-tab navigation (Active/Challenges/Clubs) enables quick browsing mode switching

product_insight.cn: 将社区功能与内容创建深度整合，通过展示超大规模官方俱乐部建立平台权威性，同时降低用户创建门槛，实现UGC生态的冷启动和持续增长
product_insight.en: Integrates community features with content creation, establishes platform authority through massive official club while lowering creation barriers for UGC ecosystem growth

core_function.cn: 展示运动挑战活动信息并引导用户参与
core_function.en: Display challenge details and encourage user participation

design_highlights.cn: 橙黑配色强化品牌识别，动态插画营造运动氛围
design_highlights.en: Orange-black brand colors with dynamic illustrations create athletic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 醒目橙色CTA按钮"Join Challenge"位置突出，降低参与门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange CTA button with clear action reduces participation friction

design_highlights.cn: 展示595万参与者数据，利用社交证明激励用户加入
design_highlights.en: Displaying 5.9M athletes leverages social proof to motivate participation

design_highlights.cn: "One month. 100 kilometers. You in?"激励式文案唤起挑战欲
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy sparks competitive spirit and challenge desire

product_insight.cn: 通过徽章奖励+社区规模+倒计时三重机制驱动参与，将个人运动目标与社群归属感绑定，有效提升用户活跃度和留存。挑战规则清晰透明，降低认知成本。
product_insight.en: Triple mechanism of badge rewards, community scale, and countdown drives engagement. Binding personal goals with community belonging effectively boosts retention. Clear rules reduce cognitive load.

core_function.cn: 展示挑战详情并引导用户创建或加入群组挑战
core_function.en: Display challenge details and guide users to create or join group challenges

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景搭配橙色CTA按钮形成强烈视觉对比，引导用户行动
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange CTA buttons creates strong visual contrast to drive action

design_highlights.cn: 励志文案"Going the distance"结合灵活目标设定降低用户心理门槛
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy 'Going the distance' with flexible goals reduces psychological barriers

design_highlights.cn: 底部双CTA设计（创建挑战+邀请好友）最大化转化路径
design_highlights.en: Dual CTA design at bottom (create challenge + invite friends) maximizes conversion paths

design_highlights.cn: Overall/Following分栏切换满足不同社交场景的排行榜需求
design_highlights.en: Overall/Following tab switch meets leaderboard needs for different social contexts

product_insight.cn: 通过空状态展示群组功能价值，配合户外场景图片营造社交运动氛围。隐私说明透明化处理增强用户信任，双CTA设计同时服务于创建和邀请两种用户意图，提升功能触达率。
product_insight.en: Empty state showcases group feature value with outdoor imagery creating social sports atmosphere. Transparent privacy policy builds trust, dual CTAs serve both creation and invitation intents to maximize feature engagement.

core_function.cn: 展示运动挑战目标、进度和奖励信息
core_function.en: Display challenge goals, progress and reward information

design_highlights.cn: 徽章设计精美，搭配品牌橙色主视觉和动感图形元素，营造活力氛围
design_highlights.en: Exquisite badge design with brand orange visuals and dynamic graphics creating energetic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: "You in?"互动式文案激发参与欲望，奖励徽章预览增强完成动力
design_highlights.en: "You in?" interactive copy drives participation, badge preview enhances completion motivation

design_highlights.cn: 清晰展示剩余天数和目标距离，结合分享功能促进社交传播
design_highlights.en: Clear display of remaining days and target distance, share function promotes social spreading

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗提供分享和复制链接快捷操作，降低传播门槛
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet provides quick share and copy link actions, lowering sharing barriers

product_insight.cn: Strava通过月度挑战机制构建社区粘性，徽章奖励和社交分享形成完整的游戏化闭环，限时性设计制造紧迫感，值得运动类App借鉴其社区运营策略
product_insight.en: Strava builds community stickiness through monthly challenges, badge rewards and social sharing form complete gamification loop, time-limited design creates urgency

core_function.cn: 跑者社区讨论装备话题并参与投票互动
core_function.en: Community space for runners to discuss gear and participate in polls

design_highlights.cn: 横向滚动图片画廊展示社区活力，群组封面增强归属感
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling gallery showcases community vitality with group cover enhancing belonging

design_highlights.cn: 投票结果实时可视化，进度条直观展示各选项占比
design_highlights.en: Real-time poll visualization with progress bars showing option percentages intuitively

design_highlights.cn: +941K成员数展示社区规模，营造活跃氛围激励参与
design_highlights.en: +941K members display creates active atmosphere and encourages participation

design_highlights.cn: 悬浮POST按钮降低发帖门槛，促进UGC内容生产
design_highlights.en: Floating POST button lowers barrier for content creation and promotes UGC

product_insight.cn: 通过投票互动降低社区参与门槛，将品牌讨论转化为用户自发内容；Top Posts/Recent双维度排序平衡内容质量与时效性，评论区真实用户分享增强社交证明效果
product_insight.en: Polls lower community participation barriers, converting brand discussions into UGC; dual sorting balances quality and timeliness; real user comments in thread enhance social proof

core_function.cn: 展示用户收藏的社区帖子，便于快速回访
core_function.en: Display user's saved community posts for quick revisit

design_highlights.cn: 红色书签图标醒目标识收藏状态，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Red bookmark icon clearly indicates saved status with clean visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 跑步小人插画配合趣味文案，空状态不再枯燥无聊
design_highlights.en: Running figure illustration with playful copy makes empty state engaging

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Clear all一键清空，批量管理操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Clear all button enables quick batch management of saved posts

product_insight.cn: 收藏功能是提升用户粘性的重要手段，空状态设计呼应运动主题，用运动术语'run to the end'巧妙传达信息，保持品牌调性一致，值得借鉴
product_insight.en: Saved posts feature enhances user retention. Empty state uses running metaphor 'run to the end' maintaining brand consistency with fitness theme, worth learning from

core_function.cn: 提供多种格式分享运动轨迹到社交平台
core_function.en: Share activity routes in multiple formats to social platforms

design_highlights.cn: 3D卫星地图飞越视角，沉浸式展示运动轨迹
design_highlights.en: 3D satellite flyover view creates immersive route visualization

design_highlights.cn: 分段式Tab切换支持Flyover/Map/Photo多种分享格式
design_highlights.en: Segmented tabs enable switching between Flyover/Map/Photo formats

design_highlights.cn: NEW标签突出新功能，引导用户尝试Flyover分享
design_highlights.en: NEW badge highlights feature to drive Flyover adoption

design_highlights.cn: 一键分享到多平台，降低分享门槛提升成就感传播
design_highlights.en: One-tap multi-platform sharing reduces friction and amplifies achievement

product_insight.cn: 通过3D飞越视频将枯燥的GPS轨迹转化为电影级内容，大幅提升用户分享意愿和社交传播效果，是运动社交产品差异化的关键功能。
