product_insight.en: Transforming GPS routes into cinematic 3D flyover videos significantly boosts sharing motivation and social virality, serving as a key differentiator for fitness social products.

core_function.cn: 将运动数据生成分享卡片发布到社交平台
core_function.en: Generate shareable activity cards for social platforms

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景搭配动态跑步图片，运动氛围感强烈
design_highlights.en: Dark background with dynamic running photo creates strong athletic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Flyover/Map/Photo三种分享样式切换，满足不同展示需求
design_highlights.en: Top tabs for Flyover/Map/Photo styles provide flexible sharing options

design_highlights.cn: 底部多平台分享入口一键触达，降低分享门槛促进传播
design_highlights.en: Bottom multi-platform sharing options reduce friction and boost viral spread

design_highlights.cn: 品牌水印+运动数据叠加，满足用户成就展示心理
design_highlights.en: Brand watermark with stats overlay satisfies achievement sharing psychology

product_insight.cn: Strava深谙社交传播对运动App的重要性，通过精美分享卡片设计将用户转化为品牌传播者，同时数据展示满足用户炫耀心理，形成病毒式增长闭环
product_insight.en: Strava leverages social sharing as growth engine, turning users into brand ambassadors through polished share cards while satisfying achievement display psychology

core_function.cn: 将运动活动轨迹分享至社交平台或好友
core_function.en: Share workout activity route to social platforms or friends

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙色运动轨迹线，品牌色突出且视觉对比强烈
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange route line creates strong brand identity and visual contrast

design_highlights.cn: 三段式切换（Flyover/Map/Photo）提供多种分享视图选择
design_highlights.en: Three-tab switcher offers multiple sharing view options for user preference

design_highlights.cn: 底部一键分享至多平台，降低分享门槛促进社交传播
design_highlights.en: One-tap share to multiple platforms reduces friction and promotes social sharing

design_highlights.cn: 地图卡片展示运动数据三要素，满足用户成就展示心理
design_highlights.en: Map card displays key metrics satisfying user's achievement sharing psychology

product_insight.cn: Strava深谙社交传播对运动App的重要性，通过精美的分享卡片设计和多平台快捷入口，将用户运动成就转化为品牌曝光，形成病毒式增长闭环。
product_insight.en: Strava understands social sharing's importance for fitness apps, converting user achievements into brand exposure through polished share cards and multi-platform shortcuts, creating viral growth loops.

core_function.cn: 将运动活动分享至社交平台或保存图片
core_function.en: Share workout activity to social platforms or save as image

design_highlights.cn: 动态运动照片配合Strava品牌水印，增强专业感和辨识度
design_highlights.en: Dynamic workout photo with Strava branding watermark enhances professionalism

design_highlights.cn: Flyover/Map/Photo三种分享视图切换，满足不同展示需求
design_highlights.en: Three view options (Flyover/Map/Photo) cater to different sharing preferences

design_highlights.cn: 系统原生分享面板集成多渠道，降低分享门槛提升传播率
design_highlights.en: Native share sheet with multiple channels reduces friction for viral sharing

product_insight.cn: Strava深谙社交传播对运动App增长的重要性，提供多种可视化分享形式，品牌水印既保护内容又实现低成本获客，是产品驱动增长(PLG)的经典设计。
product_insight.en: Strava leverages social sharing as a growth engine with multiple visualization options. Brand watermark protects content while enabling organic user acquisition - a classic PLG strategy.

core_function.cn: 展示用户收藏的社区帖子内容
core_function.en: Display user's saved community posts

design_highlights.cn: 品牌色插画配合空白背景，营造简洁友好的空状态视觉
design_highlights.en: Brand-colored illustration with clean background creates friendly empty state

design_highlights.cn: 使用跑步人物图标呼应运动主题，保持产品调性一致
design_highlights.en: Running figure icon echoes fitness theme, maintaining brand consistency

design_highlights.cn: 底部导航栏清晰标注当前位置，支持快速切换功能模块
design_highlights.en: Bottom nav clearly indicates current location with quick module switching

product_insight.cn: 空状态设计采用产品核心图标而非通用占位符，强化品牌认知；文案简洁明确告知功能用途，降低用户认知成本，引导后续收藏行为
product_insight.en: Empty state uses product-specific icon instead of generic placeholder, reinforcing brand identity. Clear copy explains feature purpose, reducing cognitive load and encouraging future saves

core_function.cn: 浏览跑步社区帖子，参与用户互动与内容分享
core_function.en: Browse running community posts and engage with user-generated content

design_highlights.cn: 顶部大图展示真实跑步活动场景，营造社区归属感
design_highlights.en: Hero image showcasing real running event creates strong community belonging

design_highlights.cn: 征集用户故事送Premium会员，激励UGC内容生产
design_highlights.en: User testimonial campaign with Premium reward incentivizes UGC creation

design_highlights.cn: 悬浮POST按钮降低发帖门槛，提升社区活跃度
design_highlights.en: Floating POST button reduces friction for content creation

design_highlights.cn: Top Posts/Recent双标签切换，满足不同浏览需求
design_highlights.en: Top/Recent tabs cater to different content discovery preferences

product_insight.cn: 通过官方征集活动引导UGC生产，结合Premium奖励形成正向激励闭环。百万用户规模展示强化社交证明，提升新用户加入意愿和留存率。
product_insight.en: Official campaign drives UGC with Premium rewards creating positive incentive loop. 1M+ user display strengthens social proof, boosting new user acquisition and retention.

core_function.cn: 浏览和分享跑步动态，与跑友互动交流
core_function.en: Browse and share running activities, interact with fellow runners

design_highlights.cn: 横向滚动的Space分类图标设计，品牌色突出主题分类
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling space icons with brand color highlighting themed categories

design_highlights.cn: 悬浮POST按钮便于快速发布内容，降低分享门槛
design_highlights.en: Floating POST button enables quick content sharing with low friction

design_highlights.cn: 真实跑步装备照片营造社区归属感和运动氛围
design_highlights.en: Real running gear photos create community belonging and athletic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式信息流设计清晰区分不同帖子内容
design_highlights.en: Card-based feed design clearly separates different post content

product_insight.cn: 通过多元化Space分类（装备、跑步分享）满足不同讨论需求，结合真实用户内容建立社区信任感。悬浮发布按钮和简洁互动降低UGC门槛，促进社区活跃度。
product_insight.en: Diverse Space categories (Gear, Share your run) meet different discussion needs. Real user content builds community trust. Floating post button and simple interactions lower UGC barriers to boost engagement.

core_function.cn: 跑者分享运动动态并互动交流
core_function.en: Runners share workout posts and interact with community

design_highlights.cn: 横向滚动分类入口配合图标，快速定位不同话题空间
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrollable category icons enable quick access to different topic spaces

design_highlights.cn: 帖子保存成功的底部toast反馈，操作确认清晰及时
design_highlights.en: Bottom toast feedback confirms post saved action clearly and timely

design_highlights.cn: 用户实拍跑鞋照片展示，营造真实运动社区氛围
design_highlights.en: Real user running shoe photos create authentic athletic community vibe

design_highlights.cn: 悬浮POST按钮降低发布门槛，鼓励UGC内容产出
design_highlights.en: Floating POST button lowers barrier to encourage UGC content creation

product_insight.cn: 通过细分话题空间（装备、跑步分享等）满足跑者多元交流需求，结合实拍内容展示增强社区真实感和归属感，悬浮发布按钮持续引导用户参与内容生产
product_insight.en: Segmented topic spaces meet diverse runner needs, real photo content enhances community authenticity, floating post button continuously encourages user content creation

core_function.cn: 展示用户训练成果，促进社区互动与激励
core_function.en: Display user training achievements and foster community engagement

design_highlights.cn: 训练数据叠加在用户自拍上，运动感与真实感并存
design_highlights.en: Training metrics overlaid on user selfie creates authentic athletic vibe

design_highlights.cn: 真实用户分享首次完成训练的喜悦，营造积极社区氛围
design_highlights.en: Real user sharing first run completion creates positive community atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 底部快捷发帖入口降低分享门槛，促进UGC生产
design_highlights.en: Bottom quick-post entry reduces sharing friction and boosts UGC

design_highlights.cn: 展示训练计划进度，激发新用户尝试系统训练的欲望
design_highlights.en: Showing training plan progress motivates new users to try structured plans

product_insight.cn: 通过社区展示真实用户的训练成果，利用社交证明降低新手焦虑，同时CoachHMunoz的引导发帖强化了教练角色，形成官方+用户的内容生态闭环
product_insight.en: Displaying real user achievements leverages social proof to reduce beginner anxiety, while coach-guided posting creates an official + user content ecosystem

core_function.cn: 搜索和发现本地运动俱乐部与社群
core_function.en: Search and discover local sports clubs and communities

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合品牌彩色图标，俱乐部身份识别清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with colorful brand icons for clear club identity

design_highlights.cn: Friends/Clubs分类切换配合Location和Sport Type筛选，精准定位需求
design_highlights.en: Friends/Clubs tabs with Location and Sport Type filters for precise targeting

design_highlights.cn: 展示会员数量形成社交证明，降低加入决策门槛
design_highlights.en: Member counts provide social proof to lower joining barriers

product_insight.cn: 通过显示会员规模（如12,053 cyclists）建立社群可信度，锁标识区分公开/私密俱乐部，品牌俱乐部（Rapha、Arc'teryx）与草根社群并列，满足不同用户社交需求
product_insight.en: Member counts establish community credibility, lock icons distinguish public/private clubs, brand clubs alongside grassroots communities serve diverse social needs

core_function.cn: 展示运动挑战活动，激励用户参与品牌合作赛事
core_function.en: Display fitness challenges and motivate users to join brand partnership events

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配鲜艳橙色CTA按钮，品牌联名banner配合动态emoji装饰增强活力感
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with vibrant orange CTA, brand co-branded banner with animated emoji decorations for energy

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的Join按钮和个性化推荐区域，降低参与门槛并提升转化
design_highlights.en: Prominent Join button and personalized recommendation section reduce friction and boost conversion

design_highlights.cn: 顶部运动类型横向筛选标签，支持快速切换不同运动挑战
design_highlights.en: Horizontal sport type filter tabs at top for quick switching between different challenge categories

design_highlights.cn: 徽章图标和品牌联名营造专属荣誉感，激发用户挑战欲望
design_highlights.en: Badge icons and brand partnerships create exclusivity and stimulate user's desire to compete

product_insight.cn: 通过品牌联名挑战和个性化推荐双重策略，既提升用户活跃度又创造商业变现空间。限时挑战配合徽章奖励形成游戏化闭环，值得运动类App借鉴。
product_insight.en: Dual strategy of brand partnerships and personalized recommendations boosts engagement while creating monetization opportunities. Time-limited challenges with badge rewards form a gamification loop worth emulating.

core_function.cn: 展示各类跑步挑战活动，激励用户参与完成目标
core_function.en: Display running challenges to motivate users to achieve fitness goals

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合霓虹风格徽章图标，营造电竞感和成就感
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with neon-style badges creates gaming atmosphere and achievement feel

design_highlights.cn: 顶部活动类型筛选器支持多运动类型快速切换
design_highlights.en: Activity type filter chips enable quick switching between sports categories

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的橙色Join按钮统一放置，降低参与门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange Join buttons with consistent placement reduce participation friction

design_highlights.cn: 品牌联名挑战（Brooks）增加活动吸引力和专业感
design_highlights.en: Brand collaboration challenges (Brooks) add appeal and professional credibility

product_insight.cn: 通过游戏化徽章系统和品牌联名策略，将单调的运动目标转化为可收集的成就。多难度梯度设计（5K到100K）覆盖不同能力用户，提升整体参与率和用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Gamified badge system and brand partnerships transform mundane fitness goals into collectible achievements. Multiple difficulty tiers (5K to 100K) cater to various skill levels, boosting engagement and retention.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步社群信息，支持加入互动与内容浏览
core_function.en: Display running group info with join and content browsing features

design_highlights.cn: 动态跑步场景大图配合品牌色块头像，视觉冲击力强
design_highlights.en: Dynamic running hero image with branded avatar creates strong visual impact

design_highlights.cn: 横向功能按钮组设计，Join/Overview/Share/Activities/Stats一目了然
design_highlights.en: Horizontal action buttons for Join/Overview/Share/Activities/Stats provide clear navigation

design_highlights.cn: Just for fun轻松文案配合运动场景，传递积极社群氛围
design_highlights.en: Casual 'Just for fun' tagline with athletic imagery conveys positive community vibe

design_highlights.cn: 橙色Join按钮突出显示，成员数量展示形成社交证明
design_highlights.en: Highlighted orange Join button with member count creates social proof for conversion

product_insight.cn: 将品牌跑团与产品推广结合，通过Arc'teryx装备展示和NORVAN鞋款植入，实现社群运营与商业转化的有机融合，值得品牌类App借鉴
product_insight.en: Integrates brand running group with product promotion, showcasing Arc'teryx gear and NORVAN shoes to blend community engagement with commercial conversion

core_function.cn: 展示跑步社群信息、成员列表和管理层级
core_function.en: Display running group info, member list and admin hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，品牌辨识度高且户外运动氛围浓厚
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates strong brand identity and outdoor sports vibe

design_highlights.cn: 成员角色标签化设计（OWNER/ADMIN），层级清晰便于识别
design_highlights.en: Role badges (OWNER/ADMIN) provide clear hierarchy visualization

design_highlights.cn: 产品Slogan'Built for what's to come'传递品牌精神与社群归属感
design_highlights.en: Product slogan conveys brand spirit and community belonging

product_insight.cn: 将品牌官方跑团与产品推广深度绑定，通过1154人的社群规模建立社交证明。成员头像真实展示增强信任感，ADMIN分布各地展示社群活跃度与地域覆盖。
product_insight.en: Integrates brand running club with product promotion. 1,154 members provide social proof. Real member avatars build trust, geographically diverse admins show community reach.

core_function.cn: 展示俱乐部成员运动距离排名，激励用户参与
core_function.en: Display club member rankings by distance to motivate participation

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景突出数据，大字号总里程形成视觉焦点
design_highlights.en: Dark background highlights data, large total kilometers creates visual focus

design_highlights.cn: 头像+表情符号展示个性，增强社交归属感
design_highlights.en: Avatars with emojis show personality, enhancing social belonging

design_highlights.cn: 个人数据与群体排名对比，形成参与动机
design_highlights.en: Personal stats vs group ranking comparison creates participation motivation

design_highlights.cn: 显示用户0km状态，暗示需要开始运动以参与竞争
design_highlights.en: Showing user's 0km status implies need to start exercising to compete

product_insight.cn: 将个人运动融入社群竞争机制，用排行榜激发用户活跃度。顶部展示群体总成就强化集体荣誉感，个人0数据与榜单对比形成落差，驱动用户行动
product_insight.en: Integrates individual exercise into community competition. Group total achievements enhance collective pride, while personal zero stats contrast with rankings creates gap that drives user action

core_function.cn: 展示跑步俱乐部详情并提供多渠道分享功能
core_function.en: Display running club details with multi-channel sharing options

design_highlights.cn: 动态运动员剪影配合蓝天背景，传递活力与运动感
design_highlights.en: Dynamic athlete silhouette against blue sky conveys energy and athleticism

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生分享面板支持多种分享渠道，降低分享门槛
design_highlights.en: Native iOS share sheet supports multiple channels, reducing sharing friction

design_highlights.cn: 显示1,154成员数量形成社交证明，激励用户加入
design_highlights.en: Displaying 1,154 members creates social proof to encourage joining

design_highlights.cn: 品牌联名俱乐部(Arc'teryx)提升社区专业感与归属感
design_highlights.en: Brand partnership club (Arc'teryx) enhances professional feel and belonging

product_insight.cn: 通过品牌联名俱乐部增强用户粘性，原生分享组件降低传播成本，成员数量展示利用社交证明心理促进病毒式增长，值得借鉴的社区运营策略
product_insight.en: Brand partnership clubs enhance retention, native share sheet reduces friction, member count leverages social proof for viral growth - excellent community growth strategy

core_function.cn: 展示俱乐部成员发布的动态和互动内容
core_function.en: Display club member posts and social interactions

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配高对比度文字，营造沉浸式社交氛围
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with high contrast text creates immersive social atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: Kudos点赞机制配合头像堆叠展示，增强社交认同感
design_highlights.en: Kudos mechanism with stacked avatars enhances social validation

design_highlights.cn: Emoji表情与节日问候结合，营造温暖社区氛围
design_highlights.en: Emoji with holiday greetings creates warm community feeling

product_insight.cn: 运动类App通过俱乐部社交功能增强用户粘性，Kudos机制比传统点赞更具运动社区特色，内容不可用状态的优雅处理值得借鉴
product_insight.en: Fitness app enhances retention through club social features. Kudos mechanism is more fitness-community specific than traditional likes. Graceful handling of unavailable content is noteworthy

core_function.cn: 向用户介绍基于位置的社区空间新功能
core_function.en: Introduce location-based community spaces feature to users

design_highlights.cn: 地图配合动态定位点动画，直观展示位置功能特性
design_highlights.en: Map with animated location pin visually demonstrates location feature

design_highlights.cn: 底部醒目CTA按钮引导用户立即探索新功能
design_highlights.en: Prominent CTA button at bottom guides users to explore new feature

design_highlights.cn: 用户里程碑帖子(3年戒酒)展示社区正能量氛围
design_highlights.en: User milestone post (3 years alcohol-free) showcases positive community vibe

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗形式不打断浏览，可自然关闭继续使用
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet overlay allows dismissal without interrupting browsing

product_insight.cn: 将新功能公告融入社区页面底部弹窗，既不强制打断用户又确保曝光。通过地图可视化和数字列表清晰传达功能价值，降低认知成本，提升新功能采用率。
product_insight.en: Feature announcement as bottom sheet overlay ensures visibility without interrupting users. Map visualization and numbered list clearly communicate value, reducing cognitive load and boosting feature adoption.

core_function.cn: 浏览和加入跑步社区、赛事及本地跑团
core_function.en: Browse and join running communities, races, and local groups

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸真实跑步场景图片营造沉浸感和社群归属感
design_highlights.en: Large authentic running photos create immersion and community belonging

design_highlights.cn: 横向滑动卡片设计便于快速浏览多个选项
design_highlights.en: Horizontal scrolling cards enable quick browsing of multiple options

design_highlights.cn: 显示参与人数(+1M、+22K)利用社交证明促进加入
design_highlights.en: Member counts (+1M, +22K) leverage social proof to drive joining

design_highlights.cn: 私密空间入口降低用户心理门槛，提供专属感
design_highlights.en: Private space entry reduces barriers and provides exclusivity

product_insight.cn: 通过General/Races/Location三层分类满足不同社交需求，大数字社交证明配合真实赛事照片建立信任，私密空间功能支持品牌/教练创建专属社群实现商业化
product_insight.en: Three-tier categorization (General/Races/Location) meets diverse social needs. Large member counts with real race photos build trust. Private spaces enable brand/coach monetization

core_function.cn: 通过emoji选择记录当前情绪状态
core_function.en: Record current emotional state through emoji selection

design_highlights.cn: 渐变暗色背景搭配emoji图标，营造温暖舒适的情绪表达氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient dark background with emoji icons creates warm and comfortable mood expression atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 个性化问候语"Good afternoon, Julia"增强用户亲密感和关怀感
design_highlights.en: Personalized greeting enhances user intimacy and sense of care

design_highlights.cn: 12种情绪选项采用3x4网格布局，覆盖正负面情绪，便于快速选择
design_highlights.en: 12 emotion options in 3x4 grid covering positive and negative emotions for quick selection

design_highlights.cn: 半透明卡片设计配合圆角，视觉层次分明且现代感十足
design_highlights.en: Semi-transparent card design with rounded corners creates clear visual hierarchy and modern feel

product_insight.cn: 情绪追踪入口设计降低用户记录门槛，通过emoji视觉化降低情绪表达难度，时段问候语增强日常打卡仪式感，是心理健康类产品提升用户粘性的典型设计
product_insight.en: Mood tracking entry design lowers recording barrier, emoji visualization reduces difficulty of emotional expression, time-based greeting enhances daily check-in ritual, typical design for mental health apps to improve user retention

core_function.cn: 展示单餐营养信息并支持快速记录
core_function.en: Display meal nutrition info and enable quick logging

design_highlights.cn: 顶部大图沉浸式设计，食物摄影唤起食欲感
design_highlights.en: Immersive hero image with appetizing food photography

design_highlights.cn: 环形图直观展示卡路里与三大营养素占比配色区分
design_highlights.en: Circular chart with color-coded macronutrient breakdown

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计支持编辑和一键记录，降低操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Dual CTA buttons for edit and quick log reduce friction

design_highlights.cn: 五星评分和服务人数增强用户信任感与参考价值
design_highlights.en: Star rating and serving info build trust and reference value

product_insight.cn: 将食谱与饮食追踪深度整合，通过预设营养数据降低用户记录成本；社交评分元素增加可信度，Edit按钮保留个性化调整空间，平衡便捷性与准确性
product_insight.en: Deep integration of recipes with diet tracking reduces logging effort via preset nutrition data; social ratings add credibility while Edit button preserves customization flexibility

core_function.cn: 录入跑鞋信息并设置里程目标追踪鞋子损耗
core_function.en: Input shoe details and set distance goal to track shoe wear

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式表单布局清晰分组，灰白配色简洁专业
design_highlights.en: Card-based form layout with clear grouping and clean gray-white color scheme

design_highlights.cn: 滑块式里程目标选择，直观可视化进度条反馈
design_highlights.en: Slider-based distance goal selection with intuitive visual progress bar feedback

design_highlights.cn: 底部健康提示文案传递专业关怀，建议500-800km更换
design_highlights.en: Health tip at bottom shows professional care, recommending 500-800km replacement

design_highlights.cn: 预设700km合理默认值降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Pre-set 700km default value reduces user decision-making effort

product_insight.cn: 通过装备追踪延伸跑步场景，绑定用户资产增加留存；健康提示既体现专业度又创造复购提醒场景，是运动App差异化竞争的巧妙切入点
product_insight.en: Extends running scenarios through gear tracking, binding user assets to increase retention; health tips show professionalism while creating repurchase reminders - a clever differentiation point for fitness apps

core_function.cn: 实时GPS追踪并记录用户运动路径
core_function.en: Real-time GPS tracking and recording user activity routes

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图主题搭配亮色路径线，视觉层次分明，夜间使用护眼
design_highlights.en: Dark map theme with bright route line creates clear visual hierarchy, eye-friendly for night use

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的橙色暂停按钮置于底部中心，单手操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange pause button at bottom center enables easy one-handed operation

design_highlights.cn: 3D建筑物渲染增强空间感，提升地图沉浸体验
design_highlights.en: 3D building rendering enhances spatial awareness and map immersion

design_highlights.cn: 右侧浮动工具栏提供图层、3D、定位快捷操作
design_highlights.en: Floating toolbar on right provides quick access to layers, 3D view, and location

product_insight.cn: 采用Mapbox地图引擎，深色模式减少运动时视觉干扰。极简界面只保留核心操作，暂停按钮设计突出，符合运动场景下用户快速操作需求。稍后保存功能降低操作门槛。
product_insight.en: Uses Mapbox engine with dark mode to reduce visual distraction during exercise. Minimal interface with prominent pause button suits quick interactions in active scenarios. 'Later' save option lowers friction.

core_function.cn: 滚轮选择器输入运动活动的时长
core_function.en: Wheel picker to input exercise duration for activity logging

design_highlights.cn: 深色毛玻璃弹窗设计，选中行高亮突出，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark frosted glass modal with highlighted selection row, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 三列滚轮联动选择时分秒，操作直观高效
design_highlights.en: Three-column scroll wheel for hours, minutes, seconds with intuitive operation

design_highlights.cn: 橙色确认按钮与深色背景形成对比，引导完成操作
design_highlights.en: Orange OK button contrasts with dark background, guiding action completion

product_insight.cn: 手动记录运动场景中，滚轮选择器比数字键盘更符合时间输入心智模型，减少输入错误。弹窗设计保持上下文可见，用户不会迷失当前操作位置。
product_insight.en: Wheel picker matches mental model for time input better than numeric keypad, reducing errors. Modal overlay keeps context visible so users maintain orientation.

core_function.cn: 选择食物并记录到饮食日记中
core_function.en: Select food items and log them to diet diary

design_highlights.cn: 食物卡片配高清图片，信息层级清晰，卡路里标注醒目
design_highlights.en: Food cards with HD images, clear info hierarchy, prominent calorie labels

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计便于单手操作，增减按钮支持精确份量调整
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design for one-hand use, +/- buttons for precise portion control

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色主CTA按钮突出，减少记录步骤提升完成率
design_highlights.en: Prominent blue CTA button, streamlined steps boost completion rate

design_highlights.cn: 与食谱页面联动，从烹饪到记录形成闭环体验
design_highlights.en: Links with recipe page, creating closed-loop from cooking to logging

product_insight.cn: 将食谱与饮食记录深度整合，用户做完菜后可一键记录，降低手动输入门槛。支持配料单独记录，满足精确追踪需求，提升数据准确性和用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Deep integration of recipes with diet logging enables one-tap logging after cooking. Supporting individual ingredient logging meets precise tracking needs, improving data accuracy and user retention.

core_function.cn: 录入跑鞋信息并设置里程目标追踪磨损
core_function.en: Record shoe details and set mileage goal to track wear

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式表单设计，字段分组清晰，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Card-based form design with clear field grouping and visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 滑块交互设置目标里程，实时显示数值，操作直观
design_highlights.en: Slider interaction for goal setting with real-time value display

design_highlights.cn: 底部健康提示文案，科学建议500-800km更换跑鞋，体现专业关怀
design_highlights.en: Health tip at bottom recommending 500-800km shoe retirement shows professional care

design_highlights.cn: 进度条可视化当前与目标里程，绿色激励持续使用
design_highlights.en: Progress bar visualizes current vs goal mileage with motivating green color

product_insight.cn: 通过装备管理功能增强用户粘性，里程追踪结合科学建议帮助用户合理更换跑鞋，既体现专业性又创造潜在消费场景，是运动App的高级功能差异化设计
product_insight.en: Equipment tracking enhances user retention; mileage goals with scientific advice shows professionalism while creating potential purchase scenarios, a differentiating feature for fitness apps

core_function.cn: 实时记录骑行轨迹、时间和距离数据
core_function.en: Real-time tracking of cycling route, time and distance data

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配蓝色轨迹线，视觉对比鲜明易于追踪
design_highlights.en: Dark map with blue route line creates high contrast for easy tracking

design_highlights.cn: 橙色STOPPED状态栏醒目提示暂停状态，底部Resume/Finish双按钮操作清晰
design_highlights.en: Orange STOPPED banner clearly indicates pause state, dual Resume/Finish buttons for clear actions

design_highlights.cn: 大字号时间显示配合简洁数据布局，骑行中快速读取核心指标
design_highlights.en: Large time display with clean data layout enables quick reading of key metrics while riding

design_highlights.cn: 底部图标栏支持多种骑行模式切换，满足不同场景需求
design_highlights.en: Bottom icon bar supports multiple riding modes for different cycling scenarios

product_insight.cn: 采用高对比度深色主题减少户外阳光干扰，核心数据层级分明，暂停状态通过颜色强化感知，支持多种骑行类型体现专业度，设计充分考虑户外骑行使用场景
product_insight.en: High-contrast dark theme reduces outdoor glare interference, clear data hierarchy with color-enhanced pause state perception, multiple bike types show professionalism for outdoor cycling scenarios

core_function.cn: 通过滚轮选择器输入运动距离数据
core_function.en: Input exercise distance via scroll wheel picker

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器，支持整数与小数独立滚动，操作直观高效
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker with separate integer and decimal scrolling for intuitive input

design_highlights.cn: 深色模态弹窗与毛玻璃背景，聚焦用户注意力，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark modal with frosted glass background creates focus and visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 支持公里/英里单位快速切换，适应不同地区用户习惯
design_highlights.en: Quick km/mi unit toggle accommodates users from different regions

design_highlights.cn: 橙色确认按钮与品牌色一致，强化操作引导
design_highlights.en: Orange confirm button matches brand color, reinforcing action guidance

product_insight.cn: 采用底部弹窗而非全屏页面，保持用户上下文感知，减少操作中断。滚轮设计比数字键盘更适合范围固定的数值输入，降低输入错误率。
product_insight.en: Bottom sheet maintains user context without full page transition. Wheel picker is more suitable than numeric keyboard for bounded values, reducing input errors.

core_function.cn: 为当前情绪添加场景标签和备注，完成情绪记录
core_function.en: Add context tags and notes to current mood entry

design_highlights.cn: 正向引导文案「Take a moment to appreciate」营造积极情绪氛围
design_highlights.en: Positive copy 'Take a moment to appreciate' creates uplifting emotional atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 标签采用胶囊式设计，Family选中态明显区分，层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Pill-shaped tags with clear selected state for Family, clean visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 多标签可选设计降低用户输入成本，提升记录完成率
design_highlights.en: Multi-select tags reduce input effort and improve logging completion rate

design_highlights.cn: 深蓝渐变背景配合毛玻璃卡片，营造沉浸冥想感
design_highlights.en: Deep blue gradient with frosted glass cards creates immersive mindful feel

product_insight.cn: 情绪追踪应用通过预设标签大幅降低记录门槛，结合正念文案引导用户反思积极情绪，备注区可选填设计平衡了数据丰富度与操作便捷性，有效提升日活和留存。
product_insight.en: Preset tags significantly lower logging barriers. Mindfulness copy guides reflection on positive emotions. Optional notes balance data richness with convenience, boosting DAU and retention.

core_function.cn: 记录每日身体状况、情绪和生理周期相关数据
core_function.en: Log daily physical symptoms, mood and menstrual cycle data

design_highlights.cn: 使用表情符号和可爱图标直观表达情绪和症状，降低记录门槛
design_highlights.en: Emoji-style icons for symptoms and moods reduce logging friction

design_highlights.cn: 权限请求弹窗说明数据用途，提升用户授权意愿
design_highlights.en: Permission dialog clearly explains data usage to increase consent rate

design_highlights.cn: 分类设计贴合女性生理周期需求，涵盖经期、排卵、性行为等敏感话题
design_highlights.en: Categories thoughtfully address intimate health topics with sensitivity

design_highlights.cn: 药丸式标签设计搭配浅色背景，视觉层次清晰易点击
design_highlights.en: Pill-shaped tags with soft colors create clear visual hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 通过情感化图标设计降低敏感话题的记录心理压力，权限请求时机恰当且说明价值回报，分类全面覆盖女性健康各维度，体现产品对用户隐私和体验的双重关注。
product_insight.en: Emotionally designed icons reduce stigma around sensitive topics. Well-timed permission request with clear value proposition. Comprehensive categories show deep understanding of women's health needs.

core_function.cn: 记录经期症状、月经量及排卵测试等健康数据
core_function.en: Log menstrual symptoms, flow intensity and ovulation tests

design_highlights.cn: 可爱拟人化emoji图标降低敏感话题的尴尬感，粉色主色调贴合女性健康主题
design_highlights.en: Cute emoji icons reduce awkwardness of sensitive topics, pink theme matches feminine health

design_highlights.cn: 药片式标签选择器支持快速单选，操作简便高效
design_highlights.en: Pill-style selectors enable quick single-tap selection with minimal friction

design_highlights.cn: 问候式文案'What are you feeling today'营造关怀氛围
design_highlights.en: Greeting copy 'What are you feeling today' creates caring atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 底部固定Apply按钮确保用户完成记录提交，减少流失
design_highlights.en: Fixed Apply button at bottom ensures users complete logging submission

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的健康追踪简化为快速选择式交互，降低记录门槛。分类清晰、视觉友好的设计有效提升用户日常打卡习惯，值得健康类App借鉴这种轻量化输入模式。
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex health tracking into quick-select interactions, lowering entry barriers. Clear categorization and friendly visuals effectively build daily logging habits—a lightweight input pattern worth adopting.

core_function.cn: 可视化展示和选择经期日期记录
core_function.en: Visualize and select period dates for tracking

design_highlights.cn: 粉色圆形标记清晰区分经期日与普通日，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Pink circular markers clearly distinguish period days with strong visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 支持多日期连续选择，虚线圆圈表示正在选择状态
design_highlights.en: Multi-date selection with dashed circle indicating current selection state

design_highlights.cn: TODAY标签突出当前日期，帮助用户快速定位时间
design_highlights.en: TODAY label highlights current date for quick temporal orientation

design_highlights.cn: 柔和粉色配色契合女性健康主题，营造舒适感
design_highlights.en: Soft pink color scheme aligns with feminine health theme, creating comfort

product_insight.cn: 采用连续月份滚动视图设计，避免翻页操作，让用户直观查看跨月经期规律。勾选式交互降低输入门槛，虚线状态反馈增强操作确定性，适合高频记录场景。
product_insight.en: Continuous month scroll view eliminates pagination, showing cross-month patterns intuitively. Check-style interaction lowers input barrier while dashed feedback enhances operation certainty for frequent tracking.

core_function.cn: 搜索并添加食物到指定餐次进行热量追踪
core_function.en: Search and add food items to specific meals for calorie tracking

design_highlights.cn: 下拉菜单快速切换餐次类型，支持早中晚餐及零食分类
design_highlights.en: Dropdown menu for quick meal type switching between breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks

design_highlights.cn: 多入口设计：条形码扫描、语音记录、拍照识别、快速添加四种方式
design_highlights.en: Multiple input methods: barcode scan, voice log, meal scan, and quick add options

design_highlights.cn: 历史记录智能排序，显示热量和分量，一键快速添加
design_highlights.en: Smart history sorting with calories and portions displayed, one-tap quick add

design_highlights.cn: 绿色勾选标识已验证食物，增强数据可信度
design_highlights.en: Green checkmarks indicate verified foods, enhancing data credibility

product_insight.cn: 通过多种录入方式降低记录门槛，历史记录复用提升效率，餐次分类帮助用户养成规律饮食习惯，设计充分考虑了高频场景的便捷性。
product_insight.en: Multiple input methods lower recording barriers, history reuse improves efficiency, meal categorization helps build regular eating habits, design fully considers convenience for high-frequency scenarios.

core_function.cn: 显示已暂停的运动轨迹和数据，提供路线操作选项
core_function.en: Display paused activity track and stats with route action options

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色状态栏，清晰标识暂停状态，数据大字体易读
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange status bar clearly indicates stopped state, large readable data

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗提供路线加载和返回起点导航，简化复杂操作流程
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet offers route loading and navigate back options, simplifying complex actions

design_highlights.cn: 3D地图视图展示蓝色运动轨迹，地形渲染增强空间感
design_highlights.en: 3D map view displays blue activity track with terrain rendering for spatial awareness

design_highlights.cn: 实时数据展示时间、速度、距离三项核心指标，满足运动者即时反馈需求
design_highlights.en: Real-time display of time, speed, distance metrics satisfies athletes' instant feedback needs

product_insight.cn: 暂停状态下即时提供路线操作选项体现场景化设计思维，返回起点导航功能解决户外运动者迷路痛点，底部弹窗设计降低操作门槛同时保持主界面数据可见性
product_insight.en: Contextual route options during pause state shows scenario-based design thinking. Navigate back feature solves outdoor athletes' navigation pain point while bottom sheet maintains data visibility

core_function.cn: 记录运动活动详情并设置感知强度等级
core_function.en: Log workout activity details with perceived exertion level

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式强度选择器，滑块交互直观便捷，支持连续调节
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet exertion picker with intuitive slider for continuous adjustment

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色渐变滑轨，视觉层次分明且聚焦关键操作
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange gradient slider track, clear visual hierarchy focusing on key action

design_highlights.cn: 私密笔记区域提示语温和，营造个人专属记录空间感
design_highlights.en: Gentle placeholder for private notes creates personal recording space

product_insight.cn: 将主观感受（RPE）融入运动记录是专业健身App的标配，滑块设计降低输入门槛，Easy/Moderate/Max三档文字标注帮助用户快速定位，提升数据录入效率和准确性
product_insight.en: Integrating RPE into workout logging is essential for fitness apps. Slider with text anchors reduces input friction and improves data accuracy for training analysis

core_function.cn: 记录每日健康数据如体重、基础体温和笔记
core_function.en: Log daily health metrics including weight, basal temperature and notes

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局清晰分隔不同记录模块，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Card-based layout clearly separates different tracking modules with visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 每个卡片独立可编辑删除，支持快捷操作图标
design_highlights.en: Each card has independent edit and delete icons for quick actions

design_highlights.cn: 粉色主题配合周期追踪场景，品牌色一致性强
design_highlights.en: Pink theme aligns with cycle tracking context, maintaining brand consistency

design_highlights.cn: 引导性文案如'Log your temperature'降低输入门槛
design_highlights.en: Guiding copy like 'Log your temperature' reduces input friction

product_insight.cn: 将多维度健康数据整合在单一日视图中，通过模块化卡片设计平衡信息密度与操作便捷性。顶部显示周期天数强化用户对时间节点的感知，'View chart'入口促进数据回顾行为。
product_insight.en: Integrates multi-dimensional health data in single daily view. Modular card design balances information density with ease of use. Cycle day display reinforces time awareness, 'View chart' entries encourage data review.

core_function.cn: 记录经期症状、月经流量及性生活等健康数据
core_function.en: Log menstrual symptoms, flow levels and sexual activity data

design_highlights.cn: 可爱emoji风格图标配合柔和粉色调，降低敏感话题的尴尬感
design_highlights.en: Cute emoji-style icons with soft pink tones reduce awkwardness of sensitive topics

design_highlights.cn: 胶囊标签式多选设计，支持快速点选，已选状态清晰可辨
design_highlights.en: Pill-shaped tag multi-select design enables quick tapping with clear selected states

design_highlights.cn: 「What are you feeling today?」温暖问候语营造关怀氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm greeting 'What are you feeling today?' creates caring atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 分类卡片垂直布局，逻辑清晰，支持编辑自定义类别
design_highlights.en: Categorized vertical card layout with clear logic and customizable categories

product_insight.cn: 通过情感化设计和低门槛交互降低女性健康话题的记录阻力，胶囊标签预设选项提高输入效率，分类可编辑设计满足个性化需求，值得健康类App借鉴
product_insight.en: Emotional design and low-friction interaction reduce barriers for logging sensitive health data. Pre-set pill tags improve input efficiency while editable categories enable personalization

core_function.cn: 快速记录当日是否有无保护性行为
core_function.en: Quick log whether unprotected sex occurred today

design_highlights.cn: 问号图案背景营造私密安全氛围，弱化敏感话题压力
design_highlights.en: Question mark pattern background creates safe atmosphere, reducing sensitive topic pressure

design_highlights.cn: 极简二元选择设计，Yes/No按钮降低用户决策负担
design_highlights.en: Minimalist binary choice with Yes/No buttons reduces decision burden

design_highlights.cn: 直接坦诚的提问方式，去污名化处理敏感健康话题
design_highlights.en: Direct honest questioning destigmatizes sensitive health topics

design_highlights.cn: 颜色区分Yes绿色和No红色，符合用户心理预期
design_highlights.en: Color-coded Yes green and No red matches user psychological expectations

product_insight.cn: 健康追踪类产品处理敏感信息时，采用轻量化设计和去污名化文案，降低用户心理门槛。问号背景暗示'这只是一个普通问题'，有效提升数据采集完成率。
product_insight.en: Health tracking apps handle sensitive data with lightweight design and destigmatizing copy to lower psychological barriers. Question mark background implies 'just a normal question', improving data collection completion rates.

core_function.cn: 记录每日身体状况、月经流量和性生活数据
core_function.en: Track daily symptoms, menstrual flow and sexual activity

design_highlights.cn: 使用可爱表情图标表达身体状态，降低敏感话题的尴尬感
design_highlights.en: Cute emoji icons for body states reduce awkwardness of sensitive topics

design_highlights.cn: 药丸式标签选择，支持多选且状态清晰可见
design_highlights.en: Pill-shaped tags with clear multi-select states for easy interaction

design_highlights.cn: 粉色系配色营造女性友好氛围，话题分类贴心细致
design_highlights.en: Pink color scheme creates feminine-friendly atmosphere with thoughtful categorization

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式分区设计，信息层级清晰易于快速定位
design_highlights.en: Card-based sections with clear hierarchy for quick navigation

product_insight.cn: 经期追踪App需平衡隐私敏感性与数据完整性，通过可爱视觉和温和措辞降低用户记录心理门槛，分类设计覆盖全周期需求，教程入口引导新用户理解排卵检测价值
product_insight.en: Period tracking apps balance privacy sensitivity with data completeness. Cute visuals and gentle wording lower psychological barriers. Category design covers full-cycle needs with tutorial entry for ovulation education.

core_function.cn: 引导用户记录每日感恩事项，培养积极心态
core_function.en: Guide users to record daily gratitude items for positive mindset

design_highlights.cn: 渐变紫色背景营造温暖治愈的氛围，符合冥想/心理健康类产品调性
design_highlights.en: Gradient purple background creates warm healing atmosphere for wellness apps

design_highlights.cn: 编号列表式输入降低用户思考负担，明确引导填写3项内容
design_highlights.en: Numbered list input reduces cognitive load with clear guidance for 3 items

design_highlights.cn: 开放式提问"What are you grateful for today?"触发积极情绪反思
design_highlights.en: Open question triggers positive emotional reflection and gratitude practice

design_highlights.cn: Change Prompt功能提供多样化引导语，避免用户疲劳
design_highlights.en: Change Prompt feature provides varied prompts to prevent user fatigue

product_insight.cn: 通过结构化的3项感恩记录降低输入门槛，Change Prompt功能增加内容新鲜感，提升长期留存。简洁的表单设计让用户专注于内容本身，是心理健康类App的优秀实践。
product_insight.en: Structured 3-item gratitude format lowers entry barrier. Change Prompt adds freshness for retention. Minimal form design keeps users focused on content - excellent practice for mental wellness apps.

core_function.cn: 记录每日冥想反思和情绪变化
core_function.en: Track daily meditation reflections and emotional changes

design_highlights.cn: 渐变蓝绿背景营造宁静冥想氛围，与品牌调性高度一致
design_highlights.en: Gradient blue-green background creates calm meditation atmosphere, highly consistent with brand

design_highlights.cn: 周视图日历设计便于快速定位和回顾历史记录
design_highlights.en: Weekly calendar view enables quick navigation and historical review

design_highlights.cn: 开放性引导问题激发用户深度自我反思
design_highlights.en: Open-ended prompts encourage deep self-reflection

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式条目设计层次分明，时间戳增强记录真实感
design_highlights.en: Card-based entries with timestamps enhance authenticity and hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 通过结构化的每日反思问题，帮助用户建立冥想习惯并追踪情绪变化。日历视图设计强化了连续性和打卡感，提升用户长期留存。
product_insight.en: Structured daily reflection questions help users build meditation habits and track emotional changes. Calendar view reinforces continuity and streak motivation, improving long-term retention.

core_function.cn: 选择室外跑步或跑步机开始训练
core_function.en: Select outdoor or treadmill run to start workout

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计，背景模糊保持上下文关联感
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with blur effect maintains context awareness

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的运动类型图标配合文字，降低选择认知负担
design_highlights.en: Clear icons with text labels reduce cognitive load for selection

design_highlights.cn: 显示具体训练计划信息增强执行动力
design_highlights.en: Showing specific workout plan details enhances motivation

product_insight.cn: 将训练计划与运动类型选择整合，用户在开始前能清晰看到今日任务详情，减少决策步骤同时强化计划执行感，提升训练完成率。
product_insight.en: Integrating workout plan with type selection shows today's task clearly, reducing decision steps while reinforcing plan execution, improving completion rate.

core_function.cn: GPS定位追踪，准备开始记录骑行或跑步活动
core_function.en: GPS tracking ready to record cycling or running activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图配色减少视觉干扰，蓝色定位点醒目突出
design_highlights.en: Dark map theme reduces visual distraction with prominent blue location marker

design_highlights.cn: 底部活动类型图标切换，支持多种运动模式快速选择
design_highlights.en: Bottom activity icons enable quick switching between multiple sport modes

design_highlights.cn: 绿色GPS信号状态栏增强用户信心，橙色START按钮形成强烈行动召唤
design_highlights.en: Green GPS status bar builds confidence, orange START button creates strong CTA

design_highlights.cn: 信号获取成功提示给予即时正向反馈，降低等待焦虑
design_highlights.en: GPS acquired notification provides positive feedback, reducing waiting anxiety

product_insight.cn: 将GPS状态前置显示解决了运动类App的核心痛点，用户无需猜测定位是否准确。多运动模式切换设计提升了产品延展性，深色地图在户外使用时更省电护眼。
product_insight.en: Prominently displaying GPS status addresses core pain point in fitness apps. Multi-sport mode switching enhances product extensibility, while dark map saves battery and reduces eye strain outdoors.

core_function.cn: 记录每日感恩事项并追踪签到习惯
core_function.en: Record daily gratitude items and track check-in habits

design_highlights.cn: 温暖渐变背景配合毛玻璃卡片，营造温馨治愈氛围
design_highlights.en: Warm gradient background with frosted glass card creates cozy healing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 完成首次签到的成就提示增强用户正向反馈
design_highlights.en: First check-in completion message provides positive reinforcement

design_highlights.cn: 周视图日历清晰展示连续签到状态，激励持续打卡
design_highlights.en: Week view calendar clearly shows streak status to motivate continued engagement

design_highlights.cn: 分享按钮鼓励用户传播，带品牌水印提升曝光
design_highlights.en: Share button encourages spreading with branded watermark for exposure

product_insight.cn: 通过卡片化设计将感恩记录可视化，结合日历追踪形成习惯闭环。分享功能既满足用户表达需求，又实现品牌传播，是正念类产品的典型增长设计。
product_insight.en: Card-based gratitude visualization combined with calendar tracking creates habit loop. Share feature serves both user expression and brand growth - classic mindfulness app growth design.

core_function.cn: 显示跑步计划详情并准备开始追踪运动数据
core_function.en: Display run plan details and prepare to track workout data

design_highlights.cn: 绿色主题配色传达健康活力感，地图实时显示用户位置
design_highlights.en: Green theme conveys health and vitality, map shows real-time user location

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸醒目的Start按钮便于运动中快速操作
design_highlights.en: Large prominent Start button enables quick operation during exercise

design_highlights.cn: Easy Run标签降低心理门槛，鼓励用户轻松开始
design_highlights.en: Easy Run label lowers psychological barrier, encouraging users to start

product_insight.cn: 将训练计划与GPS追踪无缝整合，用户无需手动设置即可按计划开始运动。地图定位增强真实感和信任度，GPS信号指示确保数据准确性。
product_insight.en: Seamlessly integrates training plan with GPS tracking. Users can start workouts without manual setup. Map location enhances credibility, GPS signal indicator ensures data accuracy.

core_function.cn: 实时记录运动时间、速度和距离数据
core_function.en: Real-time tracking of time, speed and distance during activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配超大白色数字，极简高对比度设计便于运动中快速读取
design_highlights.en: Dark background with oversized white numbers, minimalist high-contrast design for quick reading during activity

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的橙色暂停按钮置于底部，单手操作友好
design_highlights.en: Prominent orange pause button at bottom, thumb-friendly for one-handed operation

design_highlights.cn: 垂直信息层级清晰，时间-速度-距离按重要性排列
design_highlights.en: Clear vertical hierarchy with time-speed-distance arranged by importance

design_highlights.cn: 位置图标提供快速定位入口，便于查看运动轨迹
design_highlights.en: Location icon provides quick access to view activity route

product_insight.cn: 运动场景下用户需要快速获取关键数据，超大字体和极简布局确保一眼可读。深色模式既省电又减少夜跑时的光污染，体现对运动场景的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Users need quick data access during exercise. Oversized fonts and minimal layout ensure instant readability. Dark mode saves battery and reduces light pollution for night runs, showing deep understanding of athletic scenarios.

core_function.cn: 保存活动时选择具体运动类型
core_function.en: Select specific sport type when saving activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动类型图标设计统一精致
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent, unified and refined sport icons

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模式便于单手操作，常用运动置顶快速访问
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet for one-hand use, top sports pinned for quick access

design_highlights.cn: 分类清晰有序，Foot Sports和Cycle Sports逻辑分组
design_highlights.en: Clear categorization with logical grouping by foot and cycle sports

design_highlights.cn: 个性化Top Sports区域体现用户习惯学习
design_highlights.en: Personalized Top Sports section reflects learned user habits

product_insight.cn: 将用户高频使用的运动类型置顶展示，减少选择成本；分类设计兼顾覆盖面和易用性，图标+文字组合提升识别效率，体现对运动场景的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Pinning frequently used sports reduces selection friction. Category design balances coverage and usability. Icon-text combo improves recognition, showing deep understanding of sports scenarios.

core_function.cn: 多方式快速搜索和添加食物记录
core_function.en: Quick food search and logging with multiple input methods

design_highlights.cn: 四种输入方式（条码扫描、语音、AI识别、快速添加）满足不同场景需求
design_highlights.en: Four input methods (barcode, voice, AI scan, quick add) for different scenarios

design_highlights.cn: 历史记录展示卡路里和份量信息，绿色勾选标识已验证食物
design_highlights.en: History shows calories and portions with green checkmarks for verified foods

design_highlights.cn: 一键加号按钮降低添加门槛，提升记录效率和完成率
design_highlights.en: One-tap plus button reduces friction and improves logging completion rate

design_highlights.cn: Tab分类（全部/我的餐食/食谱/食物）便于个性化快速访问
design_highlights.en: Tab categories enable quick personalized access to saved items

product_insight.cn: 通过多模态输入和历史记录复用大幅降低食物记录门槛，绿色验证标识建立数据可信度，Tab分类支持个性化常用项快速访问，提升用户记录坚持率
product_insight.en: Multi-modal input and history reuse significantly reduce logging friction. Verified badges build data trust while tabs enable quick access to personalized items, improving adherence

core_function.cn: 搜索并记录用户的饮食摄入信息
core_function.en: Search and log food intake for meal tracking

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的Tab分类导航，区分全部、我的餐食、食谱和自定义食物
design_highlights.en: Clear tab navigation separating All, My Meals, Recipes and My Foods

design_highlights.cn: 多种输入方式并行：条形码扫描、语音记录、拍照识别、快速添加
design_highlights.en: Multiple input methods: barcode scan, voice log, meal scan, quick add

design_highlights.cn: 验证标识（绿色勾选）增强数据可信度，一键添加按钮简化操作
design_highlights.en: Verification badges enhance data credibility, one-tap add buttons simplify logging

design_highlights.cn: 友好的错误提示弹窗，清晰说明搜索字符最低要求
design_highlights.en: Friendly error dialog clearly explains minimum search character requirement

product_insight.cn: 通过历史记录和智能建议降低用户输入成本，多模态输入方式（扫码、语音、拍照）覆盖不同使用场景，验证标识建立数据库权威性，提升用户对营养数据的信任度
product_insight.en: History and suggestions reduce input friction, multi-modal inputs cover various scenarios, verification badges establish database authority and build user trust in nutritional data

core_function.cn: 实时显示跑步时间、距离和配速数据
core_function.en: Display real-time running time, distance and pace metrics

design_highlights.cn: 超大数字排版突出核心数据，层次分明易于快速读取
design_highlights.en: Large typography highlights key metrics with clear hierarchy for quick glance

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计支持暂停和分圈操作，运动中单手易操作
design_highlights.en: Dual button design enables pause and lap actions, easy one-hand operation during workout

design_highlights.cn: 绿色进度条直观显示当前训练计划完成状态
design_highlights.en: Green progress bar intuitively shows current training plan completion status

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的训练目标标题(4km Easy Run)给予明确目标感
design_highlights.en: Clear workout goal title provides clear sense of purpose and motivation

product_insight.cn: 极简设计专为运动场景优化，大字体确保户外强光下可读性，减少认知负担让用户专注运动。双CTA设计兼顾暂停和分段需求，体现对跑步用户核心场景的深度理解。
product_insight.en: Minimalist design optimized for workout scenarios. Large fonts ensure readability in bright outdoor conditions. Dual CTAs address both pause and lap needs, showing deep understanding of runners' core use cases.

core_function.cn: 选择运动活动的开始日期和时间
core_function.en: Select start date and time for workout activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合滚轮选择器，橙色高亮当前选中项，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with wheel picker, orange highlight for selected item, clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器支持连续滚动，日期时间联动选择体验流畅
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker with continuous scrolling, smooth date-time linked selection

design_highlights.cn: 提供Today快捷选项减少操作步骤，体现对用户时间的尊重
design_highlights.en: Today shortcut option reduces steps, showing respect for user's time

product_insight.cn: 运动记录场景采用模态弹窗聚焦时间选择，避免页面跳转打断用户心流；预设Morning Run标题降低输入门槛，提升活动记录完成率。
product_insight.en: Modal popup focuses on time selection without page navigation, preset Morning Run title lowers input barrier and improves activity logging completion rate.

core_function.cn: 记录跑步活动时选择跑步类型和详细属性
core_function.en: Select run type and attributes when logging running activity

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合圆形单选按钮，视觉层次分明，减少视觉疲劳
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with circular radio buttons creates clear visual hierarchy and reduces eye strain

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗选择器模式，保持上下文可见，操作便捷高效
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet selector pattern keeps context visible while enabling quick selection

design_highlights.cn: 私人笔记区域强调隐私性，增强用户信任感和记录意愿
design_highlights.en: Private notes section emphasizes privacy, building trust and encouraging detailed logging

design_highlights.cn: 装备关联功能（Anta PG7）体现数据追踪的专业性和完整性
design_highlights.en: Gear association feature (Anta PG7) demonstrates professional and comprehensive tracking

product_insight.cn: 通过多维度数据收集（类型/感受/装备/通勤标记）构建完整的跑步档案，既服务于用户自我复盘，也为后续个性化训练建议提供数据基础，体现专业跑步App的深度设计。
product_insight.en: Multi-dimensional data collection builds comprehensive running profiles for self-review and personalized training recommendations, reflecting the depth expected from professional running apps.

core_function.cn: 实时追踪跑步数据，显示距离、时间和配速
core_function.en: Real-time tracking of running metrics including distance, time and pace

design_highlights.cn: 极简清爽的白色界面，绿色品牌色强调关键信息，数据层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimal clean white interface with green accent color highlighting key metrics

design_highlights.cn: 底部双按钮设计，暂停与分段操作分离，减少误触风险
design_highlights.en: Dual bottom buttons separating pause and lap functions to prevent accidental taps

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式分段数据展示，便于用户追踪每段表现
design_highlights.en: Card-based lap data display for easy tracking of each segment performance

design_highlights.cn: 训练名称「4km Easy Run」设定明确目标，降低运动压力
design_highlights.en: Named workout '4km Easy Run' sets clear goal and reduces exercise anxiety

product_insight.cn: 运动追踪界面追求极致简洁，仅展示跑步时最关键的三项核心指标。预设训练计划降低决策成本，分段功能满足进阶用户需求，体现了对不同用户群体的精准把控。
product_insight.en: Workout tracking prioritizes simplicity with only three essential metrics. Preset training plans reduce decision fatigue while lap feature serves advanced users, showing precise understanding of different user segments.

core_function.cn: 为跑步训练计划设置具体执行时间
core_function.en: Set specific execution time for running workout plan

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计减少页面跳转，时间选择器采用滚轮式交互直观易用
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet reduces navigation, drum picker provides intuitive time selection

design_highlights.cn: Add Time开关控制时间设置区域的显隐，渐进式表单降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Add Time toggle controls visibility, progressive disclosure reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: Set As Default Time选项提升效率，Skip workout提供灵活退出路径
design_highlights.en: Set As Default option improves efficiency, Skip workout provides flexible exit

design_highlights.cn: 显示预估时长35-40分钟，帮助用户合理规划时间预期
design_highlights.en: Shows estimated duration 35-40min, helps users plan time expectations

product_insight.cn: 通过可选的时间设置和默认时间功能，平衡了灵活性与便捷性。Skip功能降低用户压力，避免因错过训练产生挫败感，体现了以用户为中心的健身产品设计理念。
product_insight.en: Balances flexibility and convenience with optional time setting and default time feature. Skip option reduces pressure, avoids frustration from missed workouts, reflecting user-centered fitness product design.

core_function.cn: 实时记录跑步数据并在地图上显示位置
core_function.en: Real-time tracking of running data with map location display

design_highlights.cn: 绿色主题配色传达运动活力，数据区块清晰分隔
design_highlights.en: Green theme conveys vitality, clear data block separation

design_highlights.cn: 自动暂停功能智能识别停止状态，减少用户操作负担
design_highlights.en: Auto-pause smartly detects stops, reducing user operation burden

design_highlights.cn: 黄色AUTO-PAUSED状态条醒目提示，避免用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Yellow AUTO-PAUSED banner provides clear status feedback

design_highlights.cn: 长按结束设计防止误触，Resume按钮突出便于快速恢复
design_highlights.en: Hold-to-finish prevents accidental ends, prominent Resume button

product_insight.cn: 采用自动暂停机制体现对用户场景的深度理解，Hold to Finish的防误触设计保护运动数据完整性，GPS信号指示器增强用户对数据准确性的信心
product_insight.en: Auto-pause mechanism shows deep user scenario understanding, hold-to-finish prevents accidental data loss, GPS indicator builds confidence in data accuracy

core_function.cn: 记录用户最快1公里跑步成绩和日期
core_function.en: Record user's fastest 1K running time and date

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式时间选择器，滚轮交互直观高效，支持时分秒精确输入
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet time picker with scroll wheel for intuitive hours/minutes/seconds input

design_highlights.cn: 分层界面设计，背景半透明遮罩突出选择器焦点
design_highlights.en: Layered interface with semi-transparent overlay highlighting the picker focus

design_highlights.cn: "Fastest 1K"标题强调个人最佳成绩，激发用户记录动力
design_highlights.en: "Fastest 1K" title emphasizes personal best, motivating users to track achievements

product_insight.cn: 采用iOS原生滚轮选择器降低学习成本，时分秒分离设计便于跑步成绩的精确记录。日期+时间双字段设计为后续数据分析和进步追踪提供完整上下文。
product_insight.en: Native iOS scroll picker reduces learning curve. Separated time fields enable precise running records. Date+time context supports future progress analysis and tracking.

core_function.cn: 手动记录运动活动并添加照片视频
core_function.en: Manually log workout activities with photos and videos

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配橙色强调色，运动App专业感强，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates professional sports app feel with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗即时告知视频限制规则，减少用户操作失误
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet proactively informs video length limits to prevent user errors

design_highlights.cn: 友好提示语气'Just So You Know'降低规则说明的生硬感
design_highlights.en: Friendly tone 'Just So You Know' softens the rule notification experience

design_highlights.cn: 支持无限添加照片视频，鼓励用户生成更多内容
design_highlights.en: Unlimited photo/video uploads encourages more user-generated content

product_insight.cn: Strava通过手动记录功能覆盖GPS未捕获的运动场景，底部弹窗预告知设计减少上传失败挫败感，30秒视频限制平衡了内容质量与服务器成本
product_insight.en: Strava covers non-GPS activities with manual entry. Proactive video limit notification reduces upload frustration. 30-second limit balances content quality with server costs

core_function.cn: 记录用户最快1公里跑步成绩及日期
core_function.en: Log user's fastest 1K running time and date

design_highlights.cn: 极简双字段布局，大量留白降低认知负担
design_highlights.en: Minimalist two-field layout with ample whitespace reduces cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: 下拉选择器替代手动输入，减少错误率
design_highlights.en: Dropdown pickers replace manual input to minimize errors

design_highlights.cn: "Fastest 1K"标题激发成就感和竞争心理
design_highlights.en: "Fastest 1K" title evokes achievement and competitive motivation

product_insight.cn: 将个人最佳成绩作为独立录入场景，强调仪式感和里程碑意义。极简设计让用户专注于核心数据输入，时间格式预设减少填写门槛，有效提升完成率。
product_insight.en: Treating personal best as a dedicated entry creates milestone significance. Minimalist design focuses users on core data, while preset time format reduces friction and improves completion rate.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步轨迹、时间和配速等运动数据
core_function.en: Display running route, time, pace and workout metrics

design_highlights.cn: 极简地图轨迹可视化，起终点用不同颜色标识清晰
design_highlights.en: Minimalist route visualization with color-coded start/end points

design_highlights.cn: 描述文案强调'轻松跑'理念，降低用户心理压力
design_highlights.en: Description emphasizes 'easy run' philosophy to reduce user pressure

design_highlights.cn: 关键数据三列横排布局，信息层级清晰便于快速扫视
design_highlights.en: Three-column layout for key metrics enables quick scanning

design_highlights.cn: 珊瑚色CTA按钮与整体浅色调形成对比，突出保存操作
design_highlights.en: Coral save button contrasts with light theme, highlighting primary action

product_insight.cn: 页面设计注重运动记录的完整性，同时通过教练式文案引导用户建立正确的训练心态。数据源标识增强了记录可信度，适合需要系统训练的跑者。
product_insight.en: Design emphasizes workout completeness while coaching-style copy guides healthy training mindset. Data source indicators enhance credibility for systematic runners.

core_function.cn: 记录并保存骑行活动数据，添加描述和照片
core_function.en: Save ride activity with details, description and media

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配橙色强调色，运动App专业视觉风格
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates professional sports app aesthetic

design_highlights.cn: 渐进式引导气泡介绍Speed Map功能，降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Progressive tooltip introduces Speed Map feature to reduce learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 功能发现弹窗采用1/4进度指示，引导用户探索更多功能
design_highlights.en: Feature discovery popup with 1/4 progress indicator encourages exploration

design_highlights.cn: 预设'Morning Ride'标题降低输入负担，快速完成记录
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled 'Morning Ride' title reduces input friction for quick saving

product_insight.cn: 通过分步引导气泡介绍高级功能，在用户完成核心操作时展示增值特性，既不打断主流程又提升功能发现率，是成熟运动App的最佳实践
product_insight.en: Contextual feature discovery during activity save flow showcases advanced features without interrupting core action, a mature approach to increase feature adoption in sports apps

core_function.cn: 保存运动活动记录并添加详情和媒体
core_function.en: Save workout activity with details and media attachments

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，运动感十足，地图预览增强视觉吸引力
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates sporty feel, map preview enhances visual appeal

design_highlights.cn: 分层引导设计，通过底部弹窗和提示卡片逐步介绍Speed Map等高级功能
design_highlights.en: Layered guidance with bottom sheets and tooltip cards progressively introducing advanced features

design_highlights.cn: 视频上传限制说明提前告知用户，减少上传失败后的负面体验
design_highlights.en: Video upload limit notification upfront reduces negative experience from failed uploads

design_highlights.cn: 「Morning Walk」预填充标题降低输入负担，鼓励用户完成保存
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled 'Morning Walk' title reduces input friction, encouraging activity completion

product_insight.cn: Strava通过渐进式功能引导（1/4步骤）培养用户对高级功能的认知，同时在关键操作前预告限制条件，体现了成熟产品对用户预期管理的重视
product_insight.en: Strava uses progressive feature education (1/4 steps) to build awareness of advanced features while pre-emptively communicating limitations, showing mature expectation management

core_function.cn: 保存运动记录并添加照片、地图等详情
core_function.en: Save workout record with photos, maps and details

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配橙色强调色，运动感与专业感兼具
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates sporty and professional feel

design_highlights.cn: 渐进式引导提示(1/4)介绍新功能，降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Progressive tooltip (1/4) introduces new features, reducing learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 地图预览带说明文案，设定用户期望值
design_highlights.en: Map preview with explanatory text sets user expectations

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗告知上传状态，消除用户对数据丢失的焦虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet shows upload status, eliminating anxiety about data loss

product_insight.cn: 通过分步引导提示教育用户高级功能（Speed Map），同时媒体上传状态提示增强信任感。表单设计简洁，必填项清晰，降低用户保存活动的操作门槛。
product_insight.en: Progressive tooltips educate users on advanced features (Speed Map) while upload status builds trust. Clean form design with clear required fields lowers barrier to save activities.

core_function.cn: 保存运动记录并添加描述、地图和详情
core_function.en: Save workout record with description, map and details

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动App专业感强烈
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates professional sports app feel

design_highlights.cn: 地图类型可切换选择，支持多种可视化展示方式
design_highlights.en: Switchable map types supporting multiple visualization options

design_highlights.cn: 功能引导提示框介绍Speed Map，渐进式功能教育
design_highlights.en: Tooltip introduces Speed Map feature for progressive education

design_highlights.cn: 预置活动名称降低输入负担，快速完成保存流程
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled activity name reduces input burden for quick saving

product_insight.cn: 通过分步引导提示(1/4)教育用户高级功能，既不打断主流程又能提升功能发现率。地图预览给予用户成就感可视化，增强分享意愿。
product_insight.en: Step-by-step tooltips (1/4) educate users on advanced features without interrupting main flow. Map preview visualizes achievements, enhancing sharing motivation.

core_function.cn: 保存运动记录并添加照片、视频等媒体内容
core_function.en: Save workout record with photos, videos and media content

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题搭配橙色强调色，运动App专业感强烈
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates professional sports app feel

design_highlights.cn: 步骤引导气泡(2/4)渐进式教育用户添加媒体功能
design_highlights.en: Step-by-step tooltip (2/4) progressively educates users on media features

design_highlights.cn: 地图预览占位图激发用户保存活动查看完整路线
design_highlights.en: Map preview placeholder motivates users to save and view full route

design_highlights.cn: "Celebrate your activity"文案赋予成就感和仪式感
design_highlights.en: "Celebrate your activity" copy creates sense of achievement and ritual

product_insight.cn: 通过分步引导气泡降低功能学习成本，地图缩略图和媒体添加引导提升用户内容生产意愿，为社交分享做铺垫，增强用户粘性和社区活跃度
product_insight.en: Step-by-step tooltips reduce learning curve, map thumbnails and media prompts encourage content creation, laying groundwork for social sharing and community engagement

core_function.cn: 保存运动活动并添加详细信息和隐私设置
core_function.en: Save workout activity with details and privacy settings

design_highlights.cn: 渐进式引导提示（3/4）帮助用户发现通勤标记功能
design_highlights.en: Progressive tooltip (3/4) guides users to discover commute tagging feature

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 私密笔记区域明确说明'只有你能看到'，建立信任感
design_highlights.en: Private notes clearly state 'Only you can see' to build trust

design_highlights.cn: 可折叠的下拉选项减少认知负担，按需展开详情
design_highlights.en: Collapsible dropdowns reduce cognitive load with on-demand expansion

product_insight.cn: 通过步骤式引导教育用户高级功能（通勤标记），同时将复杂设置折叠隐藏，平衡功能丰富性和操作简洁性。隐私控制前置展示体现对用户数据主权的尊重。
product_insight.en: Step-by-step tooltip educates users on advanced features while collapsing complex settings balances feature richness with simplicity. Prominent privacy controls respect user data sovereignty.

core_function.cn: 保存运动记录并添加感受、笔记和可见性设置
core_function.en: Save workout with perceived effort, notes and visibility settings

design_highlights.cn: 感知努力度按钮组设计，Easy/Moderate/Hard三级快速选择替代心率监测
design_highlights.en: Quick effort rating buttons (Easy/Moderate/Hard) as alternative to heart rate monitor

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配橙色强调色，层次分明的卡片式布局
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent, clear hierarchical card-based layout

design_highlights.cn: 贴心提示文案'No heart rate monitor? No problem'降低用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Reassuring copy 'No heart rate monitor? No problem' reduces user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 隐私控制选项增强用户信任感，提升分享意愿
design_highlights.en: Privacy controls build trust and encourage activity sharing

product_insight.cn: 通过主观感知努力度(RPE)替代硬件依赖，降低使用门槛；分层隐私控制（可见性+隐藏详情+静音）满足不同社交需求，平衡社区活跃与个人隐私。
product_insight.en: Perceived effort rating removes hardware dependency, lowering barrier to entry. Layered privacy controls balance community engagement with personal privacy needs.

core_function.cn: 保存运动活动并添加详情、地图和可见性设置
core_function.en: Save workout activity with details, map, and visibility settings

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动氛围感强烈，地图与照片预览增强活动记忆
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates sporty vibe, map and photo preview enhance activity memory

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗选择活动类型，层级清晰不打断主流程，支持快速切换
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet for activity type selection, clear hierarchy without interrupting main flow

design_highlights.cn: 私人笔记区域的锁定图标传达安全感，让用户放心记录真实感受
design_highlights.en: Lock icon on private notes conveys security, encouraging authentic recording

product_insight.cn: 将活动保存设计为结构化表单，涵盖活动类型、感受、笔记、装备等维度，既满足数据追踪需求，又为社交分享和个人复盘提供完整信息，隐私设置前置体现对用户控制权的尊重。
product_insight.en: Structured save form covers activity type, feeling, notes, and gear, serving both tracking and social sharing needs while front-loading privacy settings to respect user control.

core_function.cn: 保存运动记录并设置活动详情和自感疲劳度
core_function.en: Save workout record with activity details and perceived exertion rating

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动感强烈，滑块渐变设计直观展示强度等级
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates athletic feel, gradient slider intuitively shows intensity levels

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计让用户快速选择疲劳度，滑块交互简单高效
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design enables quick exertion selection, slider interaction is simple and efficient

design_highlights.cn: 私人笔记区域强调'Only you can see'增强隐私安全感
design_highlights.en: Private notes area emphasizes 'Only you can see' to enhance privacy reassurance

design_highlights.cn: 地图预览和照片缩略图激励用户完成保存，增加活动记录完整度
design_highlights.en: Map preview and photo thumbnails motivate users to complete save and enhance record completeness

product_insight.cn: 将主观感受（自感疲劳度）与客观数据结合，既丰富了训练数据维度，又增强用户对身体状态的感知，是运动类App提升用户粘性和数据价值的有效策略
product_insight.en: Combining subjective feelings (perceived exertion) with objective data enriches training dimensions and enhances body awareness, an effective strategy for fitness apps to boost engagement and data value

core_function.cn: 引导用户进行日常思绪记录和反思
core_function.en: Guide users to journal and reflect on their thoughts

design_highlights.cn: 渐变背景从深蓝过渡到暖橙色，营造日出/日落般的宁静氛围
design_highlights.en: Gradient background transitions from deep blue to warm peach, creating a serene sunrise/sunset atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 温和鼓励的文案'Feel free to refresh'降低用户心理压力
design_highlights.en: Gentle encouraging copy 'Feel free to refresh' reduces user psychological pressure

design_highlights.cn: 支持刷新更换提示，让用户找到当天合适的写作切入点
design_highlights.en: Supports refreshing prompts to help users find the right writing entry point

product_insight.cn: 通过极简界面和随机提示机制降低日记写作门槛，渐变色彩营造冥想般的平静感，引导用户进入反思状态。'刷新找到合适提示'的设计巧妙解决了固定提示可能导致的写作阻塞问题。
product_insight.en: Minimalist interface and random prompt mechanism lower journaling barriers. Gradient colors create meditative calmness. The refresh feature cleverly solves writer's block from fixed prompts.

core_function.cn: 保存运动记录并同步到第三方应用
core_function.en: Save workout records and sync to third-party apps

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的三列数据展示（距离/时间/配速），信息层级分明
design_highlights.en: Clear three-column data display with distinct information hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 应用同步开关设计，支持Strava和Apple Health一键切换
design_highlights.en: App sync toggles for seamless Strava and Apple Health integration

design_highlights.cn: 描述文案强调'轻松跑'理念，降低用户压力感
design_highlights.en: Description emphasizes 'easy run' concept, reducing user pressure

design_highlights.cn: 保存/放弃双按钮设计，红色警示放弃操作避免误触
design_highlights.en: Save/Discard dual buttons with red warning color for discard action

product_insight.cn: 页面巧妙融合数据记录与健康理念传达，通过描述区强化科学训练观念。第三方同步功能提升生态粘性，私人笔记区满足进阶用户复盘需求，体现分层设计思维。
product_insight.en: Cleverly combines data recording with health philosophy. Third-party sync enhances ecosystem stickiness, private notes serve advanced users for reflection, demonstrating layered design thinking.

core_function.cn: 手动记录运动活动并添加照片和详情
core_function.en: Manually log workout activity with photos and details

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，契合运动App活力氛围
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent color fits energetic sports app vibe

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗实时提示媒体上传状态，减少用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet shows real-time media upload status to reduce user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 预设活动名称"Morning Run"降低输入门槛，引导用户快速完成
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled activity name reduces input friction and guides quick completion

design_highlights.cn: 虚线框添加媒体区域视觉引导明确，支持多图上传
design_highlights.en: Dashed border media area provides clear visual guidance for multi-photo upload

product_insight.cn: 将手动记录流程模块化设计，通过预填充字段和实时上传反馈降低用户操作成本，同时支持社交分享（@标记）增强社区粘性，是运动社交产品的标准范式。
product_insight.en: Modular manual logging with pre-filled fields and real-time upload feedback reduces friction. Social sharing via @mentions enhances community engagement, a standard pattern for fitness social apps.

core_function.cn: 手动添加和编辑轻松跑运动数据及描述
core_function.en: Manually add and edit easy run workout data with descriptions

design_highlights.cn: 核心数据三栏并列展示，距离/时间/配速一目了然，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Three-column layout for key metrics (distance/time/pace) with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 描述文案强调「轻松」理念，降低用户压力，传递健康运动观
design_highlights.en: Description emphasizes 'easy' concept, reducing pressure and promoting healthy exercise attitude

design_highlights.cn: Strava集成开关设计，一键同步第三方平台，简化数据分享流程
design_highlights.en: Strava integration toggle for one-tap third-party sync, simplifying data sharing

design_highlights.cn: 顶部渐变绿色背景搭配步骤指示器，营造运动活力氛围
design_highlights.en: Green gradient header with step indicator creates an energetic athletic atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 页面将运动记录与教练指导结合，通过描述区域传递训练理念（配速上限而非目标），既是数据录入工具也是训练教育场景。Strava集成降低了用户迁移成本，提升留存。
product_insight.en: Combines workout logging with coaching guidance through description area conveying training philosophy. Strava integration reduces migration cost and improves retention.

core_function.cn: 记录灵活性训练详情并同步至第三方应用
core_function.en: Log mobility workout details and sync to third-party apps

design_highlights.cn: 顶部渐变背景与清晰的卡片分区，层次分明易于浏览
design_highlights.en: Gradient header with clear card sections creates visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 时间显示采用大字体突出核心数据，表单字段分组清晰
design_highlights.en: Large time display emphasizes core data with well-grouped form fields

design_highlights.cn: 私人笔记区域强调隐私性，增强用户安全感和信任
design_highlights.en: Private notes section emphasizes privacy, building user trust

design_highlights.cn: Strava同步入口无缝集成，降低数据孤岛促进用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Strava sync integration reduces data silos and increases stickiness

product_insight.cn: 表单设计兼顾简洁与完整，公开描述与私人笔记分离满足不同记录需求，第三方同步功能提升产品生态价值，降低用户迁移成本
product_insight.en: Form balances simplicity with completeness, separating public description from private notes. Third-party sync enhances ecosystem value and reduces user switching costs

core_function.cn: 自定义每日卡路里和宏量营养素目标
core_function.en: Customize daily calories and macro nutrient goals

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的数值与百分比双重展示，信息层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clear dual display of values and percentages with distinct hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 星期多选按钮支持灵活的按日定制，满足周期性饮食计划
design_highlights.en: Day-of-week multi-select enables flexible periodic diet planning

design_highlights.cn: Premium标签暗示高级功能价值，促进付费转化
design_highlights.en: Premium badge hints at feature value to drive subscription conversion

design_highlights.cn: 底部透明化推荐机制链接，建立用户信任
design_highlights.en: Transparent recommendation explanation link builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 将个性化目标设置作为Premium功能既提升付费价值感，又通过按日定制满足健身人群周期训练需求。推荐说明入口体现数据透明度，增强用户对App的专业信任。
product_insight.en: Making personalized goal-setting a Premium feature increases perceived value while day-specific customization serves fitness users' periodic training needs. The recommendation transparency link builds professional trust.

core_function.cn: 自定义每日卡路里和宏量营养素配比目标
core_function.en: Customize daily calories and macronutrient ratio goals

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮选择器实现精准百分比调节，操作直观且高效
design_highlights.en: Scroll picker enables precise percentage adjustment with intuitive operation

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示克数换算，百分比与绝对值双重展示增强理解
design_highlights.en: Real-time gram conversion with dual display of percentage and absolute values

design_highlights.cn: 周几多选支持不同日期设置不同目标，满足灵活饮食计划
design_highlights.en: Multi-day selection supports different goals for different days

design_highlights.cn: 底部100%总计校验确保数据有效性，降低用户输入错误
design_highlights.en: 100% total validation ensures data validity and reduces input errors

product_insight.cn: 通过底部弹窗分离宏量调节与主设置，既保持页面简洁又提供专业级配置能力。百分比/克数切换和实时换算满足不同用户认知习惯，Premium标识强化付费功能价值感。
product_insight.en: Bottom sheet separates macro adjustment from main settings, maintaining simplicity while offering professional configuration. Percentage/gram toggle accommodates different user preferences, Premium badge reinforces subscription value.

core_function.cn: 设置跑步目标距离，系统根据预估配速制定训练计划
core_function.en: Set running target distance with estimated pace-based workout planning

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器，支持精确数值输入与快捷预设按钮结合
design_highlights.en: Native iOS picker wheel combined with quick preset buttons (5k/10k/15k)

design_highlights.cn: 分段控制器清晰区分距离与时长两种目标模式
design_highlights.en: Segmented control clearly distinguishes distance vs duration goal modes

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调'激励你到达终点线'，增强用户完成目标的动力
design_highlights.en: Motivational copy 'motivate you to the finish line' enhances goal commitment

design_highlights.cn: 展示当前预估5KM配速，建立用户对个性化训练的信任感
design_highlights.en: Displaying estimated 5KM time builds trust in personalized training

product_insight.cn: 将复杂的训练目标设置拆解为距离/时长两个维度，通过预设快捷选项降低决策成本，同时展示预估配速增强专业感，有效平衡易用性与专业性。
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex goal-setting into distance/duration dimensions, reduces decision friction with presets while showing estimated pace for professional credibility, balancing usability and expertise.

core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入并展示详细营养数据
core_function.en: Log food intake with detailed nutritional breakdown

design_highlights.cn: 环形图配合颜色编码直观展示三大营养素占比
design_highlights.en: Donut chart with color-coded macronutrient breakdown

design_highlights.cn: 日期多选功能支持批量添加重复饮食
design_highlights.en: Multi-day selection enables batch logging for repeated meals

design_highlights.cn: 智能推荐常搭配食物降低记录门槛
design_highlights.en: Smart pairing suggestions reduce logging friction

design_highlights.cn: 绿色验证标识增强用户对数据准确性的信任
design_highlights.en: Green verification badge builds trust in data accuracy

product_insight.cn: 页面将复杂营养信息层次化呈现：卡路里优先、宏量营养素次之、每日目标百分比辅助。多日批量添加功能洞察到用户饮食规律性，大幅提升记录效率和留存。
product_insight.en: Hierarchical nutrition display prioritizes calories, then macros, then daily goals. Multi-day batch logging leverages meal regularity patterns to boost efficiency and retention.

core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入量并查看营养成分详情
core_function.en: Log food intake and view detailed nutrition breakdown

design_highlights.cn: 环形图配合百分比直观展示宏量营养素占比，信息层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Donut chart with percentages clearly visualizes macro nutrient distribution

design_highlights.cn: 引导提示框教育用户编辑份量，降低学习成本
design_highlights.en: Tooltip guides users to edit quantity, reducing learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 智能推荐常用搭配食物，提高记录效率和用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Smart food pairing suggestions improve logging efficiency and engagement

design_highlights.cn: 日历多选支持批量添加到多天，减少重复操作的烦恼
design_highlights.en: Calendar multi-select enables bulk adding across days, reducing repetitive tasks

product_insight.cn: 页面将营养信息分层展示（总览→宏量→每日目标占比），满足不同深度需求。引导提示和智能配对降低记录门槛，体现了「让健康记录更简单」的产品理念。
product_insight.en: Layered nutrition display (overview→macros→daily goals) serves varying user needs. Tooltips and smart pairing reduce friction, embodying the 'make health tracking easier' philosophy.

core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入量并展示营养成分分布
core_function.en: Log food intake with nutritional breakdown display

design_highlights.cn: 环形图直观展示卡路里及三大营养素占比，配色清晰区分
design_highlights.en: Donut chart visualizes calories and macros with distinct color coding

design_highlights.cn: 分数/小数切换键盘，支持精确的份量输入方式
design_highlights.en: Fraction/decimal toggle keyboard for precise serving size input

design_highlights.cn: 多日批量添加功能降低重复操作，提升记录效率
design_highlights.en: Multi-day selection reduces repetitive actions and improves logging efficiency

design_highlights.cn: 验证徽章增强食物数据可信度，提升用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Verification badge enhances food data credibility and user trust

product_insight.cn: 页面将复杂的营养追踪简化为单屏操作，分数键盘解决了真实饮食场景中的非整数份量问题，多日添加功能契合用户饮食规律的重复性特征，大幅降低记录门槛。
product_insight.en: Simplifies complex nutrition tracking into single-screen operation. Fraction keyboard solves real-world non-integer serving issues. Multi-day feature aligns with repetitive eating patterns, significantly reducing logging friction.

core_function.cn: 通过条码扫描快速记录食物及营养摄入
core_function.en: Log food and nutrition intake via barcode scanning

design_highlights.cn: 环形图直观展示卡路里，三色营养素占比清晰易读
design_highlights.en: Circular chart displays calories intuitively with clear tri-color macros breakdown

design_highlights.cn: 多日批量添加功能简化重复性记录操作
design_highlights.en: Multi-day selection simplifies repetitive food logging

design_highlights.cn: 净碳水功能弹窗精准定位低碳饮食用户，引导付费升级
design_highlights.en: Net carbs popup precisely targets low-carb users to drive premium conversion

design_highlights.cn: 条码自动匹配提示增强用户操作成就感
design_highlights.en: Barcode auto-match feedback enhances user sense of accomplishment

product_insight.cn: 在核心记录流程中嵌入高级功能推广，针对特定用户群体（低碳饮食者）精准营销。底部弹窗设计不打断主流程，提供明确价值说明和便捷入口，是非侵入式转化的优秀范例。
product_insight.en: Embeds premium feature promotion within core logging flow, targeting specific user segment (low-carb dieters). Non-intrusive bottom sheet with clear value proposition exemplifies contextual upselling without disrupting primary task.

core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入并展示营养数据和每日目标进度
core_function.en: Log food intake with nutrition data and daily goal progress

design_highlights.cn: 环形图直观展示卡路里，配合三色营养素分布清晰易读
design_highlights.en: Circular calorie chart with color-coded macronutrient breakdown for clarity

design_highlights.cn: 份量和时间选择器设计简洁，减少输入操作步骤
design_highlights.en: Streamlined serving size and time pickers minimize input steps

design_highlights.cn: 每日目标进度条采用分色设计，直观展示各营养素占比
design_highlights.en: Multi-colored progress bars show daily goal percentages at a glance

design_highlights.cn: 验证徽章增加食物数据可信度，提升用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Verification badge builds trust in food data accuracy

product_insight.cn: 页面将复杂营养数据分层展示，环形图聚焦当前摄入，进度条关联每日目标，可折叠营养详情降低认知负担，帮助用户快速完成记录同时了解饮食影响。
product_insight.en: Layered nutrition display with circular chart for current intake, progress bars for daily context, and collapsible details reduces cognitive load while keeping users informed.

core_function.cn: 手动录入轻松跑训练数据，包含距离、时间和配速
core_function.en: Manually log easy run data including distance, time and pace

design_highlights.cn: 渐变绿色顶部背景搭配清爽白色卡片，运动感与专业感兼具
design_highlights.en: Gradient green header with clean white cards balances sporty and professional feel

design_highlights.cn: 自动计算配速功能减少用户输入，智能联动提升效率
design_highlights.en: Auto-calculated pace reduces input effort with smart field linkage

design_highlights.cn: 信息层级分明，日期时间、距离数据、配速三层递进展示
design_highlights.en: Clear information hierarchy with date/time, distance data, and pace in progressive layers

design_highlights.cn: Configure Laps入口满足进阶用户需求，提升专业用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Configure Laps option caters to advanced users, increasing pro user retention

product_insight.cn: 表单设计遵循渐进披露原则，核心字段前置、高级配置折叠，既降低普通用户门槛又满足专业跑者需求，配速自动计算减少认知负担是优秀的产品细节
product_insight.en: Form follows progressive disclosure - core fields upfront, advanced options tucked away. Auto pace calculation reduces cognitive load, balancing simplicity for casual users with depth for serious runners

core_function.cn: 手动记录运动活动数据，包括时间、距离、配速等
core_function.en: Manually log workout activity with time, distance, and pace stats

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动类App经典配色，专业且有活力
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent, classic sports app color scheme, professional and energetic

design_highlights.cn: 下拉选择器统一交互模式，所有数据字段右侧箭头暗示可点击展开
design_highlights.en: Unified dropdown selector pattern with right arrows indicating expandable fields

design_highlights.cn: 虚线边框的媒体上传区域，清晰区分输入类型，降低用户认知负担
design_highlights.en: Dashed border for media upload area, clearly distinguishes input types

design_highlights.cn: 预填活动名称'Morning Run'降低输入门槛，引导用户快速开始
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled activity name 'Morning Run' reduces input friction for quick start

product_insight.cn: 表单设计将核心数据（时间/距离/配速）结构化展示，支持描述和@标记增强社交属性。媒体上传位置突出，鼓励用户分享成就，提升社区活跃度和用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Structured stats display with social features like descriptions and @mentions. Prominent media upload encourages sharing achievements, boosting community engagement and retention.
