core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入量并查看营养成分详情
core_function.en: Log food intake with detailed nutritional breakdown

design_highlights.en: Donut chart visualizes calories and macros with color-coded nutrients

design_highlights.en: Onboarding tooltip guides users to complete action, reducing learning curve

design_highlights.cn: 智能推荐常见搭配食物，促进连续记录行为
design_highlights.en: Smart food pairing suggestions encourage continuous logging behavior

design_highlights.cn: 多日添加功能支持批量操作，提升重复餐食记录效率
design_highlights.en: Multi-day selection enables batch logging for recurring meals

product_insight.cn: 页面整合了数据录入、营养可视化、目标追踪于一体，通过百分比进度条建立与每日目标的关联，智能配对推荐降低记录门槛，是提升用户粘性的关键设计
product_insight.en: Integrates data entry, nutrition visualization, and goal tracking. Progress bars connect to daily goals while smart pairing reduces friction, key design for user retention

design_highlights.en: Multiple input methods with clear icons: barcode scan, voice, meal scan, quick add

design_highlights.en: Bottom toast feedback 'Food logged!' provides clear confirmation of successful action

design_highlights.cn: 历史记录一键添加设计，绿色验证标记增强食物数据可信度
design_highlights.en: One-tap add from history with green verification badges enhances food data credibility

design_highlights.cn: 显示具体份量和卡路里，让用户对饮食有清晰掌控感
design_highlights.en: Showing specific portions and calories gives users clear sense of dietary control

product_insight.cn: 通过四种输入方式（扫码、语音、拍照、手动）大幅降低食物记录门槛，历史记录复用设计减少重复输入，验证标记建立数据信任，整体提升记录效率和用户粘性
product_insight.en: Four input methods significantly lower logging barriers, history reuse reduces repetitive entry, verification badges build data trust, improving overall efficiency and user retention

core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入并追踪用餐时间

design_highlights.cn: 环形进度图直观展示卡路里和营养素占比，配色清晰易读
design_highlights.en: Circular progress chart visualizes calories and nutrients with clear color coding

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗引导时间追踪功能，不打断主流程的同时推广高级功能
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet promotes time tracking feature without interrupting main flow

design_highlights.cn: 将时间追踪标记为高级功能，以价值展示方式引导用户升级

design_highlights.cn: 日期选择器支持多日批量添加，体现对用户便利性的关注
design_highlights.en: Multi-day selector enables batch logging, showing care for user convenience

product_insight.cn: 通过在核心功能流程中嵌入高级功能弹窗，让用户在使用中自然发现付费价值。营养数据可视化设计降低健康管理认知门槛，日期多选功能提升记录效率，整体兼顾转化与体验。
product_insight.en: Embeds premium feature promotion within core flow for natural value discovery. Nutrition visualization lowers cognitive load while multi-day selection improves logging efficiency, balancing conversion with UX.

core_function.cn: 通过条码扫描快速记录食物营养信息

design_highlights.en: Circular calorie chart with color-coded macros creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.en: Barcode auto-matching with editable serving size and meal time

design_highlights.cn: 日期多选功能支持批量添加，降低重复记录的操作成本
design_highlights.en: Multi-day selection enables batch logging to reduce repetitive input

design_highlights.cn: 每日目标百分比进度条激励用户保持营养平衡
design_highlights.en: Daily goal percentage bars motivate users to maintain nutritional balance

product_insight.cn: 页面通过条码扫描+智能匹配大幅降低食物记录门槛，多日添加功能针对规律饮食用户优化效率，营养目标可视化强化用户健康意识，形成记录-反馈-激励的正向循环。
product_insight.en: Barcode scanning with smart matching significantly lowers logging friction. Multi-day feature optimizes for users with regular diets. Nutrition goal visualization reinforces health awareness, creating a positive record-feedback-motivation loop.

core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入并显示营养成分和目标进度
core_function.en: Log food intake with nutrition breakdown and daily goal progress

design_highlights.cn: 环形图清晰展示卡路里和宏量营养素比例，色彩编码直观易读
design_highlights.en: Donut chart clearly displays calories and macros with intuitive color coding

design_highlights.cn: 多日批量添加功能，支持一次性为整周安排相同餐食
design_highlights.en: Multi-day bulk add feature allows scheduling same meal across the week

design_highlights.cn: 进度条展示每日目标完成百分比，让用户快速了解摄入情况
design_highlights.en: Progress bars show daily goal percentages for quick intake assessment

design_highlights.cn: 提供数据反馈入口，增强用户信任和参与感
design_highlights.en: Report Food option builds user trust and engagement through feedback

product_insight.cn: 页面整合营养数据、时间选择、多日规划等功能于一体，降低重复记录成本。宏量营养素百分比和目标进度的双重展示，帮助用户建立健康饮食认知，提升长期留存。
product_insight.en: Integrates nutrition data, time selection, and multi-day planning to reduce logging friction. Dual display of macros percentages and daily goals helps users build healthy eating awareness and improves retention.

core_function.cn: 扫描识别食物并选择记录到指定餐次
core_function.en: Scan and identify foods, then log to specific meal category

design_highlights.cn: 多选复选框设计，用户可快速勾选多种食材一次性记录
design_highlights.en: Multi-select checkboxes allow quick batch selection of multiple ingredients

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗展示四餐分类，按钮采用浅蓝色卡片式布局清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet with four meal categories using light blue card layout for clarity

design_highlights.cn: 自动识别显示卡路里和份量，降低用户手动输入负担
design_highlights.en: Auto-display of calories and portions reduces manual input burden

design_highlights.cn: 预选常见健康食材引导用户快速完成记录流程
design_highlights.en: Pre-selected healthy ingredients guide users to complete logging quickly

product_insight.cn: 将AI扫描识别与手动选择结合，既保证准确性又提升效率。四餐分类弹窗避免多余跳转，在单一流程内完成食物识别、选择、归类三步操作，极大简化用户记录体验。
product_insight.en: Combines AI scanning with manual selection for accuracy and efficiency. Four-meal bottom sheet eliminates extra navigation, completing identification, selection, and categorization in one seamless flow.

core_function.cn: 记录每日饮食、运动和水分摄入，追踪卡路里
core_function.en: Track daily food, exercise and water intake with calorie counting

design_highlights.cn: 卡路里公式可视化呈现（目标-摄入+运动=剩余），信息层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Calorie formula visualization (Goal-Food+Exercise=Remaining) with clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 分类模块化设计，每个类别独立添加入口，操作路径简洁
design_highlights.en: Modular category design with independent add entry for each section

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗确认完成日记，引导用户形成每日闭环习惯
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet confirmation encourages daily tracking habit completion

design_highlights.cn: 剩余卡路里用绿色强调正向反馈，激励用户坚持目标
design_highlights.en: Green remaining calories provides positive feedback and goal motivation

product_insight.cn: 采用减法公式设计让用户直观理解卡路里预算概念，日记完成确认机制借鉴打卡思维，通过仪式感强化用户习惯养成，提升次日留存率。
product_insight.en: Subtraction formula helps users understand calorie budget intuitively. Diary completion confirmation leverages check-in psychology, reinforcing habit formation through ritual to boost next-day retention.

core_function.cn: 警告用户当日摄入热量不足，提供健康建议
core_function.en: Warn users about insufficient calorie intake and provide health advice

design_highlights.cn: 红色警示文案直接点明问题，传递关怀而非指责
design_highlights.en: Red warning text directly addresses the issue with care, not blame

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的信息层级，从问题→原因→解决方案逐层递进
design_highlights.en: Clear information hierarchy progressing from problem to cause to solution

design_highlights.cn: 引用权威机构NIH数据增强可信度，促进用户合规
design_highlights.en: Citing NIH authority data enhances credibility and promotes user compliance

product_insight.cn: MyFitnessPal通过健康守护机制展现产品责任感，既防止用户极端节食导致健康问题，也规避法律风险。将限制包装成关怀，提升品牌信任度。
product_insight.en: MyFitnessPal demonstrates product responsibility through health safeguards, preventing extreme dieting while avoiding legal risks. Framing restrictions as care builds brand trust.

core_function.cn: 记录每日三餐摄入的食物和卡路里
core_function.en: Track daily meals and calorie intake

design_highlights.cn: 顶部食物记录连续打卡提示，利用游戏化激励用户持续记录
design_highlights.en: Food logging streak prompt at top gamifies continuous tracking behavior

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的餐次分组和卡路里数字右对齐，信息层级分明
design_highlights.en: Clear meal grouping with right-aligned calories creates strong visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 每餐下方ADD FOOD按钮位置固定，降低添加食物的操作门槛

product_insight.en: Streak mechanism boosts retention, new feature promotion embedded in core page maximizes exposure, detailed portion and calorie display builds user nutritional awareness.

product_insight.en: Subtraction formula provides intuitive quota awareness, meal-segmented logging matches user mental model, complete diary CTA creates behavior loop improving retention and data completeness

core_function.cn: 记录每日饮食摄入并追踪卡路里与营养目标

design_highlights.cn: 目标达成即时反馈提示（纤维、蛋白质目标），强化正向激励

design_highlights.cn: 按餐次分组记录，时间戳标注便于回溯追踪

design_highlights.cn: 历史记录功能提示降低重复记录门槛，提升留存
design_highlights.en: Food history feature hint reduces logging friction and improves retention

product_insight.en: Real-time goal achievement notifications create instant gratification, gamifying tedious data logging. Meal-based display with detailed nutrition balances information density and readability.

design_highlights.cn: 数字键盘自动弹出，针对体重输入场景优化，提升输入效率

design_highlights.cn: 进度照片功能鼓励用户记录身体变化，增强健身动力
design_highlights.en: Progress photo feature encourages body transformation documentation

product_insight.en: Linking weight with photos is a classic fitness app pattern that reinforces achievement through visual comparison. Pre-filled date reduces friction, blue highlights guide attention to editable fields.

core_function.cn: 记录健身训练的时间、容量和消耗数据
core_function.en: Log workout duration, volume and calories burned

design_highlights.cn: 极简表单设计，清晰的标签-数值左右对齐布局
design_highlights.en: Minimalist form design with clear label-value alignment

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色高亮可编辑字段，灰色显示计算值，区分清晰
design_highlights.en: Blue highlights editable fields, gray shows calculated values

design_highlights.cn: 信息分组使用灰色分割区域，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Gray separator areas for information grouping with clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示卡路里消耗，即时反馈激励用户
design_highlights.en: Real-time calorie display provides instant feedback motivation

product_insight.cn: 采用轻量化记录方式降低用户输入门槛，自动计算卡路里减少操作步骤，蓝色可交互元素的视觉暗示引导用户快速完成数据录入，适合高频使用场景。
product_insight.en: Lightweight logging reduces input friction, auto-calculated calories minimize steps, blue interactive elements guide quick data entry, ideal for frequent use scenarios.

core_function.cn: 记录食物摄入并选择用餐时间和餐次类型

design_highlights.cn: 实时显示每日目标完成百分比，激励用户持续追踪
design_highlights.en: Real-time daily goal percentage display motivates continuous tracking

design_highlights.cn: Report Food入口体现数据透明，增强用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Report Food option shows data transparency, building user trust

product_insight.en: Complex nutrition data presented with clear visual hierarchy: circular chart for calories, numbers with progress bars for macros. Multi-day add reduces friction and improves retention.

core_function.cn: 手动添加运动记录时选择活动类型

design_highlights.en: Clear activity grouping: running and cross-training sections reduce cognitive load

design_highlights.cn: parkrun专属绿色卡片体现社区归属感，提升跑者情感共鸣
design_highlights.en: parkrun-specific green card reflects community belonging, boosting runner engagement

product_insight.cn: 通过丰富的预设活动类型降低用户输入门槛，渐变色卡片兼顾美观与功能分区。将parkrun单独列出体现对跑步社区文化的理解，Custom选项保证灵活性，平衡标准化与个性化需求。
product_insight.en: Rich preset activity types lower input barriers. Gradient cards balance aesthetics with functional grouping. parkrun inclusion shows understanding of running community culture. Custom option ensures flexibility between standardization and personalization.

core_function.cn: 通过滚轮选择器精确设置跑步运动时长
core_function.en: Set precise running duration via scroll wheel picker

design_highlights.cn: 渐变绿色背景营造清新运动氛围，时间选择器采用高对比度设计便于识别
design_highlights.en: Gradient green background creates fresh athletic atmosphere with high-contrast time picker

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式时间选择器，滚轮交互直观且支持精确到秒的调整
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet time picker with intuitive scroll wheels supporting second-level precision

design_highlights.cn: 实时计算平均配速并展示，数据联动清晰可见
design_highlights.en: Real-time pace calculation displayed with clear data correlation

design_highlights.cn: 预填充合理默认值减少用户输入负担，提升记录体验
design_highlights.en: Pre-filled reasonable defaults reduce input burden and improve logging experience

product_insight.cn: 时间选择器采用iOS原生滚轮设计降低学习成本，同时配速实时计算增强数据可信度。底部弹窗保留上下文，让用户清晰了解修改对整体数据的影响。
product_insight.en: Native iOS wheel picker reduces learning curve while real-time pace calculation enhances data credibility. Bottom sheet preserves context, helping users understand how changes affect overall metrics.

core_function.cn: 通过滚轮选择器设定活动时间
core_function.en: Set activity time using scroll wheel picker

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计保持主页面上下文可见，减少用户迷失感
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design keeps main context visible, reducing user disorientation

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器，支持惯性滑动和精准选择
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker with momentum scrolling and precise selection

design_highlights.cn: 选中项高亮显示，灰色渐变淡出未选项增强聚焦
design_highlights.en: Selected item highlighted with gray fade-out on unselected options for focus

design_highlights.cn: Cancel/Done双按钮设计，给予用户操作安全感
design_highlights.en: Cancel/Done dual buttons provide user safety and control

product_insight.cn: 健康追踪类应用采用模态时间选择器是最佳实践，既保持数据录入效率，又不打断用户对主任务（添加活动记录）的认知。AM/PM切换简化12小时制输入。
product_insight.en: Modal time picker is best practice for health tracking apps, maintaining input efficiency without breaking user's cognitive focus on the main task. AM/PM toggle simplifies 12-hour format entry.

core_function.cn: 通过滚轮选择器记录运动活动的持续时长
core_function.en: Record exercise duration using wheel picker selector

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮选择器设计，支持小时/分钟/秒精确选择
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker for precise hours/minutes/seconds selection

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗模态设计，背景灰度处理突出焦点
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet modal with dimmed background focusing attention

design_highlights.cn: 取消/完成双按钮设计，操作可逆降低用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Cancel/Done buttons provide reversible actions reducing anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 选中项居中放大显示，上下渐隐形成视觉层次
design_highlights.en: Selected item centered and enlarged with fading effect above/below

product_insight.cn: 采用系统原生时间选择器符合用户心智模型，底部弹窗保留上下文不打断流程。分离式时分秒设计精确满足健身场景需求，适合记录瑜伽、拉伸等灵活性训练。
product_insight.en: Native time picker aligns with user mental models. Bottom sheet preserves context. Separate H:M:S design meets fitness tracking precision needs for mobility exercises like yoga and stretching.

core_function.cn: 实时GPS定位显示运动路线和当前位置
core_function.en: Real-time GPS tracking showing activity route and current location

design_highlights.cn: 右侧悬浮工具栏支持图层切换、3D视图和定位功能
design_highlights.en: Floating toolbar on right side for layer switching, 3D view and location centering

design_highlights.cn: 绿色GPS状态栏即时反馈信号获取状态，增强用户信心
design_highlights.en: Green GPS status bar provides instant feedback on signal acquisition

design_highlights.cn: 底部功能图标栏提供快速访问常用运动功能
design_highlights.en: Bottom icon bar provides quick access to common activity features

product_insight.cn: 采用全屏地图沉浸式设计，GPS状态实时反馈降低用户焦虑，浮动控件不遮挡视野又保持功能可达性，适合户外运动场景的实用设计思路值得借鉴
product_insight.en: Full-screen immersive map design with real-time GPS feedback reduces user anxiety. Floating controls maintain accessibility without blocking the view, practical for outdoor activities

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的卡路里算式展示（目标-食物+运动=剩余），数据一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clear calorie formula display (Goal-Food+Exercise=Remaining) for instant comprehension

design_highlights.cn: 按餐次分组记录，支持时间标签和快速添加食物入口
design_highlights.en: Meal-based grouping with time labels and quick add food entry points

design_highlights.cn: 智能营养提示（钙含量高）增加健康感知价值
design_highlights.en: Smart nutrition tips (calcium content) add perceived health value

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色ADD FOOD按钮重复出现，降低记录门槛
design_highlights.en: Repeated blue ADD FOOD buttons lower friction for logging

product_insight.cn: 采用餐次+时间双维度组织食物记录，配合实时卡路里计算器形成完整追踪闭环。营养小贴士的设计增加了专业感和用户粘性，值得健康类App借鉴。
product_insight.en: Dual-dimension organization by meal and time with real-time calorie calculator creates complete tracking loop. Nutrition tips add professionalism and engagement worth adopting.

core_function.cn: 记录每日饮食、运动和水分摄入，追踪卡路里平衡

design_highlights.en: Clear calorie formula visualization showing Goal-Food+Exercise=Remaining

design_highlights.cn: 分区模块化设计，Snacks/Exercise/Water独立记录，操作清晰

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色ADD按钮和COMPLETE DIARY强CTA引导用户持续记录
design_highlights.en: Blue ADD buttons and COMPLETE DIARY CTA encourage continuous logging

design_highlights.cn: 剩余234卡路里用蓝色高亮显示，正向激励用户
design_highlights.en: Remaining 234 calories highlighted in blue for positive reinforcement

product_insight.cn: 采用经典的卡路里收支平衡模型，将复杂的营养追踪简化为加减法公式，降低用户认知负担。模块化日记结构支持碎片化记录，Complete Diary按钮创造每日闭环仪式感。
product_insight.en: Classic calorie balance model simplifies nutrition tracking into simple math. Modular diary structure supports fragmented logging, while Complete Diary button creates daily ritual closure.

core_function.cn: 记录用户的活动/拉伸训练时间信息

design_highlights.cn: 清新渐变背景与白色卡片形成层次感，视觉柔和舒适

design_highlights.cn: 日期时间选择器采用下拉模式，操作便捷直观
design_highlights.en: Dropdown date/time pickers offer quick and intuitive selection

design_highlights.cn: 极简表单设计，仅保留核心字段降低用户输入负担
design_highlights.en: Minimalist form with essential fields reduces input friction

design_highlights.cn: 顶部进度指示器展示当前步骤，增强流程感知
design_highlights.en: Top progress indicator shows current step in multi-step flow

product_insight.cn: 将活动记录简化为日期、时间、时长三个核心维度，极大降低了用户记录成本。步骤式引导设计暗示后续可能有更多细节补充，平衡了简洁性与数据完整性。
product_insight.en: Simplifying activity logging to date, time, and duration minimizes friction. Stepper design suggests optional detail steps ahead, balancing simplicity with data completeness.

core_function.cn: 提供多种快捷记录方式，支持食物、运动、水分等数据录入
core_function.en: Provides multiple quick logging options for food, exercise, water and weight

design_highlights.cn: 彩色图标与白色卡片搭配，功能分区清晰，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Colorful icons with white cards create clear functional zones and visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗设计符合拇指操作习惯，多入口并行降低操作路径
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet design fits thumb zone, multiple entry points reduce navigation steps

design_highlights.cn: AI功能（语音记录、拍照识别）突出展示，提升高级功能曝光
design_highlights.en: AI features (voice log, meal scan) prominently displayed to boost premium feature exposure

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的图标设计降低记录心理负担，让健康追踪更轻松
design_highlights.en: Minimal icon design reduces cognitive load, making health tracking feel effortless

product_insight.cn: 将高频记录操作集中于底部弹窗，同时融入AI能力（语音、拍照识别），既降低传统手动输入门槛，又为付费转化埋点。四宫格+列表混合布局平衡功能密度与易用性。
product_insight.en: Consolidates high-frequency logging in bottom sheet while integrating AI capabilities. Grid plus list hybrid layout balances feature density with usability, creating natural upsell opportunities.

core_function.cn: 扫描识别后批量选择要记录的食物项目
core_function.en: Batch select food items to log after meal scanning

design_highlights.cn: 复选框式多选设计，支持快速批量选择/取消，减少操作步骤
design_highlights.en: Checkbox multi-select design enables quick batch selection with fewer taps

design_highlights.cn: 选中项蓝色高亮边框+勾选图标，视觉状态清晰区分
design_highlights.en: Blue border highlight with checkmark icon for clear selected state distinction

design_highlights.cn: 底部引导文案提示可编辑份量，降低用户学习成本
design_highlights.en: Bottom guidance text about editing servings reduces learning curve

design_highlights.cn: AI扫描预填充结果降低手动输入成本，提升记录完成率
design_highlights.en: AI scan pre-fills results reducing manual input effort and boosting completion rate

product_insight.cn: 通过AI扫描识别+批量选择的组合设计，将传统逐项搜索添加的繁琐流程简化为一键确认，显著降低饮食记录门槛。预选常见项目同时保留编辑灵活性的平衡值得借鉴。
product_insight.en: AI scan + batch selection combo simplifies tedious item-by-item search into one-tap confirmation, significantly lowering food logging friction. Balance between pre-selecting common items while retaining edit flexibility is noteworthy.

core_function.cn: AI识别餐食内容并展示食物列表供用户选择记录
core_function.en: AI-identified meal items displayed for user selection and logging

design_highlights.cn: 多选复选框设计，允许用户灵活选择识别结果中的准确项目
design_highlights.en: Multi-select checkboxes allow flexible selection of accurate identified items

design_highlights.cn: 简洁列表布局，每项清晰展示食物名称、卡路里和份量信息
design_highlights.en: Clean list layout showing food name, calories and portion info for each item

design_highlights.cn: 底部Toast反馈'Food updated!'即时确认操作成功
design_highlights.en: Bottom toast 'Food updated!' provides instant confirmation of successful action

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的蓝色Log Meal按钮引导用户完成记录流程
design_highlights.en: Prominent blue Log Meal button guides users to complete logging flow

product_insight.cn: AI扫描+人工校正的混合模式平衡了效率与准确性，用户可快速确认或修正识别结果。底部显示已选数量降低认知负担，搜索入口支持补充未识别食物，形成完整记录闭环。
product_insight.en: AI scan with manual correction balances efficiency and accuracy. Bottom item count reduces cognitive load, search entry supports adding unrecognized foods, forming complete logging loop.

core_function.cn: 收集用户对AI餐食扫描功能的满意度反馈
core_function.en: Collect user feedback on AI meal scanning feature satisfaction

design_highlights.cn: 五星评分组件简洁直观，降低用户反馈成本
design_highlights.en: Five-star rating component is intuitive and reduces feedback friction

design_highlights.cn: 纤维目标达成提示营造正向激励氛围
design_highlights.en: Fiber goal achievement notification creates positive reinforcement

design_highlights.cn: 卡路里计算公式清晰展示，数据透明易理解
design_highlights.en: Calorie calculation formula displayed transparently and clearly

design_highlights.cn: 在功能使用后即时弹出评价，捕捉最佳反馈时机
design_highlights.en: Rating prompt appears immediately after feature use for optimal timing

product_insight.cn: 在AI扫描功能使用后即时收集反馈，既能获取真实体验数据优化算法，又通过高分默认值引导正向评价。目标达成提示与评价弹窗叠加，强化用户成就感。
product_insight.en: Collecting feedback immediately after AI scan captures authentic experience data while pre-selected high rating guides positive reviews. Achievement notification layered with rating modal reinforces user accomplishment.

core_function.en: Track food diary and collect user feedback on new features

design_highlights.cn: 轻量级弹窗设计，不打断用户主流程，可快速关闭
design_highlights.en: Lightweight modal design that doesn't interrupt main flow with easy dismiss

design_highlights.cn: 感谢语开头配合绿色成就徽章，营造正向激励氛围
design_highlights.en: Thank you message with green achievement badge creates positive reinforcement

design_highlights.cn: 蓝色CTA按钮突出，引导用户参与反馈调研
design_highlights.en: Prominent blue CTA button guides users to participate in feedback survey

design_highlights.cn: 卡路里计算公式化展示，数据关系一目了然
design_highlights.en: Formula-style calorie display makes data relationships crystal clear

product_insight.cn: 将用户反馈收集嵌入功能使用后的自然时机，用感谢语降低打扰感。通过成就达成（纤维目标）的积极情绪节点触发调研，提高用户参与意愿和反馈质量。
product_insight.en: Embeds feedback collection at natural moment after feature use. Leverages positive emotion from achievement (fiber goal) to trigger survey, improving participation rate and feedback quality.

core_function.cn: 以时间轴展示用户体重变化趋势和当前数值
core_function.en: Display weight change trends over time with current value

design_highlights.cn: 极简纯净的图表设计，大面积留白突出数据点
design_highlights.en: Minimalist chart design with extensive whitespace highlighting data points

design_highlights.cn: 左侧蓝色标签实时显示当前选中日期的精确数值
design_highlights.en: Blue label on left shows precise value for selected date in real-time

design_highlights.cn: 垂直灰色高亮条标识当前选中时间点，增强聚焦感
design_highlights.en: Vertical gray highlight bar marks selected time point for better focus

product_insight.cn: 健康类App采用极简数据可视化策略，通过减少视觉干扰让用户专注于单一数据点，降低信息焦虑。时间轴横跨月份便于观察长期趋势，体现持续追踪的产品理念。
product_insight.en: Health app uses minimalist data visualization to reduce cognitive load. Timeline spanning months encourages long-term tracking mindset and reduces data anxiety.

core_function.cn: 展示每日卡路里摄入分布与目标完成情况
core_function.en: Display daily calorie intake distribution and goal progress

design_highlights.cn: 深色圆环图直观展示各餐摄入占比，配色区分清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark donut chart clearly visualizes meal intake proportions with distinct colors

design_highlights.cn: 顶部分类Tab切换，支持日视图左右翻页浏览历史数据
design_highlights.en: Top category tabs with day view navigation for browsing historical data

design_highlights.cn: 展示高热量食物排名，帮助用户识别饮食问题并调整
design_highlights.en: Shows highest calorie foods ranking to help users identify and adjust diet issues

product_insight.cn: 将复杂营养数据分层呈现：圆环图展示宏观分布，数字摘要显示关键指标，食物排名提供行动指引。通过Goal对比设计强化目标感，激励用户持续追踪。
product_insight.en: Layered presentation of nutrition data: donut chart for macro distribution, numeric summary for key metrics, food ranking for actionable insights. Goal comparison reinforces target awareness and motivates continued tracking.

core_function.cn: 展示当日摄入热量最高的食物排名
core_function.en: Display ranking of highest calorie foods consumed today

design_highlights.cn: 极简表格设计，双列布局清晰展示食物与热量对应关系
design_highlights.en: Minimalist table design with clear two-column layout for food-calorie mapping

design_highlights.cn: 日期导航支持左右切换，下拉菜单可切换视图模式
design_highlights.en: Date navigation with left-right arrows and dropdown for view mode switching

design_highlights.cn: 降序排列让用户直观看到热量大户，促进饮食反思
design_highlights.en: Descending order helps users identify calorie-heavy items for dietary reflection

product_insight.cn: 通过排行榜形式突出高热量食物，帮助用户快速识别饮食中的"热量陷阱"，支持日/周/月视图切换满足不同分析需求，设计简洁但信息传达高效。
product_insight.en: Ranking format highlights calorie-dense foods to help users identify dietary pitfalls. Day/Week/Month view switching meets various analysis needs with efficient information delivery.

core_function.cn: 展示每日各营养素摄入目标与剩余量
core_function.en: Display daily nutrient intake goals and remaining amounts

design_highlights.cn: 极简表格设计，三列布局清晰呈现总量/目标/剩余，信息层次分明
design_highlights.en: Minimalist table design with clear three-column layout showing total/goal/remaining

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Tab分类切换，支持概览/热量/营养素/宏量多维度查看
design_highlights.en: Top tab navigation enabling multi-dimensional view of overview/calories/nutrients/macros

design_highlights.cn: 空状态以0值展示而非隐藏，直观告知用户尚未记录数据
design_highlights.en: Empty state shows zero values instead of hiding, clearly indicating no data logged

design_highlights.cn: 完整显示剩余量激励用户达成每日营养目标
design_highlights.en: Showing remaining amounts motivates users to achieve daily nutrition goals

product_insight.cn: 通过精细化的营养素分类（蛋白质、脂肪类型、矿物质等），满足专业用户深度追踪需求，空状态设计降低首次使用门槛，引导用户开始记录饮食。
product_insight.en: Detailed nutrient categorization meets professional tracking needs. Empty state design lowers barrier for first-time users, guiding them to start logging meals.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步训练完成状态和详细数据统计
core_function.en: Display running workout completion status and detailed statistics

design_highlights.cn: 顶部"High five Julia!"庆祝提示营造正向激励氛围
design_highlights.en: Top celebration banner 'High five Julia!' creates positive reinforcement

design_highlights.cn: 三个圆形勾选图标清晰展示任务完成状态，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Three circular checkmarks clearly show task completion with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 拇指点赞/点踩反馈机制收集用户训练体验数据
design_highlights.en: Thumbs up/down feedback mechanism collects user workout experience data

design_highlights.cn: 教练语音指导区域增强专业感和用户粘性
design_highlights.en: Coach guidance section enhances professionalism and user engagement

product_insight.cn: 通过完成状态可视化、成就徽章和教练指导三重反馈机制，强化用户训练成就感。简洁的数据卡片设计降低认知负荷，反馈按钮收集数据用于个性化优化。
product_insight.en: Triple feedback mechanism with completion visualization, achievement badges, and coach guidance reinforces user accomplishment. Clean data cards reduce cognitive load while feedback buttons collect data for personalization.

core_function.cn: 展示每日宏量营养素摄入与目标占比
core_function.en: Display daily macronutrient intake and goal percentages

design_highlights.cn: 环形图配合颜色编码区分三大营养素，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Donut chart with color-coded macronutrients for clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Tab导航支持快速切换营养概览、热量、营养素和宏量视图
design_highlights.en: Top tab navigation enables quick switching between overview, calories, nutrients and macros

design_highlights.cn: 空状态设计温和，显示0%而非报错，降低用户压力
design_highlights.en: Gentle empty state showing 0% instead of errors reduces user pressure

product_insight.cn: 将复杂营养数据拆分为多个维度Tab，降低认知负荷；空状态保持完整结构，暗示用户需要记录饮食才能看到数据，形成使用引导
product_insight.en: Breaking complex nutrition data into multiple tabs reduces cognitive load; empty state maintains full structure, implying users need to log food to see data

core_function.cn: 展示每日营养追踪进度并引导用户继续记录
core_function.en: Display daily nutrition tracking progress and encourage continued logging

design_highlights.cn: "Crushing it!"正向激励文案配合弧形进度条，营造成就感
design_highlights.en: Positive 'Crushing it!' copy with curved progress bar creates sense of achievement

design_highlights.cn: 蓝白配色简洁清爽，卡片式布局层次分明
design_highlights.en: Clean blue-white color scheme with clear card-based layout hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 倒计时预告新功能上线，制造期待感提升留存
design_highlights.en: Countdown to new features creates anticipation and boosts retention

design_highlights.cn: 顶部Tab分类便于切换不同维度查看营养数据
design_highlights.en: Top tabs enable easy switching between different nutrition data views

product_insight.cn: 页面设计巧妙结合进度展示与行为引导，通过正向反馈强化用户记录习惯；底部新功能预告既管理预期又制造黏性，是提升DAU的有效策略。
product_insight.en: Cleverly combines progress display with behavioral guidance, reinforcing logging habits through positive feedback. Feature preview countdown manages expectations while creating stickiness - an effective DAU strategy.

core_function.cn: 展示用户步数统计数据和历史记录
core_function.en: Display user step count statistics and history

design_highlights.cn: 极简空状态设计，三列数据指标清晰排列（平均、最佳、总计）
design_highlights.en: Minimalist empty state with clear three-column metrics layout (average, best, total)

design_highlights.cn: 顶部分段控制器支持步数和日历视图切换，时间维度可选
design_highlights.en: Top segmented control enables switching between steps and calendar views with time range option

design_highlights.cn: 空状态友好提示'No Data Available'，降低用户焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Friendly empty state message 'No Data Available' reduces user anxiety

product_insight.cn: 健康类App典型的数据空状态设计，通过预设数据框架（平均/最佳/总计）向用户暗示数据积累后的价值呈现方式，激励用户开始记录。分离Entries区域便于后续数据填充。
product_insight.en: Typical health app empty state design that hints at data value through preset metrics framework, motivating users to start tracking. Separated Entries section prepares for future data display.

core_function.cn: 展示健康数据进度并支持切换指标类型
core_function.en: Display health data progress with metric type switching

design_highlights.cn: 极简空状态设计，数据区留白清晰不杂乱
design_highlights.en: Minimalist empty state design with clean whitespace

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗选择器支持多种测量指标切换，操作便捷
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet selector for easy metric type switching

design_highlights.cn: 顶部三列统计数据布局（平均/最佳/总计）一目了然
design_highlights.en: Three-column stats layout (Average/Best/Total) for quick overview

product_insight.cn: 将多维度健康指标整合在统一进度页面，通过底部选择器实现无缝切换，降低页面层级复杂度。空状态设计引导用户开始记录数据，形成使用闭环。
product_insight.en: Consolidates multiple health metrics in unified progress view with seamless bottom sheet switching, reducing navigation complexity. Empty state guides users to start tracking.

core_function.cn: 展示本周训练计划完成情况和详细安排
core_function.en: Display weekly training plan progress and scheduled workouts

design_highlights.cn: 彩色分段进度条直观展示训练类型和完成状态
design_highlights.en: Colored segmented progress bar shows workout types and completion status

design_highlights.cn: 已完成训练自动关联实际数据，形成记录闭环
design_highlights.en: Completed workouts auto-linked with actual data creating tracking closure

design_highlights.cn: 勾选完成状态配合数据展示增强成就感
design_highlights.en: Checkmark completion status with stats enhances sense of achievement

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局清晰区分不同训练日，信息层级分明
design_highlights.en: Card layout clearly separates training days with clear information hierarchy

product_insight.cn: 将计划与执行数据打通是关键设计，用户能直观看到计划vs实际对比，彩色进度条让6周训练进度一目了然，有效降低长期计划的心理压力
product_insight.en: Connecting plan with execution data is key design. Users see plan vs actual comparison intuitively. Colored progress bar makes 6-week progress clear, reducing psychological pressure of long-term plans

core_function.cn: 展示睡眠数据及影响睡眠的生活因素关联分析
core_function.en: Display sleep data and lifestyle factors affecting sleep quality

design_highlights.cn: 环形图配合分阶段睡眠指标，色彩编码清晰区分睡眠周期
design_highlights.en: Circular chart with staged sleep metrics, color-coded sleep phases

design_highlights.cn: 日期导航箭头支持快速切换查看历史睡眠数据
design_highlights.en: Date navigation arrows enable quick historical data browsing

design_highlights.cn: 空状态引导用户记录饮食，建立睡眠与饮食的关联认知
design_highlights.en: Empty state guides food logging to build sleep-diet awareness

design_highlights.cn: 底部CTA按钮引导用户添加食物数据，提升功能粘性
design_highlights.en: Bottom CTA button encourages food logging to increase engagement

product_insight.cn: 将睡眠与糖分、水分、运动等生活因素关联展示，创造数据闭环。通过空状态+明确CTA引导用户主动记录，培养使用习惯，体现健康管理的整体性思维。
product_insight.en: Correlates sleep with sugar, water, exercise factors creating a data loop. Empty state with clear CTA guides active logging, building habits while demonstrating holistic health management approach.

core_function.cn: 展示单次攀岩运动的完整数据和心率分析
core_function.en: Display complete rock climbing workout data with heart rate analysis

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合橙红色强调色，突出关键数据，视觉层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dark background with orange-red accent color highlights key metrics with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 心率区间图表采用柱状+折线混合可视化，直观展示运动强度变化
design_highlights.en: Heart rate zone chart uses bar and line hybrid visualization showing workout intensity changes

design_highlights.cn: 社交互动元素(112人点赞)增强用户成就感和社区归属感
design_highlights.en: Social interaction elements (112 kudos) enhance user achievement and community belonging

design_highlights.cn: Follow按钮和分享图标促进用户社交连接和内容传播
design_highlights.en: Follow button and share icon promote social connections and content distribution

product_insight.cn: 将运动数据与社交功能深度结合，通过用户档案、互动点赞和关注机制构建运动社区生态，提升用户粘性和留存，同时设备标识增强专业可信度
product_insight.en: Deep integration of workout data with social features builds fitness community ecosystem through user profiles, kudos and follow mechanics, enhancing retention while device tag adds professional credibility

core_function.cn: 展示攀岩运动的心率数据变化和统计分析
core_function.en: Display heart rate data and analysis for rock climbing workout

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配粉红色图表，视觉层次分明，数据清晰易读
design_highlights.en: Dark background with pink charts creates clear visual hierarchy and readable data

design_highlights.cn: 双图表设计分层展示数据概览与详细时间序列，信息渐进呈现
design_highlights.en: Dual chart design progressively shows data overview and detailed time series

design_highlights.cn: 社交互动元素（112个点赞、1条评论）增强运动成就感和社区归属
design_highlights.en: Social elements (112 kudos, 1 comment) enhance achievement feeling and community belonging

design_highlights.cn: 平均心率虚线横贯全图作为基准参考，便于用户直观对比
design_highlights.en: Average heart rate dashed line across charts serves as visual benchmark reference

product_insight.cn: 将专业运动数据与社交互动融合，顶部点赞评论激励分享，双层图表满足快速浏览和深度分析两种需求，平均值基准线帮助用户理解表现波动，提升数据可读性
product_insight.en: Integrates professional workout data with social engagement. Dual-layer charts serve both quick overview and deep analysis needs, while average baseline helps users understand performance variations

core_function.cn: 展示睡眠数据并关联饮食等影响因素
core_function.en: Display sleep data and correlate with dietary factors

design_highlights.cn: 环形图清晰展示睡眠阶段分布，色彩编码直观区分各阶段
design_highlights.en: Ring chart clearly shows sleep stages with color-coded differentiation

design_highlights.cn: 睡眠因素滑块设计，可视化展示当前值与最优范围对比
design_highlights.en: Sleep factor sliders visualize current values against optimal ranges

design_highlights.cn: 空状态引导用户记录饮食，建立数据与睡眠的关联价值
design_highlights.en: Empty state guides users to log meals, establishing data-sleep correlation value

design_highlights.cn: 柔和的紫蓝色调营造安宁睡眠氛围
design_highlights.en: Soft purple-blue tones create calming sleep atmosphere

product_insight.cn: 创新性地将饮食、运动等因素与睡眠质量关联，空状态设计巧妙引导用户养成记录习惯，通过数据洞察提升用户粘性和产品价值感知
product_insight.en: Innovatively correlates diet and exercise with sleep quality. Empty state cleverly guides habit formation, enhancing user stickiness through data insights

core_function.cn: 展示攀岩运动过程中的心率变化与区间分布
core_function.en: Display heart rate trends and zone distribution during rock climbing

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合红粉色系心率图表，视觉层次分明且符合运动主题
design_highlights.en: Dark background with red-pink heart rate chart creates clear visual hierarchy and sports theme

design_highlights.cn: 环形图直观展示心率区间占比，94.4%大字体突出核心数据
design_highlights.en: Donut chart intuitively shows heart rate zone distribution with prominent 94.4% data

design_highlights.cn: 底部心率区间色带提供快速参考，支持用户理解数据含义
design_highlights.en: Bottom heart rate zone color bar provides quick reference for data interpretation

design_highlights.cn: 时间轴图表完整记录3.5小时运动轨迹，增强用户成就感
design_highlights.en: Timeline chart records full 3.5-hour activity, enhancing user sense of achievement

product_insight.cn: 将专业心率分析简化为易懂的视觉呈现，环形图聚焦关键指标，折线图展示过程细节，分层信息架构满足不同深度的数据需求，适合运动类App数据回顾场景
product_insight.en: Simplifies professional heart rate analysis into digestible visuals. Donut chart focuses on key metrics while timeline shows process details, layered information architecture serves varying data depth needs

core_function.cn: 展示单次跑步运动的详细数据和成就
core_function.en: Display detailed metrics and achievements for a single running activity

design_highlights.cn: 大尺寸用户照片占据上半屏，营造运动生活方式氛围感
design_highlights.en: Large hero image creates aspirational athletic lifestyle atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 成就卡片即时反馈周目标完成，激励用户持续运动
design_highlights.en: Achievement card provides instant feedback on weekly goal completion for motivation

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合清晰数据布局，四项核心指标一目了然
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with clean data layout, four key metrics displayed at a glance

design_highlights.cn: 装备关联设计（Anta PG7），支持跑鞋里程追踪
design_highlights.en: Gear linking feature enables shoe mileage tracking

product_insight.cn: 将运动数据与生活方式照片结合，强化社交属性。成就即时反馈机制提升完成感，装备追踪功能增加用户粘性和专业感，适合借鉴于健身类App。
product_insight.en: Combining activity data with lifestyle photos enhances social sharing appeal. Instant achievement feedback boosts completion satisfaction, while gear tracking increases stickiness and professional feel.

core_function.cn: 追踪和可视化腰围测量数据变化趋势
core_function.en: Track and visualize waist measurement changes over time

design_highlights.cn: 极简折线图设计，单色线条清晰展示数据趋势
design_highlights.en: Minimalist line chart with single-color display for clear data trends

design_highlights.cn: 顶部分类标签支持快速切换不同身体指标和时间范围
design_highlights.en: Top tabs enable quick switching between body metrics and time ranges

design_highlights.cn: 三栏数据摘要（起始/当前/变化）让关键指标一目了然
design_highlights.en: Three-column summary (start/current/change) provides instant key metrics overview

design_highlights.cn: 0%变化的中性展示，避免用户因暂无进展而产生挫败感
design_highlights.en: Neutral display of 0% change avoids discouraging users with no progress yet

product_insight.cn: 采用极简数据展示策略，降低用户认知负担。起始值与当前值并列显示便于对比，历史记录列表支持追溯，适合长期健康管理场景。单一数据点时的平线图表处理得当。
product_insight.en: Minimalist data presentation reduces cognitive load. Side-by-side start/current values enable easy comparison. Entry history supports tracking. Handles single data point gracefully with flat line chart.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步数据统计和个人最佳纪录徽章
core_function.en: Display running statistics and personal record badges

design_highlights.cn: 徽章系统采用六边形设计配合渐变色彩，不同距离用差异化配色区分层级
design_highlights.en: Hexagonal badge design with gradient colors, differentiated by distance levels

design_highlights.cn: 个人纪录徽章收集机制激发用户成就感和持续运动动力
design_highlights.en: Personal record badge collection motivates users with achievement sense

design_highlights.cn: 周视图切换器便于用户快速查看不同时间维度的运动数据
design_highlights.en: Week view switcher enables quick access to different time dimensions

design_highlights.cn: 简洁柱状图配合灰色调展示历史趋势，当前周数据突出显示
design_highlights.en: Minimal bar chart with gray tones, current week data highlighted

product_insight.cn: 通过游戏化徽章系统将枯燥的运动数据转化为可收集的成就，从1K到50K的完整里程碑体系覆盖新手到进阶用户，有效提升长期留存和运动积极性
product_insight.en: Gamified badge system transforms dry data into collectible achievements, milestone coverage from 1K to 50K engages beginners to advanced users, boosting retention

core_function.cn: 庆祝用户完成首次运动活动，增强归属感
core_function.en: Celebrate user's first activity completion and build belonging

design_highlights.cn: 3D金属质感徽章设计，全息渐变效果营造高级感和仪式感
design_highlights.en: 3D metallic badge with holographic gradient creates premium ceremonial feel

design_highlights.cn: "You're one of us now"文案配合emoji强化社区归属感
design_highlights.en: Welcoming copy with emoji reinforces community belonging

design_highlights.cn: 橙色动态曲线环绕徽章，增强视觉冲击力和品牌识别
design_highlights.en: Orange dynamic curves around badge enhance visual impact and brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA引导用户查看活动详情，保持操作聚焦
design_highlights.en: Single CTA guides users to view activity details, maintaining focus

product_insight.cn: Strava深谙游戏化激励设计，首次活动即给予隆重的成就反馈，通过社区归属感文案将个人行为转化为群体认同，大幅提升用户留存动机
product_insight.en: Strava excels at gamification - immediate grand achievement feedback for first activity, converting personal action into community identity through belonging-focused copy to boost retention

core_function.cn: 庆祝用户解锁新运动类型，提供正向激励反馈
core_function.en: Celebrate unlocking new sport type with positive reinforcement

design_highlights.cn: 橙色为主的活力配色，运动图标背景营造运动氛围
design_highlights.en: Vibrant orange color scheme with sport icons background creates athletic atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 勋章式设计配合"Nice work"文案，给予用户强烈成就感
design_highlights.en: Badge-style design with 'Nice work' copy delivers strong sense of accomplishment

design_highlights.cn: 中心圆环聚焦设计，跑鞋图标清晰展示解锁的运动类型
design_highlights.en: Centered circular focus design with running shoe icon clearly shows unlocked sport

design_highlights.cn: 单一CTA按钮简化操作，降低用户决策成本
design_highlights.en: Single CTA button simplifies interaction and reduces decision cost

product_insight.cn: 通过游戏化成就系统激励用户探索更多运动类型，勋章式视觉设计强化里程碑时刻，有效提升用户粘性和持续使用动力，值得健身类App借鉴
product_insight.en: Gamified achievement system motivates users to explore more sports. Badge-style visual reinforces milestone moments, effectively boosting retention and engagement motivation

core_function.cn: 展示腰围测量数据的历史趋势和变化分析
core_function.en: Display waist measurement history trends and change analysis

design_highlights.cn: 极简折线图设计，单色线条清晰展示数据走势
design_highlights.en: Minimalist line chart with single-color line clearly showing data trends

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗式日期范围选择器，支持快速切换时间维度
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet date range picker for quick time dimension switching

design_highlights.cn: 三列数据概览（起始值/当前值/变化量）直观呈现关键指标
design_highlights.en: Three-column data overview showing start/current/change metrics intuitively

design_highlights.cn: 0%变化显示保持用户动力，避免负面情绪
design_highlights.en: 0% change display maintains user motivation, avoiding negative emotions

product_insight.cn: 通过多时间维度选择器满足不同用户查看习惯，顶部核心指标+中部趋势图+底部详细记录的信息层级设计，让用户快速获取关键信息同时可深入查看详情
product_insight.en: Multi-timeframe selector accommodates different viewing habits. Information hierarchy with key metrics, trend chart, and detailed entries enables quick overview while allowing deep dive into details

core_function.cn: 展示用户成就徽章和里程碑记录
core_function.en: Display user achievement badges and milestone records

design_highlights.cn: 六边形徽章设计配合3D渐变效果，视觉冲击力强
design_highlights.en: Hexagonal badge with 3D gradient effect creates strong visual impact

design_highlights.cn: 1K成就数字突出显示，激励用户追求更高目标
design_highlights.en: Prominent 1K achievement number motivates users to pursue higher goals

design_highlights.cn: 空状态文案明确，添加按钮引导用户创建首条记录
design_highlights.en: Clear empty state copy with CTA button guides users to create first record

product_insight.cn: 采用游戏化徽章机制激励用户持续记录，空状态设计简洁不压迫，通过醒目的添加按钮降低用户首次记录门槛，培养使用习惯。
product_insight.en: Gamified badge system motivates continuous tracking. Clean empty state with prominent add button lowers barrier for first record, building user habits.

core_function.cn: 展示攀岩运动各分段时间与心率数据
core_function.en: Display time and heart rate data for each rock climbing lap

design_highlights.cn: 珊瑚粉色柱状图配深色背景，视觉层次分明且柔和
design_highlights.en: Coral pink bar chart on dark background creates clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 支持滚动浏览分段详情，图表与列表联动展示
design_highlights.en: Scrollable lap details with chart and list synchronized display

design_highlights.cn: 三列数据布局清晰，距离/时间/心率一目了然
design_highlights.en: Clear three-column layout for distance, time and heart rate

product_insight.cn: 将攀岩运动按分段拆解，配合心率波动图表，帮助用户分析每段攀爬的强度变化。0km距离设计说明系统识别这是原地攀岩而非跑步，体现运动类型的智能适配。
product_insight.en: Breaking climbing into laps with heart rate chart helps users analyze intensity changes. 0km distance indicates smart recognition of stationary climbing vs running activities.

core_function.cn: 展示用户每周运动心率数据和努力程度统计
core_function.en: Display weekly heart rate data and effort level statistics

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合大字体数字突出核心指标，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with large numeric display highlights key metrics with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 鼓励性文案'Keep uploading!'引导用户持续记录数据
design_highlights.en: Encouraging copy 'Keep uploading!' motivates users to continue tracking

design_highlights.cn: 支持左右滑动查看历史周数据，操作直观便捷
design_highlights.en: Swipe gestures to view past weeks data, intuitive and convenient

design_highlights.cn: 底部折线图配合时间轴展示长期趋势，数据可追溯
design_highlights.en: Bottom line chart with timeline shows long-term trends for data tracking

product_insight.cn: 通过空状态引导机制，告知用户需要一周数据才能生成完整报告，既管理预期又激励持续使用。数据积累策略有效提升用户留存和粘性。
product_insight.en: Empty state guidance informs users that one week of data is needed, managing expectations while motivating continued use. Data accumulation strategy effectively improves retention.

core_function.cn: 展示和管理每周跑步距离目标及完成进度
core_function.en: Display and manage weekly running distance goals and progress

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合绿色进度环，形成强烈视觉对比突出目标状态
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with green progress ring creates strong visual contrast for goal status

design_highlights.cn: 可展开的12周历史数据区域，支持快速查看长期趋势
design_highlights.en: Expandable 12-week history section enables quick access to long-term trends

design_highlights.cn: Extra字段展示超额完成量，正向激励用户持续运动
design_highlights.en: Extra field displays exceeded distance, positively motivating continued exercise

product_insight.cn: 采用极简目标卡片设计，Current/Extra双指标清晰展示完成度与超额量，12周历史折叠设计平衡信息密度与界面简洁，激励用户持续追踪长期表现。
product_insight.en: Minimalist goal card with Current/Extra dual metrics clearly shows completion and excess. 12-week collapsible history balances information density with clean UI, motivating long-term tracking.

core_function.cn: 展示用户最快1K跑步成绩及历史里程碑记录
core_function.en: Display fastest 1K running record and milestone history

design_highlights.cn: 六边形徽章设计极具辨识度，渐变灰黑配色传递成就感
design_highlights.en: Hexagonal badge design with gradient gray-black color conveys achievement

design_highlights.cn: 里程碑系统记录每次突破，激励用户持续挑战自我
design_highlights.en: Milestone system records each breakthrough, motivating continuous improvement

design_highlights.cn: 一键添加新记录按钮突出显示，降低数据录入门槛
design_highlights.en: Prominent add new record button reduces data entry friction

design_highlights.cn: 大字体时间展示强化成就感，让用户为自己骄傲
design_highlights.en: Large time display reinforces achievement, making users proud

product_insight.cn: 通过游戏化徽章和里程碑机制，将枯燥的跑步数据转化为可收集的成就，利用用户自我超越心理提升留存。支持手动添加记录体现了对用户数据自主权的尊重。
product_insight.en: Gamified badges and milestones transform boring running data into collectible achievements. Manual record entry respects user data autonomy and boosts retention through self-improvement psychology.

core_function.cn: 展示和管理跑步目标进度，支持编辑删除操作
core_function.en: Display and manage running goals progress with edit/delete actions

design_highlights.cn: 环形进度条直观展示目标完成度，蓝绿配色区分不同状态
design_highlights.en: Circular progress indicator shows goal completion with blue-green color coding

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹窗提供快捷操作入口，编辑删除操作清晰分离
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet provides quick actions with clear separation of edit and delete

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景配合高亮数据，聚焦用户注意力于关键指标
design_highlights.en: Dark background with highlighted data focuses attention on key metrics

design_highlights.cn: Extra字段展示超额完成量，激励用户持续突破目标
design_highlights.en: Extra field shows over-achievement to motivate users to exceed goals

product_insight.cn: 将目标拆解为距离和次数两个维度，配合12周历史趋势，帮助用户建立持续运动习惯。超额完成的正向反馈设计有效提升用户成就感和留存率。
product_insight.en: Breaking goals into distance and frequency dimensions with 12-week trends helps build consistent exercise habits. Over-achievement feedback effectively boosts user satisfaction and retention.

core_function.cn: 展示用户跑步训练的累计数据和综合评分
core_function.en: Display cumulative running stats and overall performance score

design_highlights.cn: 统一的青绿色图标系统，视觉一致性强，数据层级清晰
design_highlights.en: Consistent teal icon system with clear data hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: Runna Score配合个性化激励文案，增强用户成就感和持续动力
design_highlights.en: Runna Score with personalized encouragement boosts achievement and motivation

design_highlights.cn: 环形进度指示器直观展示评分，信息按钮提供深度解读入口
design_highlights.en: Circular progress indicator for score with info button for deeper insights

design_highlights.cn: 多维度训练指标（力量/柔韧/普拉提）引导用户探索更多功能
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimensional metrics guide users to explore more training features

product_insight.cn: 将简单的运动数据通过评分体系游戏化，零数据指标也展示出来制造完成冲动，个性化称呼增强归属感，整体设计驱动用户完成更多训练类型
product_insight.en: Gamifies simple stats through scoring system, displays zero metrics to create completion urge, personalized greeting enhances belonging, driving users to complete more training types

core_function.cn: 展示单次运动的完整数据和路线地图
core_function.en: Display complete workout data with route map

design_highlights.cn: 深色地图与亮色数据卡片形成层次对比，视觉焦点清晰
design_highlights.en: Dark map contrasts with light data cards creating clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 首次活动徽章奖励激励用户，增强成就感和留存动力
design_highlights.en: First activity badge reward motivates users and enhances achievement feeling

design_highlights.cn: 上下滑动切换地图全屏与数据统计的交互提示设计
design_highlights.en: Swipe gesture tooltip guides users between full-screen map and stats view

design_highlights.cn: 底部AI分析订阅引导，场景化推广高级功能
design_highlights.en: Bottom AI analysis subscription prompt contextually promotes premium features

product_insight.cn: 将碳排放节省作为核心数据展示，差异化定位环保健康理念；首次活动奖励机制降低新用户的成就门槛，配合AI功能订阅引导形成完整的用户培育路径
product_insight.en: Carbon saved metric as core data differentiates with eco-health positioning; first activity reward lowers achievement barrier for new users, combined with AI subscription prompt creates complete user nurturing funnel

core_function.cn: 展示每日反思完成状态并推荐相关冥想内容
core_function.en: Display daily reflection completion and recommend related meditation content

design_highlights.cn: 暖橙渐变背景配合粉色云朵意象，营造温暖治愈的氛围感
design_highlights.en: Warm orange gradient with pink cloud imagery creates healing atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 用户回答'I feel relieved'展示情绪记录，强化自我觉察体验
design_highlights.en: User response 'I feel relieved' reinforces self-awareness experience

design_highlights.cn: 完成反思后立即推荐11分钟冥想内容，提升功能连续使用率
design_highlights.en: Immediate meditation recommendation after reflection boosts continuous engagement

design_highlights.cn: 日历图标显示21天打卡进度，激励持续使用习惯养成
design_highlights.en: Calendar icon shows 21-day streak progress to motivate habit formation

product_insight.cn: 通过反思完成→内容推荐的闭环设计，将单次互动延伸为完整冥想体验。日期标注的反思卡片设计便于用户回顾情绪轨迹，强化产品的长期价值感知。
product_insight.en: Closed-loop design from reflection to content recommendation extends single interaction into complete experience. Dated reflection cards enable emotional tracking, reinforcing long-term product value.

core_function.cn: 展示用户运动活动历史记录和成就
core_function.en: Display user's workout activity history and achievements

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合运动图片，营造专业健身氛围
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with action photos creates professional fitness atmosphere

design_highlights.cn: 首次活动徽章奖励，激励新用户持续使用
design_highlights.en: First activity badge reward motivates new users to continue

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式活动流设计，信息层次清晰易扫读
design_highlights.en: Card-based activity feed with clear information hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 底部社交引导提示，鼓励用户邀请好友
design_highlights.en: Social prompt at bottom encourages friend invitations

product_insight.cn: 通过首次活动成就徽章强化正向反馈，结合社交引导降低新用户流失。活动卡片展示完整运动数据，建立用户成就感和使用粘性。
product_insight.en: First activity badge reinforces positive feedback, combined with social prompts to reduce new user churn. Activity cards display complete workout data to build achievement and engagement.

core_function.cn: 展示用户运动活动记录和成就徽章
core_function.en: Display user workout activities and achievement badges

design_highlights.cn: 深色主题配合橙色强调色，运动感强烈，图片沉浸式展示
design_highlights.en: Dark theme with orange accent creates sporty vibe, immersive image display

design_highlights.cn: 首次活动徽章奖励配合鼓励文案，增强用户成就感
design_highlights.en: First activity badge with encouraging copy boosts user achievement feeling

design_highlights.cn: Progress/Activities分页切换，便于查看不同维度数据
design_highlights.en: Progress/Activities tab switching for viewing different data dimensions

design_highlights.cn: 底部社交引导提示寻找好友，促进社区活跃
design_highlights.en: Bottom social prompt encourages finding friends to boost community engagement

product_insight.cn: 通过即时成就徽章奖励新用户首次活动，降低使用门槛并建立正向反馈循环。社交引导巧妙植入，利用同伴激励提升留存。活动卡片信息层次清晰，兼顾数据展示与视觉美感。
product_insight.en: Instant achievement badge for first activity lowers barrier and creates positive feedback loop. Subtle social prompts leverage peer motivation for retention. Activity cards balance data display with visual appeal.

core_function.cn: 以3D地图形式展示运动轨迹和数据统计
core_function.en: Display activity route and stats with 3D map visualization

design_highlights.cn: 3D卫星地图视角呈现运动路线，视觉冲击力强，增强分享欲望
design_highlights.en: 3D satellite map view showcases route with strong visual impact for sharing

design_highlights.cn: 关键数据三列布局清晰展示配速、海拔、距离，一目了然
design_highlights.en: Three-column layout clearly displays pace, elevation, and distance metrics

design_highlights.cn: 绿色起点标记突出运动轨迹，增强运动成就感
design_highlights.en: Green start marker highlights route, enhancing sense of achievement

product_insight.cn: Strava将运动数据与3D地图结合，创造高品质分享素材。这种设计激发用户社交分享欲望，通过UGC内容实现病毒式传播，是运动类App提升用户粘性的经典策略。
product_insight.en: Strava combines activity data with 3D maps to create shareable content. This design encourages social sharing and viral growth through UGC, a classic strategy for fitness apps.

core_function.cn: 展示跑步训练计划进度与预估成绩提升
core_function.en: Display running plan progress and estimated performance improvement

design_highlights.cn: 多距离成绩对比采用渐变色标签区分，信息层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Multi-distance results use gradient color badges for clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 预估时间改善用绿色负值展示，强化进步激励感
design_highlights.en: Estimated time improvements shown in green negative values to reinforce motivation

design_highlights.cn: 徽章等级系统结合进度条，增强用户持续训练动力
design_highlights.en: Badge level system with progress bar enhances user retention and training motivation

design_highlights.cn: 四宫格快捷入口设计，核心功能一触即达
design_highlights.en: Four-grid quick access design enables one-tap navigation to core features

product_insight.cn: 通过当前成绩与6周后预估成绩的直观对比，将抽象的训练效果量化可视化，有效降低用户的不确定感，徽章体系和多距离预估增强用户信心与粘性
product_insight.en: Quantifying training results through current vs 6-week projected comparison reduces uncertainty, while badge system and multi-distance projections build user confidence and retention

core_function.cn: 展示用户历史运动记录和详细数据
core_function.en: Display user's workout history and detailed activity data

design_highlights.cn: 活动卡片左侧黄绿渐变色条，突出运动类型的视觉层次
design_highlights.en: Yellow-green gradient accent bar on activity cards creates visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 多维度筛选器（运动类型/年份/月份）便于快速查找历史记录
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimensional filters (type/year/month) enable quick history lookup

design_highlights.cn: 关键数据（距离、时间、配速）横向并排，信息密度高且易读
design_highlights.en: Key metrics displayed horizontally with high density yet good readability

design_highlights.cn: 徽章图标激励用户完成更多运动获得成就
design_highlights.en: Badge icon motivates users to complete more workouts for achievements

product_insight.cn: 采用月度汇总+单条记录的层级结构，顶部显示月累计数据，底部展示具体活动，帮助用户建立长期运动习惯的同时追踪每次训练效果，游戏化徽章增强用户粘性。
product_insight.en: Hierarchical structure with monthly summary and individual records helps users build long-term habits while tracking each session. Gamified badges enhance engagement and retention.

core_function.cn: 展示用户历史运动活动数据和统计
core_function.en: Display user workout history and activity statistics

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局展示运动详情，信息层级清晰，配合运动图标增强识别性
design_highlights.en: Card-based layout with clear information hierarchy and sport icons for recognition

design_highlights.cn: 多维度筛选器（类型/年/月）支持快速定位历史记录
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimensional filters (type/year/month) for quick history navigation

design_highlights.cn: 成就徽章（数字5）激励用户持续运动，增加游戏化体验
design_highlights.en: Achievement badge motivates continued exercise with gamification elements

product_insight.cn: 页面采用简洁的单卡片设计，顶部汇总月度数据便于用户追踪目标。筛选器设计降低查找成本，游戏化徽章增强用户粘性。空状态提示友好，避免用户困惑。
product_insight.en: Clean single-card design with monthly summary for goal tracking. Filter system reduces search friction, gamification badges boost retention. Friendly empty state messaging prevents confusion.

core_function.cn: 展示用户运动和健身活动历史记录
core_function.en: Display user workout and fitness activity history

design_highlights.cn: 卡片式布局清晰区分不同类型活动，图标配色直观识别运动类型
design_highlights.en: Card layout clearly separates activity types with intuitive sport icons and colors

design_highlights.cn: 多维度筛选器支持按运动类型、年份、月份快速定位历史记录
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimension filters allow quick filtering by workout type, year, and month

design_highlights.cn: 徽章成就系统激励用户持续运动，数字5暗示连续打卡天数
design_highlights.en: Badge achievement system motivates consistent exercise with streak indicator

product_insight.cn: 页面顶部月度汇总数据提供宏观视角，单条记录展示关键指标（距离、时间、配速），满足用户快速回顾需求。游戏化徽章设计增强用户粘性和成就感。
product_insight.en: Monthly summary at top provides macro view while individual entries show key metrics. Gamification badges enhance user retention and sense of achievement.

core_function.cn: 引导用户对App进行评分，提升应用商店评价
core_function.en: Prompt users to rate the app on App Store

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的卡片式弹窗设计，品牌logo突出展示增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Clean card-style dialog with prominent brand logo for trust

design_highlights.cn: 友好亲切的文案"Enjoying Calm?"以问句开启对话，降低用户抵触
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy "Enjoying Calm?" opens conversation, reduces resistance

design_highlights.cn: 五星可视化评分组件直观易操作，降低评分门槛
design_highlights.en: Visual 5-star rating component is intuitive and lowers friction

design_highlights.cn: 双按钮设计提供明确的操作选择，Submit采用蓝色强调引导点击
design_highlights.en: Dual buttons with blue Submit CTA guides user action

product_insight.cn: 评分弹窗在用户使用功能后适时出现（如冥想结束），利用满意度高峰时刻获取好评。预选五星降低操作成本，是提升ASO评分的经典转化策略。
product_insight.en: Rating prompt appears after positive moments (like meditation). Pre-selected 5 stars reduces friction, a classic ASO conversion tactic leveraging peak satisfaction.

core_function.cn: 告知用户操作失败并提供重试引导
core_function.en: Inform users of operation failure and provide retry guidance

design_highlights.cn: 深色背景搭配白色弹窗，形成强烈视觉焦点
design_highlights.en: Dark background with white modal creates strong visual focus

design_highlights.cn: 单一确认按钮简化用户决策，蓝色CTA易于点击
design_highlights.en: Single confirm button simplifies decision, blue CTA easy to tap

design_highlights.cn: 友好的错误文案避免责怪用户，降低挫败感
design_highlights.en: Friendly error copy avoids blaming users, reduces frustration

product_insight.cn: 错误提示采用模态弹窗确保用户必须确认，文案用"Looks like"软化语气，避免技术性描述。顶部进度条保留上下文，让用户知道可从中断处继续。
product_insight.en: Modal alert ensures user acknowledgment. 'Looks like' softens tone, avoiding technical jargon. Progress bar preserves context, indicating users can resume from interruption point.
